movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Xia Luo, with his hands on his hips, stood in the midst of the crowd, looking around. He then walked to the window, opened it, and looked outside, saying to his mom: "Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later."
Xia Luo, ignoring everyone's calls, jumped out of the window and left.
Ma Dongmei turned her head in surprise, only to see a large number of small fly-like insects in the air, instantly flashing a blinding light.
At this moment, Xia Luo's eyes were still tightly shut. After a while, he slowly opened them, took a deep breath, and then said, "Wife, I dreamt of my mom."
Ma Dongmei's mother said: "Son, who are you calling your wife?"
Xia Luo opened his eyes and said, "Mom," and then frowned.
Mom said: 'You scared your Mom to death, can't believe you are still alive, can you?'
Ma Dongmei said in disbelief: 'I can't believe you are still alive.'
Mom was just about to comfort Xia Luo when the doctor came in. Doctor said: "From the current situation, there shouldn't be any major issues."
Xia Luo suddenly sat up and asked, "What year is it now, and is the President of the United States still Obama?"
Doctor said: "Maybe you should consider transferring hospitals."
Mom asked, "Son, what's wrong?" Xia Luo immediately got up and ran out of the ward, and Mom asked, "Xia Luo?"

Xia Luo left the hospital in a daze, wearing only his pajamas and with a neck brace. He left the hospital and went barefoot, ignoring the stares of passersby. He ran all the way to the street, where a few boys were playing with bicycles. He ran over and snatched one.

The scene shifts to Xia Luo waking up from his nightmare. He is seen wearing a neck brace, staggering through the streets. The camera pans over the familiar neighborhood, passing by the old school building and the grocery store where he used to hang out with Ma Dongmei.
He recalled the scenes of practicing boxing with his father, the various national flags he had seen, and the patriotic songs his mother had sung.

The crowd scattered in all directions, and the two were soon separated. Xia Luo was left standing in the middle of the road, holding onto the car roof, while Ma Dongmei ran off in the opposite direction. The two were no longer connected, like two trains that had reached the end of their tracks.

Ma Dongmei continued: 'If something happens to Xia Luo, I just can't go on living.' 'Honestly, Xia Luo has been fatherless since he was little.' 'Right after Xia Luo was born, Xia Luo's father disappeared.'
Ma Dongmei comforted her: "Auntie, I can especially understand you. Our family is in the same situation. My father is Ma Dong; as soon as I was born, my father was gone, so they call me, Ma Dongmei."
At this moment, Xia Luo limped into the house, opened the beaded curtain, and said, "Sorry."
The next day, the two of them arrived at the campus. Xia Luo ran ahead, and Ma Dongmei followed behind. They climbed the steps and reached the classroom.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1140_1320.text: Hunter turned and walked away, saying, "You too, goodbye."
A-Zheng asked, "What about that?"
Piggy said, 'What?'
Lei Luo whispered, 'Help me deal with them,' and then walked into the room.
Piggy walked over and asked, 'Is there any film loaded? Is there any film?'
Piggy pointed at the letter and said, "You asked us not to load it"
Piggy affirmed, "That's correct, congratulations to you." "Everyone gets a 200-dollar red packet," "because it's my birthday today, come get it."
A group of reporters thanked Lei Luo, saying, "Thank you, brother."
A Hao lying on the ground said, "Send him to the hospital"
A-Zheng said, 'Alright.'
Lei Luo said angrily, "It's your fault," "if you had let him go just now, nothing would have happened."
A-Zheng said, "We have to follow the rules in doing things"

A Hao's lips moved slightly, as if he wanted to say something. The scene then returned to the past, to the day Ah Mui asked him to marry her. He picked a wildflower and handed it to Ah Mui. Ah Mui accepted the ring he offered and happily twirled around.
A Hao was running through the woods with Ah Mui, shouting: 'Ah Mui' 'Help' 'A Hao' 'Ah Meng'
Nurse said, "Wu Shi Hao," "Wu Shi Hao," "Are you feeling better?"
Nurse said, 'Slow down, your ribs are injured.'
A Hao tried to get up and said, "Miss."
A Hao was taken to the prison, where Hunter recognized him immediately. "It's him," "Open the door," "Do you remember me?"
Hunter pointed at A Hao and asked, 'Do you remember him?'
A Hao raised his hand and said, "Do you remember my face? Do you like to beat up policemen?"
A Hao hurriedly said, "I'm sorry, I'm sorry..."
A Hao asked in confusion, "Why?"
The prison guard said, 'Speak English, come on.'
A Hao asked in confusion, "What?"
A Hao was startled by Hunter's words and quickly apologized, 'Sorry, sorry.'
Hunter said, "I'm sorry," "He's sorry," "Okay, then I'm very sorry too."
A Hao charged at Hunter, but was pushed away. Then, Hunter pulled out a taser from his waist and shocked A Hao.
A Hao was kicked to the ground, and the police started hitting him. He yelled, 'Help, the police are beating people!'
A-Zheng shouted, "Shut up," and then sprayed the water at the three people in the interrogation room, causing them to fall to the ground.
A-Zheng and Piggy were watching from outside the railing, while the reporters outside the railing were frantically taking photos. Lei Luo walked over, smiling, and said, "Stop, stop."
Lei Luo said, 'Oh, officer, you are here. You should have given me a heads up.'
Hunter walked in with his guards and said, "Don't take pictures, leave here."
Cop: "There is nothing to shoot here, let's go."
Lei Luo said, 'Yes, let the officer leave first, I'll handle them.'
Piggy said, "Open the door." The prison door was opened, and Piggy walked out of the room under A-Zheng's escort.
Hunter said, "I know what you want," "Don't be proud of yourself."
Piggy said, "Goodbye, officer."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5880_6060.text: Tang Zheng, who had been hiding in the wardrobe, took the opportunity to slip out. He swam in the pool, trying to reach the shore. Tang Zheng reached the shore, but the assassin who had been chasing him couldn't keep up. Tang Zheng climbed out of the pool and ran towards the shore.

Lin Chong rushed into the rain, shouting, "Sis, get up!" Xiao Xing, lying on the ground, was kicked into the pool by Tang Zheng. Lin Chong, who was about to help, was punched by Tang Zheng and fell into the pool as well. Tang Zheng, with a bloody face, stood in the pool, looking down at the two struggling in the water.

Liang Cong shouted, "Sis, sis, save me, sis. Get up quickly. Hurry up and get up. Sis, hurry up and get up." Xiao Xing, with eyes closed and face full of injuries, was unconscious. Tang Zheng, with a bleeding forehead, held Xiao Xing's neck, while Liang Cong, with a bleeding face, was pulling Xiao Xing out of the car.
Tang Zheng said, "Sis, get up quickly!" Hearing Tang Zheng's voice, Xiao Xing slowly opened her eyes and turned her head to look at him.
Tang Zheng crawled over to Xiao Xing, lifted her up, and said, "Get up, sis, get up quickly."

Tang Zheng slowly bent down, leaning on the piano, and fumbled to pick up the crystal bottle from the piano. Inside the bottle was a tiny wax figure. Tang Zheng held the bottle in his hand, bringing it close to his face, and gently kissed it.

Tang Zheng picked up the music box containing the shattered crystal heart and walked out of the bedroom. Xiao Xing, who was lying on the ground, kept shouting Tang Zheng's name, but Tang Zheng paid her no heed and walked straight to the coffee table. He picked up the music box and examined it closely.
Xiao Xing crawled towards the wallet on the ground, while Tang Zheng picked up the glass bottle, Xiao Xing looked at the wallet in hand, her eyes filled with terror.
Tang Zheng suddenly knelt down, pressing on Xiao Xing's chest with both hands, trying to resuscitate her.
Tang Zheng grabbed Xiao Xing's neck and said, "Why, why won't you listen to me, I'm doing this for your own good, you know, why don't you listen to me, why, obey me."
Xiao Xing struggled to turn her head, saw Tang Zheng beside her, reached out to strangle him, but Tang Zheng grabbed her wrist and smiled at her.
Xiao Xing, with a face full of blood, struggled to open her eyes and saw Tang Zheng on the ground. She then looked at Lin Chong, her eyes full of hatred.
Lin Chong knelt down and said, "Sister, sister, are you alright?" Xiao Xing weakly smiled, and Lin Chong continued, "I am Lin Chong."
Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong and said, "Lin Chong..."
Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong's face and said, "Lin Chong, leave quickly." Xiao Xing took off the ring from Lin Chong's hand and placed it in his palm, saying, "Go."

Xiao Xing said, "You should leave quickly." Lin Chong looked at Xiao Xing, then at Tang Zheng, and finally at the wound on Xiao Xing's neck. He took off his coat, covered Xiao Xing's wound, and pressed down hard.

Lin Chong unlocked the chains and shackles on Xiao Xing, Xiao Xing, who had been kneeling on the ground, collapsed weakly when the shackles were removed. Lin Chong pulled Xiao Xing to sit down on the floor, then cut the chains connecting the door and window to the shackles with a knife.
Lin Chong knelt on the ground, gasping for air, then helped Xiao Xing up. Xiao Xing clung to Lin Chong like a teddy bear, her hands tightly wrapped around his neck.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3300_3480.text: Qi Jia changed into a stylish short-haired wig, dressed in a formal suit, and looked in the mirror. She touched the collar of her shirt, feeling something off. On the dining table was a lunchbox with the words 'I love you' written on it. Qi Jia picked up the lunchbox to inspect it closely.
Qi Jia opened the lid, revealing a cute and adorable bento box made by Yuan Xiaoou. She couldn't help but smile and then started to drink the milk.
Yuan Xiaoou ran and shouted, "Exercise to protect the motherland! Pick up the pace!"

Qi Jia, wearing 3D glasses, sat in the cinema, looking at the man next to her, who was also wearing 3D glasses. She stared at him, and he stared back, their hands gradually moving closer. Qi Jia suddenly pulled his hand away and laughed out loud. The popcorn bucket in the man's hand also fell to the ground.
Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou went to the cinema, then to the spa. Qi Jia lay on the bed with a green facial mask, while Yuan Xiaoou sat in the living room with a magazine over his head.

Qi Jia, with a face mask, patted Yuan Xiaoou's face with the mask on, then took the mask off and went to the front desk to buy two sets of masks. Yuan Xiaoou got up to follow and asked, 'Hey, why didn’t you wake me?' 'What’s so funny? Am I not handsome enough?'
Qi Jia, seeing this, teased Yuan Xiaoou with a smile and said, "You look super handsome today." "Look!" "Right?"
Yuan Xiaoou explained, 'It's not about what I'm wearing today.' 'How come... They think I look very...’ As he spoke, he gestured towards the mannequin in the store window.

After the laundry was complete, Yuan Xiaoou carried the basin of clothes into the house. Walking through the living room, he suddenly paused, as if struck by a good idea. He stopped in his tracks, pursed his lips, and began to scheme.
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Qi Jia, Qi Jia, come quickly, what is this thing?'
Qi Jia, seeing the turtle under Yuan Xiaoou's foot, quickly stood up and said, "Yuan Xiaoou, you’re stepping on it, you murderer! Yuan Xiaoou, after all these years, are you still doing okay?"
Yuan Xiaoou, holding the dirty clothes, asked, "If I may ask, then what should I be called?"
Qi Jia, after hearing this, turned her head to look at him, and Yuan Xiaoou, sensing the atmosphere was off, asked, 'What’s your name anyway?'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "Forget it, it’s not important anymore. That turtle has been starving for four years, find it something to eat, will you?"
Qi Jia, holding the turtle, said, 'At this age, the turtle is in the prime of its life in the turtle world, food isn’t that important' 'Let’s release it and let it find a girlfriend.'
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "Is what you're wearing the trend from fashion week this year?"
Qi Jia, walking behind Yuan Xiaoou, said: 'I forgot to change my pants.' 'I was wondering why it felt so breezy.'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "But you’re quite fashionable, oh!" "Look at me, showing a bit of leg hair. Is it fashionable too?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_6060_6240.text: Tang Zheng shouted from inside the car: "Sister, save me! Sister, hurry!"
Xiao Xing, who was still in shock, was then hit by a car and sent flying. She rolled on the ground several times before lying on her side, barely able to move.

Xiao Xing crawled forward, reaching out to grab the guitar, but accidentally knocked it over. She tried again, but failed. She tried to get up to pursue, but her legs wouldn't cooperate. She tried to reach out again, but the guitar was farther away than before. Xiao Xing's hair was soaked, her clothes were drenched, and she was shivering uncontrollably.
Liang Cong cried out, "Sister, come save me, Sister, come save me, Sister, hurry and save me."

Lin Chong was thrown out of the car by Tang Zheng, lying in the rain in the swimming pool, struggling painfully. Xiao Xing, with a bleeding forehead, staggered towards the car, looking at the blood-covered Lin Chong inside.

Liang Cong raised his hands above his head, trying to reach the window, but Xiao Xing was already holding the knife with his right hand, pressing it against the window, his left hand reaching out to Liang Cong.
Xiao Xing tried to open the car door, but the doorknob came off in her hand.
Xiao Xing cried out loud, her body shaking uncontrollably.
Xiao Xing cried out, "Tang Zheng"
Liang Cong turned around and said, "Sister."
Xiao Xing reached out to touch the statue, saying: "I dare not go up"
The scene shifts to a rainy night, Xiao Xing stands in the rain, crying as she carves her own name beside a statue.
Liang Cong looked at Xiao Xing with a smile full of affection and then laughed.
Xiao Xing cried out, "I am not like you! I am not like you!"
Tang Zheng, who had just rushed out of the house, saw Lin Chong struggling to get up and hurried over. He reached out to help Lin Chong up.

Tang Zheng climbed out of the pool, holding a dagger, and walked towards Xiao Xing with a determined look. Xiao Xing was extremely scared, but she had to face it head-on, just like she had faced all the other difficulties in her life.
Tang Zheng said, "Just rush forward without turning back." "Fear is not the master."
Tang Zheng walked towards Xiao Xing in the pouring rain, and Xiao Xing also walked towards him, their steps echoing each other. The rain was like a curtain, obscuring their faces.
Tang Zheng clenched the black umbrella in his hand, struggling to hold on, as the strong wind carried the umbrella away, leaving Tang Zheng alone in the rain.

Xiao Xing stood in the rain, closed her eyes, and slowly lowered her head. Her tightly closed eyes revealed no fear, as if she had made a decision. She slowly raised her hand, holding a gun, and her trembling hand betrayed her inner struggle. Xiao Xing's lips trembled slightly, and at that moment, Tang Zheng arrived.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1320_1500.text: A Hao asked: "Who brought me to the hospital?"
Qing Jie asked: "Luo Ge, are you very close to him?" "He seems to be very kind to you."
A Hao asked: "Where are my brothers?"
Qing Jie replied: "They are in another room."
Xiao Wei said: "Brother Hao."
A Hao asked the two people outside the door: "Are you all okay?"
Pighead said: "No problem."
The man with the bandaged chin said: "No problem."
David said: "Brother Zai came to see you"
A Hao said: "Brother Zai."
Xiao Wei's wife said: "Brother Zai."
Piggy said: "Hello Sister Qing"
Piggy asked: "How are you, feeling any better?"
A Hao said with a smile: "I’m okay, no problems at all"
Piggy said: "Luo Ge asked me to bring two hunchbacks," "to support your living expenses"
David said: "So five hundred is called a hunchback"
Xiao Wei happily said: "Brother Hao, now we are going to be rich."
David said: "Yes, Brother Zai said, we're going to follow Luo Ge from now on."
Piggy said: "Rest well, when you're better, lots of money will be waiting for you to earn."
A Hao said: "Luo Ge thinks of us, how can we help him?"
Piggy said: "No need to worry, you'll find out once you're recovered." "By the way, I'm in a hurry, got to go first."
A Hao said: "Brother Zai, then can I trouble you to help us, thank Luo Ge for us, okay?"
Pighead said: "Alright, alright, alright."
A Hao said to the nurse: "Take care," then walked out of the ward with his brothers. On the street, the brothers swaggered around, each with a cigarette in his mouth.
The five people from the car got out and walked towards the building. When they reached the stairwell, they found the door open and asked, 'What happened, why is this door open?'
David said: "You have to hit the women."
David pointed at Bao Zu Po and said: "What's the matter, Bao Zu Po? What are you doing?"
David pointed at Da Lan Cai and asked, 'What's the matter? What's the matter?'
Da Lan Cai angrily said: "His father lost a lot of money in my place, and I can't find him anywhere."
Da Lan Cai said: "Wait a minute, how should I address you, how should I address you"
Xiao Wei said: "Big Rotten Fortune."
A Hao said: "So you're Brother Fortune, right?"
The man in the suit said: "This is his father's deed of sale"
Da Lan Cai said, "Let me have a look."

David said, "Hit him," and then pushed the elderly woman down. The others rushed forward to stop it, saying, "Don't hit, don't hit, we're with Big Grizzly, you can save her for now, but can you protect her for a lifetime?"
The man in the white shirt said: "You're a coward, aren't you?" "He says he's with Big Grizzly." "Oh, I'm so scared."
Da Lan Cai said: "Don’t have to pay back the money owed?" "You know the rules or not? At least pay back a little bit"
Da Lan Cai asked, "How much is owed to you?"
Xiao Wei said: "Owe nine thousand seven."
A Hao said: "Nine thousand seven, right?" A Hao was pushed to the corner by Da Lan Cai, unable to speak for a long time.
A Hao said: "Come, take out the ones Luo Ge gave us first."
Xiao Wei took out the money and said: "Here's seven hundred," "I owe you nine grand."
Da Lan Cai said: "How can I trust you?"
A Hao said: "You don't trust me, huh? I'll give you two choices, either you trust me or I'll cripple you right now."
David said: "Understand?"
Da Lan Cai said: "Fine, I'll give you one month." "I'm going." After saying that, he left with his men.
A Hua ran over and hugged David, crying. David comforted her, saying: "Don't be scared, don't be scared, it's alright now."
Luo Ge's subordinate said: "<A Hao1>, you have to work hard for me with Sir Zhou's daughter, whether I can be promoted to Chief Detective or not all depends on you."
David said: "Leave it to me"
Yan Tong looked at Luo Ge and said: "Why is that brat here?"
Yan Tong looked at Luo Ge and said: "How did you get in?" "This isn’t a place for you, is it?"
Luo Ge said with a smile: "I was invited by someone."
Yan Tong asked puzzledly: "Who invited you to such a big event here?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_3480_3660.text: Qi Jia looked at the sky, Yuan Xiaoou handed the turtle to her, and she wrote on it with a marker.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "There is no feast that doesn't end, okay, this is your last photo shoot, strangle him, yes, pose as if you're strangling him, okay, hit, hit, hit him, kill him, don't kiss him, you kiss him, are you stupid or what?"
Qi Jia ran to the seaside, threw the scarf into the sea, and turned around to hug Yuan Xiaoou, saying: "I'm so happy."
Qi Jia said: "My lip hurts a lot."
Yuan Xiaoou followed behind and said: "Are you stupid or not?" "Are you stupid?"
Suddenly, a turtle appeared behind them. Qi Jia excitedly said: "It's back," "How did it come back?"
Yuan Xiaoou squatted down and said: "Are you playing stubborn?" "Huh?" "Acting like a hooligan, aren't you?" "I'm gonna give it another ride," "It's too young and can't recognize the way."
The two reached the seaside, Qi Jia turned back and said: "I knew you couldn't bear to leave me."
Yuan Xiaoou picked up the stone and said: "No, it's lost." "Isn't that right," "You got lost right?"
The man said: "Hey, young man, are you silly? That's a freshwater turtle, it crawled back when you threw it into the sea. Really silly."
Yuan Xiaoou, covering his face in pain, chased after Qi Jia and said: "Are you stupid? You can't even tell the difference between a freshwater turtle and a sea turtle."

Qi Jia said: 'You brought me to the beach,' Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou who was laughing and said: 'Laugh,' 'What're you giggling at?' Qi Jia turned her head to look at the sea, Yuan Xiaoou put the turtle into the bag, Qi Jia turned back and said: 'My lip hurts and you are still laughing.'

Qi Jia stood up and looked at Yuan Xiaoou, the scene shifted to the lake in the city park, with high-rise buildings in the distance, Yuan Xiaoou was crouching by the lake feeding fish, Qi Jia stood behind him.
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a mischievous smile, Yuan Xiaoou slowly extended his hand, Qi Jia squatted down, and carefully watched as Yuan Xiaoou slowly released the turtle into the water.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Mr. Liu, you can finally go back to your parents now," "once you leave don't come back."
The scene shifts to a restaurant, where Lin Shuer says: "Not bad, your complexion is rosy and shiny, could it be that you got the big fool to do something for you?"
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: 'I just had a good sleep, is that a big deal?'
Lin Shuer said: "During my travels, I heard that the big fool has trained you very well, it was worthwhile to take him in."
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: "When I took him in, I had no ulterior motives at all."
Lin Shuer said: 'Could it be that you two are the long-lost 'tears between men and women' that scares many of-age youths in the world, the pure friendship between a man and a woman?'
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: 'He and I have pure friendship like sisters.'

Lin Shuer said: 'You have such a 'sacred beast' that 'harvests Yang to supplement Yin' at home, and you're so calm. To be honest, there aren’t many people who would give their lives and shed blood for you.'
Qi Jia sips her drink and says: "But..."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: The scene shifts to the school, where two big speakers are installed in the courtyard. Da Chun is standing behind them, slowly shaking his body to the rhythm of the song.
Meng Te: "I always said Xia Luo had a few screws loose." "It's really frightening." "I'll be avoiding him from now on."
Meng Te took the egg from Zhang Yang's hand and said, "You don't need to." "You've got a heavy yin aura; it'll counter him."
Meng Te waved his hand and said, "I hate it." "I don't want to play with you boys." "It drives me crazy."
Zhang Yang smoking nearby said, "Sha Chun," "Put out the cigarette."
Da Chun: "I have some thoughts about this."
Teacher: "Hey, you shorty smoking next to the toilet, which class are you in? Get to the principal's office now."
The scene shifts to Qiu Ya sitting alone in the park, with classmates saying to her: "Qiu Ya, cheer up." "It's just a kiss."
Ma Dongmei stood up and said, "Hey, listen up." "If you have something to say, say it to my face." "Stop gossiping behind my back all day."

Ma Dongmei: "But seriously, isn't Xia Luo kind of dumb? He dared to hit the teacher for my sake. I warned him that I can't date right now because I need to focus on practicing the shot put. And what did he do? He jumped out of a window for me. When will Xia Luo finally grow up?"
The girl with glasses continued, "Dongmei, maybe I should tell you in detail what happened after you left."
The boy with glasses said: "Sorry, sorry." "Hey Losao, kick the ball back, please."
Ma Dongmei stood up and said, "I warn you, don't call me by that name irresponsibly." "My relationship with Xia Luo isn't set in stone." "Ugh, here, catch this."

Principal said sternly: "Since the founding of the school," "or even since the establishment of New China," "nothing this egregious has ever happened in the history of education." "Therefore, the school has decided to expel him!"
Principal looked at the woman, who was daydreaming with her head on her hand, and suddenly the woman's phone rang. The woman untied her hair clip and looked at the caller ID, then answered the phone.
Xiaodao: "It's all for the sake of the child." "Sorry, principal, please understand." "Help!" "The principal is molesting me!"
Ma Dongmei: "How am I being a hooligan?"
The woman angrily said: "There's no mother like this" "Totally devoid of manners!"
Ma Dongmei: "I can't face anyone anymore."
Principal said helplessly: "Alright, alright, let's just let Xia Luo write another self-criticism."
Ma Dongmei: "Thank you, principal."

Principal: "Hey, hey, hey, no recess exercise today. We need to hold an emergency meeting. Yesterday, there was a shocking incident where a student hit a teacher in the second class of the third grade. The culprit, Xia Luo, committed a grave offense and should be expelled. However, he recognized his mistake in time and repented by jumping from a window."

Principal said sternly: "Moreover, he helped a frightened classmate with CPR. Considering this, the school will record a major demerit for Xia Luo and ask him to self-critique in front of the entire school." Principal gestured with a fan, and the students around waited for Xia Luo to come forward. Xia Luo walked slowly with a hunched back, and a girl in the crowd shouted: "Hey, what are you doing?" Xia Luo covered his head with a torn school flag.

movie101_7010686199291445773_660_840.text: Xiao Xing said: "Thank you, Cong Cong." "I'm not eating anymore, you eat." "I'm not eating anymore, you eat, Cong Cong."
The next day, the alarm clock went off as usual, but there was no sign of Xiao Xing in the kitchen.
The next day, Zheng Huiying was scrubbing the floor when a knock on the door sounded.

She desperately banged on the door, but there was no response. She leaned against the door, her heart filled with despair. Suddenly, there was a power outage, and the hallway plunged into darkness. She screamed in fear.
Xiao Xing quickly hid in the stairwell as the door was opened, a pair of leather shoes stepping into the stairwell.
Xiao Xing was hiding at the staircase corner, bloodstains on her hands and feet, she was climbing up the stairs.

Zheng Huiying's eyes were filled with panic and fear. She tried to run but was pushed down the stairs by Mama. She rolled down the stairs and fell at the door. The iron door locked with a padlock, sealing all the memories of the past.

"The missing case of female college student Zheng Huiying," "The police are appealing to the public for clues," "Zheng Huiying, 21 years old," "a junior student at the city's Economic and Trade University," "has been missing since leaving the campus on the evening of the 2nd of this month." "If anyone knows her whereabouts, please contact our station as soon as possible."
The scene shifted to a high-rise building, where Xiao Xing walked to the intercom, pressed the answer button, and the screen lit up showing Mama's image.
Mama: "Xiao Xing, it's Mom."

Xiao Xing sat in the car, looking out the window. Mama said: "Uncle Liang plans to sell our old Lanhu Villa house." "Do you want to come back and see if there's anything you want to take away?" "And there's Liang Cong's stuff, do you want to keep any of it?"

The next day, Xiao Xing arrived at the villa where Cong Cong used to live. She opened the door and walked in, but her heart was filled with mixed feelings. She looked around but did not see Cong Cong. Just as she was about to leave, she heard the children's voices.
Xiao Xing chased after him shouting: "Slow down"
The next day, Liang Cong climbed a swan sculpture in the park. Zheng Huiying was nearby, anxiously saying: "Be careful!"
Liang Cong climbed up and said: "There are so many, Sister Xiao Xing, come up here quickly!"
Xiao Xing looked up at the sky and said: "But how do I get up there? I'm afraid to go up."
Xiao Xing stood at the door, staring blankly at the place where Cong Cong had disappeared, feeling a deep sense of loss.
The next day, Xiao Xing, as usual, went to work. She went downstairs, but her mind was filled with thoughts of Cong Cong.

Xiao Xing opened the door and saw Liang Cong's mom saying to Liang Cong: "This is what I bought for you with the savings from my New Year's money. You have to practice diligently," "and play beautiful melodies."
The little boy nodded and said: "Then sister, you must also become a future flying superheroine."
Liang Cong nodded and continued playing the guitar.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3660_3840.text: Qi Jia: "But he will still leave."
Lin Shuer said: "Oh, I detect a hint of reluctance?"
Qi Jia said: "Stop kidding, let's go have a drink."

Lin Shuer said: "When drunk, you'll know who you love the most. When you're ill, you'll know who loves you the most. Consider the fool. Though he has countless flaws, he has one greatest merit—he is utterly guileless."
Lin Shuer said: 'Such a rare quality in a man.'
Qi Jia said: "Let's go, let's go, let's go shopping."

Qi Jia and Lin Shuer arrived at the mall, where every display cabinet was filled with exquisite jewelry. They walked from one store to the next, with Qi Jia occasionally asking Yuan Xiaoou about the products.
Yuan Xiaoou: "Mr. Li, ah, I've bought it. Alright, I'll pick you up shortly."

The scene shifts to Gui Jie walking out of the mall, wearing a fashionable houndstooth skirt and carrying a luxury handbag. She walked briskly towards a luxury car parked at the entrance. The driver opened the car door, and Gui Jie said, "Mr. Li, take it slow."

Qi Jia was so angry that he threw the bag out of the window, then opened the door and ran after it. Lin Shuer, seeing Qi Jia's back, quickly followed. Qi Jia ran after the bag, and Gui Jie, seeing this, quickly closed the car door and drove away. Qi Jia and Lin Shuer watched Gui Jie drive away, then turned to look at the bag on the ground. Lin Shuer said: "Yuan Xiaoou, it's easier to give birth to twins than to find a devoted man. Even a person like Yuan Datou has a spare tire."
The waiter brought the food, and Yuan Xiaoou said: "Thank you."
Lin Shuer said: "Didn't order any hearty dishes? I'm not even hoping for braised pork, twice-cooked pork, or stewed pork belly. But there should at least be a plate of stir-fried pork, right?"
The waiter replied, "Sorry, our restaurant only serves health cuisine and does not offer those dishes."
Qi Jia asked: "Health cuisine, do you have health beer?"
Gui Jie: "Sorry, none either."
Qi Jia said: 'How about health liquor?'
Lin Shuer said: "Yuan Datou, you really squeezed out your wife's savings."
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'The food here isn't cheap at all.' 'It's all organic.' 'It's good for your body.'
Lin Shuer asked: "So, what's the theme of today's grand feast?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I... I got promoted to Administrative Director."
Qi Jia asked in surprise: 'Your boss got drunk and made you the Administrative Director?'
Lin Shuer asked in shock: 'Did you sell your body?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "What's with that talk? Do you think everyone is like you?"
Lin Shuer said: 'Stop, yesterday you were still fooling around.'
Qi Jia: 'Exactly.'
Yuan Xiaoou explained: "It's not like that. That was my boss, we were visiting a client together. Qi Jia."
Qi Jia said: "Alright, alright, let's toast. Hopefully, you will do well in the future."

movie101_6965768652251628068_1500_1680.text: Xia Luo stood in front of the teaching building, closed his eyes, took a deep breath, and then opened his eyes again.
The dean said: "Hurry up, don't waste everyone's time."

Xia Luo stood on the rooftop, looking at the sky, and said: "All the time, I was wasting my time," "but I never thought that heaven gave me a chance to rebirth," "so, I want to thank the sky, thank the earth."
Xia Luo said: "You should thank the school," "thank the teachers," "thank your class for the not high floor level."

Xia Luo turned around and spoke to Teacher Wang: "Teacher Wang" "From now on" "Our grudges will be settled", then he addressed Qiu Ya: "Finally, I want to say sorry to classmate Qiu Ya" "I not only wrote you a love letter" "I kissed you" "But I really thought it was a dream" "I will be responsible for you"

Teacher Wang slapped Ma Dongmei across the face, and the surrounding classmates laughed. Teacher Wang said: "Enough, that's it. Take the classmate with heat stroke to the medical room." The scene then shifted to the school's blackboard, where the scores of the three main subjects were written.

Teacher Wang holding a book said: "Students turn to page 142," "question 3," "this will definitely be on the exam," "it wasn't on the last two years' exam," "this year it is," "fifteen points are up to you to study or not."
Teacher Wang turned around and said: "What's the matter, Zhang Yang" "You don't believe me, right"
Zhang Yang replied: "No."
Teacher Wang: "Then I'm going to make a bet with you, we'll wager a bread machine."
Zhang Yang looked up and said: "I don't gamble, teacher"
Teacher Wang said: "That's it, classmates, be the witness."
Ma Dongmei: "Report."
Teacher Wang turned to Principal and said: "Go back."
Teacher Wang said: "Students, pay attention, let's continue with the bread machine topic, I mean, the betting topic."
A classmate stood up and said: "Report."
Teacher Wang said: "What's the matter, Xia Luo, do you want to add a pound?"
Xia Luo said: "I want to change seats"
Teacher Wang said: "Xia Luo, let me tell you, our matter is not over yet, don't push your luck here."
Xia Luo: "Ma Dongmei keeps eating sunflower seeds in class, it affects my learning."
Teacher Wang angrily said: "Does your studying need to be affected? Is there any room for decline?"
Xia Luo continued: "Look, Teacher Wang," "I also want to study well," "Nobody wants to always lag behind in class, right?"
Teacher Wang said: "Alright then, where do you want to move to?"
Xia Luo: "I'm fine with sitting at a desk with Qiu Ya."
Teacher Wang said: "Are you going there to study? I'm too shy to break it to you."
Xia Luo continued to ask: "Then why can Yuan Hua sit with Qiu Ya"

Teacher Wang continued: "Can you compare with Yuan Hua? Yuan Hua is an excellent student and cadre every year. By the way, speaking of student Yuan Hua, I have to give special praise here. Just yesterday, student Yuan Hua, won the first prize in the district essay contest. The essay topic was "My District Chief Father". Applaud for encouragement."
Xia Luo: "Teacher Wang, is that a comparison of studies? That's showing off who has the more powerful dad."
Teacher Wang said: "What are you worried about others? If you can't compare, just sit quietly there. Anyway, you'll always sleep wherever you sit."
Xia Luo: "Then I want to change a sleeping place"
Teacher Wang angrily said: "Xia Luo, are you done? Is the school opened by your family? Do you think you are Principal? Sleep wherever you want."
Principal: "Teacher Wang," Principal called out from the back.

movie101_7010686199291445773_840_1020.text: Xiao Xing's smile faded. She looked at Liang Cong's back, tears swirling in her eyes. She reached out to touch the photographs on the wall, each one filled with memories of Liang Cong.
Xiao Xing touched the words 'dream chaser' on the wall, then picked up Liang Cong's violin.

Xiao Xing looked at the guitar in her hands, feeling increasingly panicked. She remembered the first time she saw Liang Cong play the guitar, the two of them standing opposite each other, the guitar strings vibrated with the sound of music.
Xiao Xing took out a guitar from the bag, placed it on the stand, and gently wiped it with her hands.
Liang Cong shouted: "Sis", "Step aside", "Stop meddling in my affairs", "You're not my real sister", "Let me go"
Mother pulled Liang Cong aside and said, "Behave yourself"
Liang Cong said: "On what basis you can do this because you want to be a cop, what right do you have to tie me up here."

Xiao Xing looked at the painting in front of her, feeling a sense of loss. She slowly withdrew her gaze, her eyes filled with reluctance, and tears welled up in her eyes. She turned and walked out of the room, closing the door behind her.
Mother walked up behind Xiao Xing and said, 'Xiao Xing, are you just leaving like this?' Xiao Xing didn't respond, but turned around and handed her phone to Liang Cong.
Mother took out a vibration guiding detector and placed it in Xiao Xing's hand, saying, "It can sense obstacles that are beyond the reach of a normal stick." "Carry it with you."

Mother said: "The stronger the vibration, the closer it is to you," "the weaker the vibration, the further it is from you," Mother put a vibrating wristband on Xiao Xing and said: "Xiao Xing," "some things," "don't take it to heart," "it was an accident."
Xiao Xing turned and said: "I'm leaving"
Mother said, "Xiao Xing, kid, listen to me, this weekend, Liang Cong and their band are holding a concert, in memory of Liang Cong's three-year anniversary, inviting us to go together."
Xiao Xing said: "How can I go", "Do I have the face to go, if it weren't because of me, Liang Cong would still be the lead singer of that band"
Xiao Xing, with tears in her eyes, said: "I should have fallen from that bridge with Liang Cong in the first place"
Mother worriedly said: "Xiao Xing, it's dark, how are you going to walk alone"

Xiao Xing asked, "For me", "Is there a difference between day and night", Xiao Xing turned off the light in the room, and the soft light seeped through the crack under the door, illuminating the desolate corridor.
The raindrops hit the ground, splashing white flowers in the puddles. The passengers at the bus stop rushed to the taxi with their umbrellas.
Xiao Xing said, "Hello."
Xiao Xing's friend said: "Hello, this is 96106. Can I help you with anything?"
Xiao Xing said, "I was the one who just made a reservation for a taxi."

movie101_7021829520667705869_1080_1260.text: Grandma continued: "Everyone stand against the wall, there is someone at the door," "You can't escape, they beat people, and if you run, they'll kill you," "Just play slowly, play a bit then leave," "Leave as soon as the door opens," "(To me) It didn't do anything," "(The Japanese) He doesn’t care about you, doesn't look at you, doesn't even glance at you," "Remember a bit then forget a bit," "Understand, but then again forget a little," "I'm finished speaking, I won't talk anymore, no more talking," "I have said I am not comfortable."

Grandma sat there, looking at the door, lost in thought. The door was wide open, but the old lady had already fallen asleep, and outside, the granddaughter was also taking a break from chores, sitting on a small stool.
The next day, Grandma came to Huang Meirong's house early as usual, bent over with a basket to pick vegetables, and Huang Meirong also came out to greet her.
The next day, as usual, after Wang Deqing finished his morning chores, he went to the yard with a bucket of water and a watering can to water the vegetable garden.

Wang Youzhi: "My mother doesn’t tell me anything," "She says there's no use telling me now that I am grown up," "She doesn't tell me, so I don't ask, I don't force her," "What's there to say about old people’s matters," "What’s there to talk about, we as the younger generation can’t speak up."

Grandma continued: "When reporters came to interview, I heard what others said, and that's how I knew, but she always keeps silent, doesn't talk to me, reporters came to interview, she started suspecting, they said it's the old people’s matters that got into newspapers, that situation was on TV, discussing, saying she is Korean, Japanese did that to her, Japanese bullied her, my father never talked to me about it, he’s been dead for 18 years now, he surely knew about it a long time ago."
Grandma picked up the bowl and drank it all in one go.
Grandma picked up a potato slice with chopsticks and put it into the bowl, saying: "At such an old age, what's there to say," "Once it's in the past, let it be past."
The scene shifts to Wuguan, Guangdong, where the sky is overcast, and the air is filled with the smell of burning charcoal. The creaking of wooden boards and the hissing of pipes are incessant.

The screen goes black, and the film 'The Story of the Grandmother' begins. On October 11, 1979, in the small town of Wang Chuan, the story of the Grandmother begins. The Japanese occupied the small town of Wang Chuan and occupied China for 14 years and 5 months.

movie101_7101937153785102885_3840_4020.text: Qi Jia said: "I hope you can do well in the future." As they spoke, Qi Jia raised a glass with a smile, took a sip, and then handed the glass to Yuan Xiaoou, saying: "What is this? It tastes like overnight swill."
Yuan Xiaoou introduced: 'This is red date yogurt, especially good for women.'
Lin Shuer laughed and said, 'Sir, you are truly a marvel in the world of women's therapy.'
Yuan Xiaoou: "Actually, I have another matter today. Our boss wants me to go to Shanghai to prepare for the new branch. But the decision is up to me, I don't have to go if I don't want to."
Qi Jia, with a mouthful of asparagus, said: "Go, of course you should go. Why not go?"

Yuan Xiaoou, with a face full of surprise, looked at Lin Shuer. Lin Shuer nodded at him, and Yuan Xiaoou, after a moment of thought, clenched his fist and put it in his pocket. Seeing this, Lin Shuer also picked up her bag and prepared to leave.
The scene shifts to a small island in the lake, where Yuan Xiaoou is running in circles. Qi Jia says: "Yuan Xiaoou, I really can't do this anymore."
The scene shifts to the campus, where Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou are running. Yuan Xiaoou said: 'I'm exhausted, running alone feels like using the strength of two people.'
Yuan Xiaoou pulled Qi Jia and said: "Hurry up," "What's there to look at?" "It's just where you had your first kiss," "Nothing impressive."
Qi Jia asked in surprise: 'How do you know?' 'Lin Shuer, that gossip.'
Yuan Xiaoou pulled Qi Jia and said: "Come, I'll show you a magic trick." "I guarantee you’ll never think of that person again when you pass by here." "Now, stand still and close your eyes, quickly."
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, I'm telling you I'm scared of ghosts. If you summon something weird, I'm going to hit you!"
Yuan Xiaoou clenched his fists and said: 'Heavenly spirits, earthly spirits, let the Supreme Elder Lord appear.'
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia, slowly moved his hands from her shoulders to her waist, and kissed her. The two shared a passionate kiss under the tree.

The scene shifts to a large tree in the park, where Yuan Xiaoou forcefully kisses Qi Jia against the trunk, their bodies pressed tightly together. Yuan Xiaoou's hands roam over Qi Jia's body, and Qi Jia, unable to resist, closes their eyes and leans into the kiss.

Yuan Xiaoou, panting, leaned against a big tree, while Qi Jia stood still, staring at him. After a while, Qi Jia turned around and left, and Yuan Xiaoou watched Qi Jia's departing figure, feeling a deep sense of loss.
The two of them jogged through the campus, passing by a large tree. The sunlight filtered through the leaves, shining down on them. Qi Jia jogged ahead, with Yuan Xiaoou following behind.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1500_1680.text: Yan Tong pointed to Sir Chow and asked Lei Luo, "Do you recognize Sir Chow?"
Lei Luo said: "Hmm, I suppose so."
Sir Chow said: "Ladies and gentlemen," "Welcome, welcome." Sir Chow extended his hand to invite the woman in front to come up.
Sir Chow said: "Now, I am honored to introduce my daughter's good friend. He is an outstanding member of the community. And this young man has a great future ahead."
Yan Tong whispered to Lei Luo: "What did he say?"
Xiao Wei said: "He said his daughter is twenty-four years old this year" "Likes successful people" "Seems like he is talking about me"
Lei Luo said: "Nonsense. He is introducing his future son-in-law."
Yan Tong asked: "Who? You?"
Sir Chow said: "May we welcome, Inspector Lei Luo"
Sir Chow held the bride's hand, and the two put their hands together. Sir Chow said: "Next month, the two are getting engaged. Make sure to respond to the invitation, and come early."

The scene switches to a tennis court, where two foreign businessmen were walking and discussing. One of them said: "Boss, Lei Luo seems to be getting close with Sir Chow's daughter. Would Sir Chow help him become chief inspector? Does he deserve such a title?"
Ge Bo said: "The London headquarters has decided not to increase the position of the chief Chinese inspector for now"
Yan Tong said: "I've spent so much money in the past."

Ge Bo said: "Don't worry, if this goes through, you'll be the first choice" "Listen, I have something to discuss with you" "The Wan Chai Inspector has passed away" "No matter what happens" "Lei Luo really needs this position"
Yan Tong said: "This kid, he can live off of a woman" "He wants to sit in this oil-rich district?" "In his dreams."
Ge Bo said: "There is only one way to keep him out of this position," "and that is," "you take his place."

Yan Tong said: "Tsim Sha Tsui and Wan Chai have approximately the same oil and water levels" "Although I live in Kowloon" "For the sake of resisting this brat, I'm willing to move" "Thank you, boss" "What about my previous position as Chief Inspector of Yau Tsim District?"
Ge Bo said: "He will replace you."
Lei Luo sat down and said: "Him?" "Boss?"
Sir Chow said: "Didn't you just agree?"
Ge Bo said: "He just agreed to take over the position in Wan Chai."
Lei Luo said: "He?"
Ge Bo said: "Yes, good news, isn't it?"
Lei Luo said: "Yan Tong sir, really?" "But you live in Kowloon" "Going to work in Hong Kong every day, you have to take the ferry"
Lei Luo asked in confusion: "Why?"
Yan Tong said to Lei Luo: "You gigolo, don't get too happy too soon."
Ge Bo said: "Mind your words."
Yan Tong said: "Sorry, boss."
The referee asked, "Lei Luo, shall we get started?"
Lei Luo said: "Alright, excuse me." He then walked away.

The scene shifted to the streets of Macau, where A Hao was running frantically, with the police closely pursuing him. He ran into a bus stop, and the bus just happened to arrive. A Hao boarded the bus and continued to flee, while the police officer chased after the bus.

A Hao ran into the snack street, Xiao Wei and A Qi followed closely. A Hao ran into a dead end, Xiao Wei and A Qi blocked the way, A Qi shouted, "Where are you going?" A Hao looked around and ran into a restaurant, Xiao Wei and A Qi followed closely.
A Hao said: "Buddy, I'm looking for Brother Chao" "Brother Chao"

movie101_6965768652251628068_1680_1860.text: Principal looked at Teacher Wang and said: "Come out for a sec"
Principal left the classroom, Teacher Wang turned around and said: "Go to self-study," then Teacher Wang also left the classroom.
Xia Luo rolled his eyes, grabbed his books, and walked towards the back of the classroom. He patted Yuan Hua's shoulder and said: "You, go to the back."
Yuan Hua asked: "Did Teacher Wang agree to it?"

Xia Luo continued: "If he doesn't agree, I'll beat him up once more." Yuan Hua, who was sitting behind, overheard Xia Luo's words, then turned and whispered to Qiu Ya, who was sitting in front of him.
Qiu Ya asked: "Yuan Hua, what should I do?"
Yuan Hua looked at Qiu Ya and said: "Don't worry," "I'll come back eventually," Yuan Hua left after speaking, Xia Luo sat down and looked at Qiu Ya.
Qiu Ya: "You, go to the back."
Meng Te turned to Ma Dongmei and said: "Dongmei," "you can't tear us apart just to pursue your own happiness."
Ma Dongmei snapped the pen in two and threw it on the ground.
Zhang Yang, with a smile, got up and left, while the boy next to Qiu Ya continued to sing: "Ma Dongmei, you're the first girl since I started school, who has asked to sit beside me"
Xia Luo: "Qiu Ya, nothing much," "I just seriously wanted to apologize to you."

Xia Luo turned around and saw Ma Dongmei drawing on his own, he asked: "What are you doing?" Ma Dongmei did not speak, just quietly tore off the drawing paper and stuffed it into the drawer. Xia Luo got up and walked over to Ma Dongmei.
Ma Dongmei, sitting at the back, was staring intently at Qiu Ya, who was daydreaming, while the surrounding classmates were whispering about the commotion in the back.
Xia Luo said to Qiu Ya: "Qiu Ya, I wrote a song for you," "I'll sing it for you." Qiu Ya covered her face in embarrassment.

Xia Luo continued to sing: "Just this once," "I'll accompany you to see the desolate wilderness," "Laugh out loud on sunny days," "Make a fuss in the carefree air," "Do you know," "The one thing I want"
Xia Luo bit the book in his hand and asked: "What are you doing?"
Ma Dongmei: "Xia Luo, keep it down, the rest of us are still trying to study."
Ma Dongmei turned around and shouted: "Qiu Ya, I have a problem I can't solve, can you take a look for me?", Qiu Ya got up and walked to the front of the desk to sit down.
Qiu Ya: "Thank you, Ma Dongmei"
Ma Dongmei turned around and said: "Turn around."
Xia Luo, who was immersed in the joy of reading, was pulled up by Ma Dongmei. Xia Luo stood up with a smile and asked: "What are you doing?"
Ma Dongmei turned around and said: "You sang pretty well just now," "Sing it for me again, will you?"
Qiu Ya: "Get out of my way"
Ma Dongmei said: "Why not sing it for me one more time?"
Xia Luo tried to stop her: "Oh come on, stop it, wife"
Ma Dongmei said: "Who are you calling wife? Shameless."
Ma Dongmei, seeing this, jumped up in joy, while Xia Luo stood there awkwardly, saying: "This is such a sin"

Yuan Hua, who was nearby, heard this and quickly walked over. Seeing Qiu Ya's tear-streaked face, he reached out to wipe the tears away but was dodged. Qiu Ya turned and walked away, leaving Yuan Hua looking confused.
Ma Dongmei patted Yuan Hua's back and said: "Don't be like this"
Yuan Hua, while walking, said: "I'm so frustrated"

movie101_7021829520667705869_1260_1440.text: On October 29, 1937, the Japanese army occupied three major towns of Nanjing, following the compulsion of the Chinese army to retreat, Japanese soldiers stationed in Nanjing city also moved into the city.
The screen goes black, and the film 'The Fog of War' officially begins.

The camera slowly moves, the sky is overcast, and the densely built houses of Nanjing appear especially dreary. On November 8, 1937, the Nanjing Railway Station was opened to the public. However, the Japanese military stationed there, with about 100 foreign workers, were not confined in the station. They were allowed to go out and live in the surrounding residential area, which was already densely populated.
The next day, Yinmei Mao was as usual preparing to go out, but suddenly he stopped in his tracks.
In the courtyard, Yinmei Mao sat on a wooden chair, hands resting on their lap, head bowed, eyes closed, seemingly lost in thought. The scene shifted to the next day.
Yinmei Mao looked at the visitor, a hint of surprise in his eyes.
Yinmei Mao said: "I can't remember." "I can't remember."
Yinmei Mao said: "He called me Miss Hamada."
Yinmei Mao said: "I don't know what it means," "Welcome, please sit down," "I am asking you to sit down."
The landlord Granny said: "Come in, I am asking you to come in, to come up, please come in, welcome, please sit down, I am asking you to sit down."
The next day, the sun shone on the messy wires outside the house, and the small courtyard looked particularly narrow.
The next morning, the alarm clock rang as usual, but no one got up to turn it off.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: The two of them walked one after the other through the woods, over the hills, through the streets, and finally arrived at the small community where Qi Jia used to live. It was drizzling, and the girls in school uniforms were carrying their easels, heading towards the riverbank.
Yuan Xiaoou held up his clothes, shielding Qi Jia from the rain as they walked. Qi Jia was drenched, but she didn't seem to mind.
Lin Shuer shouted from the car: 'Qi Jia, silly goose, over here, get in the car!' Qi Jia ignored Lin Shuer and ran straight ahead, with Yuan Xiaoou following behind.

Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou took shelter from the rain under the car, watching Lin Shuer and the other couple walk away. Lin Shuer got into the car and said to the two in the back, 'You two are quite romantic, aren't you? The place is almost flooded, but you're still strolling in the rain.'
Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a face full of grievances, then turned to look out the window. Lin Shuer, who was driving, glanced in the rearview mirror and then saw Qi Jia's face clearly.
Lin Shuer said: 'Did you two have a fight?' 'I don't know which brain-dead twins parked their cars blocking mine, not even leaving a phone number. Just wait and see how I'll deal with them.'

Lin Shuer: 'No, no, this won’t do. If it keeps raining like this, none of us will be able to get home tonight. I'll go out and think of a solution. If you both are going to fight, do it outside of the car, don't splatter blood all over my vehicle, it has genuine leather interior.'
Lin Shuer, holding an umbrella, got out of the car and walked barefoot in the pouring rain towards the apartment building.
The two cars were so close that they could almost touch, yet they had never felt so distant. Just like that, Lin Shuer got out of the car, and Qi Jia watched her walk away without looking back.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "That thing, starting tomorrow morning..." "You know you need to increase the sit-ups to 50, yeah?"
Qi Jia said: 'Got it. Starting tomorrow, I'll do it by myself. Just take care of yourself going to work. No need to rush every day.'
Qi Jia looked at the scenery outside the window and said: 'Thanks for earlier at the school.'

movie101_7021829520667705869_1440_1620.text: The camera switches to a room. Wang Youzhi's mother said, "Over the years, people have come to visit her" "Greet her on the phone" "Once a year"
The scene shifts, and the next day, Huang Meirong arrives at Yinmei Mao's home.
Wang Youzhi said: "When Korean people call, they still say they're looking for Park Chaesoon""I said why did she change her name to Park Chaesoon""I said her name is Yinmei Mao"
Yinmei Mao: "I chose my name with Chairman Mao""My surname is Park first""Then I followed Chairman Mao's name""I love Chairman Mao"
Yinmei Mao said with a smile: "He loves us," "and I love him too."

The scene shifts to the doorstep of Huang Meirong's house. The girl helps the boy take off his shoes. Huang Meirong sits on a chair, holding a watermelon. The boy brings his shoes to Huang Meirong and says, 'Grandma, this is my friend, he's from Japan.' Huang Meirong smiles and says, 'Don't care where he's from, as long as he's good to me, I'm good to him, that's enough, raised him to this age, that's nice enough, I should take care of him in return.'
Huang Meirong sat on a stool, her hands constantly moving, scrubbing the socks.

Huang Meirong's mother said, "She can't do anything in the winter, always curling up from the cold, just want to move around a bit, her hands are too cold to stretch out, she has no blood, if it's too cold, she hides in the quilt, once she's cold, she doesn't want to go out"
The old lady said, "Only bones left, here is drafty, so cold."
Huang Meirong: "The draft makes it so cold" "She's just afraid of being a bother" "I've lived so long, I've seen a lot"
Yinmei Mao waved his hand and said, "Wasted, wasted", "Wasted", "Lived so long, useless"
Ma Mei: "Can you sing" "What's wasted, do you still remember"
Yinmei Mao: "When I was a child, I remembered well", "Any song, I can sing once I hear it"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4200_4380.text: Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia and said: "I think you're getting better." "You're becoming more positive and optimistic."
Qi Jia smiled and said: "I think you need to go to Shanghai." After saying that, Qi Jia turned her head to look at the driver, who was still smiling at her.

Qi Jia, sitting in the passenger seat, felt a tingling on their legs. They clenched their hands tightly and stared intently at the wad of cash on the back seat, but the rain made it hard to see clearly.

Lin Shuer: "How many times do I have to tell you?" "I'm stuck on the road and can't get back." "I'm with Qi Jia." "She’s in the car." "I’m outside now." "Why are you asking her to answer the phone?" "You're the one contradicting yourself." "Where else could I be?" "Where do you think I can go in this heavy rain?"

The scene switches to a stormy night, with lightning and thunder outside the window. Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou are sitting in the car, Qi Jia said: "Where the hell is Lin Shuer that bitch?" "I'll go find her."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't, let me go." "It's raining so heavily and you're still so weak." Yuan Xiaoou reached out to close the car window.
Qi Jia anxiously said: "The water is waist-deep." "It's over, it's over, what do we do now."

Lin Shuer, holding an umbrella, sat on a motorcycle in the rain, saying: "Who's being unreasonable here?" "Who’s starting the fights on purpose?" "I’m sitting in the middle of the road in the rain." "You keep pestering and causing trouble." "Can I be gentle?"
The voice on the phone said: "Look at that filthy mouth of yours, are you even a woman?"
Lin Shuer said: "If I’m not a woman, then you're not a man." "I just missed two of your calls, so what?" "It’s pouring rain, I didn't hear, is that not okay?"
Lin Shuer's boyfriend: "No." "I’m abroad, staying up late because of the time difference to call you." "And you? Throwing tantrums, acting like a diva, and purposely not answering my calls."
Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou were still struggling in the car, and Lin Shuer's boyfriend on the rooftop was also exhausted. Qi Jia asked: "Is there no other way?"
Lin Shuer said: "You shameless jerk, didn't you say you were abroad?"
Lin Shuer's boyfriend said: "I'm destined to travel the world." "Don’t think you can ride the bull and act all mighty."
Lin Shuer said: "I am mighty, so what?" "If you're so capable, swim over here and bite me"
Lin Shuer's boyfriend said: "I haven't learned to swim all this time, didn't you know?" "Call the police to save me quickly."
Lin Shuer said: "I won't." "I won't save you or call the police." "Float wherever you want."
Yuan Xiaoou: "You're too heartless. Let's break up."

Lin Shuer's boyfriend: "Fine, let's break up. Whoever doesn’t is a coward." Lin Shuer's boyfriend was kneeling on the rooftop of the car, crying uncontrollably. The rain was pouring down like a torrent, and the car was already submerged in the water.
Yuan Xiaoou held the phone and tried to make a call, but the other party said: 'The line is busy.'
Yuan Xiaoou took out his phone and called his friend: "Come back quickly and save us." "Water is already inside the car." "Hurry, hurry, hurry."
Qi Jia, looking at the increasingly heavy rain outside the car, said to Yuan Xiaoou: "Yuan Xiaoou, we probably won't be able to escape, right?"
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Qi Jia, Qi Jia smiled and said: "It's okay, it's okay, I’m still here. Don't worry."
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, we are about to die, right?"
Yuan Xiaoou, looking at Qi Jia, said: "If we have to die together, I think it's quite nice."

Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, I've imagined ten thousand ways to die, but I never thought it would be like this, suffocating." Qi Jia turned to look at Yuan Xiaoou, both of them submerged in water up to their chests, with Qi Jia's legs barely visible.

movie101_7021829520667705869_1800_1980.text: The camera shifts to the exterior of the Hainan Provincial People's Court, with a voiceover from the TV news report: 'Recently, a group of people claiming to represent the interests of the masses have caused trouble in our province.'
The next day, the family took Chen Shui-bian to the hospital for an IV.
The screen shows Chen Shui-bian, the last Han Chinese in the world, passing away at the age of 100.

The camera shifts to the sky above, moving from top to bottom, a dense forest, the leaves on the trees are lush, the branches are full, the wind gently blows, the leaves rustle, the small path under the trees is covered with fallen leaves, the old man with a hat and white beard walks slowly along the path, his figure is slow and his pace is not steady, he looks around as he walks.

The old man said: 'Huang Yufeng A-Po passed away in February 2003. The Japanese built a bridge from Kamo base to the county town, opening a road to the Japanese military camp in Baoting. They forced the local farmers to work as laborers. Huang Yufeng A-Po was among these laborers in the village because she was very beautiful, as our Li people are. The Japanese drooled when they saw her and tricked her into going to the base to do laundry. During the Cultural Revolution, her name became well-known. Some people used to say she married a Japanese, saying she was a Japanese collaborator. At that time, these elderly women were called Japanese mothers. The term 'comfort women' hadn't been mentioned yet.'
The camera shifts to a small room where a woman sits on a bed, hugging her legs. She is Huang Youliang, born in 1927, a Han ethnic from the Hui ethnic group in Ningxia.
The scene shifted to the early morning of the next day, Chen Liancun was still fanning the flies away from his face.

The scene shifted, and Chen Shui-bian said: "So every time I go to interview these elderly women," "I have to seriously record their experiences," "from the first time I met them," "to tracking their lives until their passing."
The next day, Chen Shui-bian was cooking in the kitchen, and Fu Meiju was washing clothes in the bathroom.
The camera switched to an old lady leaning on a hoe, slowly walking towards the fields, with a few dogs lying at the door.

The news reported: 'We are currently suing the Japanese government' 'to help the 'comfort women' in this lawsuit' 'Actually, the term 'comfort women' is what the Japanese call them' 'not what we Chinese call them.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_420_600.text: Doctor flipped through the book and said: "The age of menopausal patients is tending to decrease." "This is called premature menopause." My mom hasn't even hit menopause. Are you saying I'm experiencing premature menopause? Do you even have professional ethics?"
Doctor said: "Angry, aren't we? Feeling a bit dizzy, right? These are typical symptoms of menopause. Just like this cactus. Prickly on the outside, but the inside is still very soft."
Qi Jia: "Soft my sister, prick your own head," Qi Jia left the hospital, took off her high heels, and lay down on the lawn outside the hospital. Lin Shuer stood in front of her, looking down at her.

movie101_6973286990817002015_1860_2040.text: A Hao slapped Fat Boy Chao and then arrogantly said: "Fat Boy Chao, am I not qualified enough?"

The scene switches to a plane flying over a densely built residential area in Hong Kong. The plane is flying over the densely built residential area of Hong Kong, with tall buildings densely packed together, resembling a densely built 'Naked City'.

movie101_7021829520667705869_180_360.text: The snow was as deep as her waist, and Zhang Xiantu moved slowly, step by step.
The scene shifts, and Zhang Xiantu is seen dragging a basket, shivering from the cold as she walks towards the kitchen. Her daughter, seeing this, quickly helps her.

The year is 2015. Zhang Xiantu is sitting in the house, her eyes dim, her brows furrowed tightly, her hands moving unconsciously. She is mending clothes, but her movements are slow and disordered, as if her mind is preoccupied with other things. She occasionally lifts her head, but her hands never stop moving. She pinches the yarn and rubs her eyes, then continues mending.
The screen shows the dates from 1933 to 2014, and Li Xiumei is sitting on the edge of the bed in the room, looking at the photo of her and Zhang Xiantu taken 21 years ago.
The scene shifts to the interior of the house, where the clock on the wall shows that it is 12 o'clock.

The screen goes black and the text appears: 'During the Second World War, Japan's eight-year reign of terror in Nanjing alone resulted in the deaths of over 500,000 Chinese women. Most of them were forced into the comfort stations by the Japanese military. Many were tortured to death by the Japanese soldiers guarding the comfort stations. Only a few survived.' The camera moves to the ruins of a small town, with a dilapidated wooden door and overgrown weeds around it. Zhang Xiantu continues: "This (used to be) what they called a comfort station. Barbed wire and trenches were all around. There were puppet soldiers on guard at the entrance. It was essentially a place to imprison women."
The courtyard was overgrown with weeds, and the fruit trees in the yard were wild and uncultivated.

Zhang Xiantu said: "The front has two cave dwellings; it used to imprison Liu Mianhuan and Feng Zhuangxiang, this place, and the east side has three cave dwellings, which used to imprison Li Xiumei and Zhang Xiaoni."

The camera cuts to Zhang Xiantu's narration: "The south side has four rooms, which were used to imprison Hou Dong'e and Chen Lintao. This cave dwelling had two kangs, which likely accommodated women. According to my investigation, at least more than 40 women were imprisoned in this courtyard. Then to Shangshe stronghold, Xiyan sawmill stronghold, Hedong stronghold. Through these strongholds, investigations were conducted across various places. Wherever the Japanese stayed, there were victimized women."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.text: The camera cuts to the three siblings' house, where Da Chun, Zhang Yang, and Yuan Hua are all displaying their peculiar behaviors. Xia Luo sang passionately, while Yuan Hua and Qiu Ya were annoyed by the noise.

The screen shows that in 1919 and 2015, the centenarian Guìyīng Fú sat at the door, watching the busy villagers. A woman came over and asked: "Did your husband go to Haikou?"
The scene shifts to 1932, in the home of Wang Yikai. Wang Yikai's wife Guìyīng Fú opened the door to a man. Guìyīng Fú said: "I thought you'd come to see us a few days ago."
The woman replied: "The Dragon Boat Festival, right? I was a bit busy those days, is everything packed up?"
Xiaoxin replied, "I come up here when the festival arrives." "I would come up for both the Dragon Boat Festival and the Spring Festival."
The man continued: "Do you also come up during the Spring Festival to pay respects to the deities?"
The girl took the album and looked at it for a while, then returned it to the old man. The old man took the album back and put it on the shelf by the door.
The woman said: "The chicken is killed right here." "If the cooked rice isn't eaten, it's discarded (nowadays) no one eats it."
The woman said: "She was sleeping right here."

The elder sister said: "She just lay here sleeping, like she was sleeping, she wouldn't get up and it was very uncomfortable." "My husband said, if you can't get up then you can't, my husband also cried, if you can't get up then that means you can't, he precisely said that." The two of them laughed heartily. movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: The students who had just left the auditorium gathered around the broadcasting station, praising the songs that were just played.
Qiu Ya shouted, 'Xia Luo!'
Teacher Wang looked out the window and said, 'Ma Dongmei, Ma Dongmei, what are you doing?' 'Put down the fan.'

Teacher Wang fanning himself with a fan, said, 'Ma Dongmei,' 'How come you start acting up too,' 'You tell me honestly,' 'Didn't the teacher take enough care of you,' 'Has the teacher ever taken anything from you,' 'You know you are practically asking for it, don't you?'

On stage, Xia Luo was performing with great momentum, while Ma Dongmei and Da Chun were bringing out a large banner that read 'Support for the Environmentally Friendly Team.' Xia Luo's energetic performance and the catchy tunes made the audience involuntarily move along with the rhythm.
The students in the audience were completely convinced by Da Chun's performance and applauded enthusiastically. Da Chun waved to the students and then took a deep bow to the students.

Da Chun and Xia Luo were waiting for Qiu Ya at the school gate. Qiu Ya came out pushing her bike, and Da Chun stepped forward to greet her, asking, 'Qiu Ya, what happened to your bike?'
Qiu Ya: 'Xia Luo, did you do this?'

Da Chun: "You actually thought it was me""I saw you swallowing saliva during class""I guessed you must be thirsty""I went to buy you a soda at the convenience store before school was over""but all I could find were cold ones""I remember you can't drink cold ones these days."
Da Chun said, 'So I had to warm the soda on my chest.' 'Now it's good,' 'the soda isn't cold anymore,' 'but my heart is freezer cold.'
Da Chun was stunned for a moment, then said, 'I'm sorry, I must have misunderstood you.' Da Chun raised his hand holding the cola, trying to make up for it.

Qiu Ya quickly explains: "It's not like that" "I actually admire you very much" "Being old and ugly can never matter for a man" "What matters the most is talent" "Moreover, you have..." "such a talent."
