The next day, Da Chun arrived at the school gate as usual, only to find that the bicycle locked there was gone.

movie101_6973286990817002015_2040_2220.text: A Hao asked the vendors on both sides of the street, "A Qi, where's Da Wei?"

A Hao walked out the door and saw Da Wei had returned. He walked into the house and saw everyone was already seated at the dining table. Da Wei, who was drinking, was still drunk and staggered towards the bathroom. A Hao followed him and saw him vomiting outside the bathroom door. Da Wei said, "I'm sorry, Brother Hao."
A Hao looked at Da Wei who was rubbing his hands and said: "What are you doing? Want to die? Do you remember when you stole money to gamble last time?"
Da Wei said: "I remember."
A Hao said angrily, 'And you're still gambling? Do you want to stick around here forever?'
A Hao said: 'Ah, what about your grandmother in the countryside? Didn't you say you were going to build her a big house? Remember that. Is that clear?'
Da Wei said: "I remember, I understand."
A Hao looked at Da Wei and asked, "Where's Xiao Wei?"
A Hao slapped Da Wei and said, 'Doing work.' Then he went upstairs.

The person in the white shirt pointed to a place and said: "Go over there." Xiao Wei sat on the side, squinting at the person in front of him, "Si Yan Zai, I've never seen you before, what are you doing here?"
Si Yan Zai pointed at Xiao Wei and said: 'Buying that.'
Xiao Wei: "One piece."
A Hao walked over and slapped Si Yan Zai, grabbing him by the throat: "Are you trying to become like him?"
The man squatting on the ground said: "No."
A Hao held Si Yan Zai's head and said: "He's all skin and bones from doing drugs" "Do you want to be like him?"
Si Yan Zai shook his head and said, 'No.'

A Hao continued to persuade: "Try it once, and you're hooked for life." "I'm telling you, don't let me find out you've been back to buy." "And don't let me find out you've bought elsewhere." "Or I'll break your legs."
Si Yan Zai: "Got it."
A Hao pushed Si Yan Zai away and said, 'Take your money and go, go.'
Xiao Wei stepped forward and said: "Brother Hao," "why refuse money when it's offered?"
A Hao said: "That's how we operate."
Xiao Wei looked at the three people above and said: "Got it," "We need to have bottom lines."
A Hao said: "Do you need to be so loud?"

A Qi and Da Wei were playing soccer in the alley, with A Hao following behind them, constantly kicking the ball. The three of them chased the ball back and forth, enjoying themselves immensely. The lively scene attracted the attention of passersby, who stopped to watch.

A Qi, seeing this, laughed and waved his hand, then turned and walked towards the bus stop. The three of them followed closely. The bus arrived, and A Qi boarded first. The three of them watched as A Qi got on the bus and then followed. At the restaurant entrance, Si Yan Zai was just about to open the door when the three of them walked in.

Xiao Wei, who was sitting in the driver's seat, had his hands on the money, but suddenly felt a sharp pain in his left arm, and then he clutched his arm and howled in agony. The bus stopped, and Xiao Wei, in a fit of rage, pushed Da Wei out of the window. The bus stopped at a station, and Xiao Wei, along with the bus, fell into a daze.
A Qi and Da Wei rushed to the scene upon hearing the commotion. The three of them dealt with the thugs together, and after subduing them, they tied them up and threw them into a small room.
A Hao walked out of the bar with a cigarette in his mouth. He casually flicked the match in his hand, and a group of people rushed out from the bar, running away in panic.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Qi Jia looked at Yuan Xiaoou and said: "If we are about to die later on, can you get away from me? I don't want others to find us and say we died together due to a flood."
Qi Jia, who was still in the car, looked at the rising water level and couldn't help but exclaim.
Qi Jia said: "Yuan Xiaoou, why do you want to die with me? Are you shy?"
Qi Jia reached out to grab Yuan Xiaoou's face and said: "Do you think I'm short of your breath? Open your mouth! Open it, Yuan Xiaoou!"
Qi Jia reached out to touch his face and said: "Open your mouth"
Qi Jia said: "You want to hold your breath, right?" "If you're going to hold your breath, I will hold mine with you."

The car was sinking in the water like a giant sinking slowly. The two people inside were also getting closer and closer. Yuan Xiaoou's chest was heaving violently, and he couldn't help but stretch out his arms to pull Qi Jia into his embrace. Yuan Xiaoou's hands slid from Qi Jia's neck to her waist, and Qi Jia's body leaned back involuntarily.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I really think it's good to die with you."
Yuan Xiaoou, with his head close to Qi Jia's, reached out and touched her cheek, saying: "Can I hug you?" Qi Jia smiled and opened her arms.
Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou hugged each other tightly in the car. The woman said: "Where's my car? If I can't find it later, I'll be in trouble."
Qi Jia opened the chat software on her phone and said: "Hurry back and rescue us, the water has already seeped into the car. Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up!"
The rain grew heavier, and the water in the car reached Yuan Xiaoou's chest. The rescue team arrived and successfully rescued Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia from the car.

The two walked side by side, one on each side of the stairs, and after a while, they reached the top of the stairs. The alley was still as quiet as ever, with only the sound of their footsteps and the raindrops falling on the ground. The dim light illuminated the corner where the wall met the ceiling, casting a faint glow on the ground. The two walked side by side, one on each side of the stairs, and after a while, they reached the top of the stairs.
Yuan Xiaoou followed behind, hesitating to speak. Finally, he called out Qi Jia's name softly: "Qi Jia."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Do you think I still need to go to Shanghai?"
Qi Jia looked down at the clothes in her hand, glanced at Yuan Xiaoou, and said: "Go" "Isn't Shanghai quite good?"
Qi Jia crossed her arms over her chest and looked at Yuan Xiaoou with a smile. Then she turned and walked towards the house, glancing back at Yuan Xiaoou as she entered the door.
Qi Jia, feeling helpless, turned around and walked back into the house. Yuan Xiaoou, with arms crossed, slowly walked back to the doorstep, then turned into the alley.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2160_2340.text: The woman said, "Grandma passed away on the morning of January 2, 2014. Grandma's granddaughter contacted me online to say that Grandma had passed away. The funeral was also arranged, Grandma really passed away."
The woman asked, "Is the old lady really gone?"
The woman said, "All is bought by you" "All the things you bought have never been used." After saying this, the woman turned around, picked up the bag, and walked away.
The man continued, "I said so many people care about you, you all"
The man replied, "Isn't there that many people?" The man continued packing.
The woman took out a blanket and said, "This has not been used," "It's new."
The granddaughter said, "Come on weekends," "I visit grandma Wang Yuka's house more often," "seems like once a month," "this grandma is the loneliest among the seven grandmas in Hainan."
Lin's mother explained, "Because she lives alone, other grandmas roughly live with their families."
The scene shifts to a place of detention, in the Guangxi Zhuang region.

The scene shifts to the next day, Liang Zhaosheng is seen riding a motorcycle with a tricycle, delivering eggs to the school. He rides slowly along the small path beside the school, the tricycle's small basket at the front filled with the day's freshly purchased eggs. He then drives into the school, past the playground and various small buildings, and stops in front of the staff building.

The scene shifts to the outside of the nursing home, Liang Zhaosheng said: "The nursing home has been built for three years," "Now I manage it," "That's to open the door in the morning, open the main gate, and close the door in the evening."

Liang Zhaosheng said: "This window is burglar-proof," "It's to prevent someone (thief) breaking the glass and stealing things" "The elderly who come here are all five guarantees households" "Blind and disabled elderly without descendants"

The scene shifts to the outside of the detention center where Lin Ailan is standing. Liang Zhaosheng said: "She moved up here three years ago"" She moved up as soon as it was established"" She was the earliest to come"

The camera shifts to the other side, where Lin Ailan is standing by the window of the nursing home, looking out. The days pass by, and Lin Ailan remains alone, her frail body and thin frame hinting at her loneliness.

The scene shifts to the prison, where Liang Zhaosheng, holding a fan, sits in front of the bed, staring blankly at the wallet and knife on the bed. Suddenly, a hand reaches out from under the blanket and grabs the wallet.

movie101_6965768652251628068_2400_2580.text: Xia Luo, bending over in pain, said: "Who the hell did this?"
Chen Yan's bike broke down, and he said to Qiu Ya: "Hey, Qiu Ya, my bike's broken. Get on, I'll give you a ride home."
Qiu Ya: "Thanks, Dongmei."
Qiu Ya said: "No problem." "Xia Luo, why do you have so many locks on this crappy bike?" "Who would even want to steal it?"
Xia Luo shouted loudly: "Ma Dongmei" "You annoying ugly!" Da Chun looked at Xia Luo in surprise.
Da Chun said: "Xia Luo, how can you say that about Dongmei? I think Ma Dongmei looks better than Qiu Ya."
Da Chun laughed and said: "When did you go blind? You must like her, don’t you?" Xia Luo was speechless and slapped Da Chun.
Da Chun hurriedly said: "I don't, I don't, I don't," "No, no," while Xia Luo laughed and covered his face.

Xia Luo said: "I don't believe it," Xia Luo turned to Dachun and said: "Dachun," "The gender ratio in our country is severely imbalanced. In the future, tens of millions of men will remain bachelors here. Do you think you'll be one of them?"
Da Chun: "Of course I will be. Isn't that obvious?" "Xia Luo, what should I do?"

Xia Luo patted Da Chun and said: "Go chase Ma Dongmei." "Just follow my earlier advice." "Be persistent and relentless." "If you don’t seize the opportunity at school, you'll be worse off in society."
Da Chun asked anxiously: "The college entrance exam is coming soon. What about my studies?"

Xia Luo looked at Da Chun and said, "Is that something you should be worrying about? Dachun, let me tell you, you’re different from others. Don’t waste your time on studying. You definitely shouldn't go to college. Tell your mom, get her to take the money she saved for your college tuition and buy a house instead. Buy a house within the second ring road. Your mom will listen to you. No one argues with a fool."

Da Chun looked at the machine and said: "Alright, it's settled." The two of them looked at the machine, and Da Chun shouted excitedly: "Hey, Xia Luo, I got it!" "Xia Luo, Xia Luo, it's my first win!" "Xia Luo, I won!"
The gang leader pointed at Xia Luo and said: "You're Xia Luo, right?" "Let's go."
Da Chun turned around and asked, "What do you want?"
Xiao Luo slapped Xia Luo and said, "Get out!"
Xia Luo glared at Da Chun and said: "Fine, I'm leaving!" Then he stormed out.

The scene shifts to a photo of the Five Tiger Gang, with Da Chun in the center holding a samurai sword, surrounded by his gang members. The camera moves upward, revealing that the man in the photo is actually Chen Kai, the current owner of the snack bar.
Chen Kai said, "So, you're the Xia Luo I've heard about?" "You're cocky, huh?"
Xia Luo leaned against the wall and said, "I'm telling you, don't bully me. I'll jump off a building. My brain doesn’t work right!"
Chen Kai said: "Who are you trying to scare? Acting like only your brain works, huh?"
Da Chun said: "Don’t act cocky." "You should find out who my big bro Chen Kai is."
Xia Luo said: "Big bro Chen Kai."

Chen Kai pointed at Xia Luo and said, "Let me tell you, Qiu Ya is my sister-in-law. Stay away from her in the future, got it?" Chen Kai kicked Xia Luo, saying, "Got it, got it, got it?!" "Did you hear me?" "Got it, got it, got it!"
Xia Luo: "Big bro."

movie101_7021829520667705869_2340_2520.text: The two of them were chatting in a harmonious atmosphere, unaware that their home had become a haven for mosquitoes.
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "When I was 18, I joined the Communist Party."
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "I also fought battles along the path to Hako city. I killed two Japanese devils."
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "The trigger was also here, I hung the gun around my neck, one in each hand, with all the bullets loaded, and I was shooting practice."

Grandma Lin Ailan said: "I have a hole right here," "If I had entered, I would have died," "Just scraping my head." She gestured with her hands to show the size of the hole. Grandma Lin Ailan looked at Yan Xuechen with a smile.

Grandma Lin Ailan said: "We ran out of cigarettes," "Go on, have some food," "I've already eaten three scoops of rice," "I'm about to take another scoop," "Big brother, big brother," "You're really something."

The next day, Yan Xuechen rode a bicycle to the Nansheng Elementary School. The school was surrounded by lush trees, providing a pleasant teaching environment. The children's reading voice could be heard from the classroom.

Yan Xuechen said: 'When I came back from school, I often passed by her door.' 'She was very difficult, no one helped her.' 'I'd buy some stuff, cook rice, fetch water for her.' 'That's how I got to know her.' 'There was once an old anti-Japanese war veteran.' 'He is dead now, but he told me before!' 'Grandma Lin Ailan had great contributions to the revolution, to the party, and to the people.' 'Why, you ask? Because she infiltrated the enemy interior.' 'Qi Lian told me; she's no longer around now.' 'Then, she stole a lot of bullets for our troops.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: After Yuan Xiaoou left, Qi Jia closed the door and turned off the lights in the hallway.

The next day, Qi Jia woke up alone in the spacious bedroom, wrapped in a blanket, looking around. She saw a large bed, a desk, and a cabinet in the corner. The room was decorated in a Scandinavian style, with a large poster of bare trees on the wall. Qi Jia sat on the bed, holding a newspaper, and looked around again.
Qi Jia put down the keys, turned around, and picked up the letter next to the door.
Qi Jia took the two admission notices, her hands trembling slightly as she held them, her expression serious. She slowly opened one of the notices, wanting to know the result of her hard work.
The phone rang, and it was Yuan Xiaoou calling. Qi Jia hesitated for a moment but still pressed the hang-up button.

Yuan Xiaoou continued: "Qi Jia, I don't like saying goodbye face to face. Let's say goodbye in this way. First and foremost, you must take your medicine on time, two bowls with half a pot of water, drink it after breakfast and dinner, the one at night doesn't need to be reheated, just warm it in hot water. Don't panic when you forget your keys, I've hidden a spare one in the electricity meter box at the door, you'll touch it as you reach out."
Qi Jia opened the cabinet in the kitchen, intending to take out a knife. But when she opened the cabinet, she found several sharp knives inside.

Yuan Xiaoou comforted: "Qi Jia, don't cry for the people who don't deserve it." "Be the real you." "You are kind, but good people should treat themselves better." "When you're tired, sleep; when you wake up, smile." "Simple life is the best." "Thank you." "Qi Jia, I'm leaving."

The next morning, Yuan Xiaoou came to Qi Jia's house to take care of the plants. He gently lifted the pot of cactus from the window sill and looked at it for a long time. Qi Jia stood by the window, watching him.
Qi Jia touched the flowerpot with her injured finger, and the next second, the flowerpot's thorns penetrated her wound.
Qi Jia looked at the cactus, smiling, then she came to the café where she used to work.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2520_2700.text: Yan Xuezhan said: "She smuggled out a lot of bullets for the troops" "She took out boxes and boxes" "She also mobilized the public and young women to join the army"

The camera shifts to Grandma Lin Ailan's house, where Grandma Lin Ailan sits at the door, carefully tying plastic bags filled with fruit. The wrinkles on her hands have turned deep blue from the years of washing.

Grandma Lin Ailan said to the passing Yan Xuezhan: "How many photos have you taken after shooting for so long?" "I don't know where they went after being handed over to the state." "Did I forget? No, I'm not a fool."

Grandma Lin Ailan: "I know the medals are kept with the money and the wallet." "There's nothing in that wallet either, I don't know where it is." "It has been stolen." "It wasn't stolen, it's been found." "(Look) You said someone stole it, but it's here."

The old man said, "It wasn't stolen, it's been found." "(Look) You said someone stole it, but it's here." "It's placed inside here." "It might have fallen out from here." "You accused Ah Han of stealing and wanted others to chase Ah Han."

Yan Xuezhan said: "Where did you find it? I've searched everywhere." "This one is inside the flower bag." "Where is it, let me take a look." "If you hide it like this, you will definitely not be able to find it."
The man took out a red envelope and said, "This one is like this," "Both are the same, oh well, never mind."
Yan Xuezhan said: "Our troops rescued her and she joined the army. So, here in our Civil Affairs Bureau, we awarded her the 60th Anniversary of the Anti-Japanese War Medal!"
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "A few of us girls" "sang those songs," "songs about fighting the devils," "The Japanese devils' artillery destroyed our families,"
Grandma Lin Ailan said: "They captured my father and mother, and then captured us," "Our troops saved me, they are our saviors."

Grandma Lin Ailan said: "We are going to fight Japan, oh, there are so many such songs. When you sing them, the Japanese come to fight us, and it was then that the Japanese had just arrived and destroyed our home."

movie101_6973286990817002015_2220_2400.text: A Hao and his brothers arrived at the rooftop. The man in the yellow shirt asked: "Who wants to eat mooncakes?"
The child said: "I want, I want too."
The uncle said to A Qi: "Can you cut them?"
A Qi replied: "Sure."
Yan Zheng praised: "Be careful" "Well done"
The child said: "Wow, you're so smart."
A Hao said: "Well done."
A Hao called out: "Bro Yan Zheng!" Hearing A Hao's call, Yan Zheng's smile gradually froze on his face. He looked at A Hao in front of him, then stood up and walked towards him.
A Hao smiled and said: "Hello, hello."
A Hao said: "Happy Mid-Autumn Festival." "Sit, sit, sit."
Yan Zheng said: "So happy to see you!"
A Qi said: "Come, sit."
A Hao said: "Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival. I specifically brought mooncakes to honor you." Then he added: "And also, fine wine."
Yan Zheng quickly said: "I can't accept these things. I'm a public official."
A Hao said: "It's Mid-Autumn Festival, bro Yan Zheng. Just take the mooncakes, take them."
Yan Zheng said: "Alright, then. I'll only accept this box of mooncakes" "The rest, you take back" "Thanks for the gesture."
A Hao said: "Bro Yan Zheng, you helped me last time. I've kept it in my heart all along. Actually, I've been wanting to find a chance to repay you."
Yan Zheng said: "No need to be so polite."
A Hao put down the cola, grabbed a box of snacks and said: "This is for the children, for the children."
Yan Zheng quickly said: "No, no, no. I can't take your money."
Yan Zheng hurriedly said: "What do you mean? I don't want it."
A Hao said: "It's a small thing, don't be so formal" and then threw the money on the ground.
A Qi grabbed A Hao's clothes and said: "I already said I don't want your money."
Yan Zheng grabbed A Hao's collar and said: "A Hao, you're filthy rich, right?" "Tell me," "Have you been selling drugs with Fat Boy Chao recently?" "Speak!"
A Hao said with a smile: "Just trying to make a living."

Yan Zheng said: "It doesn't matter if you don't admit it. My colleagues have already told me everything. Let me tell you, I've been a cop for twenty years. I haven't taken a single bribe. So I won't take your dirty money. Take these gifts and leave immediately!"
A Hao grabbed Yan Zheng's arm and said: "Bro Yan Zheng."
Yan Zheng said angrily: "If you won't leave, I'll leave."
A Qi and A Hao each picked up a handful of cards from the ground and began to shuffle them in their hands.

The scene shifts to the second floor where A Qi and Lei Luo are standing by the railing. A Qi said: "In this world, some people are greedy for money, while others aren't. Yan Zheng is one of the ungreedy ones. Let him go."
A Hao laughed and said: "I'm greedy for money. Having money is great."
A Hao said: "By the way, bro Lei Luo, last time you got Brother Zai to lend me some money. How about I return it now?"
Lei Luo said: "That's it? You're still short on principal and interest. Keep it as a deposit for now. When I need you, you come."
A Hao laughed and said: "I'll definitely come."
Lei Luo pointed at him and said: "You said it."
A Hao: "I said it."
A Hao and Lei Luo laughed and held hands, A Hao said: "Thank you, bro Lei Luo."

A Qi said: "I said it." The scene shifted to the stage where Fat Boy Chao was playing the drums. The band was performing a song, and the atmosphere was very lively. Everyone at the scene was watching the band on stage.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4740_4920.text: Qi Jia walked to the street, and a truck slowly drove up. The driver shouted at Qi Jia: "Don't you value your life?!"

Qi Jia turned around to look at the posters on the wall, all of which were related to the exhibition of the first issue of 'No Name'. There was also a large tree in the middle, with dates from 1993 to 2018 marked on it.

The exhibition content was about the campus environment. There was a large tree on the poster, with the words 'Campus Environment Exhibition' written beside it. Qi Jia walked slowly in front of the tree, reminiscing about the past.
Qi Jia walked to the side, carefully observing the little girl's painting. The girl was sitting under a tree, her hair fluttering in the wind, and the painting was signed and dated by the artist.
Qi Jia was stunned when she saw the content of the painting. It was a painting of a couple kissing under a big tree, just like the one in the storybook, almost identical.
Qi Jia was stunned by the paintings depicting romantic scenes between a man and a woman. All the paintings showed a man and a woman kissing under a tree.

Qi Jia was stunned on the spot, her eyes wide open, unable to believe that the paintings in front of her were all created by Yuan Xiaoou. She kept looking at the paintings, her eyes filled with disbelief.
Qi Jia was stunned, and the scene flashed back to the day of the first kiss with Yuan Xiaoou, Qi Jia said: "I can't believe it."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don't worry, as long as I'm here, I'll definitely protect both of you." Yuan Xiaoou then carried Qi Jia to the hot pot restaurant.
The scene shifts to the couple's home, where Yuan Xiaoou pretends to be a doctor and says: "Don't worry, I'll definitely cure you."
The scene shifts to the rainy night when Qi Jia and Yuan Xiaoou were in the car. Qi Jia tightly hugged Yuan Xiaoou, and Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, don't be afraid."
Qi Jia walked out of the gallery with a bag, while the students dispersed, chatting and laughing.

The scene shifts to Shanghai in 2013. On the 52nd floor of a building, the real estate sales department of a large state-owned enterprise is located. The entire floor is filled with glass windows, and the sunlight shines in, illuminating the spacious and tidy layout of the office.

The scene shifts to a man in a suit, who is standing in the elevator of an office building. As the elevator doors close, he sighs in relief and heads to the company reception. The man in the suit, having just entered the company, is greeted by the receptionist with a smile.
The manager, covering his face in pain, stumbled into the meeting room, with the employees standing up to greet him.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Oh man, these two foreigners can really drink" "They nearly drank me to death last night" "But yes". After speaking, Yuan Xiaoou and the crowd cheered and celebrated.

movie101_6965768652251628068_240_420.text: Da Chun and Zhang Yang were holding shoes, looking at the approaching Xia Luo with a smile, while Little Brother-in-law opened the car door, Xia Luo got out of the car, and Xia Luo looked at the wedding scene with great interest.
Zhang Yang said: "Xia Luo!"
Zhang Yang, seeing this, was very happy and said: "Xia Luo, you're doing well."
Da Chun came over and said: "I was just wondering who was driving around here in circles."
Xia Luo said: "Long time no see." Xia Luo took the flowers and walked away.
Zhang Yang cursed: "Little Brother-in-law, you little bastard!"

Zhang Yang continued: "Everything I did today was for the one secretly hidden in my heart. Her name is Qiu Ya. She was famous in school, recognized as the school beauty, while I was even more famous as the school joke. But I just don't get it—why do such beautiful girls always end up marrying a pig in the end? I want to have a moment of brilliance on her most important day and then disappear forever, becoming the unattainable idol in her life. Although I'm not the protagonist today, I want to dress the most handsome. Unfortunately, I ended up wearing the same outfit as the Master of Ceremonies."
Master of Ceremonies said: "This esteemed colleague, did you walk into the wrong room?" Xia Luo furrowed his brows, glared, and then sneered.
Zhang Yang turned to Yuan Hua and said: "Yuan Hua, can you improvise a poem for Xia Luo's outfit?"
Xia Luo said: "I'll toast to you."
Zhang Yang said: "Come on, come on, give us one!"
Yuan Hua stood up and said: "Alright, I'll try." "A lone banquet guest, feathered outfit—all classmates, hence feathered attire."

Yuan Hua said: "Xia Luo, I was just joking. Don't take it to heart. It was purely for rhyme." After saying this, Yuan Hua raised his glass with a smile and clinked it with Xia Luo's glass. Xia Luo also raised his glass and drank it in one gulp.
Old Wang put down his wine glass and said: "Classmates, how have you been?"
Zhang Yang said: "Old Wang, I heard you were expelled for accepting gifts and yet you still came."
Zhang Yang said: "Do you remember me? I won the winter marathon that year."
Zhang Yang said: "First."
Zhang Yang said: "That New Year's, my dad brought over a Sony radio for you."
Old Wang said: "Zhang Yang, a teacher can never forget."
Yuan Hua said: "Mr. Old Wang, my dad sent a television."
Da Chun said: "Teacher, I gave you a calendar."
Old Wang said: "The teacher can't remember that." "I don't hold grudges." "You all have changed so much."
Meng Te said: "Old Wang, I'm Meng Te. I go by Meng Te Jiao now."
Old Wang, smiling, says: "Come, sit, sit."
Old Wang picked up a glass of wine and toasted with everyone, saying: "Please, take a seat."
Old Wang said: "To be honest, the student I remember most from your class is that fool, Xia Luo. What is that idiot doing now?"
Zhang Yang said: "Come here, fool!" "Tell the teacher what you're doing now." Everyone laughed.

movie101_7021829520667705869_2700_2880.text: "My mother was caught and killed", Grandma's eyes welled up with tears as she recounted this tragic memory. She continued, "Her hands were tied behind her back and feet were bound, all tossed into the river. Grandma covered her face and wept.
Grandma said: 'They caught my mother and threw her into the river that they were building.' 'The person who threw my mother was him (the Japanese soldier).'
Grandma's face was full of wrinkles, her eyes deep with a hint of sharpness. She rested her chin on her hand, looking at the visitor in front of her with a calm expression.
The next day, the sun shone on the earth, and the tree leaves above the ward fluttered in the wind. The patients in the ward were sitting at the door of their rooms, waiting for breakfast.
Grandma sat by the window, bowed her head, and sobbed silently.
The clouds in the sky were rolling and changing, and the sun was sometimes blocked by the clouds.

Grandma continued, "They wanted to kill people of Songmei village, I was caught by the Japanese, and three of us from Songmei Village were forced to marry him. I pretended to agree, but in my heart, I thought of stabbing him with a knife."
Grandma said: 'I pretended to agree to marry him, but later I opposed him.'
Grandma said: "Many of my experiences are known to the state. He (the Japanese) made me crippled, and he is dead too."
The frail body of Grandma was trembling, and her face was covered with wrinkles. She was wearing slippers, supporting herself with two plastic stools, slowly making her way to the dining table.
Deputy Dean Liang Chaosheng continued, "When she gets up, someone feeds her. Sit until noon and then slowly move inside to sleep."

Deputy Dean Liang Chaosheng continued, 'In the afternoon, she sits at the door, waiting for the woman (caretaker) in the afternoon to prepare the food, then gives it to her to eat. We cook for three people and deliver it to them, the others who can walk can go and get their meals from the dining hall themselves.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Yuan Xiaoou was still in the middle of a phone call when suddenly Lin Shuer called him. Yuan Xiaoou said: "Hey, rich lady," "what made you think of calling me?"
Lin Shuer said: "Yo," "I was even worried that you were too busy with state affairs to take my call."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "What am I busy with? It’s not that I don’t contact you all because I’m afraid you wouldn’t want to deal with me."
Lin Shuer said: "I knew you’d try to turn it around." "You’re really shining in Shanghai, aren’t you?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Don’t say that... Whenever you want to come to Shanghai, I'm always ready to welcome you."
Lin Shuer laughed and said: "Look at you, sweet talker." "When Qi Jia went to Shanghai, I didn’t see you being so attentive."
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "When did she come to Shanghai?"
Lin Shuer replied: "She's been there for a while now, currently in the hospital."
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "Why is she still in the hospital?"
Lin Shuer replied: "Qi Jia has been in Shanghai for almost a year now."
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "No, which hospital is she in?"

Lin Shuer said: "What, you want to visit her? I’m telling you, you’re too late. Even if you saw her, you wouldn’t recognize her. Do you know why you can’t catch up with Qi Jia, blockhead? It’s not because you’re poor, dumb, and ugly; it’s simple, because you lack the savvy."
Yuan Xiaoou angrily said: "Stop the bullshit and just tell me which hospital and what ward she's in."
The scene shifts to a hospital. A car slowly stops at the entrance. The driver, Yuan Xiaoou, gets out and walks straight into the hospital.

Yuan Xiaoou ran into the hospital, past the nurse stations on both sides, and arrived at the elevator. Lin Shuer and her group had already taken the elevator to the second floor. The elevator slowly ascended, and Lin Shuer's figure gradually disappeared from the mirror.
Yuan Xiaoou pushed Lin Shuer away and ran towards the hospital.
In the hospital, a disheveled Yuan Xiaoou arrived at the nurse's station, looking around for Lin Shuer. At that moment, a patient walked by and bumped into him.
Yuan Xiaoou followed behind, hesitating to speak.
Yuan Xiaoou, who was originally standing, slowly squatted down in front of Lin Shuer, and said: "Qi Jia."
Yuan Xiaoou held the pen, took the woman's hand and said: "You've been in Shanghai for such a long time, why didn't you contact me?"
Lin Shuer asked: "Who are you?"

movie101_7021829520667705869_360_540.text: The scene shifts to the interior of an abandoned house, where the windows are wide open, letting in a gentle breeze that rustles the curtains.

In 1997, the year of Li Feng's death, the village was still as quiet as ever, with the same simple and peaceful life.

Cao Heimao was sitting on the edge of the bed, carefully pouring a small glass of water from the basin. She held the glass with both hands, afraid of spilling a single drop, and tilted her head back to drink. After drinking, she wiped her mouth with the back of her hand, as if she had just finished a big meal.

Cao Heimao was born in 1922, in the town of Huairou, Hebei. Her parents were both teachers. As a child, she loved to go to the village library to borrow books. She was deeply inspired by the 'Song of the Great Wall' written by the patriotic poet Lu Xun, and at the age of 13, she joined the Communist Party. During the Anti-Japanese War, she worked as a nurse, and during the Korean War, she served as a medical staff at the front lines. She witnessed the suffering of the masses and the heroes emerging from the masses, which greatly influenced her. She firmly believed that the Party was the only hope for the people, and she swore to fight for the Party's cause.

Volunteer An Shihong squatted on the stool in front of the house, eating and chatting with the old lady. The old lady said, 'She was born under unfortunate circumstances, fleeing from Korea to China.'
Volunteer An Shihong, who had been volunteering in various ways, had a car accident on the way to deliver food. He was taken to the hospital and passed away on the way home from the hospital.
Volunteer An Shihong said: "Mama in Korean," "Papa in Korean," "Grandma in Korean"

movie101_6965768652251628068_3840_4020.text: Qiu Ya followed closely behind, and the three of them looked at Yuan Hua on the small boat, feeling a bit scared.
Xia Luo and Qiu Ya exchanged a glance and then looked at Yuan Hua together. Yuan Hua was startled by their gaze and stood up straight.
Zhang Yang: "What a twist of fate," "Can you believe what happened to our Uncle Yuan Hua?" Yuan Hua was stunned by the news. Meanwhile, Qiu Ya was in the pool, soaking up the last rays of sunlight.
Yuan Hua's eyes were drawn to Qiu Ya's slender figure. Zhang Yang said to Yuan Hua: "Stop looking. She is your sister-in-law now."
Qiu Ya turned around, picked up the wine glass, and gave him a look. Yuan Hua was startled and quickly looked away. Zhang Yang said: "Why are you still sneaking a peek?"
Xia Luo said: "Yuan Hua" "I have always admired you" "You were distinguished even in school days"
Yuan Hua looked down at the food in his hands and said: "Showing off, showing off."
Xia Luo: "Could you write an impromptu poem about my current outfit?"
Yuan Hua smiled and said: "My poetry is always critical."
Xia Luo: "It's okay."
Yuan Hua said: "Let me try." Yuan Hua gestured with his hands and said: "Strutting cockerel, Soars higher than the phoenix."

Xia Luo clapped and said: "Good, good literature!" "You have not lost your talent from those days." "How about this," "I'll invest in a magazine for you," "I've already thought of a name." "'Men Need to Show off.'" "You will be the editor."
Yuan Hua was stunned, his eyes wide open. Qiu Ya looked at him with a smile, and Zhang Yang was also amused by this. Xia Luo was leaning on the chair, smiling at the three of them.

Xia Luo raised his glass and clinked with Yuan Hua's glass, then drank it in one gulp. Yuan Hua watched the three of them, feeling a bit out of place, and quickly lowered his head to finish the last sip of his drink. Zhang Yang sat beside him, smiling at him.
Yuan Hua holding a hat said: "Let me tell you, I really regret it." "I was so naive back then." "Xia Luo, the truth is that I'm still haunted by the time Chen Kai insulted Winter Mei."
Yuan Hua: "What did you say?" Everyone looked at each other in shock.
Yuan Hua said: "Maybe I talked too much, I thought you all knew."
Xia Luo said: "It's okay, Yuan Hua. I just want to get a simple understanding. Continue."
Yuan Hua: "Actually, it's no big deal." Winter Mei agreed to go into the small woods to protect you, but I shouted myself hoarse, but I couldn't change her mind to protect you."
Zhang Yang said: "Chen Kai's family had some influence, making Winter Mei's family compensate."

movie101_7166164445343941151_1080_1260.text: Wang Xiaobing laughed and said: "You look a lot more like him."
Huang Dage smiled and said: "What's the matter? Speak."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Brother, this is the situation" "My girl is sick and waiting for money to have surgery in the hospital" "I'm afraid that if the prices go up, I won't be able to get a job."
Huang Dage said: "I don't think you're unable to get a job. You just don't want to work anymore, do you?"
San Er patted Wang Xiaobing's shoulder and said: "Isn't that right?"
Wang Xiaobing turned to Huang Dage and said: "Kneel down"

Huang Dage said: "You know the rules here. If you want to fight, you have to cripple. If you want to punish, you have to pay money."

Wang Xiaobing said: "If you really want to fight, someone will die here today."
Huang Dage said: "If you dare, let him go." "Damn it, tell me, what are you here for?"
Xu Decai said: "It's one thing to beat us, but stealing my case? Don't go too far."
Huang Dage asked: "Who hit you? Where?"
Wang Xiaobing replied: "On the street."

Huang Dage said: "My people never fight in the street" "They won't steal your things" "If you get beaten up, go to the police" "The same goes if you lose your case" "I can't help you" "I won't take care of it"
Wang Xiaobing looked at Xu Decai and said: "My brother already paid the protection fee."
Huang Dage asked: "What is the protection fee?"
Wang Xiaobing replied: "That's called."
Wang Xiaobing said: "That's called a management fee."
Wang Xiaobing said: "I paid the management fee."
Huang Dage said: "Oh my, you thought this was the underworld? This is a logistics company, understand? Do you understand what a logistics company is?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "I'll do it."
Huang Dage said: "Do you think it's easy to do this job on the street?" "We should talk about affection, righteousness, civility, and manners."
Wang Xiaobing replied: "Yes"

Huang Dage said: "Rules." "Do you think I like to raise the price?" "Is it easy for us brothers to live?" "There's pressure to have a place to live, to eat, to use water and electricity," "all kinds of pressure." "Everything else is going up in price." "Can I not raise it?" "Am I not embarrassed if I don't raise it?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "No, no, no, I'm sorry."
Huang Dage said: "If we don't raise prices, there's no future in what we do."
Wang Xiaobing laughed and said: "Let's go."
Wang Xiaobing stood up and said: "He's absolutely right."
Huang Dage, with a fierce expression, said: "Listen to me" "In consideration of your being a fellow townsman, I'll let you off this time" "Get lost."
Wang Xiaobing took the cloth and said: "Thank you, Brother Huang."
Huang Dage took a puff of his cigarette and said: "Come back" "I'll borrow it" "Take it"
Wang Xiaobing said: "Brother, this, this isn't right."
Huang Dage said: "If I tell you to take it, you take it."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Take it, take it, take it, take it."
Huang Dage said: "Listen to me" "Take this money" "Cure your daughter's illness" "If your daughter's illness is not cured" "I'll beat you every time I see you" "Do you hear me?"
Huang Dage said: "Go, go, go."
Wang Xiaobing took the money and said: "Thank you, thank you, sisters."
Huang Dage said: "You'd better go."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3120_3300.text: Lei Luo was shot and fell to the ground. The police chased after A Hao and others, shouting, 'Don't run, stand still, don't run.'
A man said: "Lei Luo killed Dingye, didn't he"
Everyone shouted in unison: "Yes, Lei Luo killed Dingye!" "Yes, yes, I saw it with my own eyes."
The people in the house shouted: 'Lei Luo killed Dingye'
The captain ordered: 'Listen up, no one is allowed to let Lei Luo escape, stay sharp.'
Everyone chased after them, shouting, 'Lei Luo killed Dingye, don't run!'

At this moment, A Hao walked into the courtyard. He glanced at Lei Luo, then walked straight past him. Lei Luo, who was sitting on a chair, immediately stood up and chased after him, but he ran into a dead end.
The man in the white vest shouted, "He's here, don't run! Lei Luo killed Dingye," "He's here, don't run! Catch him!"

The man in the suit was shot in the leg. He used the wall as a support to jump up, but was shot again as he landed. A man in a white shirt was shot in the shoulder, stumbled and fell. He got up and kicked two people in the chest, then fell again after being shot in the leg. A man in a suit was shot in the arm and knee, and was kicked by a man in a white shirt, sending him flying.

The man in the suit shot Lei Luo in the abdomen, Lei Luo fell to the ground, the gun dropped beside the basket. The man in the suit looked around, and suddenly someone grabbed his shoulder from behind.

The group of people chasing after them quickly caught up. Xiao Wei and Da Wei hurriedly ran towards the staircase, with the others hot on their heels. Xiao Wei grabbed the handrail and swung down, with Da Wei following suit.

A Hao, who had just rushed out of the house, was about to go back for help, but was blocked by the merciless Lei Luo. Lei Luo raised the samurai sword and chopped down, severing the arm of the man in the yellow shirt.

The leading man, who had just wielded the machete, swung it horizontally at Dingye, but Dingye dodged it nimbly. The man, angered, swung his machete at Dingye again, but Dingye dodged it with a swift back move. The man, furious, swung his machete down, hitting Dingye's head. Dingye, in pain, dodged the man's machete again.

Lei Luo, holding a samurai sword, charged into the building. The people hiding inside scattered in panic. Lei Luo swung the samurai sword left and right, killing the people blocking his way. He reached the door of the room, but it was locked from the inside. He tried to break in with his samurai sword, but the lock was sturdy and unbreakable. Lei Luo, in a fit of rage, swung his samurai sword at the lock, but it did no damage.

Lei Luo, who had just run a few steps, was kicked back by the iron door slamming shut. He quickly grabbed a nearby iron rack to brace against the door, preventing it from closing. Dingye, who had just rushed out of the house, was blocked by the newly closed door. A Hao, who had just rushed out of the house, was blocked by the newly closed door.
The roller shutter door slowly descended, and inside, Lei Luo was struggling to say to A Hao: 'A Hao, ah, the signal flare's gone; I can't call for help, I can't reach the outside.'
A Hao urged, 'Go, go quickly.'

The two arrived at the rooftop, and A Qi, who was squatting by the iron gate, immediately stood up as soon as he saw them. He looked at the two for a while, then climbed over the rooftop using the air conditioning units and ventilation hoods as footholds.
At this moment, A Qi climbed over the wall and came to the back door of the rooftop. He first looked around, then opened the back door and went inside.

At this moment, Lei Luo and Da Wei, who had been locked in a room, were rescued by Dingye and A Hao. Dingye dragged Lei Luo inside, and A Hao carried Da Wei in. The families of the two were left behind, with the children covering their eyes and crying.

At this moment, A Qi was still beating Dingye. Lei Luo took the opportunity to escape. A Hao immediately shot and killed A Qi, then carried Dingye on his back and ran towards the other end of the alley.

The thief shouted: 'Over there, chase.' The two groups of people began to fight. A Qi and Xiao Wei quickly closed the iron gate at the end of the alley. The two groups of people outside were still fighting. The thieves outside didn't dare to enter the iron gate and started throwing tools inside.

Yinmei Mao said, "My Gaga is my mother-in-law." "I don't understand!" "Mother-in-law is Gaga (Hubei dialect)."
Yinmei Mao said, "Gaga would look for me, search everywhere. Without Gaga, I would be lost."
Yinmei Mao paused and continued: "I followed her, I followed her, I don't know how old I was, I, don't, don't know, I don't know how old I was when I fled."

movie101_6965768652251628068_4020_4200.text: Yuan Hua: "It ended up costing Winter Mei's family a lot of money. I heard her mom even had to sell the house."
Xia Luo looked at Qiu Ya and asked: "Do you know about this, Qiu Ya?"
Qiu Ya replied: "Yes, I'm aware of it. You were busy with the rehearsal for the Spring Festival Gala at that time, I didn't want to distract you."
Xia Luo asked: "Do you know about this as well, Zhang Yang?"
Zhang Yang laughed and said: "Bro, whether I know or not, I'm uncertain." Xia Luo picked up a bottle of wine.
Xia Luo sips his wine and says, "It's all in the past now."
Qiu Ya smiled and said: "Come on, let's all have a drink."
Zhang Yang said: "Yes, it's been so long since we've seen our old classmates." "Come on, let me pour you a drink." "To drinking, to drinking."
Xia Luo kicked the chair angrily and said: "To hell with drinking!"
The scene switches to the villa, where Winter Mei is standing by the window, looking at the heavy rain outside. She opens the window, takes a sip of wine, and contemplates something.

Xia Luo: "Winter Mei ah, where are you now?" "We're not together anymore, and yet I still owe you such a big favor." "Back when we were together, I never let you live a good life." "The two of us crammed into a 40-square-meter little house." "A 40-square-meter house."

The next day, Xia Luo drove to the old building where he used to live. He parked the car at the entrance and walked into the corridor. Xia Luo asked an old man sitting at the entrance: "Old Man, is it Winter Mei's family that lives in apartment 322 upstairs?"
Old Man: "Ma Dong what?"
Xia Luo shouted: "Winter Mei"
Old Man asked: "What about Dongmei?"
Xia Luo: "I'll give you money, just let me go."
Old Man: "Ma what Mei?"
Xia Luo says: "Alright, Old Man, you just keep cool."
Old Man raised his hand and said: "Alright then."
Xia Luo: "Alright then," and with that, Xia Luo turned and left.
Qiu Ya walked up to the door and heard Old Man's voice: "Have you earned a single cent since graduation? All you do is drink every day and laze around at home. You're wasting away."
Yuan Hua: "What do you know, this is my dream."
Qiu Ya: "What dream?"
Old Man opened the door: "Who are you looking for?"
Xia Luo, with a toothbrush in his mouth, looked at Yuan Hua and said, "Is this Winter Mei's place? Sorry, looks like I've got the wrong door."
Xia Luo stopped walking, turned around to look at the two of them, and said: "If the money is gone, it can be earned again, but when a person is gone, everything is gone."
Old Man pointed at Yuan Hua and said, "You're Xia Luo."
Xia Luo, with a toothbrush in his mouth, said: "If you've been together for a long time, don't waste all that little passion on fighting. Go on, make a baby while the iron is hot!"
Yuan Hua said: "Let's make one, let's make one." "I'll take your auspicious words!"
Yuan Hua: "I'll close the door for you."

Yuan Hua opened the door and said: "Let's have twins." After saying that, Yuan Hua walked out of the room with a smile on his face. He looked at the house in front of him, feeling a sense of belonging.

movie101_7021874945990853151_1020_1200.text: The scene shifted to outside the Paramount Studio in Shanghai, where neon lights were shining, and the streets were bustling with people. The car that came to the cinema earlier stopped at the entrance.

The street outside the nightclub was wet from the rain, with neon lights shining on the buildings. A group of scantily clad women stood at the entrance, each trying to attract passersby with their unique allure.
Fang Jie opened the car door and got out. A girl said: "Come on, come on! I've booked the second floor! Come down! Relax a bit."
Fang Jie looked at the girls surrounding him and asked, 'Where are you going?'
On a stormy night, a few cars with their headlights on were driving on the road. The first car slowly turned into a lane on the side, while the other two followed closely behind.

The scene shifts to the entrance of the club, where several cars drive in simultaneously. The bodyguards stand neatly on both sides, maintaining order. The last car, as it turns out to be Tang Hexuan's, stops in front of the gate, and Tang Hexuan and his companions get out and walk into the club.
The car stopped in front of a nightclub, and Tang Hexuan and Fang Jie got out of the car one after another. The bodyguards respectfully greeted Tang Hexuan.

Tang Hexuan took off his hat as a gesture of respect, and the others followed suit. After paying their respects, the group walked into the hotel. The interior was grand and luxurious, with crystal chandeliers hanging from the ceiling, and the marble floor underfoot was polished to a high sheen. The hotel staff dressed in black were neatly lined up along the sides.

Fang Jie walked up to Tang Hexuan and said: "Dad, that Ye Fatty was too ruthless this time!" "The bastard wants to kill me straight in jail!" "He even dares to stir things up!" "Should I make him disappear?"
Tang Hexuan looked at Fang Jie and said: "Fang Jie, it's good you're back." "How do you know it was Ye Fatty?" "Why are there so many people in the yard? Dismiss them all."
Fang Jie said: 'I won't disband them.'
Tang Hexuan looked at Fang Jie's face, then turned away in disappointment.
Fang Jie looked at Li Zihao with a smile in his eyes, then turned and left the room. The night fell, and the villa was brightly lit.

Li Zihao drove the car into the estate, but the car stopped in front of a statue in the courtyard. The driver, Li Zihao, looked at the statue in front of him and then drove the car towards it. The car crashed into the statue, and the driver Li Zihao was furious.
Li Zihao slammed the door shut, got out of the car, and walked towards the back of the vehicle.
Li Zihao, who had been hiding in the alley, saw this scene and slowly squatted down, clutching his bleeding left shoulder.

Li Zihao lay on the ground, struggling to move, his body soaked through, the rain beating more fiercely against him. He propped himself up with difficulty, his disheveled hair wet and clinging to his face.
Fang Jie was drenched in the rain, standing in front of the prison door, unable to calm his emotions for a long time.

Li Zihao, drenched in the rain, looked up at the iron cage above his head, then lowered his head to pull the door of the cage. The torrential rain washed over him as he struggled to move, his hands shaking as he tried to open the cage.

The rain was so heavy that it was hard to see clearly, and Li Zihao was also struggling to move forward. He stumbled and fell in a puddle, but after a brief shake of his body, he got up and continued to move forward.

Gong Zai Keung and Piggy, along with the remaining brothers, quickly followed. At this moment, A Hao was still carrying Lei Luo and running downstairs, with bullets hitting the wall right next to them.

Gong Zai Keung took the opportunity to grab A Hao's shoulder, but A Hao turned around and grabbed Gong Zai Keung's hand, pulling it down. Lei Luo took the chance to escape, but Gong Zai Keung pinned him down, and A Hao came over to help Lei Luo pick up the gun from the ground.

A Hao took off his jacket and threw it aside, then grabbed a sack nearby and charged out. He lifted the sack and smashed it towards the men in white, who fell to the ground instantly. A Hao then grabbed a bamboo pole and thrust it into the abdomen of one of them.
A Hao, who had been knocked down, got up again, throwing punches at the people chasing him. He then used the momentum to kick away one of the attackers.

The man in the yellow shirt was also knocked down by the net. He struggled to get up, but was kicked down again by a thug. He tried to retaliate but was repeatedly beaten by the crowd. Seeing this, A Hao couldn't bear it and rushed in to help.

Li Zihao was drenched in the rain, his messy hair sticking to his face. He leaned against the wall, looking up at the rain. At this moment, Fang Jie and his children arrived at Li Zihao's side. Fang Jie stood with his hands in his pockets, while his children looked at Li Zihao with concern.

The ship docked at the pier, the bustling crowd dispersing like a tide.

Fang Jie: "Dragons produce dragons and phoenixes give birth to phoenixes", "The sons of mice will fight", "No, no mice", "I tell you", "Everyone on the Bund knows", "We are a perfect match", "You are a crow in the sky", "No, no crows", "You are a phoenix flying in the sky", "I am on the ground, this..."

Fang Jie turned around and said, "There she is."

Tang Qianqian and her sister Tang Qianqian, carrying their luggage, walked down the stairs of the ship. The dock was crowded with people disembarking. Tang Qianqian looked around for Fang Jie, while Fang Jie was busy navigating through the crowd to find the ship's gate.
Tang Qianqian got out of the car and greeted the crowd. A man said, "You're back."

Fang Jie stood up and walked towards the front of the carriage. Tang Qianqian watched Fang Jie's retreating figure with a smile. The carriage started moving, and Fang Jie sat back in his seat.
Tang Qianqian smiled and said: "You are quite romantic now, you even arranged an antique carriage to pick me up."
Fang Jie: "Of course!" "Who am I?" "I'm Fang Jie."
Tang Qianqian handed the gift to Fang Jie and said, "Here is your gift."
Fang Jie looked at the photo and answered: "A dog."

The two men, using a long rope, swung A Hao onto the power pole at the end of the alley. Using the rope, they dragged A Hao back to the ground. Seeing A Hao lying on the ground, they used the rope to lift him up again. This time, they used the rope to drag A Hao towards the staircase.

A Hao was pinned down by two thugs, one on each arm, and another one came up and stabbed him with a knife. Just then, a group of people rushed in from outside the door. A man in a suit kicked Lei Luo to the ground, and A Hao was rescued.

A Hao's eyes widened as he watched the two people dragging his legs away. Lei Luo shouted: 'A Hao!'

The doctor said, "The patient's leg bone is fractured in half, and the knee has shifted out of place. It looks like we'll have to amputate. Even if we can save his leg, he'll walk with an uneven gait and become a hunchback."

A Hao's eyes were lifeless, his face covered in blood. He was falling into the river, with blood mingling in the water. The scene shifted to a shattered glass surface, with broken bricks falling into the water below. The shattered glass surface was surrounded by scaffolding, with the two standing on it.
