A Hao opened his eyes and looked at the ceiling, his mind in disarray, recalling the events that had transpired.
A Hao lying on the bed, turned his head to look at Lei Luo.
A Hao, who was lying on the bed, slowly opened his eyes and looked at Lei Luo. Then he raised his head to look at the ceiling.

Lei Luo, who was originally standing straight, had to bend down to pick up the IV stand and then stood up straight again. He held his head with one hand and supported himself with the other on the IV stand, looking at A Hao's injured leg.
The scene shifts to a hospital room, where A Hao is having his leg bandaged.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1260_1440.text: Man, who was drenched in water, said: "Take that broom down" "I think this brother is not easy."
Bald Man said: "You guys are blessed in disguise."
Driver: "So, thank Brother Huang for me." "Thank you, I'm very ashamed."
Driver: "Roll it aside."
Bald Man said: "The car you guys bought" "Was the previous owner called Wan Peng?" "You dare to buy his car" "Countless people are looking for him"
Driver asked: "Hey, brother, what's going on? Can you clarify a bit?"
Bald Man: "Go find out yourself."
Driver said: "Hey, bro" "Bro, you said" "Bro" "What are you doing, it hurts."
Xu Decai: "Go and find that Wan Peng quickly."
Driver, touching his head, said: "Ouch, this hurts."
The scene shifts to a small truck slowly stopping in front of the grocery store. Xu Decai asks Driver: "The person you talked about, is he here?"
Driver said: "Wan, Wan Peng, no, not him, my daughter is here, I need to send the money to the hospital first."
Xu Decai: "Do you have a clue?" "How can this little money be enough?" "Go and find the box first." "Once you find the box, it will end all the problems."
Driver glanced at the box and said: "Brother, there is actually money in the box, right?"
Xu Decai said: "If there's no money in the box, you're not gonna look for it, right?"
Driver: "No, I just want to know whether you're looking for the box" "or helping your niece with treatments."
Xu Decai said: "Both."
Driver smiled and said: "Well, in that case," "why don't we make a written agreement or something?"
Driver quickly refused: "No, no, no." "No need, no need, no need." "Let's go, let's go."
Driver turned on the engine, and Man asked: "What are you going to do?"
Driver turned around and said: "Didn't you say that we needed to find the box?"
Driver said: "Go on, go on."
Driver got out of the car and shouted: "Bro, bro, bro." Then he walked up to Xu Decai and said: "When you see my wife and daughter later, can you please respect me a little?"
Driver said: "Don't move." Xu Decai left, ignoring Driver's order, and got into the van.
Driver, seeing Doctor coming out, quickly stepped forward and said: "Doctor, Doctor, how is Wang Rui doing now?"

Doctor: "Her condition is basically stable right now, and the child is also very strong. The hospital has thought of all possible ways. The most important thing right now is medicine for surgery, imported medicine. We have to rush and order it from abroad. This way we can reduce some risks. If you don't pay the day after tomorrow, it will be too late."
Driver: "Got it, I understand."
Doctor, with a face full of confusion, looked at Xu Decai and said: "My memory, Xu Decai, we have had dinner together, I brought two of our female nurses from the department with me."
Xu Decai: "We never had dinner, you must be mistaken."
Doctor: "No way, how could I possibly misremember."
Xu Decai: "I have a too common face, it must have confused you."

At this moment, a Female Nurse called Doctor over and said: "Doctor, patient on bed 309 is getting fever again." Doctor put on his mask and walked away, and Xu Decai, seeing this, quickly pulled Driver into a nearby room.

movie101_6965768652251628068_4200_4380.text: The old lady's chicken suddenly started flapping its wings and flew out, Xia Luo was startled, and Ma Dongmei looked up to see the old lady's bald head covered in chicken droppings. The old lady was picking up clothes from the drying rack and saw Ma Dongmei, throwing the clothes in her hand at Ma Dongmei. Xia Luo was stunned, and Ma Dongmei looked at the old lady in a daze.
The next morning, the sunlight was just right, shining on the balcony where Ma Dongmei was hanging clothes. She wore a long-sleeved shirt and shorts, methodically hanging up the washed clothes.
Ma Dongmei was tidying up the house and said: "Come in" "Superstar" "You could've knocked or said something" "Let me tidy up this mess" "Our place is small" "Can't compare to your mansion"
Xia Luo walked and said: "There are no degrees in homes."
Ma Dongmei sat down and said: "Xia Luo" "Sit down and talk."
Xia Luo walked a few steps forward and said: 'Ma Dongmei'
Ma Dongmei said: "Yes."
Xia Luo turned around and said: "Long time no see."
Ma Dongmei stammered, "I, I, I see you on TV all the time. You, buddy, you're so popular right now, you're on every channel, you're on every channel, it's gotten to the point it's totally annoying."
Ma Dongmei turned around and saw Xia Luo, and said with a smile: 'This is the brick I used to film Sister Na, I always keep it, now whenever I see her sing, I want to hit her with it.'
Xia Luo said: "So, you've given up javelin?"
Ma Dongmei helplessly said: "I gave up a long time ago" "There was this one competition where I accidentally hit the referee with the javelin and was banned for life"
Xia Luo said: "Good that you've given up," "Constant practice would've given you thick arms."
Ma Dongmei replied: "Ah," "I'm working as a team doctor in sports school now," "and when I'm free, I give massages and cupping therapy to the athletes and all."
Xia Luo walked into the room and saw the chandelier, which made him think of Ma Dongmei. He turned his head and looked towards the door.

Ma Dongmei said: 'Right, you haven't eaten, right?' 'I'm boiling noodles in the pot, anise noodles, it's my unique skill.' 'You must have never tried it.' 'Let me serve you a bowl.' After saying that, Ma Dongmei happily went to cook.
Xia Luo said: "I've been wanting this for years,"

Xia Luo sat on the sofa, watching the two of them. Ma Dongmei was barefoot, wearing shorts, and dancing while holding a guitar. Xia Luo came out wearing a bathrobe and slippers, carrying a bowl of freshly cooked noodles. Ma Dongmei said, 'Hurry up and eat the noodles, they're glopping up, finish them and then you can tune your old piano.'
Xia Luo said: 'I'm sick of eating anise noodles every day, even my sweat smells like anise.'
Ma Dongmei said: 'Well, do you see me being sick of it?' Ma Dongmei snatched the guitar Xia Luo was holding and threw it aside.

Ma Dongmei brought a bowl of soup to Xia Luo and said: "Here it comes" "Come on, hurry up" "Enjoy it while it's hot" "Xia Luo" "I always knew that you talk too much" "Just like when we were kids" "Whenever my mother cooked" "You'd certainly knock on the door" "Try it while it's hot" "I do not know if you'll like the taste"
He picked up the bowl of noodles that Ma Dongmei had made with chopsticks and brought it to his mouth.

movie101_6973286990817002015_3660_3840.text: Lei Luo, with a bandage on his head, looked at A Hao lying in the hospital bed and said: "I won't let it go just like that"
Lei Luo said: "You rest, I'm leaving". After saying this, he turned around and left.
A Hao, lying on the bed, thought for a moment and shook his head.
Fat Boy Chao was kicked to the ground, his feet still tied to the chair, he struggled painfully, and said: "Piggy, when did you see me break his leg?"
Piggy said: "These few packages were found in the car, your car."
Fat Boy Chao said: "Are you playing me? I won't admit it even if you beat me to death."
Piggy said: "I dare not kill you" "I still need to invite you for a Judicial milk tea."
Fat Boy Chao said: "Don't make such a joke," "It could kill someone."
Piggy said: "That's what I want", then slapped Lei Luo hard and fed him a bowl of porridge to swallow.

Piggy took out a spoon and forcefully fed the porridge from the bowl into Fat Boy Chao's mouth, saying: "Spend the night here tonight" "Until you fall down with a stomachache" Fat Boy Chao was forced to kneel on the ground and vomit.
Piggy said: "Still not talking? Then we'll leave first."
Fat Boy Chao was beaten to the point of kneeling on the ground, crying out: "I admit, I admit, I admit, I admit."
The camera switched to the hospital room, where Lei Luo suddenly sat up from the bed, then collapsed back onto it.
Lei Luo was lying on the floor in a pool of blood, motionless. Next to him was his abandoned wheelchair and slippers.

After a while, he staggered out of the ward, glanced at Qing Jie sitting by the window, and then stumbled towards the nurse station. He collapsed to the ground, and Qing Jie looked at him with a face full of sympathy.
He crawled towards the door, but his legs wouldn't cooperate. He stood up shakily, leaning on the wheelchair, and with one leg lifted, he walked towards the door.
The scene shifts to the hospital, where Qing Jie is pushing a wheelchair, and A Hao is sitting inside with his arms outstretched.
Lei Luo took out three incense sticks from a bundle and said: "I've said, whatever I have, you have half of it."
After the two left, A Hao came to the grave of Yong Zhi and placed a cane in front of the tombstone. He wore sunglasses and looked fiercely at the tombstone.

At this moment, a plane flew over Lei Luo's head, and when he looked up, the plane had already passed. Lei Luo smiled faintly. At this time, a car stopped in front of the crowd, and two people got out of the car and walked towards the crowd.

A Hao said: "In 1965, Brother Luo really gave me half of the world" "He industrialized corruption in the police, the powder business, gambling business, and prostitution business" "Unified money collection, unified money distribution, no need for quarrels" "Those were the smooth years for both the underworld and legitimate businesses" "We made a lot of money, bought lots of property" "Some people say that Brother Luo has five billion in assets"

movie101_7021874945990853151_120_300.text: Li Zihao's body gradually sinks to the bottom of the river, his hands slowly falling, his face showing a painful expression, then he closes his eyes tightly.
The cold rainwater seeped into his skin, he turned his head to look at the sky, then slowly turned to look behind him, his body trembling uncontrollably.

Li Zihao: "Torture" "It momentarily helps me forget the pain" "Forget those unforgettable memories" "The Bund of Shanghai only brings me pain" "The organization" "Hope" "Where is it" "Oh God, please help me" "I want to escape" "I want to end all this"

The three men in black walked into the execution ground, watching Li Zihao. He was bare-chested, hands cuffed, and hanging on an iron chain. The execution ground was filled with water, and Li Zihao was bound to a chain above. He struggled to break free, but the chains were too strong. In a moment of desperation, he jumped into the water below.

Li Zihao was dragged back to the ground by two policemen, his hands and feet bound. He struggled desperately, but the policemen held on tightly, ignoring Li Zihao's screams for help. The policeman holding the flashlight even kicked Li Zihao's feet.
Li Zihao's powerful kick sent the men in black flying, crashing through the training ground's wire mesh.

Li Zihao bent down to dodge, but was hit by a club on the side of his head, then he was directly lifted up by two policemen and thrown heavily to the ground. The policemen then surrounded him with clubs, Li Zihao stood up and shook off the chains on his body.

Li Zihao, with his back to the door, firmly held the iron chain. The police officers, despite the heavy rain, still aimed their guns at him. One officer, unable to contain the situation, drew his pistol and fired several shots at Li Zihao. The bullets, however, landed on the iron chain around his waist, causing him to tremble uncontrollably.
Li Zihao swung the iron chain, hitting the guard's head. The guard fell to the ground, and Li Zihao, with a mighty pull, broke the iron chain. The guards behind rushed forward.
Li Zihao leaped up, kicking open the iron gate, sending the policemen behind him tumbling. Bare-chested, he fought back against the policemen who rushed at him, using the fence to trap one of them.

Li Zihao, with arms bound, could only retreat passively as the man in black approached. Li Zihao was pushed to one side, his hands grabbed by the iron chain hanging on the ground, and he was forced to turn around, raising his arm to meet the iron chain.

Li Zihao was lifted out of the water by the iron chain, his body suspended in mid-air, his legs kicking the water surface, creating waves in the pool. The rain was pouring down on him, and the cold rainwater stung his face.
The seagull soars over the sea, with ships coming and going on the water. On the bustling promenade, pedestrians come and go, and vehicles race by.

movie101_6965768652251628068_420_600.text: Teacher Wang turned around and said: "The teacher speaks without thinking."
Teacher Wang: "No problem, no problem." Teacher Wang raised his glass to toast with Xia Luo, who picked up the bottle and drank it all in one go.
Ma Dongmei said: "Classmates."
Everyone stood up and said: "Congratulations, congratulations!"
A man said: "We're all classmates, how about we send a representative to say a few words, Xia Luo?"
Everyone was shouting: "Xia Luo Xia Luo be brave be brave make a confession". At this moment, Ma Dongmei walked in.

Xia Luo said: "Qiu Ya," "When we were in school," "I wrote you a poem; but before I could read it to you, I ate it." "But that's okay," "I wrote you a song," "At this moment," "I'll sing it for you," "I want to mark our relationship with a perfect question mark."
Xia Luo knelt on one knee and said: "Once is enough, I want to watch the end of the world with you."
Ma Dongmei shouted: "Xia Luo"
Ecco Lee looked at the bride and said: "Ma Dongmei." Ma Dongmei came in from outside. Ecco Lee said: "Why did she come dressed like this?"
The waiter replied: "Yes, yes."
Ma Dongmei said: "Xia Luo, didn't you tell me that you were going to sweep your mother's grave?"
Xia Luo asked: "What's wrong?"
Qiu Ya said: "Ma Dongmei, why are you here so late?" Ma Dongmei turned around, and Qiu Ya continued: "Xia Luo is drunk."
Ma Dongmei said: "Qiu Ya, I didn't even know you were getting married. I just came dressed like this, sorry about that." "Oh my, congratulations, congratulations, sir."
Qiu Ya: "This is my husband."
Ma Dongmei apologized: "Oh dear, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, sir." "Oh my, all the classmates are here, it's been so many years." "Oh, Teacher Wang, you’re here too, you're still alive!"
Teacher Wang: "Ma Dongmei, Ma Dongmei, Ma Dongmei is here, have a seat quickly."

Ma Dongmei turned around and said: "No, I'm not sitting down, I still need to go with Xia Luo to her mother's grave." "You know, all these good events happened on the same day." "Xia Luo, let's go, let's go home."
Xia Luo said: "You go home first, I haven't finished my drink." Ma Dongmei said: "Your stomach is not good." "Stop drinking, let's go home and drink." "We have wine at home, let's go."
Xia Luo pushed Qiu Ya away and said: "I don't want to drink Royal Salute."
Ma Dongmei said: "You see, you've had a little to drink, isn't it just making the classmates laugh at you?"
Xia Luo shouted: "Who dares to laugh at me, Xia Luo?"
A man said: "No one's laughing at you, isn't that right?" "No one's laughing at Xia Luo at all, is that right?" "Go, go, go, go home, go home, go home, go home."
Xia Luo shouted: "The last thing I fucking want to hear is you talking. Don't think I don't know, Qiu Ya’s first kiss was fucking taken by you."
Ma Dongmei said: "Let's go home." Then she turned and left.
Ma Dongmei turned around and said: "Xia Luo" "Am I treating you too kindly?"
Xia Luo's inner monologue: "Honey, let's not bother with them men."
Ma Dongmei said: "Get out of my way." "Qiu Ya is having a wedding here," "and you're singing and dancing around," "dressed like a feather duster." "What are you showing off for?"
Xia Luo said: "I earned the money myself." "I can wear what I want."

Ma Dongmei said: "You earned that money yourself? Do you feel proud, Xia Luo? From graduation to now, have you earned a single penny? For so many years, you've been lying at home all day, your limbs are practically atrophying from disuse."

movie101_7021874945990853151_1380_1560.text: Tang Qianqian said, 'Look how much it resembles you'
Fang Jie pretended to be reluctant and said, "Alright, I'll reluctantly accept it, thank you."
Tang Qianqian asked, 'By the way, how's my dad?'
Fang Jie: "He's doing well. He misses you a lot, just like I do."
Tang Qianqian asked, "Then why didn't he come to pick me up?"

Fang Jie replied: "He's at a meeting in the Administrative Council today, so he specifically sent me to pick you up. He should be waiting for you at home now. The situation in Shanghai is too chaotic these days, every day, the Suzhou River surfaces with so many bodies. Those people's faces are all decayed."

Fang Jie and Tang Qianqian were knocked down by the crate, but the box car was still moving forward. Li Zihao quickly jumped onto the box car, which then crashed into a narrow alley. The box car was filled with various sizes of cardboard boxes and tied with thick ropes. The impact of the crash caused the boxes to break open, feathers flew out, and the children quickly grabbed the boxes to cover their heads.

The Japanese soldiers on the second floor opened heavy fire towards the front line of the People's Liberation Army. The PLA was forced to retreat repeatedly. The Japanese soldiers even shot at Fang Jie who was crawling on the ground.
Fang Jie pushed Tang Qianqian into the alley, but was blocked by the oncoming truck. He had no choice but to push Tang Qianqian onto the truck. Tang Qianqian struggled and shouted, "Let go of me!"

Fang Jie and Li Zihao were both knocked off the carriage by the impact, crashing to the ground. The two people behind the carriage took the opportunity to grab the reins and dash away. The carriage sped off, and the three of them tumbled over each other.
Li Zihao was also knocked off his feet by the blast wave, tumbling into the cargo hold of the ship. The shockwave sent the entire ship airborne, and the cargo hold was filled with feathers and dust.

Fang Jie and Li Zihao were in a fierce chase, with Fang Jie shooting while running. Li Zihao, who had just jumped onto the carriage, was knocked off by a shot. Seeing this, Fang Jie immediately jumped onto the carriage to take over.
Fang Jie fired a shot at Li Zihao, then quickly got on a bicycle and rode away. Li Zihao's men were knocked off their horses by the crowd and fell to the ground.

The rickshaw driver was knocked out by the blast wave, and the rickshaw, out of control, crashed into Tang Qianqian. The shockwave from the explosion shattered the shop windows on both sides of the street, and countless rickshaws were overturned in the middle of the road.

Li Zihao, who was hit by the cart, was lying on the ground, unable to get up. He used his hands to support himself and tried to pick up the net on the ground to wrap it around his feet, hoping to use it to drag himself forward.

The sedan chair was being chased by a sedan, and the two people in the sedan were trying to shake it off. The pedestrians on the street were scared and ran away in all directions. The sedan driving was very skilled, driving in and out of the road to obstruct the pursuers.

Tang Qianqian, who was sitting in the car, was thrown out due to the sudden stopping, and Li Zihao, who was holding onto the car door, was also thrown out. Fang Jie saw the two being thrown out and immediately jumped out of the car to chase after them. Li Zihao, who was running away, looked back to see Fang Jie chasing after him and quickly ran forward. Seeing this, Tang Qianqian also got up and got out of the car, shouting as she ran after them, 'Run, run!'
Tang Qianqian was knocked onto a pile of goods on the street, and the feathers in the hat were scattered on her and the hat, with the car driving away.

Li Zihao was about to throw Tang Qianqian into the car, but the car started moving. The two of them fell onto the truck, and Li Zihao, unable to hold on, fell to the ground. Fang Jie, seeing this, raised his gun and shot Li Zihao in the leg.

Tang Qianqian was startled by the explosion, and the cigarette in his mouth ignited instantly. He hurriedly grabbed Li Zihao's collar to extinguish the fire. The gasoline-soaked Fang Jie was even more furious, furiously pedaling the pedal.

Fang Jie was determined to catch up with Li Zihao, he rode the bicycle into the narrow alley, the thief who had just robbed Li Zihao also followed closely. The two of them rode side by side, the thief even daringly knocked the opponent off the bike, but unexpectedly, Fang Jie was also experienced in bike-handling, he quickly got up and continued the chase.

movie101_7166164445343941151_1440_1620.text: Wife turned around and saw the two of them, waved at them, and then said to Wang Xiaobing: "You've come?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "Ah?"
Wang Xiaobing took out the money from his pocket and said to Wife: "This, this is the money a big brother gave, take it for now." Wife took the money and put it in his pocket.
Wife said: "You should go in later, they are just getting an IV."
Xu Decai said: "Yes."
Wife said: "The kid was in so much pain last night that he couldn't sleep."
Wife was about to leave but turned back to look at Wang Xiaobing. Wang Xiaobing said: "You’ve been working hard these past few days."

Wife said worriedly: "I'm fine. I wish I could take this pain for Daughter." "What should we do? We still need so much more money." "That director came again yesterday." "They said if we can’t raise enough, the surgery could be at risk."

Wang Xiaobing comforted his wife, saying: "It's okay, my dear, it's okay, I'm here. I will find a way for sure. No problem at all." Then he turned to Xu Decai and said: "Ah, this is Xu Decai brother I often talk about with you."
Wife said with a sobbing tone: "Big brother."
Xu Decai said: "All right, all right, all right."
Wife said: "Thank you."
Wang Xiaobing and Xu Decai also came to visit. Wang Xiaobing sat by the bed, and Daughter said: "Dad, you’re here."
Wang Xiaobing smiled and said: "Daddy missed you." "Does it hurt?"
Daughter said: "It doesn’t hurt, daddy. I want to go home. I still have to go to school." Wang Xiaobing looked at Xu Decai, then back at Daughter.

Wang Xiaobing said: "Don't worry, daddy will get you home soon. Once we’re home, you can go back to school, we won’t miss any lessons. Look, daddy even brought your backpack for you. Look, English, Maths."
Wife said with a smile: "Now we can catch up on everything you’ve missed."
Wang Xiaobing said to Xu Decai: "Quickly find the box" "It will solve everything."
Wife said: "You can go if you have things to take care of." Wang Xiaobing smiled and nodded.
Wang Xiaobing smiled and said, "My girl, don’t worry, you’ll be out of the hospital soon. You'll be home before you know it. Be strong, you’re dad’s bravest girl."
Daughter smiled and said: "Goodbye, Daddy." Wang Xiaobing happily left the ward, but Xu Decai had been waiting outside. He pulled Wang Xiaobing away from the doorway, and the two walked off together.
The boy, wearing headphones, took a bite of an apple.
Da Xiong kept calling out: "Yo, Yashi, Yashi."

movie101_6973286990817002015_3840_4020.text: A Qi said: "More than Li Ka-shing." After saying that, A Qi walked to the table, picked up the money, and put it in his bag. The scene then shifted to Sir Chow, who was still counting money, with paper money flying around him.

A Qi sat in the car, his hands were also shackled. He stared straight ahead, then lowered his head to look at his own hands. The scene shifted to a wedding, where the groom and bride walked arm in arm, and the guests applauded. A Hao and Qing Jie stood in the front row, smiling happily. The two then posed for a wedding photo with the elders.
Lei Luo said: "This world is divided into black and white." "I am the biggest in white, you are the biggest in black." "Brother, let me say it again to you."

Lei Luo said: "All you see now in Hong Kong is governed by the British." "Even I can be killed by you." "But you can't kill British police." "If you can endure," "this world belongs to us two brothers."

Boss said: "Guys, we don't have a royal family in Texas." "The race club has specifically organized a Queen's Cup." "If we are confident," "I have the chance to shake her hand." "We must win this race."
Yan Tong laughed and said: "When the time comes, Boss will be the most majestic"
Yan Tong said: "Large and small chicken."
Yan Tong waved to the crowd, then led the group to the gambling table. Boss was holding a cane, and Yan Tong walked up to him.
Yan Tong turned around and said: "A Hao." "Dressed so handsomely." "Are you coming to pull the lead horse?"
A Qi said: "No, I have a friend who has a horse, and it's going to run a race today, just to learn." "What was the horse called again?" "Dragon Pond rat, how is it?"
Yan Tong said: "The horse is as lame as you. Can it outrun the rat? This race, it's my Boss's 'Thunder' that has to win. Definitely win."
A Qi said: "Very well, thank you, thank you," "Hey, we need to supplement the bet, go quickly."

The commentator was calling out the race results: "The last horse to enter the pen is number four, all horses are in position." "Today, let's wait and see who will emerge victorious." "Get ready, after the gates open, the first to rush out is 'Thunder'." "This horse is really great, it's a favorite and is already leading after a few steps." "Look, the second one is the 'Supreme Divine Steed'." "And there's 'Major Success', closely followed by 'Get rich soon'." "The one which is last but one is 'Must be red'." "Oh no, 'Dragon Pond rat' falls to the last place." "They're entering the straight road now, 'Thunder' seems to be winning, it’s been leading all the way and has pulled ahead by several lengths." "Oh no, trouble! 'Dragon Pond rat' has suddenly moved to the outer line and has surged forward, as if it was motor-powered, leaving all the other horses behind." "'Dragon Pond rat' is a big upset this time." "That's it, now crossing the line, 'Dragon Pond rat' is in first place and 'Thunder' is second."
Boss said angrily: "My goodness, what the hell are you doing?" "How do you guys work?" "Both of you."
Hunter said: "Listen, listen, something has happened."
The scene shifts to the day of the horse race, with the trio of A Hao, accompanied by a large number of reporters, arriving at the racecourse.
Boss and Hunter were both furious, while Yan Tong and Lei Luo were full of smiles. Boss and Hunter were then led away by the officials.
Hunter said: "Do you know how much I earn in a month?" "I lost everything." "What do you want me to do?"

movie101_7021874945990853151_1560_1740.text: The two were still driving the carriage, with Fang Jie shouting from the back seat: 'A little closer.' The two carriages were neck and neck, and at the critical moment, Li Zihao, who was bare-chested, picked up an axe and chopped the driver of the other carriage.

Li Zihao, who had been shoved aside, grabbed the thug's hand and threw him towards the tram's driver. The vehicle was in full swing, with the thug hanging on the side, screaming in terror. Li Zihao, bare-chested, fought with the remaining thugs on the outside of the vehicle.

Fang Jie, who had been observing from afar, saw the right moment and rode a bicycle at high speed, crashing through the blockade set by the rickshaw pullers. He rode the bicycle onto the rickshaw, and with a strong pull, he flipped the rickshaw over, causing the pullers to fall to the ground.
Li Zihao, who was about to open the car door, was knocked to the ground by the speeding rickshaw. The rickshaw driver, in a hurry, didn't notice the rickshaw he was driving was actually Fang Jie's.
Li Zihao was chased by the police on the street, he was knocked down by a car, but he quickly got up and continued to fight with Fang Jie on the carriage.

Li Zihao and Tang Qianqian were still on the carriage, while Fang Jie was on the truck, the three of them were moving at the speed of sound on the road, the tires were screeching, and the road was filled with puddles, the carriage was swaying, and the three of them were shaking violently.
Fang Jie, furious, dashed into the laundry shop, lifted the curtain, and rode his bicycle out, heading straight for Li Zihao.

Li Zihao, who had just ridden pillion, was shot in the abdomen by Tang Qianqian. Fang Jie, seeing this, floored the gas pedal and crashed into an obstacle, breaking it in two. The two cars collided, and Li Zihao's car was pushed in front of Fang Jie's car.

The drug dealers behind him were knocked down one by one by Li Zihao's gunfire. Suddenly, a bomb detonated in front of Fang Jie, and he quickly ducked to avoid it, landing on the ground. Fang Jie immediately regained his composure, picked up two pistols, and aimed at Li Zihao and Tang Qianqian.

Lan Ruoyun picked up the glass, took a sip, and then put it down.

movie101_7021874945990853151_2820_3000.text: Lan Ruoyun said: 'Care for a drink? This liquor is really fine. More expensive than you could ever imagine.'

Lan Ruoyun smiled at Li Zihao, then picked up the wine glass and took a sip. Li Zihao frowned, watching Lan Ruoyun. Lan Ruoyun finished the wine in one gulp, and Li Zihao still looked worried.

Lan Ruoyun said: 'You say shouldn't have, shouldn't have let me join,' 'Regardless of success or failure of this mission,' 'We were supposed to be together,' 'That's what you said, right?' 'We were going to get married in Beiping,' 'That's what you said, too, right?'

Lan Ruoyun held Li Zihao tightly, as if afraid he would disappear the next moment.

Lan Ruoyun said: "But what am I supposed to do after you leave me?" "What should I do?" Li Zihao's expression darkened, and he lowered his head, refusing to look at Lan Ruoyun.

movie101_6965768652251628068_5280_5460.text: The scene shifts to the next day, the weather is clear, the temperature drops, and the trees outside the window are covered with a thick layer of frost. The weather suddenly becomes cold, and snowflakes flutter down from the sky. Ma Dongmei and Da Chun are walking in the park when Da Chun suddenly shouts: "Doctor!"
Nurse looked at Da Chun and asked, "Why are you here again?"
Nurse shook her head and said, "No, I don't have the authority."

Ma Dongmei climbed up to the window sill, forcefully breaking the blinds, and said to the inside: "Xia Luo, Xia Luo, I came to see you with Da Chun."
Ma Dongmei said: "Da Chun, now it's just me here to see you." Ma Dongmei walked to the bedside and held Da Chun's hand, looking at his sleeping face.

Ma Dongmei said: "Xia Luo, you know, relationships between people are quite funny. When we were kids, I liked sticking to you, playing house with you. I was the dad, and you were the mom. Later, you got together with Qiu Ya. That's when I realized I had fallen for you. And later, you became a big star, and I didn't dare to like you anymore. Over the years, you wrote so many songs."

movie101_6965768652251628068_600_780.text: Ma Dongmei, with a flushed face, said: "My limbs are about to degenerate," "I go out during the day to do cupping therapy for others," "I ride a tricycle at night," "I just thought I would save some money," "If I change to a motorcycle, I could save some energy," "But you're great," "You took apart everything," "You even disassembled my engine," "Xia Luo, ah," "When we got married, There were no ceremonies," "Just on the day we got the certificate," "You accompanied me to eat a meal of lamb spine," "Now what are you trying to show here," "Do you think what I am saying is too exaggerated," "come on,"
The man with a big beard said: "Hold it in, hold it in for me"
Ma Dongmei, while pulling Xia Luo, said: "Why? Because I have to return it after wearing it."
Xia Luo, lying on the ground, said: "At this moment," "the last bit of dignity I had as a man is gone."
Xia Luo, running upstairs, said: "I no longer have to bother about what others think of me" "I must thank my wife" "She made me a textbook fool"
He then walked to the sink, turned on the faucet, and without even removing his dry clothes, he plunged his head directly into the running water. The icy cold of the water woke him up.
Xia Luo thought to himself: "Perhaps, it's fate that my life," "will always be a joke." "I have never accomplished anything," "and the more saddening fact is," "I have no idea what I want."
Xia Luo cursed while vomiting: "Worthless", "Damn", "Worthless", "Worthless", "Worthless", "Worthless", then lay down on the hotel's luxurious sink and fell asleep.

He lifted his head from the toilet, his hair soaked with water, and his clothes were also wet. He touched his hair and stood up, the mirror behind him was already cracked. He turned around and said: "Divorce."
Xia Luo opened the door, but the sunlight outside was too dazzling, so he covered his eyes with his arm.
In his daze, he suddenly heard the sound of a door closing. When he came to his senses, he found himself in a classroom, surrounded by students.
Teacher Wang, with his back to the students, asks: "You stop right there" "Where is your mother"
Teacher Wang said: "Didn't I ask you to bring your mother here"
Teacher Wang pointed at him with a brush and asked: "What did you just say"
Xia Luo looked at Teacher Wang and asked, "What on earth is going on"
Teacher Wang, with a smile, said: "Xia Luo, hey, hey."

movie101_7166164445343941151_2340_2520.text: Driver, dressed in only a pair of underwear, walked over to Xu Decai and said: "Bro, you got a nice phone there, swiping back and forth like that."
Xu Decai said: "Weibo, looking for the box."

Driver, in a pair of women's underwear, wiped his head with a towel, and said: 'Hey bro, where are you hitting? This is still useful, can you afford to pay for it if you damage it?' Beautiful Receptionist urged: "Go, go, go, go, hurry up and get some sleep."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3000_3180.text: Lan Ruoyun couldn't help but kiss Li Zihao, but was interrupted by the host's voice: "Miss Lan Ruoyun, the next performance is about to start. Mr. Tang Hexuan is waiting for you."

movie101_6973286990817002015_4560_4740.text: A Hao angrily said: "Spread the word, if anyone dares to sell cocaine to my younger brother again, they will lose their hands and feet. Also, if I find out you're the one supplying him, we can no longer consider ourselves brothers."

movie101_7021874945990853151_300_480.text: The scene shifts to a bustling street, where a black car is driving slowly. The scene shifts to the outside of the psychiatric hospital, where two sentries stand guard on either side of the main gate. The iron gate opens, and a car slowly drives in. The man in the passenger seat, wearing a suit, looks around as the car comes to a stop.
The truck drove into the factory, and the workers in the factory were all driven into the trucks by the police. The trucks were sealed off, and the workers could only raise their hands in surrender.

The prison guard took the key, opened the cell door, and the faint light from outside the cell cast upon their faces. The prisoners walked in a line, with the guard at the front saying, "Fang Jie, have a good journey."

Fang Jie, who had been beaten to the ground, suddenly stood up, grabbed the assassin's leg, and yanked him up. Then, with a powerful twist, he flung the assassin onto the bed. The assassin, unable to regain his balance, crashed into the window and was sent flying outside.

Fang Jie quickly gets up and continues to fight with the criminals. He knocks one of them to the ground and then kicks another one in the chest. The criminal, in pain, clutches his chest and stabs Fang Jie in the back with a knife. Fang Jie dodges and kicks the criminal away.
The scene shifts to the prison, where Fang Jie is being escorted out by the guards. Fang Jie looks back at his unconscious comrade and gives a slight smile. Fang Jie: 'Have a good journey.'

Fang Jie's eyes were filled with determination. The police chased after Fang Jie, and Fang Jie threw the handcuffs on the ground. The police immediately drew their guns and shot at Fang Jie. Fang Jie quickly dodged the bullets and grabbed a nearby prison guard, using him as a shield to block the bullets for himself. He then kicked over a nearby table and used the momentum to leap onto the prison guard's shoulders.
The police officer who was shot yelled, 'Quick, he's upstairs!'
The police chase after him, but Fang Jie is one step ahead, entering a door and closing it.

movie101_6973286990817002015_4740_4920.text: Chai Jia said: "Zao’er, Tianhua, Rong, and Achao all came looking for trouble with me, I told them to drop dead. I only work for your A Hao family, let's not talk about this for now, let's relax tonight and take a bath first."

Mr. Luo said, "I did it for the safety of more people. Why didn't you contact the organization after the jailbreak?"

Mr. Luo looked around, then turned to Li Zihao and said, "Alright, let's follow this lead. So this opportunity for you is very rare."
Li Zihao was about to leave but was stopped by Tang Qianqian. Li Zihao turned back and looked at her. "Okay," Li Zihao said, "but I have one condition."
Mr. Luo said, "Go ahead."
Mr. Luo said, "After the job is done, destroy the files and send Lan Ruoyun away." Li Zihao's eyes were red but he remained silent.
The car slowly stopped at the entrance of the mansion. Li Zihao got out of the car, closed the door, and walked into the mansion with a stride.
Lan Ruoyun got out of the car, Li Zihao closed the car door for her, and Lan Ruoyun looked back at Li Zihao with a smile before walking into the house.
Li Zihao took the bag, looked at it, and then looked at Lan Ruoyun. Lan Ruoyun turned and walked away, and Li Zihao remained in place, lost in thought.
Tang Qianqian's eyes were filled with anger and determination. She took a deep breath and walked resolutely towards Lan Ruoyun. Lan Ruoyun stood still, watching her approach.
Tang Qianqian was stunned for a moment, then looked at Li Zihao with a meaningful expression. She turned to Lan Ruoyun and asked, "How come you two are together?"
Lan Ruoyun smiled and said: "Miss Tang, your father said he was busy," "so he had Li Zihao pick me up."
Tang Qianqian asked, "Is it just a simple pick up?" Lan Ruoyun nodded. Tang Qianqian continued, "Li Zihao, I forgot, I heard that you and he used to be good friends, right?"
Lan Ruoyun said: "I wouldn't say Li Zihao and I are good friends."
Lan Ruoyun said: "If you're not good friends why do you address each other so intimately? I saw you with Owen yesterday coming out of Hua Mao Hotel, quite affectionate."
Lan Ruoyun looked at Tang Qianqian and said: "Do you think I've wronged your father?"
Lan Ruoyun said: "That's not the case, I didn't tell him," "But I want to tell you," "Li Zihao," "You'd better stay away from him."
Lan Ruoyun's eyes were filled with tears, her expression firm. Tang Qianqian looked at her with admiration.

Lan Ruoyun said: "Your father knows I went to see Owen," "He asked me to find him and discuss some things," "So you don't need to worry about that," "Nor do you need to bring it up with me in the future."

movie101_7166164445343941151_2520_2700.text: Driver asked, "So, should I register alone?"

Driver asked, "What does BC mean?"
Mr. Xu said: "BC means Before Christ."
Driver asked: "What does 'Before Christ' mean?"
Mr. Xu said: "It means 'Before Christ'."

Wu Jiang said: "Back then, there were constant wars." "A lot of nobles and royals." "They would feast one day, and the next day their country would be gone." "So they inevitably had to run around." "And in the process, some important things would get lost." "This thus gave rise to our finding industry."
Mr. Xu asked, "Mr. Wu, have you found my box yet or not?"

Wu Jiang said: "It will be found. Don't worry." "We actually want to do some publicity to build up a reputation." "So, we ask for your support and understanding." "Since Mr. Xu is in a hurry, I'll just skip the middle parts." "I'm talking about now."

Wu Jiang said: "Well, I think..."
Boss Bao asked, "Which one of you is Mr. Xu?"

Boss Bao said: "Very straightforward." "Where are you guys from?"
Boss Bao said: "From the Central Plains."
Driver said: "Bro, just say you're from Henan." "Why say Central Plains?"
Boss Bao said: "Henan is the Central Plains." "The Central Plains is Henan." "It's the same thing."
Driver asked, 'Bro, where are you from then?'
Boss Bao said: "As for me, well, let me put it this way. I'll explain it to you properly."

Boss Bao said: "Your box, though it hasn't been found yet, I believe it will be found soon. Because before this, we used the American satellite positioning system, later found that it was only good for finding oil, not for finding boxes. So then we used the German satellite positioning system, which has made a lot of progress."
Mr. Xu asked, "Where are we at now with the search?"
Boss Bao pointed at the map and said, "Within a 100-kilometer radius."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3360_3540.text: Lan Ruoyun said: "You just need to remember that your dad loves you."
Lan Ruoyun asked: "Do you love him?"

Lan Ruoyun looked at Tang Qianqian with a fierce gaze and said: "Tang Qianqian, I advise you to stay away from me. Stay away from here too, okay? You shouldn't be in Shanghai. You should hurry back to England."
Tang Qianqian's smile gradually faded. She turned and left, leaving Lan Ruoyun and Li Zihao standing there.

Lan Ruoyun walked out of the hotel, and Li Zihao was already waiting outside. When Lan Ruoyun saw him, she stopped in her tracks. Li Zihao looked at her with a face full of remorse, and Lan Ruoyun was also moved.

Li Zihao, with his head down, didn't dare to look at her. Lan Ruoyun turned to look at him. Li Zihao slowly walked towards Lan Ruoyun. As he approached, Lan Ruoyun said, "This girl has fallen in love with you."
Lan Ruoyun said: "A single glance is enough. I know." Li Zihao turned his head to look at Lan Ruoyun, who was smiling at him.

Lan Ruoyun said: "Don't harm her the way you once harmed me." After speaking, Lan Ruoyun left, leaving Li Zihao standing there, watching her back. The sun shone through the window onto the church, illuminating the cross at the altar. The church was empty, but Li Zihao was the only one left.
Lan Ruoyun clasped her hands together and prayed: "Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done on earth."

The scene shifted to a rainy day, with the sound of rain falling like a mournful melody. The overcast sky seemed to mirror the statue's sorrowful expression. Tang Qianqian, dressed in a simple long dress, walked alone on the church steps, raising her hand to signal Lan Ruoyun.

Lan Ruoyun asked: "Zihao, what kind of person was my father really?"
Li Zihao said: "That's not important. All you need to know is that he is your father and he loves you. That's enough."
Lan Ruoyun said: "Maybe that kind of love is a misfortune."

Tang Qianqian didn't respond to Li Zihao's words, but stared at the rain falling from the sky. After a long while, she took a deep breath, shrugged off Li Zihao's arm, and walked out of the school gate alone. Li Zihao, holding an umbrella, watched her leave, feeling a sense of loss.
Tang Qianqian said: "Li Zihao, I love you. No matter what kind of person you are, I love you. I'll say it again. No matter what kind of person you are, I love you."

The scene switches to a library, where JC is searching for books. He takes a large book off the shelf, pretending to read it, and then leaves the library with the book. Meanwhile, the two maids continue to clean the water off the floor.

Maid wiped the table with a cloth and said, "Strange, what's the boss up to?" At this moment, Teammate was looking at the books on the bookshelf, all of which were exactly the same, with the same cover and even the same serial number.

The camera switches to JC, who is wearing special glasses and looking at the books on the bookshelf, saying, 'How could a person with OCD misplace books like this? 'A,' They should be placed…' 'Here,' '4,' '3.' 'He uses this to remember the password.'
Maid: "Yes, master."
Maid: "Get me some coffee."
Maid B said: "Alright, sir, let's go, okay."
Maid, carrying a fire extinguisher, walked towards the bookshelf, and the two sneaked into the second floor of the bookshelf.

He then climbed up to the second-floor bookshelf, found the hidden compartment, and took out the flashlight to examine the letters inside. Just as he was about to take out the letters, the bookshelf began to shake violently.
The scene switches to a library, where JC shines a flashlight on a row of books, scanning the spines for a specific title. The books are arranged in numerical order, and JC finds the volume he needs.
Afterwards, he quickly leaves the room and closes the door. He then turns around and locks the door from the inside.

movie101_7021874945990853151_3720_3900.text: Li Zihao walked up to her and said: "Tang Qianqian, it's late, you should go home."
Tang Qianqian looked up at Li Zihao and asked: "Do you want to dance?" Li Zihao nodded. Tang Qianqian continued to ask: "Can you dance or not?"
Li Zihao shyly said: "I can't dance"
Li Zihao took off his scarf and said: "Then I can teach you how to dance." Tang Qianqian smiled and leaned into his arms, but Li Zihao pushed her away saying: "Relax."
Li Zihao grabbed Tang Qianqian's hand and continued to slap her hard. Tang Qianqian's face turned red from being slapped, but she still wore a faint smile.

Li Zihao said: "Tang Qianqian, if you mess with me again, I will carry you home." Tang Qianqian took off her sunglasses and said: "Oh, so what you mean is that you don't want to dance, so you want to wrestle?"
Fang Jie, who had just entered the room, saw the whole process with his own eyes. He was stunned, his breathing became rapid, his face pale with shock.

Tang Qianqian, with her head down, was panting heavily. She struggled to lift her head, her eyes red and tears streaming down. Li Zihao, lying on the ground, looked at her with concern. Tang Qianqian, with a face flushed with fever, stared at Li Zihao without speaking.
Tang Qianqian leaned down and gently kissed Li Zihao's lips. Li Zihao frowned, his mind racing with thoughts.

Fang Jie sat in the chair, holding a bottle of alcohol in one hand and a glass in the other. He poured himself a drink, took a sip, and then placed the bottle on the table, resting his head in his hand, appearing very dejected.
Tang Hexuan: 'What are you nodding at, huh?' Fang Jie was stunned.
Fang Jie stroked the little dog and said: "Do you think I'm easy to bully?"

Fang Jie returned to the room, collapsed onto the sofa, and his thoughts suddenly went back to the previous day when Tang Hexuan had arrived at the station with a group of policemen, searching for the assassin of the Japanese Minister.

Tang Hexuan: "I and Ye Qishan each only have a five percent chance" "This time we must use Ye Qishan's knife to get things done" "Let all of Shanghai bund watch me fall" "In this way, all the public opinion" "will stand on our side."
Li Zihao replied: "Heard that Ye Qishan found a few killers from the road who have never missed."
Fang Jie said: "Dad, is it worth it to do this?" "We are now basically showing our most vulnerable place to others to hit."

Tang Hexuan said: "A person only in the most vulnerable time, those who surround him, hidden enemies can emerge." Tang Hexuan gestured with his hands and said: "I would rather die than lose this fight."

movie101_6966492004553490981_120_300.text: Auctioneer said: "Each bid is one hundred thousand Euros,"
Man said: "Ladies and Gentlemen, there are only four in the world."

White-haired Elder took the white cloth, covered his face, and then had the servants remove it. The servants took out a small dog head and placed it on the table. Professor Guan examined the dog head carefully and said: "Chinese Ambassador".
Professor Guan shook hands with White-haired Elder and said: "I'm honored to meet you" "I'm sorry I'm late, I apologize."
White-haired Elder said: "Actually, we should apologize to you."
Professor Guan said: "Look at the edge here,"

White-haired Elder said: "Due to the war many years ago," "My ancestors took something that didn't belong to them," "Every time I see the copper statue," "I feel deeply guilty," "It is the heritage of all mankind," "It should not only belong to one or two people," "So I donated it to a museum in China,"
Professor Guan said: "Sir, in my humble opinion, if everyone thought like you, the world would be a much better place."
White-haired Elder said: "I wish you success" "In finding the whereabouts of other copper statues."

Mr. Morgan raised his paddle and said: "Seven million"

The reporter said: "Congratulations to Mr. Mr. Morgan, MP Company now owns the world's rarest four stamps."

Mr. Morgan said: "You're wrong, not four." Mr. Morgan took out a sheet of paper and tore off four stamps, leaving only one. Mr. Morgan continued: "Now, there's only one in the world." Mr. Morgan handed the item to the assistant, who placed it on the display board.
The scene shifts to a room where a man says: "Look at the news from all over the world about MP Company" "The boss is back" "This is the only one of this stamp" "Its value can triple overnight"

The auctioneer said: "So talented, if you want valuable antiques, I can make them for you, next item."
Man with Red Bow Tie said: "Percy called to question our oil painting 'Morning Light,'"

The auctioneer said: "Question? They know nothing," "Buy it back at a slightly higher price, just like before," "Once a counterfeit is bought and sold a few times," "It slowly becomes real, right?" "Next item,"
Auctioneer said: "The fifth zodiac bronze statue was auctioned very well, beyond our expectations."
Woman said: "This auction season, all buyers are businessmen and they are very patriotic."

The man in the suit continued: "Therefore, these businessmen are willing to pay whatever it takes to buy back their country's cultural relics, aren't they? Their patriotic sentiment can earn us profits."
Hat Man said: "So talented."
The man in the middle said: "These Zodiac bronzes" "Each sells higher than the last" "How can I find them" "Give me some names."
Another man said: "Let's look for Nine-Headed Bird."
The man in the suit said: "Shouldn't we look for a local instead?"
Hat Man: "How about JC?"
A man in a blue suit said: "He hasn't found the oil painting 'Rose' yet,"
The man in the suit said: "'Rose', forget 'Rose', "Tell JC," "If he can help me find the rest of the bronzes," "I will reward him handsomely,"
Hat Man said: "As long as the price is right, JC can find anything."
The man in the suit said: "Then tell him it's one million euros per bronze head" "If he can find the Dragon's bronze head" "I will add a zero."

The man in the suit said: "So talented." The sports car drove out of the checkpoint, and the soldiers on the scene were also attracted by the sound of the car. They ran towards the car with their guns, and the car sped away.

movie101_6973286990817002015_5460_5640.text: Hunter kicked A Ping and said, "Take this bastard away."

Hunter shouted, "Take him away." Fat Boy Chao was beaten so badly that he couldn't get up. Hunter picked up a fire extinguisher and smashed it towards A Ping's face. The impact knocked A Ping unconscious. Seeing A Ping unresponsive, Hunter angrily kicked him.
A Hao, hearing the news, quickly rushed to the hospital with his men. When they got to the ward, they saw A Ping's condition had worsened. Da Wei said: "Bro A Hao."

A Hao asked, "What did the doctor say?"

A Hao said angrily: "I told this damned kid not to touch that thing, told him not touch."

Lei Luo said: "You can't kill a cop," "Even in Britain," "If you fight with the British, we can't win."

A Hao excitedly said: "Why can't we fight them?" "Right now, all the goods in Hong Kong are in my hands," "All the police in Hong Kong are fed by me," "As long as I give the word," "Even burning down the police headquarters is possible."
Lei Luo quickly grabbed A Hao and said: "Cool down, cool down, just cool down." A Hao took out a gun, but Lei Luo snatched it away.
Lei Luo said: "Alright." He then patted A Hao's shoulder.

Lei Luo said: "Do you know why things have turned out this way? Do you realize we're not invincible? Do you know why, despite all we've done, the Englishmen haven't laid a hand on us? It's because everything we do is within some kind of order."

A Hao turned around, walked up to Lei Luo, and said: "Do you know what our bottom line is?" "You crossed the line, you know that?" "You want to kill the police," "The British government won't let us go," "Then everyone will suffer," "What about our brothers, our wives and children?"

Lei Luo said: "I won't kill the police."
"A Hao" turned to leave, and someone shouted from behind: "A Hao, A Ping is spitting out blood!"
A Hao, seeing that the situation was not good, turned and ran into the ward, shouting: "Call the doctor! Call the doctor! Call the doctor quickly!"

movie101_7166164445343941151_2880_3060.text: Wang Xiaobing said to Big Brother: 'Hey, brother, you haven't done a single good deed.'
Big Brother asked Mr. Bao: "Mr. Bao, do you see any way to fix this?"
Mr. Bao said: 'In developed countries, charity is a part of people’s daily lives. As a social elite, it's astonishing and disappointing to see you haven't done any charity.'

Big Brother said: 'Don't be disappointed. Isn't it still time for me to start now? I'll go out and donate to the Hope Project and the Red Cross immediately, then I'll go to the blood donation center to donate blood.' 'Mr. Bao, as soon as we find the box, I'll donate my riverside house to the children in the mountain areas.'

Mr. Bao stopped Big Brother and said: "No, no, no, Big Brother." "Charity comes from the daily details of life." "I understand your intention." "Let's do this: there's a public charity foundation office upstairs." "Just go up and donate 100 yuan."
Big Brother asked: "How many?"
Mr. Bao: "One hundred"
Big Brother thought for a moment and said: "5000."
Wang Xiaobing asked: 'Brother, why do we have to donate 5000? Can't we just find an old lady downstairs, help her across the street, and take a picture?'
Big Brother said: "In society, it's most taboo to suffer big losses for small gains."
Big Brother walked up to the screen and said: "Hello."
Receptionist asked: "Who are you looking for?"
Big Brother said: "Donation."
Wang Xiaobing asked: "Why are we still waiting then?"
Receptionist looked at the turtle in front of her, then at the donation box, and asked: "Where do you want to donate?"
Big Brother said: "Chairman Mr. Bao always says to donate to disabled children."
Receptionist asked: "Chairman Mr. Bao, which Chairman Mr. Bao?"
Big Brother said: "The one downstairs from the Ma Hu Lu Company, Chairman Mr. Bao."
Receptionist replied: "I don't know, and besides, we don't have a donation project for disabled children now."
Big Brother said: "What projects are available now? As long as it can issue a receipt, it's fine."
Receptionist pointed to the sea turtle behind and said: "There, the sea turtle, an endangered animal in Australia." "If you donate to it, you can also participate in an Australian tour lottery."
Wang Xiaobing said: "You have money to donate to this big turtle, but no money for the children, huh?"
Receptionist said angrily: 'This is a sea turtle, an endangered animal in Australia. Do you even understand that?'
Big Brother said: "I'll donate, I'll donate."
Receptionist asked: "How much to donate?"
Big Brother said: "5000."
Wang Xiaobing said: 'You have money to donate to the big turtle, but no money for my daughter, huh?'
Big Brother said: 'I'll adopt two more later.'
Big Brother said: 'Adopt, huh? You must be sick.
Big Brother said: "There's not enough money on this card now." "Find the box and everything will be fine." "Just shut up."
Big Brother said: "An invoice?"
The scene switches to the front desk of the eco-farm, where Mr. Bao said to Big Brother: "Oh, Mr. Xu, congratulations." "The box has finally been found."
Big Brother said: "Really?"
Big Brother said: "That's fast."
Mr. Bao said: 'It's in my branch office.' 'You can come here, come here.' 'Yes, this address.'
Big Brother agreed: "Oh, alright, alright." "I'll go right away."
Big Brother said: "Hey, give me that receipt."
Big Brother said: 'Oh, alright, thank you.' Big Brother shook hands with Mr. Bao and then left.
Wang Xiaobing said: 'Is this the place, right, brother?'
Big Brother said: "That's it."
Wang Xiaobing walked out of the bathroom and said to Big Brother: "Brother, after we get the box, I want to go handle something. Is that alright?"
Big Brother grabbed Wang Xiaobing and said: 'Until the matter is settled, you can't go anywhere.'
Wang Xiaobing said: "I meant after it's settled."
The woman said: "Welcome, welcome."
Big Brother said: "Chairman Mr. Bao sent us."
Woman said: 'You have an appointment.'
Woman said: "You guys."

movie101_7021874945990853151_3900_4080.text: Tang Hexuan: "This war I'd rather lose." Hearing Tang Hexuan's words, Fang Jie was stunned. He never expected that the man in front of him was willing to sacrifice the entire Shanghai business just to win the war. The scene shifts to the street outside the nightclub, where the neon lights are dazzling.
The scene switches to Tang Hexuan, who is in the middle of a big deal, washing his hands in the bathroom of the suite, turning the cold and hot water taps on and off.

At this moment, a subordinate came in and said to Tang Hexuan: "Master, Mr. Takada urgently needs to see you." Tang Hexuan, who was looking in the mirror, froze instantly. He turned around slowly, his eyes widening as he stared at Gao Tian who had just entered.

Tang Hexuan stood in the restroom, expressionless, as he opened the bag and began to read the letter.

Tang Hexuan opened the box and looked at the letter inside. The letter contained a list of names, which was also the list of people he had to kill. He stared at the letter for a long time, then put it down and walked out of the restaurant.

Fang Jie jumped down from the second floor, while Li Zihao and his men were still searching for Fang Jie. The two groups were closing in on each other, with Li Zihao's men having the upper hand. Fang Jie picked up a machine gun and started firing wildly.

Tang Hexuan and others were also in a tough spot, with Li Zihao and his men catching up, Tang Hexuan had to lead the way again.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4080_4260.text: Li Zihao shouted: "Quick, get in the car!" He then got into the car himself and drove away.

Suddenly, a car exploded at the end of the alley, and the shockwave generated by the explosion spread instantly. The three of them ran towards the narrow alley, with the police relentlessly chasing them. The ground was wet and muddy from the rain, making it difficult for them to run. Despite this, they did not stop. At a turn in the alley, Li Zihao almost fell.

The group of people behind them were closing in. Li Zihao kicked a cart in front of him, blocking the way, and then threw a stool at the enemy. The group of people behind were still relentless, and Li Zihao picked up a wooden plank to confront them.

The two of them were still in the alley, with the gangsters relentlessly chasing them. They had to run back and forth through the narrow alley, exhausted. The two of them hid in a corner, catching their breath.

Fang Jie, with a bloodied face, looked at Li Zihao in front of him, his eyes revealing a ferociousness that seemed ready to tear Li Zihao to pieces. Li Zihao, with a determined look, raised his gun and fired a shot into the sky, then immediately turned around and locked Fang Jie in a headlock, slamming him against the wall.
Fang Jie shouted, 'What the hell is going on, what the hell is going on, tell me! 'My dad is dead!' 'Did you arrange the car?' 'Did you set up the men?' 'Was it you?' 'Do you want to be the boss?'
Li Zihao said: "Fang Jie, calm down."
Fang Jie said: "How can I calm down?" "Why was there an explosion?"
Fang Jie fired a shot at the assassin, and Li Zihao shouted, "Hurry up"
Li Zihao was about to leave when he heard the sound of the fight. He turned around, pulled Fang Jie up, and ran away carrying him.
Li Zihao pushed Fang Jie into the room, closed the door, and pulled the curtain. Fang Jie, lying on the ground, said, "My dad is dead," "What about Qianqian?"

Fang Jie was shot in the abdomen, Li Zihao pressed a handkerchief against the wound, Fang Jie weakly said, 'I hope blocking this bullet for you was worth it' 'You treat your brothers better than women'
Li Zihao said: "I treat Qianqian like a sister." Li Zihao, with a determined look, continued to press down hard on Fang Jie's abdomen. Fang Jie winced in pain, his expression contorted.

Fang Jie continued: "You know how good she is to you" "Sometimes I really envy you" "Have you considered her happiness in the future?" "Have you thought about it?" "I really don't understand" "Why is it that the more dull you are, the more women like you?" "Do you know?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Piggy said: "What you feared the most is finally happening."

"Sir Jack Cater has been appointed as Commissioner of the ICAC." "A large number of personnel have been recruited to join the ICAC," "and a statement was made that no personnel will be seconded from the civil service." "This concludes the special news report."

Sir Chow said: "I don't believe they can deal with all the corrupt cops in Hong Kong." "Who would manage the city's security then?" "Leave it to the gangs?"

"Your monthly salary is only three thousand two hundred dollars." "How do you explain this?"

The scene shifts to a rooftop, where Lei Luo is standing with a gun in hand, his expression serious as he gazes into the distance. The camera slowly zooms in on him, capturing his determined look.

Lei Luo: "Dad."
Lei Luo bent down, holding Sir Chow's hand and said: "The ICAC is not a paper tiger." "They even dare to come after me."
Sir Chow patted Lei Luo's shoulder and said: "Alo, go."
Sir Chow said: "Take Snow and the kids with you. Any later, and you won't be able to escape." Lei Luo left the hospital, closed the door, and got into the car.

A Hao poured a glass of wine and said: "Have a safe trip"

A Hao angrily said: "You came in the middle of the night just to tell me this?"
A Hao, leaning on a cane, slowly sat on the sofa and said to Lei Luo: "I know you're not happy"

Lei Luo stood up and said: "No need" "You haven't been happy with what I've been doing these past two months, right?" "You blew up his car, I had people stop him" "You ambushed at the police station" "I had someone whisk him away" "Do you know why?" "If an English cop died, both you and I would be in trouble. Do you understand?"
Lei Luo, with a face full of disdain, picked up the glass of wine from the table and said, "You're a disgrace to the old and the young."
Lei Luo said: "I've received word, the ICAC will move against me in two weeks" "Yan Tong will take my place" Without me, no one can help you. But you should know, I'm doing this for your own good."
A Hao, after hearing this, was stunned for a moment, then suddenly sat up from the sofa, pointing at Lei Luo and said: "You're doing this for my good""I’m the tumor""That’s what you gave me"
Lei Luo said: "That's not how you count brotherhood... I've already handled quite a lot..."
A Hao said: "You can’t forget, it was you who told me to go to Thailand" "Because of that, my brother Little Wei got killed" "Now my own blood brother lies in the hospital" "turned into a vegetable"
Lei Luo said: "I didn't expect it to turn out like this. I'm not a god, I can't control everything."

A Hao said: "That's where you’re right, you can't control everything" "Life, we can’t control. Death, we can’t control" "Between life and death, I can control what I’m able to, I can choose my own path" "I call the shots"
Lei Luo said: "So, in the end, it boils down to you saving my life and me ruining yours, right? As long as I'm alive, shoot me, it’s fine to kill me with a single shot, come on."
A Hao raised the gun and said: "Alright, if you were good to me, you wouldn't have planted a needle by my side."

movie101_6966492004553490981_1560_1740.text: He climbed up the wall, but unexpectedly, the window was locked. He angrily said: 'See how you can chase me' 'Why are there some more' After saying that, he ran away.

The well-trained hedges in the park formed a natural fence, a large stone in the center, and small stone lions at the top. JC ran into the park, and the black-clad hedges immediately surrounded him. He jumped over the stone wall in the middle, and the hedges chased after him, but they could only follow the path he had left.
JC said: "I'm in the southeast of the castle" "Tell me how to get there"
Teammate looked at the monitor and said: "There's a big maze in front of you." "Don't go in there at all costs."

The woman asked, "Can you fly out"
Teammate: "The runway is not long enough"
JC said while running: "I have to try even if it's not enough," "One bean two grains of rice," "That exit is you."
Teammate said: "Hey, does feudal superstition work?" The Doberman still followed closely behind.
JC, while running, said: "Stop talking and find the exit for me."
The woman said, "You have to fly so that we can see you." The Doberman leaped and bit down on the flying JC. The Doberman bit down on the flying JC and dragged him around in the maze.
The two of them ran back and forth in the maze, desperately trying to find a way out.
The Doberman ran wildly in the maze, and soon after, JC also ran into the maze with a gun in hand, shouting loudly.
JC turned around and said: 'Not chasing anymore, do they have myopia?'

The Doberman chased after him, but the thick hedge made it difficult for the dog to navigate. JC ran frantically, occasionally looking back at the Doberman. In a panic, he ran into a dead end. The Doberman was not far behind. In a critical moment, a man in black appeared and knocked the Doberman to the ground.
The bodyguards behind quickly drew their guns, and the parachute deployed. The parachute deployed, and JC was carried away. Teammate saw this on the computer and said, 'I see, I see, he's airborne.'
The woman in the car said: "He fell again."
JC said: "The runway is not long enough", then he got up and ran, but was bitten by the dog again.
He ran wildly in the maze, accidentally letting the two dogs get away. The two dogs followed the sound, running deeper into the maze.
The two dogs ran towards JC, who was still eating the leaves. The dogs barked at the sound, and JC immediately spat out the leaves in his mouth. Teammate asked: "What's that sound"
JC said: 'I'm pretending to be a dog.' He bit off a leaf from the tree and chewed loudly, attracting the attention of two Dobermans nearby.

He looked back at the two hedges and then at the two dogs chasing him. He quickly stood up and ran forward, but his parachute got stuck in the hedge. He struggled to break free, but the resistance from the hedge made it impossible for him to move. The two dogs were getting closer, and he was panicking. He pulled the rope hard, but the resistance from the hedge was too strong. He fell to the ground, and the two dogs were already at his feet.

The Doberman bit JC's arm hard. He rolled on the ground trying to shake it off. Another Doberman came, and he bit the hand holding the money. JC was in great pain, and the Dobermans were getting closer.
The Doberman obediently lay down. Seeing this, JC petted the Doberman's head. Suddenly, the Doberman tried to bite him, and he quickly stood up.
The female officer said in surprise: "You speak Chinese to a French dog"
JC said: "I wonder too that it can understand Chinese" Two dobermans ran out from the hedge, and JC quickly dodged them.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4440_4620.text: Ye Qishan walked out of the hotel under an umbrella, Ye Qishan's bodyguard held the umbrella for him, and then Ye Qishan walked towards the funeral site with the bodyguard's assistance.

Ye Qishan walked under the umbrella with his head down, his face full of anger. The bodyguards held the umbrella over Ye Qishan's head, but they didn't dare to lift it for him. The rain poured down, and the scene was particularly bleak.

Ye Qishan walked into the main hall, where the portrait of his father was placed on the ancestral tablet. He looked at the people standing on both sides, then turned to look at Tang Qianqian standing by the wreaths. He then walked to the center of the hall, with the sound of the mournful music in the background.

Ye Qishan said, "Old brother, are you pretending to be dead?" "You old fox." "Nothing you do can be trusted." "Not even your death can be believed." Ye Qishan walked towards Tang Qianqian and said, "Unless we lift this coffin lid and have a look."

Ye Qishan walked to the front of the coffin, opened the lid, and looked at the body inside. The face of the deceased was severely disfigured, blood still seeping from the wounds. Ye Qishan closed the lid again, tears swirling in his eyes.
Ye Qishan said, "Old brother, how did you end up like this?" "Who did this to you?" "Not only did they hit you, but they even bombed you."
Director Zhang said, "He's already burned to this extent." "Show some decency."
Ye Qishan looked at the coffin and said, "Old brother, without you, what are we going to do in Shanghai Bund?"
Ye Qishan walked to the center of the hall with a smile, then said to Tang Qianqian: "Qianqian, take your uncle's advice and get married soon. Why not become my concubine?"
Ye Qishan said to Fang Jie: "Old brother, I can't bear to see you go."
Ye Qishan said angrily, "Why so much nonsense? Kneel down for me."
The minion ran out and shouted, "Boss!"
Li Zihao and Fang Jie exchanged glances and rushed to the wedding scene. Li Zihao knocked a waiter to the ground and then pushed Fang Jie aside, taking a hit himself.

Ye Qishan was shot dead by Tang Qianqian from behind. Li Zihao, who was walking past, heard the gunshot and turned back to look. Fang Jie stood behind Li Zihao, his face expressionless. Tang Qianqian stood behind Ye Qishan, tears streaming down her face.
Ye Qishan struggled to get up, but Fang Jie pressed the gun against his forehead, staring fiercely at him.

Ye Qishan said: "I, Ye Qishan, crawled out from a pile of corpses." "Only dead people have ever pressed on my head." "You two want to play heroes, huh?" "Fine, I will show you." "There have never been heroes in Shanghai Bund." "Only gangsters." "I, Ye Qishan, am the biggest gangster in Shanghai Bund." "Today, you got the best of me."
Ye Qishan turned his head and said, "Old man, don't blame me for not giving you face."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: A Hao said: "Rose, put down the gun." "Tell Lei Luo what your name is." Rose put down the gun, but kept her eyes tightly on A Hao.
The scene switched to a memory, in which A Hao said to Qing Jie: "My name is Ah Hua." A Hao handed the clappers to Qing Jie.
A Hao said: "Her name is Ah Hua; I raised her." "I sent her to Thailand and Taiwan for training." "By your side." "Someone so capable." "You, Lei Luo, wouldn't waste such talent, would you?"

Lei Luo said: "Alright." "Turning an abused little girl from the old buildings of Kowloon City into a rose, impressive." "But don’t think I don’t know." "Do you know what it means to turn a blind eye?" "Placing a needle by my side." "Do you even consider my feelings?"
A Hao said: "Do you even consider my feelings?" "If Rose wasn't by your side, I would have already been dealt with."

Lei Luo stood up and said: "I'm leaving."

A Hao said: "Alright, I've said what I needed to say. Let's end this here," and with that, Lei Luo left.
Lei Luo pointed at him and said, "You really upset me tonight."
A Hao pointed at Lei Luo and said, "Ah Hua, help me see Lei Luo out."
Lei Luo stood up and said: "No need. I want to try the feeling of not having a needle by my side." Then he turned to Rose and said: "Watch them closely," and then walked towards the door.
Qing Jie came over with a blanket, covered A Hao's legs with it, sat down next to him, and noticed his hand was trembling. A Hao took Qing Jie's hand and said, "Get me two headache pills."
Qing Jie stood up and said, "Okay."

The driver parked the car in the courtyard of the villa. A Hao's family walked towards the house, Lei Luo closed the car door, and the driver took the two children to the living room. Lei Luo said, "Hey, weren't we meeting at the airport?"
Piggy ran over and said, "Something big happened." "A Hao is going after Hunter tonight."
Snow, sitting in the car, called out to her husband, Lei Luo, who was about to get in the car, not to forget to pick up the bag on the back seat.
Lei Luo got out of the car and said to Piggy: "I only trust Ah Zheng." "Help me find Ah Zheng right away." "This is evidence of Hunter's corruption." "Have Ah Zheng give it to the ICAC."
Piggy said: "Alright, got it." "Lei Luo, is that all?" "Do you have any other instructions?"
A Hao's wife and sister were sitting in the car, silently watching everything in front of them.
A Hao couldn't hold back his tears and hugged Rose tightly. Rose cried out loud, and A Hao comforted her.

movie101_7021874945990853151_4620_4800.text: Li Zihao slowly lowered his gun, and Ye Qishan walked up to him with a smile, saying: "Good job" "Go". Ye Qishan's men quickly brought a black sedan chair and Ye Qishan sat inside.

The scene shifted to a rainy day in Shanghai, with mournful music playing and rows of people holding black umbrellas standing on both sides of the street, leading to a church.

The Four Heavenly Kings rushed into the Catholic Church, and Tang Qianqian inside was praying. The Four Heavenly Kings followed her.
Fang Jie threw the marriage certificate on the table and said: 'Ye Qishan is blatantly coming for us.'

San Ma said: "We must attend the position of President Hua" "Otherwise, we can't explain it to the other factions" "We have to go" "That old ghost Ye Qishan will definitely provoke us" "So we must attend" "But Ah Hao should go"
Li Zihao suddenly burst into the room, panting heavily. He said: "Young master, young master!" "The young lady has been kidnapped." "Two of our branches have been taken over by Ye Qishan's men."
Fang Jie said: "What's the point of having a meeting now?" "Brothers, follow me."
Li Zihao stood up to stop him, saying: "Calm down."
Fang Jie retorted: "All you know is to keep calm." "How could Tang Qianqian fall for someone like you?"
Li Zihao said: "Calm down," Fang Jie said: "Calm? What about Tang Qianqian? Just watch her die?"
Fang Jie let go of his hand, thought for a moment, and said: "Before Ye Qishan takes over, nothing will happen to Qianqian." "Acting rashly will play right into his hands."
Fang Jie lowered his head, took the gun, and pointed it at Li Zihao saying: "Your eyes are filled with fear."
Li Zihao said: 'Fear helps us stay calm. He's forcing you to act now, to wipe us all out in one fell swoop. Once you act, all the factions will side with him.'
Fang Jie shouted: "I'm asking you, what should we do about Qianqian?"

San Ma stood up and said, 'A Jie, stop fighting. Listen to me. Tang Ye treated me well. My people are your people. Today if he Ye Qishan insists on forcefully dealing with things, then let's turn his plan against him.'
Fang Jie's eyes were filled with determination. Li Zihao's gaze was full of regret. The mansion at night was eerily quiet. Fang Jie returned to the workshop, where San Ma was already waiting for him.
Fang Jie asked: "Brother, can we trust that San Ma?"
Li Zihao asked: 'What do you think?'

At this moment, JC suddenly appeared behind the RV, shouting: "Be careful!" He then jumped onto the RV.

The RV driver floored the gas pedal, and the vehicle roared as it rushed past the two. Seeing this, Simon quickly unbuckled his seatbelt and leapt out of the RV. He grabbed the handles on the roof and was flung out of the vehicle. He tumbled several times on the ground before quickly getting up and running away.

At this moment, Simon is driving with BONNIE in the car, while JC is following them in a jeep. Suddenly, the jeep gets airborne, and Simon's car also drives up the slope.

The parachute slowly opens, and JC is suspended in mid-air. He looks at the car below and then at the road below, feeling a sense of fear. He then looks at the car, which is only 10 meters away, and then at the road, which is about to end at any moment.
At the last moment, he stepped on the roof of the car, and then disappeared into the distance.

The scene shifts to a room where CoCo is examining a bull's head. She says, "CoCo took it."

movie101_6973286990817002015_600_780.text: A Hao grabbed Da Wei's collar and lifted him up, but Da Wei grabbed A Hao's left leg and wouldn't let go. A Hao turned around and kicked him away.

A Hao was surrounded by people wielding sticks and stabbed at him. He dodged quickly, and the people behind him were not so lucky, and were stabbed to the ground. The crowd became even more frenzied, and A Hao was quickly overwhelmed.

A Hao said, "This is bad, really bad." He saw Da Wei fighting a group of people and rushing towards the back of Da Wei. He quickly joined the fight, and the two of them cooperated perfectly, fighting all the people in front.
A Hao said, "That curly-haired one can really fight."
A Hao said, "Screw you, Little Wei." He then kicked the thug in the face and punched another thug in the head.
A Qi was kicked out of the building by Da Wei, crashing heavily to the ground. Lei Luo watched from the rooftop, laughing heartily.

A Qi, who had been knocked down, suddenly got up, picked up a fallen stick, and swung it at the people around him. His crazy actions scared off the surrounding enemies. At this moment, he was no longer covered and exposed, and a few people rushed up. He picked up a fallen shoe and threw it at them. Seeing that he was about to be overwhelmed, he picked up a signboard and swung it at the enemies.

A Hao and his group were surrounded by a large number of thugs, while the police were slowly approaching from a distance. A Hao looked at the approaching police and the surrounding thugs, feeling a bit anxious. At that moment, the thugs raised their sticks and shouted, charging towards the police.
Hua Zi Rong said, "Big Brother, we're surrounded, you go first, I’ll hold off those cops for you."
Hua Zi Rong said, 'Good brother.'
Hua Zi Rong said, "Let's go."
The scene shifts to Lei Luo's side. The uncle asked, 'Who called the riot police?'
The police shouted, "Fire!"

At this moment, A Hao and his group were walking down the street. Suddenly, a grenade landed at their feet. A Hao threw it back, and the grenade exploded, scattering thugs. The police put on gas masks and shouted, "Take them down!"

The police chased after the crowd furiously, and A Hao and his group quickly ran into a small alley. Da Wei, who was repairing something, saw them and immediately stood up and shouted, "Don't come any closer!"
Hua Zi Rong asked, "Whose side are you on?"
Da Wei pointed at A Qi and said, "Which side are you on?"
Hua Zi Rong said angrily, 'Which side are you asking? Tell me.'
