A Hao threw the knife in his hand to Hua Zi Rong and said, 'You little punk,' 'You almost got me killed.' Hua Zi Rong said, 'We agreed on thirty bucks for a walk-through, now this has turned so big, how should we settle this?'
A Qi, seeing this, shouted, "Own people, own people, own people, own people."
Hua Zi Rong said, "Cover your mouth."

The police, equipped with gas masks, rushed into the alley and sprayed tear gas into the crowd. The thick gas quickly enveloped the crowd, and the police struck down with batons, causing the crowd to fall to the ground.
The police immediately put on their gas masks, and the customers also took out their prepared cloth masks and covered their mouths and noses with them.
The people in the alley had no time to escape and were mercilessly shot by the police.
The police kept a close watch on the situation at the scene.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3240_3420.text: Zhao Bing, who was trying on clothes in the store, heard Xu Decai's voice and answered the call: "Sorry, I couldn't make it."
Zhao Bing asked: "What's going on?"
Xu Decai said: "We need to talk in person."
Zhao Bing said: "I have something very important right now.""You can't come to me."
Xu Decai said: "I've lost both my ticket and passport, and there's no time to replace them. You have to help me!"
Zhao Bing said: "How could you be so careless?"
Xu Decai said: "I was robbed, and I don't even know who did it, and furthermore," Xu Decai said while walking.
Zhao Bing said: "Okay."
Xu Decai, while rowing the boat, called the person he trusted the most in the world, but the other party still didn't answer. So he had to call the next best option.

Zhao Bing leaned against the glass cabinet, looking out, and said: "Are you okay then?"

Zhao Bing, after thinking for a moment, said: "That's fine. Send me the address, and I'll have A Qiang find you. He will take care of everything."
Zhao Bing said: "Be careful!"
Waiter was playing games in the kitchen, Xu Decai was drinking with Driver, and Driver looked at Xu Decai with a helpless and troubled expression.
Driver said: "Brother, we aren't going to look for that suitcase anymore, right?"
Xu Decai sighed and said: "There's no hope."
Xu Decai said: "I've arranged everything. You don't need to worry."
Driver said: "Of course, all the money is in the suitcase! Can't you help me out, brother? If I don't get the money by tomorrow, my daughter will be in danger!"
Driver said: "If you don't help me, you're too much, brother!" "You have money to buy such expensive liquor but no money to help me." "You're not tricking me, are you, brother?"
Xu Decai angrily said: "This is all your damn fault!"

Xu Decai took the mineral water handed over by Driver, patted his shoulder, and said: "What's going on? He's not coming yet!"
Xu Decai picked up the phone and said: "Hello."
A Qiang called and said: "President Xu Decai, our car has arrived."
Xu Decai said: "Wait for my news!" After Xu Decai left, Driver turned around and smiled.
A Qiang said: "President Xu Decai, Sister Bing asked me to pick you up."
A Qiang said: "Okay."
Xu Decai said: "Wait a minute, I have a brother inside, and I need to tell him something."
A Qiang said: "Sister Bing told me to get you back quickly." "You should hurry up and go." After saying this, A Qiang helped Xu Decai into the car. Driver stood at the door, watching them leave.
Xu Decai said: "A Qiang, stop the car. I still need to talk to my brother."

A Qiang said: "Sister Bing is in a hurry. We'll talk about it later." Xu Decai looked at A Qiang in the driver's seat, then turned to look at the rearview mirror. Suddenly, Xu Decai noticed someone following them. He quickly grabbed the chain on his necklace and tried to pull the driver's hand, intending to use the chain to break the steering wheel.

Tang Qianqian, who had just rushed out of the room, was pulled back by Ye Qishan. He was shot in the left arm and fell to the ground. Fang Jie, seeing this, rushed to the window to look outside. movie101_6966492004553490981_2100_2280.text: Coco said: "People always think that what's gone is precious."
JC followed behind, saying: "Yes, that's right". JC followed behind, saying: "A chicken head".
Jia Fu Lian said: "That's why I asked you to come here." JC said: "Is that true?"
Jia Fu Lian replied: "It's been here since I was born."
Coco looked at the item and said: "This could be considered stolen goods, right?"
Jia Fu Lian asked: "What did she say?"
JC looked at Coco and said: "She said the stairs are beautiful."
Jia Fu Lian bowed and said: "Oh, thank you."
JC said: "I'm leaving." He then left the room.

Jia Fu Lian said: "He is my great-great-grandfather," "her grandfather," "he returned from overseas many years ago," "he always wanted to go to sea again to find his first mate," "but he couldn't raise the funds for the voyage," "later his son, my grandmother's father," "organized an expedition team," "to search for that ship called Not-fire," "but he never returned," "he just mysteriously disappeared," "I heard that some bronze heads are in your possession," "or perhaps you know something about my great-grandfather."

Fu Hao said: "I don't care about any of it, bronze heads, tokens, diamonds, none of these can see the light of day. The only thing I want to get back is that painting. They've stolen my stuff, worth over a billion dollars."
Shou Xia said: "If you had agreed earlier, to install an infrared security system then."
Fu Hao said: "That was my mistake."
Shou Xia said: "No, I promise you I will."

Fu Hao said: "If you don't bring back the painting" "I will kill you." Fu Hao's threat scared Shou Xia so much that he ran out of the room in tears. The next day, Fu Hao went to the auction house and bought a painting.

Jia Fu Lian said: "This is my childhood rocking horse" "It was painted by my great-great-grandfather when he came back from overseas" "This was the environment around him when his ship was wrecked" "Feel free to have a look" "I'll go and pour some tea".
JC said: "Thank you". Everyone looked around the room. JC said: "Let's go."
David walked over to Coco and said: "Sorry, we need to discuss some private matters."
The three of them huddled together, whispering, "What about the manuscript?"
David said: "Best to pretend to stay for two days, steal it and then leave."
JC said: "No, at least make a fake head to switch with the real one."
David said: "To make a fake" "You need data" "Professor Guan has the data" "Find Coco".
JC said: "Don't ever mention stealing in front of her," "she won't help us."
David asked: "Then what should we do?"
Coco excitedly ran over with a scroll and said: "Look, it's Lang Shining's 'Autumn Hunting.'"
David asked: "Is it valuable?"
Jia Fu Lian replied: "Old things are certainly valuable."
David jokingly said: "My grandfather's chamber pot is also very valuable."
Coco exclaimed: "So the painting really exists."
A man replied: "I thought it was burned up."
Jia Fu Lian holding a teapot said: "In the year 1860, my great-great-grandfather sailed on the Not-fire to China," "fought a victorious battle," "this is one of the spoils he brought back."
Coco holding a picture frame said: "You must mean the looting of the Old Summer Palace" "It happened during the Second Opium War, remember?"
Jia Fu Lian replied: "That depends on one's perspective."
JC turned to look at Coco and said: "She's right", "The corrupt Qing government executed diplomats from Britain and France", "which became an excuse for the war."
Coco said: "Are those the reasons for two industrial nations to join forces to invade an agricultural nation?"

movie101_6973286990817002015_6720_6900.text: Lei Luo and Piggy walked towards the stairwell, Lei Luo holding a gun in his left hand, and Piggy holding a pistol in his right hand, both at the ready. Lei Luo, who had been quietly observing from the laundry room, saw the man in the suit holding a gun and immediately understood his intention. He quickly hid behind the clothes rack and observed his next move.

Piggy, lying on the ground, said: "I'm scared."

A Qi, who had been shot in the abdomen, rolled over and lay on his back, blood continuously gushing out from his mouth. A Hao, who had been holding the iron rod, let go and fell backward, while A Qi's eyes rolled white.

movie101_7166164445343941151_360_540.text: Wang Xiaobing looked around and said, "Waiter, waiter, where is everyone?" "What's going on?" "Not in business anymore, huh?" Wang Xiaobing was sweating profusely, his face turning red from the heat.

Da Ma shouted: "Cui Hua, Gou Sheng!"

Cui Hua tilted her head and asked: "Anything else?"
Wang Xiaobing looked around and said: "Nothing else to eat," "What's going on," "What kind of attitude is this," "Where's the young girl?"

Xu Decai walked to the counter and saw Da Ma sleeping on the side, he opened the fridge and saw the two cans of Indian beer, he looked at the sleeping Da Ma, and then closed the fridge.
Xu Decai turned around, picked up the calendar on the table, and pointed to the date on it. He said, "Last year's calendar." He then walked to the window with his suitcase and looked outside.

At this moment, three people arrived at Lao Da's grocery store. The three looked around and asked, "Who owns the car with the dog outside? Huh?" Lao Da came out from inside, and the three were instantly startled.
Old Da turned around and said: "Not enough to eat? Who owns the car with the dog outside?"
At this moment, Cui Hua suddenly appeared, glaring fiercely at Wang Xiaobing. Wang Xiaobing, while eating, said, "It's mine," and was kicked down by Cui Hua, yelling, "Oh my mom!"

The man in the red shirt walked up to Lao Da and said: "Big brother, I suspect he, he is talking about me."
The boss said: "You don't have to suspect; he is talking about you."

The man in the blue shirt charged at Xu Decai, but Xu Decai blocked him with one hand and hit his face with the other. The man in the red shirt tried to punch Xu Decai, but was knocked down by Xu Decai. The man in the blue shirt kept hitting Xu Decai's back.
The scene switches to a restaurant where Xu Decai and his men are chasing Wang Xiaobing. The men shout, "Bro, catch!" and "Why didn't you catch it?"
The boss, seeing this, was scared and shouted, "Everyone get out of here."

movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.text: A Hao, seeing this, was so scared that he couldn't even move his legs, just staring blankly at the two men.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3780_3960.text: Zhao Bing, dressed in a beautiful gown and wearing a pearl necklace, stood in front of the mirror in the restroom, vomiting. After she finished, she looked at herself in the mirror with satisfaction.
Zhao Bing placed her bag on her lap, and the waiter brought over two drinks. The waiter asked: "Most important thing in life is happiness. I'd like to offer you two our special cocktails. May I?"

The waiter brought the prepared cocktail and said: "Very well. This cocktail is prepared for you. It's called 'Flame of Love.' You see its red color? It's reminiscent of a rose in the dark night. So passionate, so brilliant."
The waiter brought a drink and said: "This one is for you. It's called 'Emerald Green.' The green of the emerald symbolizes the vigorous vitality of love, full of hope. Please enjoy slowly."
The waiter asked: "Don't you want to try it?" Zhao Bing picked up the cocktail glass and took a sip.
Xu Decai, with a bitter expression, sips his drink and then puts down the cup, staring intently at Zhao Bing.
Xu Decai, with a furrowed brow, said: "I didn't expect you to do something like this to me."
Zhao Bing said: "Do you know what I've given up" "to have what I have today?" "I simply cannot afford to lose."
Xu Decai said: "So, you can afford to lose me?"
Zhao Bing said: "I gave you the opportunity to leave" "It's your own failure to take it" "It's fate" "If you were me, would you let me go?"
Xu Decai said: "I would try to find a solution."

Zhao Bing said: "Don't try to be so noble. I don't believe a word you men say. If you were truly willing to sacrifice for me, you wouldn't have come to me at this time. If you really had no ulterior motives, you would not have copied that USB flash drive and taken it away; you would have destroyed it right then and there."
Xu Decai's eyes were filled with disgust. He sneered and said: "I've finally seen you for what you truly are, Zhao Bing. You are a villain."
Zhao Bing looked at him and said: "Are you judging me?" Zhao Bing glared at him and asked: "What right do you have to judge me?" "What kind of person are you?" "Don't you know yourself?"
Xu Decai said: "In these ten years, I've never done anything that wronged you. I even thought about... being together with you."
Zhao Bing said: "Do you really have feelings for me? If it weren't for that girl leaving you ten years ago, would you be with me, huh? Don't think I don't know why you're with me."

movie101_7021874945990853151_5520_5700.text: Li Zihao pointed the gun at Tang Qianqian, and the smile on Fang Jie's face disappeared instantly. The scene shifted to Ye Qishan's side.

Li Zihao was hit by a bullet and fell onto the chair. Fang Jie quickly got up and smashed the chair to the ground. Li Zihao got up, kicked the curtain aside, and walked to the window to open it.

Li Zihao turned and saw the bodyguards rushing into the room. He quickly hid behind the door. The bodyguards split into two groups, one upstairs and one downstairs. The bodyguards upstairs opened fire first, and Li Zihao shot the door lock. The bodyguards downstairs broke in. Ye Qishan struggled to stand up, and Li Zihao shot him in the abdomen. Tang Qianqian tied Ye Qishan to the chair, and Li Zihao tied Tang Hexuan to the cabinet.
Ye Qishan cursed, "Damn it, kill me then, you two bastards." "Don't even think about leaving here alive," "especially you, Fang Jie, you little wimp."
Li Zihao wiped the blood from Ye Qishan's face and said, "I don't like people cursing my brother"
Tang Qianqian struggles desperately, but the man still does not let go. Tang Qianqian says, "Let go of me."

Tang Hexuan was pinned to the ground by a bodyguard, struggling in vain. Li Zihao and Tang Qianqian were locked in a fierce battle. Fang Jie kicked open the door and charged in, shooting dead a bodyguard blocking his way. Seeing the bodyguards fall, Tang Hexuan shouted, "Let me go!" Just as he was about to stab Tang Qianqian, Tang Hexuan fired a shot, hitting Li Zihao's vital area. The rope binding Tang Qianqian snapped, and Tang Qianqian broke free. Li Zihao, clutching his bleeding abdomen, fell to the ground, his gun flying out of his hand.
A passerby looked and said, 'Look, why did an explosion happen over there, what happened?'

Tang Qianqian replied, 'I don't know either.' Li Zihao and Fang Jie got out of the car, and the car drove away. The newspaper reported that the Japanese army had occupied the entire city of Shanghai. The next day, Tang Hexuan and Fu Sheng were reading the newspaper at home.
Tang Hexuan smiled and said, 'Fu Sheng'
Tang Hexuan smiled and said, "Yes."
Tang Hexuan said, "It's our turn to clean up."
Fu Sheng said, 'Sir, you are always one step ahead.'
The scene shifts to the night when Tang Qianqian was kidnapped. The car sped along the deserted streets, with the rain-soaked streets reflecting its lights.
Fang Jie: 'Bro, why did Fu Sheng call us this late?'

movie101_6966492004553490981_2280_2460.text: Coco: "Is that the reason two industrial countries jointly invaded an agricultural country?"
The man next to her continued: "Yeah, back then our Qing government considered itself as the Celestial Empire"
Coco: 'Are you helping me or her?'
Zhang Zhichen: 'Of course, I'm helping you. And then?'
The waiter asks in confusion: "What?"
The man asked, "And then what?"
Coco's assistant: "On the way back, they encountered a storm." "The ship was destroyed."
Coco: "The stolen items were too many and too heavy." "This is retribution."
The woman looked at him puzzled and asked, 'What did she say? Can you speak English?'
Coco turned around and said: "I don't speak English."
The man with a big nose and big eyes said: "She said that it was really unfortunate." Coco said: "I didn't say that was unfortunate, I said he deserved it."
Bian Bian retorted: "He deserved it? That's too heartless." "He went to China on a national mission." "It was his duty as a soldier." "Fortunately, he was saved by a passing Chinese merchant ship."
Coco: "Heaven really didn't open its eyes back then."
Coco: "What are you saying?"
Zhang Zhichen: "She said thank heaven he came back."
The woman in the cream-colored suit laughed and said, "Clearly, that wasn't what she said." "But I still appreciate it."
Yuan Shuai: "You're welcome."
The woman with curly hair asks, "What are you doing?"
Coco: "I'm taking it back to China."
Bian Bian: "This is my home" "You cannot take things at will."

Coco: "Your ancestors took this painting without asking, just like over a hundred years ago." The three were stunned by this revelation. Coco: "I found it in a book." After saying this, she turned and left.

The man hurriedly stepped forward to mediate, saying, "Coco," "Coco," "Coco," "Well, well, that was a long time ago." "Just like back then if a woman wore little, someone might throw stones at her." "Not at you, at her." "Sorry."
Coco stepped forward and said, 'What are you apologizing for? Don't be a doormat. The ones who should apologize are them—'
Zhang Zhichen asked, "Did she say anything?"

Coco turned around and said: 'I don't need you to translate for me. Have you all forgotten? Over a hundred years ago in our country, they burned, killed, and looted. Just over a century ago, you came to our country to plunder and kill. Even a hundred years later, these are painful memories for the Chinese people.'

The woman nodded and said, "That's right. I've studied history, and no matter how you interpret it, those events did happen. Sometimes we can only justify it with unreasonable reasons, like in those days, the strong were always right."
The man replied, 'We can't judge past mistakes by today's standards. Even now, the strong rule. You need to be strong enough for others to reason with you.'

The woman in the cream suit said: "Alright, I begin to understand her thoughts." Then she turned around and walked away, saying: "Sorry." She then turned back and said: "In the end, these things all belong to the bank now." "They are of no value to me." "If I could, I would give them to you."
The man serving the tea said: "Isn't it true that you just wanted to get into this fort?" "It wasn't easy to get here," "We'll stay with you for two days then leave." "How about a cup of tea?"
Zhang Zhichen: "Since you're here,"

The scene shifts to a flashback, showing A Hao sitting in a car, looking gloomy. He recalls the scene of Lei Luo leaning on the table full of cash, staring at him.
A Hao recalled the good times they had in the past, and the scenes they had experienced together.

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: Xu Decai, with tears in his eyes, said: "Stop talking, I understand everything."
Xu Decai picks up the wine glass, ready to pour some for Zhao Bing, but the red wine spills out of the glass and splashes all over the plate.

Yan Zheng said: "If you need anything, just find me."
Wu Shi Hao laughed and said: "Definitely, definitely."
Yan Zheng continued: "Also, let me tell you, there are so many temptations in Hong Kong." "No matter what you do, don't join the underworld, otherwise it's for life."
Wu Shi Hao responded: "Understood, understood."
David said: "Understood."
Yan Zheng looked at him and said, "Are you hungry? Shall I order some food for you?"
David said: "Extremely hungry."
Yan Zheng said: "Okay, wait a bit."
Yan Zheng said: "Okay, thank you." After speaking, Yan Zheng turned around and left, angrily hitting the wall.
David said: "Starving ghosts, talk less," and then sat down on the ground.
Luo Ge said: "After a seven-day stakeout, the police finally caught the pervert," "confirming that the pervert committed as many as fifteen similar cases in the Shau Kei Wan District."
At this moment, Hunter was scolding the prison guard: "Go away, open the door, open the door."
At this moment, someone shouted from outside: "Wu Shi Hao brother." Hearing this, Wu Shi Hao stopped eating and looked outside. Then, another convict came out from the cell next to them.
Wu Shi Hao said: "Damn, problems are coming""Listen""Nobody should speak in a while""I'll handle it."
Wu Shi Hao said: "Okay."
David said: "Irrelevant."
The man in the prison uniform said: "Understood."
Hunter said: "Go open the door." The prison guard opened the door and walked in.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4320_4500.text: Driver was changing clothes and said: "The inside room is almost finished, just this bit outside left"
Yang Shan, carrying a bowl of soup, called out to Driver who was about to take a shower, saying: "No rush".
Driver replied: 'How can I not be in a rush?' 'The flowers outside haven't been moved' 'I have things to do later'
Yang Shan asked, 'What do you have to do?'
Driver said, "Nothing major, but we still need to move, right?"
Yang Shan, holding a bowl of soup, said: "Let's eat first if we're hungry, then move"
Driver said: "No, not eating now"
Yang Shan said: "Then you can go, I'll eat by myself"
Driver turned around and said: "Okay, okay, we'll eat, we'll eat"
Yang Shan smiled and turned to the kitchen, picking up two tomatoes and placing them in the cutting board. She put down the knife and looked at the sunlight outside the window.
Driver was still in the middle of a bath when Yang Shan barged in with Xu Decai. Driver was stunned, his eyes wide open, staring at the two of them.
Yang Shan asked, "Driver, what happened, who came?"
Driver turned around and said: "Nothing, my apprentice is here." "I asked him to help me move." "That lazy bum just now came."
Yang Shan came out and said, "Don't talk about him like that. You guys sit down first. The food will be ready soon."
Driver replied, "Alright, nothing's wrong." Xu Decai left the house, and Driver, feeling helpless, started cleaning up.

Xu Decai grabbed Driver by the collar and pushed him against the wall, glaring at him fiercely and said, "What do you have to say to your daughter?" "Say it now, today, only one of you is getting out alive."
Xu Decai said: 'You ruined my life, do you know that?'
Driver, with a fierce look, said: 'Who ruined Yang Shan's life then?' 'If it wasn't for you and Zhao Bing being together ten years ago' 'Could she be like this now?'

Xu Decai grabbed Driver and said: 'I had no other choice, you know that' 'If you hadn't brought Yang Shan to find me,' 'Would she have found out?' 'Would she have turned out like this?' 'Everything I did' 'Was for a better life with Yang Shan'
Driver said excitedly: "Don't talk crap, you ruined Yang Shan and you say it was for her."

Driver said excitedly: 'I did it for her' 'You don't understand how much I love her' 'You don't understand' Xu Decai pushed Driver onto the flowerpot, Driver got up and continued to grapple with Xu Decai.

Driver angrily said: "How dare you say that, you love her? You only love yourself. If you loved her, would she be like this? Would she be like this?" Xu Decai grabbed Driver by the collar and pushed him against the wall.

Driver continued, 'Do you know why she had to find you ten years ago?' 'Because she was pregnant with your child' 'She wanted to tell you first thing' 'The child was lost later' 'Cried her eyes blind' 'This is the result of your love, right?' 'Right?'
Xu Decai countered, 'You're lying'
Yang Shan came out and said to Driver: "Driver" "Driver what are you guys doing?" "Hurry up and come eat with your apprentice"
Driver was about to hit Xu Decai with a bottle when Xu Decai grabbed his hand. Driver, with his head still throbbing, let go of the bottle and said, "Okay, we'll go in right away"
Yang Shan urged: "Hurry up"
Driver grabbed Xu Decai's collar and said: 'When we're inside, keep your mouth shut'
Yang Shan, who was about to leave, suddenly turned around and said to Xu Decai: "Here, Xiao Bing"

movie101_7021874945990853151_6240_6420.text: Fang Jie turned his head to look at Tang Hexuan, who said: "Your many lives are not even worth 80 gold bars."

Tang Hexuan looked at the photo, then at Fang Jie, and with a flick of his hat on his head, said to his subordinate, "Deal with him." Tang Hexuan patted Fang Jie's shoulder and then walked away with his men.

Tang Hexuan continued, "Ah Jie, this is an era where the strong survive and the weak can only die. There is no brotherhood in the guild, only unchanging interests. If you want to be the boss, the only way is to conquer."
Tang Hexuan patted Fang Jie's shoulder, signaling him to be careful and to take care of himself. Fang Jie nodded in response.
Li Zihao lowered his head, and Fang Jie also looked away, then turned to leave.
Fang Jie's eyes were filled with killing intent as he raised his gun and fired several shots at Li Zihao.

Fang Jie, holding the gun, said: "You said we would share both food and hardships." "I call you brother 'Hao' because I really regard you as my brother." "Since I can remember, I've been grabbing things from others." "I grabbed food in the orphanage, a place to sleep on the dock, and struggled to survive on the Bund in Shanghai." "Since I met 'daddy', I have been grabbing territory with my brothers." "No one can grab whatever I want." "But you are my brother." "I can give 'Qianqian' to you." "I don't even need the position of the boss of Shanghai." "Why did you lie to me?" "Why?" "Why did you work for The Blue Society?" "Why?" "Speak."
Li Zihao said to Fang Jie: "Fang Jie, my good brother, live on for me."

Fang Jie said: "I don’t want to see you anymore." Fang Jie, with tears streaming down his face, pulled the trigger. Li Zihao fired back instantly, hitting Fang Jie in the back. Fang Jie fell into the water, his body sinking deeper into the river.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6420_6600.text: The screen gradually fades to black.

The scene shifted to the Yulin Guard's residence. Inside, Li Zihao sat on the couch, with Fang Jie standing beside him. Both of them looked towards the stage, where a young man was performing a shadow play.
Tang Hexuan asked Fu Sheng: 'Fusheng, do you know a Mr. Luo?'
The scene shifts to a rainy night, with the sound of rain and thunder in the sky, and a few scattered pedestrians.
The scene shifts to the rainy night when Li Zihao fell into the river. A little girl said, "It's him, hurry up."
The scene shifts to the night where Li Zihao and Fang Jie found the corpse of the young man. They placed the corpse on the shore, opened the backpack, and took out the diary.

The scene shifts to the wedding site, where Tang Hexuan is lying on the railing, his head soaked in the rain. A man in a black coat throws a piece of paper at him, saying: "Mr. Tang said that Fu Sheng loves tea." "Don't waste it."
Fu Sheng, who had been eavesdropping nearby, heard the key being turned in the lock and immediately climbed down from the upper floor.
Li Zihao's right chest was covered in blood and bandages, and his body was trembling uncontrollably. He frowned and struggled to open his eyes.

Tears welled up in her eyes, and she couldn't help but cry out loud. She held Li Zihao's hand, which was covered in blood, and held it to his chest. The blood on their hands had already seeped through the bandages.
Li Zihao, who was lying on the bed, slowly opened his eyes. He looked around in confusion, trying to remember what had happened.

Tears rolled down Tang Qianqian's face as she turned away. The three siblings watched silently from the doorway. At that moment, a car's headlights swept over the building, and Tang Qianqian continued to care for Li Zihao.
The scene shifts to the parking lot, where the car lights go out one by one. Fang Jie sat in the car, his eyes dull, his mind preoccupied with thoughts of Tang Qianqian.
The scene shifted, and Li Zihao arrived at the agreed location. He got out of the car, closed the door, and looked around.
Fang Jie, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally walked up to the driver's seat, hesitated for a moment, and then opened the car door.

The scene shifts to the hallway of the hotel, where Fang Jie walked alone. The hotel's interior was lavishly decorated, with marble and gold accents giving it an opulent yet eerie atmosphere. Fang Jie walked through the corridor, his expression serious, as if he was on a mission. He stopped in front of a door, his back to the camera, as if he had made a decision.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Yang Shan poured the juice into the glass, watching Xu Decai with a smile in his eyes.
Yang Shan raised his glass and said, "Little Soldier, I owe you a lot over the years. Take care of your wife and kids, and look after me, too. This cup is to honor you."
Yang Shan said, "This is the rose wine I brewed myself." "It's non-alcoholic and doesn't contain any alcohol."
Driver said, 'I didn't do anything.' Yang Shan and Driver clinked glasses, while Xu Decai frowned and looked down.
Yang Shan poured a drink and said, "Come on, the apprentice of Little Soldier."
Driver refused, saying, "He is not of age yet and doesn't drink alcohol." Then he took a sip of the drink in front of him.
Yang Shan said, "Little Soldier, how have you become so harsh? The young brother has been here for a while and hasn't spoken; is the food not to your liking? Come on, don't just sit there."
Driver said, "He doesn't speak, he just eats, already finishing half a bowl of rice."
Yang Shan looked at Driver and asked, "Little Soldier, we won't be moving too far away from here, will we?"
Driver lowered his head and thought for a while, then said, "Not far from here."
Yang Shan said, "That's good." Yang Shan looked at Driver, then at Xu Decai, and smiled awkwardly.
Driver said, "You know, Yang Shan, I think you should have left this place a long time ago. I know in your heart you can't let go of that bastard, and you don't want to see him. Why bother?"

Yang Shan said: "No, it's not that. It's this shop I can't let go of. In another year, it will be ten years since the shop opened. I had plans for celebrating the tenth anniversary: to invite all the customers who have bought flowers here, and thank them for all these years."
Driver was stunned for a moment, then suddenly understood and said, "Ah, right, when moving, remember to take my dancing shoes. They were a gift from Xu Decai."

Xu Decai looked at the worn-out wooden bed, then at the worn-out photo frame beside it, and finally at the worn-out ballet shoes on the top of the bed. He slowly sat down on the edge of the bed, closed his eyes, and tears began to fall.
Driver said, 'You really care about the stuff given by the ungrateful one.'
Yang Shan said, "It's already like this now. I've gotten used to it over the years. As long as I can feel his breath, that's good enough for me."

He picked up the bowl of rice and ate it voraciously, every bite bringing him comfort. The rice was as hot as the emotions in his heart, burning his mouth and causing him to choke, but it also eased his pain slightly.
Yang Shan looked at Driver and smiled, then lowered her head to look at the goldfish in the tank.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6600_6780.text: The scene shifts, and the door of the office slowly opens. Fang Jie walks in with his head down, and Tang Hexuan is sitting at the desk, smoking a cigar.

Tang Hexuan: "The brothers have searched Suzhou River up and down three times but still haven't found Li Zihao's body. If you don't kill him, he'll come to kill me. Do you want me dead? The one who killed the boss can never become the boss."

Tang Hexuan continued: "But let me tell you, the only person who can replace me in Shanghai Beach is myself. All others who tried to replace me are dead. Do you want to replace me? Qianqian will end up with you sooner or later. The gang will be yours eventually, but unfortunately, you acted too hastily with this setup."
Fang Jie sighed and said: "Father, I'm too foolish to handle such a big setup."

Tang Hexuan: "The fortune teller said I have a hard destiny, which means 'One general's success is built upon countless bones.' But I still need someone to take over. I held you in my hands to raise you, but you don't want that; instead, you choose to be one of the bones under my feet."
Tang Hexuan: "You want the bones under my feet" Fang Jie's eyes reddened instantly, he was extremely angry, but he still remained silent.
Tang Hexuan said: "In this world, the most terrifying people are those who pretend to be fools. Even scarier than pretenders are actual fools."
The door of the smoking room suddenly opened, and a policeman stood at the doorway with a gun, staring intently at Tang Hexuan.

Fang Jie looked at the sweating Tang Hexuan, then turned to look around the room. The furnishings were simple yet elegant, with a few pieces of antique furniture. The room was empty except for the two of them.

The newspaper reported: "A shocking incident occurred last night at the residence of the Japanese General Masaya Masao" "He was sleeping in his bedroom when a bomb exploded beside his bed" "Fortunately, the Japanese officer was unharmed"
Tang Hexuan: "They were outsiders after all. One aspiring youth after another—why would they follow the Blue Shirt Society's nonsense and waste their youth in vain?"

Tang Hexuan said: "The number of people eating with me is getting fewer and fewer. In the end, family is the most reliable. Let's eat." Tang Hexuan put down the napkin, picked up the bowl, and said: "Doing too many good deeds displeases the bad. What's the use of being a good person? Kind people are taken advantage of. This is society now."

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: Li Zihao kicked hard at the wooden board beneath his feet, breaking it instantly. The wooden board flew towards Fang Jie, who was still unaware of the danger.

Li Zihao was knocked to the ground again by the flying bricks, he hurriedly got up and saw that the bamboo building next to him was also damaged. He looked around in panic, searching for a hiding spot, but saw Fang Jie rushing over with a gun.
Li Zihao lifted the manhole cover, and Fang Jie, who was tied up, hit his head on the edge of the manhole as he tried to get up.
Fang Jie: "What do you mean" "Do you know who I am" "I am a big shot in Shanghai" "You want me to jump from here" "How am I supposed to survive in Shanghai after this"

Li Zihao and Fang Jie climbed into the well, and the scene shifted to a brightly lit city at night. Inside a nightclub, a group of musicians was playing instruments, and several scantily clad women were dancing.
The scene switches to the night when Li Zihao and Fang Jie first met. On the stage, a woman in a pink dress sings, "Like a bright moon, overflowing through the sunset clouds and smoke."
The scene shifts to the stage where a woman sings: "The night is silent, taking away the hustle and bustle."
The woman on stage sang: "It's like a warbler's call, softly waking the spring dawn. It's a love song and dance, intoxicating the beautiful night."
Ye Qishan widened his eyes, his mouth agape in shock. Tang Hexuan didn't say a word, just sat down with a bang.

Tang Hexuan said: "Surprised to see I'm still alive, huh?" "It was a close call for me to meet you all today." "Luck was on my side." "I don't know who sent those small fry to the Bund to ambush me." "But I was lucky to escape with my life." "Otherwise, it would have been me falling on those cars outside."
Ye Qishan said: "If there's still love, don't waste time."
Ye Qishan said: "Which dock boss had the gall to mess with Mr. Tang Hexuan? He must be tired of living. Come on, let's raise our glasses. For Mr. Tang Hexuan, to calm his nerves."

Tang Hexuan said: "Thank you, Mr. Ye Qishan, for the kind words." "But think about it, even if Xiang Yu were given a thousand chances, he still wouldn't beat Liu Bang." "That's the difference between a hero and a tyrant." "For so many years in Shanghai, many heroes have wanted my life, but in the end, they all died."

The scene switches to a nightclub, where Tang Hexuan and Ye Qishan are sitting at the head table, sipping red wine. The beautiful women on stage are dancing seductively, and Li Zihao is hiding in a ventilation duct, eavesdropping on the conversation between the two big shots.

The manhole cover was opened, and Li Zihao, with a messy appearance, crawled out from the manhole, looking around. He was wearing a leather vest, with a gun in his hand. Fang Jie followed closely behind, also crawling out from the manhole.

Fang Jie said: 'My god, it stinks.' Fang Jie, who had just gotten up, fell back to the ground after taking a sniff. Li Zihao, with tears in his eyes, looked at the fallen Fang Jie and then helplessly turned to leave.

Coco said, "It's Coco them"

The tree trunk was split open, and the unconscious JC fell from the tree. He tumbled to the ground, then got up and ran towards the cabin. He looked around and found a rope hanging from the eaves.

Bonnie replied: "JC is okay" "Coco is missing"
David said, "Give us a landmark," "over here," as David took out a GPS and started searching for signals.

He climbed up the rock wall at the edge of the cliff, looked down, and saw Coco standing below. He wanted to save her, but the mosquitoes around him were too terrifying. He took out a mosquito repellent from his pocket, ready to spray it.

Coco hurriedly crawled out of the crevice, and JC shouted, "Found Coco," "Tell the captain to bring down the medical kit."
Coco replied, "Got it."

Coco said, "My foot."
Coco replied, 'Both feet.' Then she looked up and said, 'There's a snake up there.'
Jia Fulian ran over, panting heavily, and asked, "What happened?"

Jia Fulian said, "It's alright, it's alright," and then Jia Fulian walked over to David, lifted the wooden planks, and saw David's left leg was already rotten at the bone, and the wound was very deep.
Bonnie rushed over and pushed him down, shouting, "Snake!"
Coco asked, "Where?"
JC said, "Okay now."

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: The scene shifts to the dining table, where De Cai is about to pick up some food to eat.
The three of them are eating breakfast, Yang Shan stands by without a seat, Man comes in to open the curtain.

Man stood at the door and said, "We’re eating, we have to relocate, let's hurry up and move." De Cai put down the chopsticks and wanted to get up but was stopped by Man. Man pointed at Yang Shan and said, "Aren't you..."
De Cai asked: "How do you know me?"
Man laughed and said: "I've seen you on the display board at the group."
De Cai asked: "What's going on?"

Man: "This was the ""Urban Hunter Project" you planned two years ago" "Starting today, the demolition begins" "The place where you’re standing now" "Will be our city's landmark building in the future" "This whole area will be our most bustling office building complex"
De Cai looked around, seemingly searching for something.
The demolition team, wearing red helmets, is directing a large excavator to demolish the house opposite.
Driver's wife: "Yang Shan" "Yang Shan" "Yang Shan is gone" "She was just here", Driver's wife ran out of the house, but couldn't find Yang Shan.
Driver, seeing Yang Shan about to pour the hot water over his head, widened his eyes in surprise and said: "Yang Shan, what are you doing, be careful!"
Yang Shan: "Xiao Bing" "Did you hear the music?"
The woman in the yellow dress said: "What? No, I didn’t hear anything."
Yang Shan said: "I seem to hear it" "It seems to be coming from over there", Yang Shan pointed towards the opposite side, standing on the balcony looking at the source of the sound.
Yang Shan shouted: "I hear it, I hear it"

Yang Shan is standing on the rooftop, admiring the lush foliage and vibrant flowers in the baskets. The setting sun sprinkles a golden glow on the leaves, and the breeze stirs the branches, making them sway gently.

Yang Shan is watering the plants on the rooftop, the morning light shines on her, making her look exceptionally gentle and beautiful. She is wearing a simple floral dress, her hair is neatly tied at the back of her head, her brows are light, her eyes are bright, and her lips are pale.

Yang Shan is wearing a camisole, with a flower hairpin in her hair, her hair is shoulder-length, looks very pretty. She is dancing on the rooftop, her fingers like a delicate butterfly, her movements are light and graceful. Her every move is full of charm.
Yang Shan is dancing on the rooftop, wearing a dress that accentuates her petite figure.
The scene shifts to a dilapidated old house, with the camera slowly zooming in, and Yang Shan's smiling face appears.

Yang Shan is dancing gracefully on the rooftop, the sunlight shines on her, making her look even more radiant. Her dance is like a butterfly flitting among flowers, light and graceful, full of vitality and charm. De Cai is watching her from the construction site, lost in thought, reminiscing about the past.
Yang Shan is dancing gracefully in the yard, her dress fluttering in the wind.

movie101_7021874945990853151_6780_6960.text: Tang Hexuan said: "If you don't step on others' heads, others will step on your shoulders to climb up"
Tang Qianqian said: "Dad, there are only human feelings and worldly wisdom in Shanghai Bund, there's no distinction between right and wrong"
Tang Hexuan's words woke Li Zihao up from his daze. In the dimly lit room, Li Zihao sat at the table, looking at the antidote he had painstakingly researched and developed.
Tang Qianqian, with a face full of worry, brought a basin of water to Li Zihao, who was still in a coma. She dipped her hand in the water and gently wiped Li Zihao's back.
Tang Qianqian took the bandage and gently pressed it onto Li Zihao's wound.
Tang Qianqian said: "He has been lying to me" "He killed Ah Jie" "Killed the student" "Killed many people" "He will also bring the entire Shanghai Bund gangs" "to kill you"
Li Zihao said: "He has been using me from the beginning" "to eradicate others" "to eradicate the Blue Coat Society."
Tang Qianqian said: "The debt my father owes, I will repay you with my life", Li Zihao reached out and touched Tang Qianqian's face.
Li Zihao looked at Tang Qianqian and said: "Tang Qianqian, you don't owe anyone." Li Zihao turned around and left, saying: "The debt he owes, he must repay himself."
Tang Qianqian walked to the table, her eyes fixed on the man in front of her, Li Zihao turned around, his body still covered in bandages, his eyes red and swollen from crying.
Li Zihao said to Tang Qianqian: "Tang Qianqian, you should leave the Shanghai Bund as soon as possible."
Tang Qianqian said: "No, it should be us together." After saying this, Tang Qianqian walked towards Li Zihao.
Tang Qianqian said: "Tomorrow morning, we leave this place of right and wrong together, we go to England, at nine o'clock in the morning, I will wait for you at the dock"

Li Zihao's eyes were filled with confusion and helplessness. He didn't know how to answer, nor could he meet Tang Qianqian's gaze. The next day, Tang Qianqian boarded the ship that would take her back to Shanghai.

The scene shifts to the bustling dock. A large ship is docked at the pier, with a crowd of people coming and going. A woman in a long dress and a man in a suit walk out of the ship, followed by a maid in a long dress. The man in the suit is none other than Li Zihao.

Tang Qianqian looked at Tang Hexuan's serious face, lowered her head in thought for a moment, then looked around at the people in the square, and finally turned and walked towards the gate of the Tiananmen Square.
Tang Qianqian turned around and saw Li Zihao sitting in the car, staring at her.

Zhang Hua: "Stop."

Zhang Hua looked at the struggling Mr. Wu, then at the unconscious Xiao Dou on the bed, and said, "You're very agitated, very agitated." Zhang Hua hugged Mr. Wu's neck, continuing, "What's your relationship with him?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_4860_5040.text: Yang Shan was full of youth and vitality, her figure dancing gracefully under the sunlight. Xu Decai and the workers watched her from below, their eyes following her movements.

Yang Shan stood up, stretching her arms upwards, feeling the refreshing morning breeze through the gaps of the wooden frame. The morning sun was shining on the small balcony, and the entire balcony was filled with green plants that were thriving.

Yang Shan stood on the rooftop, raising her hands high, looking down at the construction workers below. The workers looked up and smiled at her, thinking she was one of them. Xu Decai and his entourage arrived at the construction site, where the workers were all wearing helmets and safety gear.
Xu Decai looked at the dancing Yang Shan, a smile twitching at the corner of his mouth. He turned to the driver and said, "Turn off the music."
Xu Decai turned on the car radio, and the melodious music began to play. Yang Shan's father and Yang Shan walked towards the dance floor.
The foreman, seeing this, quickly tried to calm him down, but Xu Decai remained unmoved.
Yang Shan, feeling helpless, pulled the beaded curtain aside and said to the old man, "Let's move."
Xu Decai signaled the workers to move aside, then walked to the front of the car, looked around, and then drove away.
Xu Decai looked at the movie poster on the wall, which read: "Release date September 10, 2017, starring Xu Decai, the film 'Holding On'".
Xu Decai watched the departing Yang Shan, his eyes gradually becoming resolute. He knew he needed to let go, and he was willing to do so.

The excavator moved to the left, demolishing the old houses one by one. The vibrant city was left with only a few dilapidated houses. Walking inside, the walls were cracked, and the floor was uneven. The house had no windows or doors, and the roof was open to the sky.
The camera panned around the room, everything was as usual, but the artificial flowers on the stairs were drooping.
The scene shifted to the rooftop where the ring was placed. It fell off the ring box, landing on the tiles. Xu Decai got into the car, ready to go home.
Xu Decai asked: 'Where did you go just now, why did it take so long?'
Xu Decai said, "I had some things to do." Then he turned around and left.

Xu Decai asked: "Where to?" The man in the passenger seat was riding a motorcycle and following the truck. Xu Decai took out his phone from his pocket, unlocked it, and opened a chat software. The phone screen showed a picture of Yang Shan and a message that reads: "I'm fine, don't worry."

movie101_7021874945990853151_6960_7140.text: Tears welled up in her eyes, and she looked down at the suitcase in her hands. She knew that once she left, it would be a long time before they met again. The next second, she mustered her courage, resolutely walked to the dock, and waited for Li Zihao.
The car sped down the street, with the pursuers behind continuously firing. The driver kept glancing back to assess the situation.
The bodyguards' car sped up, crashing through the gate, but the people inside the courtyard were no match for Li Zihao and Tang Qianqian.
The sedan charged straight through the hall, crashing through the doors and windows, and then rammed into the second-floor stairwell.
The bodyguards behind him were instantly eliminated. Li Zihao kicked open the door, and bullets from all directions riddled his body.

Li Zihao ran out of the hotel just as the bullets were hitting the ground. He quickly entered the lobby and started shooting at the bodyguards. He jumped over the couch and continued firing as he moved forward.
Li Zihao, with his back to the wall, was surrounded by more than a dozen subordinates. He picked up a gun and shot them down without hesitation.

Li Zihao was shot in the left shoulder and fell to the ground. He quickly got up and shot back at the enemy, but the opponent had already moved behind him. Li Zihao struggled to stand up and continued to fight the enemy.

Li Zihao quickly entered the mansion, dodging the bullets fired by Tang Qianqian. He then turned and shot at the bookshelf behind Tang Qianqian, scattering books and papers everywhere. Li Zihao quickly moved to the safe.

Li Zihao, who had just rushed downstairs, was forced back by the firepower of the military police. He could only find a nearby flower vase and throw it at the military police in a desperate attempt to buy time for Tang Qianqian.

Li Zihao fired back, hitting the enemies. The two subordinates were also shot and fell. Li Zihao hid behind the bookshelf, breathing heavily, his hands gripping the gun tightly. The enemies upstairs kept firing, and Li Zihao kept shooting back.

Li Zihao raised his gun and fired at the enemies on the second floor. He then threw the gun to Tang Qianqian, who was climbing the stairs. Li Zihao quickly picked up a submachine gun and joined the battle. The trio cooperated seamlessly, eliminating the enemies in the hallway one by one.

Li Zihao was cornered and saw Tang Qianqian coming at him with a knife, so he raised his gun and fired several shots at Tang Qianqian. Tang Qianqian was hit twice, once in the arm and once in the leg, and fell to the ground.
Li Zihao dodged and grabbed a gun to counterattack. The two wrestled together, and Li Zihao kicked the opponent away with a flying kick.

Li Zihao, who had just rushed in, was shot in the left shoulder. He staggered forward, raising his gun to return fire, but was hit in the right shoulder. Li Zihao fell backward, crashing through the glass and falling to the ground. The gunfire continued unabated, with bullets hitting the ceiling and falling everywhere.
Li Zihao, who had just rushed downstairs, was forced back by the powerful blast. He tumbled all the way to the ground, surrounded by flying books.

The man in black rolled on the ground, and Li Zihao seized the opportunity to stand up, picking up a book and hurling it at him. The man in black rolled to dodge and then stood up, lifting a bookshelf to block Li Zihao. Li Zihao kicked the bookshelf away and charged at Li Zihao, who blocked the gun with his forearm.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.text: The content of the message was: "When you hear this WeChat message, we are already far apart. I lost, I lost everything, including you. I'm sorry."
Xu Decai looked up at the sky, then turned to Little Soldier and said, "I can take care of myself."
Xu Decai said: "Little Soldier ah" "Send me away, take me to the place where I got on the car." After saying that, he turned his head and looked out the window.
Little Soldier said: "Brother, why do you need to do this" "The person is already gone" "What’s the use in going back to find her now?"
Xu Decai said: "Send me to the place where I got on the car," "just pretend you haven’t seen me these past few days," "remember it." After speaking, Xu Decai took out his phone from his pocket.
The scene shifts to a bustling street, where a man is driving a truck, singing as he drives. The truck is moving steadily, and the driver appears to be in a good mood.

The scene shifts to a highway, where a small truck slowly moves forward. Xu Decai sits in the passenger seat, looking ahead expressionlessly, while Little Soldier drives, occasionally glancing at Xu Decai.
Xu Decai looked at him with a stern face, then turned his head to the side.
The scene shifts to a plane flying in the sky, with the tarmac of an airport appearing in front of the two. They arrive at the airport, and Xu Decai boards the plane heading to Beijing.
The inside of the carriage was filled with smoke, and the windows were covered with dust. The driver, Little Soldier, was staring blankly ahead.
The scene shifts to a Mercedes-Benz with 'Jingxin Transportation' written on the door, parked on a bridge. Xu Decai got out of the car, looked around, and then turned to look at the driver's seat.
The figure of the man gradually disappeared in the rearview mirror, and the man in the passenger seat, Little Soldier, also gradually calmed down.
The two drove to a desolate area, Xu Decai got out of the car, lit a cigarette, and stood by the road. He looked around, his expression complex.

movie101_6966492004553490981_3000_3180.text: Coco: "My leg..."
Simon: "Your leg was just dislocated, it's alright now"

Simon and David arrived at the depths of the jungle, Simon pointed to the trees and said: "This way" Simon and David arrived at the depths of the jungle, Simon pointed to the trees and said: "Simon" Simon pointed to the trees and said: "These trees" Simon pointed to the trees and said: "They're man-made"
The scene switches to JC and Jia Fulian walking in the ruins. Jia Fulian said: "I see some shells and cannons."

JC: "Very likely so."
David: "Why are you staring at that?"
David: "This iron chain... why is it here?"
David placed the remote control on the ground and hid behind the plants, saying: 'The chain extends all the way to that tree.'
Simon excitedly knocked off the dirt on the sign, which read: "Unbreakable"
Simon: "It was us who bumped into it." "Lucky indeed."
JC: "You can't be serious!"
David: "So skilled."

At this moment, a large spider appeared on the ground. Jia Fulian picked up a stone to smash it, but Simon quickly stopped her: "It's nothing, just a wolf spider." Jia Fulian picked up the stone and examined it closely.
Jia Fulian: "JC, I've found my great-grandfather."
Simon: "What? You can tell it's him just by the bones?"
Jia Fulian: "Not by the ring, but by our family crest found right here."
Simon: "There are two" "Which one?" "Use your intuition" "Hurry!"
Jia Fulian pointed and said: "This one, I guess."

Jia Fulian: "Are you sure?"
Simon: "Positive. I'll pack your great-grandfather into my backpack then."
Bonnie: "His arm!"
Simon apologized: "Oh, sorry." Simon cut open the bark of a tree, discovering several golden bananas inside. Simon and David exchanged a knowing look.

The two of them, carrying heavy equipment, crawled out of the crevice, and the two people on the log also found the signal receiver. The two of them, carrying heavy equipment, crawled out of the crevice, and the two of them on the log also found the signal receiver. David: "JC"
Simon: "We've found the Immortal!"
The two, carrying heavy equipment, walked towards the coordinates. David said: "This is like something out of a dream. How did you find it? Well done!"
Simon: "We found it when we fell down here," "broke my leg doing it."
Simon walked over to JC and said: "Found one." Simon and Jia Fulian stood together, showing off the treasure they found.
Captain: "Bonnie, I've got the med kit!" Simon: "Come around this way, there's an old path. Just follow the markers we left."
Simon: "Thank you"
David looked up and said: "This is the Immortal." Simon: "Yes." David: "Why would the ship be here?"
Simon: "Typhoon"
Jia Fulian asked: "Was there really such a big typhoon?"
Simon: "Tsunami"
David: "It's all possible." "On our way here, we saw some graves and skeletons."

Simon: "The preparations outside the cave were likely the officials from the Immortal. The ones inside, by the degree of decay of their clothing, clearly differ from those outside, and they all have blades embedded in them, must have been a fierce fight before they died. These people were likely brought by her great-grandfather, they didn't die of natural disasters or disease, but from killing each other."

movie101_6991751088659497479_1260_1440.text: Mr. Wu said, 'It's fine,' 'Now it's related,' 'I have a condition,' 'You take my money and I will take him with me.'
Zhang Hua, with a face full of regret, looked at Mr. Wu, then turned to Xiao Dou lying on the ground and knelt down to check his condition.
Mr. Wu struggled to get up and untied Xiao Dou, saying, "Thank you."
Mr. Wu patted Zhang Hua's back to comfort him and said, "It's okay."

Zhang Hua said, 'Go out and take a look.' Mr. Wu and Zhang Hua went out to investigate. In the alley, a man in black was pacing back and forth with a flashlight. He wore a leather jacket and a ski mask, casting a gloomy shadow over his face.
President Cheng said, 'That's right, it's the car in the middle.'
The police said, 'The suspect car turned north from under the Changhong Bridge.'
Mr. Wu said to the police car driver: "Show me the next intersection."
The police officer monitoring the screens said, "That one can't be viewed."
The police asked, 'What happened, why?'
The police officer replied, 'Those intersections are under maintenance today.'
President Cheng opened the laptop, which displayed a photo of the suspect. Old Cao turned away in disappointment, while President Cheng said, 'Sure.'
The man on the screen said, 'Sure, sure.'
Old Cao said, "It's Hua Zi, right?"
Everyone replied in unison: "Yes."
The police said, 'Old Cao.'
Li Zhidui said, 'Wait for me over there.'
The bald man replied, 'Okay.'
Old Cao shouted: 'Hey!'
Old Cao stepped forward and said, 'Li Zhidui.'
Old Cao replied, "That's right."
Li Zhidui replied, 'I could tell it was him just by looking at the situation. I've also brought over Xing Feng and the others.'
Xing Feng asked, "What made you decide to go to that nightclub today?"
President Cheng explained, 'I've just invested in a new movie, signed him as the leading actor. We were celebrating together.'
Xing Feng asked, 'Did you notice anything unusual about him today? Anything off?'
President Cheng replied, "He had a fight with his wife."
President Cheng replied, "Yes, we had a fight."
President Cheng shouted, "Hey, hey, hey, hey."
Xing Feng asked: 'Does he have any relatives in Beijing?'
President Cheng quickly denied: "No, definitely not, no."
Mr. Wu said to Zhang Hua: "It's too uncomfortable, cuff my hands in front."
The scene shifted to Mr. Wu's subordinates quickly unlocking the chains. Mr. Wu said, 'The same for him.' Mr. Wu's subordinate kept his eyes on Zhang Hua while unlocking the chains.
Zhang Hua asked Mr. Wu, "Mr. Wu, are you married?"
Mr. Wu said fearfully: "No."
Zhang Hua asked, "Don't all the top stars in Hong Kong avoid getting married early?" "Afraid of upsetting fans?"
The neighbor said, 'I think they just fool around too much.'
Li Zhidui laughed and said, "You really have a lot of big shots in your phone, huh, all big stars."
Zhang Hua excitedly said, "This, this, this is my dream girl. How great it would be to have an autographed photo."
Mr. Wu said: 'Tell me, how much do you want?'
Zhang Hua asked while playing with his phone: "How much money do you have?"
Mr. Wu said, "That card has a hundred thousand and some overdraft limit."
Zhang Hua asked, "And then?"
Mr. Wu said, 'I have another card where I live, with three million in it.'
Zhang Hua asked in confusion: 'RMB?'
Mr. Wu said: "Yes."
Zhang Hua said, "You better not be joking," "Ask him, how much do I want from you."
Xiao Dou said: "Five million."
Zhang Hua said, "Your price is lower than his."
Mr. Wu said, 'I know you've been realistic.'

movie101_7021874945990853151_7140_7320.text: Shashou held the knife against Li Zihao's neck, then slowly moved it to his right eye. Li Zihao had no choice but to close his eyes tightly. Shashou flicked his wrist, and Li Zihao instinctively opened his eyes again.

Shashou's face twisted with rage, Li Zihao suddenly turned around, grabbed Shashou's head and smashed it forcefully onto the wine bottle on the table. The wine bottle shattered upon impact, and Li Zihao lifted Shashou and slammed him onto a bookshelf.
Li Zihao grabbed Shashou's right hand and twisted it forcefully, causing Shashou to scream in pain. Then he bent Shashou's arm and struck him in the face, sending Shashou flying backward.
Li Zihao lay on the ground, his face distorted in agony. The door was blown open by the continuous gunfire, and the bodyguards outside were also knocked down one by one.

Li Zihao slowly stood up, holding the gun, and walked out of the room. The light from the window shone on his face, revealing the scars on his face. He looked at the empty room, and a sense of foreboding came over him.
Li Zihao turned around and said: "The savior of Bund, you are just a villain who manipulates power."

Li Zihao fired a shot, and the bullet passed through the air and shattered the vase behind Shashou. The blood from Shashou's hand trickled down to his wrist, and his hat was stained with blood on the side of his face.
Li Zihao walked in with a sledgehammer, while Shashou was packing up belongings in the bedroom.
Li Zihao picked up the long sword from the ground and walked towards Tang Qianqian. He suddenly grabbed Tang Qianqian's hair and brought her in front of him, glaring at her fiercely.
Li Zihao struggled to stand up, supporting Tang Qianqian with one arm. The two of them supported each other and moved forward.
Li Zihao, with tears in his eyes, asked: "Tang Qianqian, why"

Tang Qianqian said: "The debt my father owed, I came to return it to you. Is the Bund really that important, important to the point that the two most important people in my life are killing each other."
Tang Qianqian cried in Li Zihao's arms, Li Zihao hugged her tightly, not wanting to let go.
Tang Qianqian weakly said: "If I must die," "I will," "I will take," "the night as you," "let myself eternally," "held in your arms"
Tang Qianqian leaned on Li Zihao's shoulder, her delicate features pale. Li Zihao held her tightly, his breathing becoming rapid.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: Xu Decai took a drag from the cigarette, then casually flicked it away, leaving only the lit end of the cigarette, which was also promptly snuffed out by the breeze.
The truck stopped in front of a small restaurant, and a little girl was squatting at the entrance washing vegetables.
Wang Xiaobing, who was tidying up his clothes, heard the commotion and quickly walked into the restaurant. He looked around but did not see Cui Hua.
Wang Xiaobing looked at Lady Boss with a complex expression, his eyes moistening. He tried to speak but couldn't, so he just sighed deeply. Lady Boss cursed: "Cui Hua" "Dog-shit"
Wang Xiaobing looked at everyone's confused faces, sighed, and went back to his room.
Wang Xiaobing looked at Cui Hua's retreating figure, then turned his gaze to Lady Boss, his eyes revealing a hint of helplessness.
At this moment, a few people walked in from the door: "Who owns the car at the door?"
Wang Xiaobing looked up at Lady Boss, who was holding a knife, ready to chop, and said: "Playing time travel with me?"
Wang Xiaobing cursed: "Fuck your ancestors."

Big Brother walked in and said: "Stop it, bro, put down the chair for now." Big Brother walked between the two, and Wang Xiaobing and Blue-clothed Little Brother stopped fighting. Big Brother said: "I've been looking for you for several days, last time we hit the wrong person."
Wang Xiaobing pointed at the TV and asked: "Where's my box?"
Big Brother said: "I'm not stealing."
Red-clothed Little Brother said: "Big Brother, I took the box." "It's in the trunk." "I haven't touched it."
Big Brother slapped him and said: "You deserved it, I'm telling you."
Blue-clothed Little Brother said: "You are such a waste, always upsetting Big Brother, you look like a joke. How are we ever going to make it out here?"
Wang Xiaobing took the box and checked the seal, then looked at Red-clothed Little Brother and said: "My box really hasn't been touched, right?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "Then you should just keep your mouth shut."
Big Brother said: "On behalf of our team," "I extend our deepest apologies to you." After saying this, Big Brother got into the car with his underlings, and they prepared to leave.
The three of them ran over and said: "We are all professionals. Let's leave contact information."
Blue-clothed Little Brother said: "Add me on WeChat."
Red-clothed Little Brother said: "Add your Weibo" "Follow you" "To be your fan."
Blue-clothed Little Brother said: "You deserved it."
Big Brother raised a hand and said: "Deserved it."

movie101_7021874945990853151_840_1020.text: Li Zihao angrily said: "Are you fucking mute? I helped you escape and you can't even say thank you." Fang Jie, who was lying on the ground, didn't even have the strength to get up.
Fang Jie, lying on the ground, spoke to Li Zihao: "What are you looking at?"

The car sped forward, and suddenly, the vehicle's speed increased. Fang Jie was thrown off the car, lying on the ground. Li Zihao rushed over, helped him up, and turned to see the car coming to a halt.

Li Zihao, unwilling to be caught, reversed the car, trying to shake off the police. The police, not giving up, held on tightly. The car sped wildly on the streets, with the sound of tires screeching against the pavement, as Li Zihao looked back to see the police car tailing them closely.

The police cars were still relentlessly pursuing, and the rear car kept shooting at them. Li Zihao was still pushing the car at high speed, with Fang Jie inside shouting excitedly. Li Zihao gripped the steering wheel tightly, his brow furrowed, his eyes filled with determination.

The explosive force of the blast was tremendous, and the street was reduced to a pile of ruins in an instant. Li Zihao drove the car, narrowly escaping the disaster as the vehicle was riddled with bullet holes and sparks flew off the side.
Li Zihao, seeing the pursuers getting closer, accelerated and crashed the car into a stall selling goods by the roadside.
Li Zihao floored the gas pedal, the rear wheels left smoke, and the car sped forward. The enemies' bullets could not hit them as the car moved along the tram tracks, bouncing and sliding forward.

Fang Jie, sitting in the passenger seat, said to Li Zihao: "I counted you in," "I indeed did not misread you," "Your driving skills are okay," "But let me tell you," "You still lack a bit when compared to me."
The scene shifts to the street, where Fang Jie says to Li Zihao: "Where did you get this clothing from? It's not bad."

Fang Jie, seeing the car behind getting closer, widened his eyes and gripped the handrail above the car with both hands, leaning forward. The two cars collided head-on, and the one behind swerved to the side.
Fang Jie said to Li Zihao: "No, I just praised you, can't you do it right? It's risking our lives, not throwing them away!"

Fang Jie gripped the steering wheel tightly, leaning into the turn, and successfully pushed the car back onto the road. The police car behind swerved to avoid the collision, but the next second, the car behind crashed into the rear of Fang Jie's vehicle.
Li Zihao floored the gas pedal, the car's tires smoked as it sped up, and then crashed forcefully into the car in front.

Li Zihao, with no other choice, floored the gas pedal and crashed straight through. The sedan was pushed to the edge of the road, while Fang Jie's limousine was violently shoved into a roadside stall.
The two cars collided violently, sending the enemy's vehicle spinning several times in the air before it crashed down hard onto the road, and then it tumbled over and over again.

Li Zihao, in a panic, floored the gas pedal, aiming to ram the car ahead. The two vehicles collided head-on, and the rear car was pushed forward due to the impact. The front car's front bumper was crumpled inward, and the rear car's rear bumper also suffered severe damage.

Fang Jie, with a look of panic, turned to see a grenade under the driver's seat. He quickly grabbed it and stuffed it into the gap between the dashboard and the steering wheel. Fang Jie then grabbed a cloth and stuffed it into the front of the car. The grenade was detonated, and the windshield shattered instantly.

The explosion lifted the front half of the vehicle into the air, and the gasoline on the ground instantly ignited, turning the entire street into a fiery inferno. Fang Jie and Li Zihao watched the explosion from their car, and the flames quickly engulfed the entire street.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: The scene shifts to a rural road, where a bus is driving along. Inside the bus, Driver answers a call. The person on the other end says: "The wheel of our vehicle is stuck; we can't move."
After hanging up, he slammed the phone onto the seat and vigorously stomped the brake.
The car is bumpy and dusty, with loose screws and bolts on the body, and the tires are worn out, but Driver still bravely drives forward.
The scene switches to a highway, where a lorry is driving. Inside the lorry, the driver licks his lips, takes out a crumpled piece of paper from his pocket, and looks at it while driving.
Driver got out of the car and ran towards the toll booth.
The little brother in red said: "Brother, the box has been found, brother." The little brother in red reported to Driver as soon as he got off the car.
Driver looks at the toll road, hesitates for a moment, and then turns to leave.
He walks to the middle of the overpass, stops, takes out his phone from his pocket, and starts to make a call. He hesitates for a moment, then puts the phone to his ear and says, "Hello."
The mother-in-law's voice came through the phone: "Driver, come back quickly. Someone has paid for our daughter's surgery, and the operation will be done tomorrow morning."
Driver: "Let, let, let, let, let that person who paid, wait for me urgently, I'll be back immediately."
Zhang Xiaoyu replied, "I don't know who paid, but Dr. Zhang said someone asked him to pass a letter to you."
Driver says: "What? Quickly ask him to read the letter to me."
DingDian said: "Hold on, let me read it to you."

The letter from Xiao Bai: "Brother, when you see this letter, I will have temporarily lost my freedom, but my heart is free." "I have hated you for these ten years, but now I understand that I should hate myself." "There is a card in this letter with some money in it, which I have saved over the years." "Take your wife, kids, and Yang Shan back to our hometown with seven streetlights, and wait for me."
Driver hung up the phone, looked around, and then turned to look behind him. Seeing no one, he turned back.

The scene switches to the highway, where a bus is driving along. Driver is sitting inside, humming a song. The lyrics go: "The wind is cold, the rain is pouring, the night is helpless, but the dream is still beautiful," "Inside and outside of the dream are burning hot," "With your hand leading, our hearts are synchronized," "You are warm, then nothing else matters."

movie101_6966492004553490981_300_480.text: Bonnie stepped out of the car in high heels and said to Soldier: "May I use the restroom for a moment?"
Soldier said, "Bonnie huh?" "Please, go ahead." "Right this way." Soldier gestured for Bonnie to go inside.
Bonnie thanked him and went inside.
President's Son said: "Dad, that's awesome! You know it's the Year of the Dragon, we're going to make a fortune!"

Bonnie stepped out of the lifeguard tower, wearing a pair of high heels, clad in a sparkling top and shorts, with a pair of sunglasses tucked into her hair. She walked to the stairs, lifted her long, slender legs, and slowly descended the stairs.
Bonnie's long dress revealed a pair of slender legs, which she crossed and placed on the filing cabinet. She then slowly rotated her body, leaning her head on one hand.

Bonnie, who had just rushed out of the house, was about to get into the car when she noticed the box on the ground. She dropped the wrench and performed a split to reach the box, then quickly got up and ran back into the house.
President said, "The task of finding JC is yours."

Zong Sheng asked, "By the way, where is he now?"
Zong Sheng said, 'He's probably on vacation.'

The man in the red protective suit, drenched in sweat, slipped and fell down the stairs. The security guards behind him also fell down the stairs one after another. The people on the second floor saw this scene and shouted, "What's that? Someone's coming in. What just happened? Stop him, stop him!"

The soldiers opened fire, and JC, in a panic, ran towards the glass door. He crashed through the door and out of the building, with the soldiers relentlessly chasing after him. The soldiers shouted, "Stop, or we will shoot! Catch him!"
The soldier guarding the house shouted, "Someone has invaded, seal all passages!"
Commander asked, 'Where are the keys?'
Soldier fired back and said, "Catch him!" The enemy fled in panic. Soldier said, "This way!"

The fully armed men in black were running in the corridor, and the last one slipped under a truck. The team members crouched and moved forward, saying, 'He's here,' but before they could act, they were also knocked down by a hidden enemy.

The mercenaries behind were still chasing, but they were all shot down by the well-prepared JC. At this moment, JC crawled under the truck, and the mercenaries on the other side couldn't find him. The truck started moving forward.

The mercenaries, who were originally on the upper floors, quickly moved to the corridor and the tunnel. The tunnel was narrow, and the mercenaries had to crawl forward. The leading soldier was shot and killed by a motorcycle bullet.
The soldiers quickly retreated inside the tunnel, and the mercenaries outside the tunnel were still searching for their position.

The jeep sped forward, and the man in the black suit slid forward on a skateboard-like machine, which automatically transformed into a crab shape, allowing the man to move quickly and smoothly on the highway.
The robot's thrusters were malfunctioning, causing it to skid sideways on the road and eventually stop at the edge of a cliff.

The two cars drove on the mountain road, with the SUV closely chasing the jeep ahead. On the guardrail by the road, a motorcyclist was lying in ambush, waiting for the right moment to pounce. As the two cars approached, the motorcyclist looked up at the vehicles passing by and then swiftly rushed down from the guardrail, diving into the oncoming traffic. The SUV driver braked urgently, but the jeep ahead didn't react in time and collided with the SUV.
The car sped up, and at that moment, JC, in a spacesuit, jumped onto the road and slid next to the car. He then transformed into a skateboard and continued to pursue.

movie101_7026623602615452196_1080_1260.text: The scene shifts to the vault, where Xiao Bao successfully bypassed the password. The vault door opened, revealing a row of gun safes inside. Unexpectedly, the butterfly flapped its wings once more and flew towards Coco.
Simon, who was playing a video game, didn't even look up. When the bombs exploded, Simon was thrown violently, and the wooden cage was shattered.
Bonnie pushed Simon away, saying: "I don't need you to care."
Mr. Liao grabbed Simon and ran, shouting: "Go, go, go"
Simon and Mr. Liao quickly picked up Martin and carried him out. Jia Fulian urged: "Hurry up"
Mr. Liao put down Jia Fulian and asked: "Are you okay?"
Mr. Liao: "Hold on"
Martin walked over and said: "How come it's a sheep head"

At this moment, the previously disarmed Simon suddenly lit up a red flare and threw it at the people in the room. The people outside were instantly confused, and those inside took the opportunity to escape. Martin said: "I am really lucky"
Coco: "My foot" "It's killing me" "Bone" Coco bit the bullet and removed his own bone.
Coco kicked the gold bar away, fell down, and Mr. Liao rushed over asking: "Koko" "Are you all right?"
Coco: "Gold?"
Simon asked: "How do you know there is gold"
Simon: "Coco"
Coco asked Simon: "How do you know there will be gold in this tree"
Coco: "I didn't say this tree"
Coco squatted on the ground and said: "Let me see"
Coco squatted down and said: "I mean my shoe," "Is there gold in this tree?"
At this moment, Simon suddenly shouted: "Found it, found it, bag it."
Bonnie asked in surprise: "How has it changed?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_1980_2160.text: Kong Laoda turned around and said: "Can't you hear?" "They are here for the money" "I can afford that money" "You want a million, right?" "I'll give them two million" "That's it" "You guys don't have to deal with this anymore."

The police said: "This guy drives pretty fast." "Has he noticed us and is trying to shake us off?"

Zhang Hua said, "Drive straight from the big bridge until you see a bicycle on your right, then stop. Just throw the money down from there."
Xing Feng in the car said: "Chao Zi go ahead and slow him down" "Don't let him be so hasty."
Chao Zi catches up and grabs Kong Laoda, saying: "Kong Laoda," "Put it down."
Chao Zi grabbed Kong Laoda and said: "Who let you follow? Are you sick?"

Kong Laoda:"Don't rush." Kong Laoda pushed the man in the fur coat to the railing, the man in the fur coat threw the bag down, and the motorcycle that was originally parked on the bridge was also driven down by Xing Feng.
The police said: "At that time," "in order to protect the hostage," "we couldn't open fire at the scene," "and the roadblocks set up along the way didn't stop him either."
Zhang Hua sitting in the chair said: "It looks like this kid's escape route was carefully planned."
Kong Laoda answered the phone: "Hello."

The mysterious person said, "Old Kong, the money has been received, thank you." "But," "let me tell you something." "Your brother is too awesome." "When I abducted him, I never intended to let him live." "So," "you prepare another million for me, and I will tell you where he is buried."
The scene shifts to a police station, where a policeman is calling someone over, saying: "Old Yu, Old Yu," "someone is looking for you in the office, come over."
