Yu Guohui holding a voice recorder says: "This is Hua Zi." Yu Guohui points to a photo and says: "This is Hua Zi."
Zhang Hua walked over and said: "Hello, Mr. Wu." "Little Dou, let me tell you," "I didn't get your card."
The man in the overcoat said: "Impossible."

Zhang Hua continued to ask: "Tell me, where's your card? Huh, where's the card? Huh, where did you put it? It's not in the room, there's no card. Think hard, did you put it under the bed? Or did you leave it with your girlfriend?"
Cang Zi: "No"
Zhang Hua bent down and said, 'Anyway, I don’t have the card.'
Mr. Wu said: "It's not possible."
Zhang Hua said: "Think hard, think about it."
Mr. Wu said in fear: "No, no," "It's right there, it's right there,"
Zhang Hua asked Mr. Wu: "Are you sure, are you sure," "no more money?"
Mr. Wu said, "No more," and the man was choked to the point where he couldn't speak.
The two men in black, one on each side, choked Mr. Wu and Zhang Hua respectively, threatening them with electric shocks. Mr. Wu, with a face full of fear, kept pleading for mercy.
Zhang Hua, with a gloating smile, took out a bank card from Mr. Wu's pocket, looked at the card in his hand, and then at Mr. Wu, and then left with a swagger.
Zhang Hua: "You really are a good actor."
Mr. Wu said: "It's a pity for you too."
Zhang Hua asked, "You've been a soldier, huh?" Mr. Wu looked at him and nodded.
Mr. Wu replied: "I have been." "I was a soldier in the south, and then I went to Hong Kong."
Zhang Hua came over and said: 'So you're telling me you've never fired a gun?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_1320_1500.text: Mulang Shenjun said: "Your mind is lost."
Huyan Dazang said, "When I came to Central Plains, it was to fulfill my master's wish, I didn't expect to meet you all."
Mulang Shenjun asked: "Are you in love with her?"
Tuocheng Junzhu came out and said to the two: "You two, dinner is ready, come in quickly."
Huyan Dazang laughed and said: "Aren't you the same?"
Mulang Shenjun said: "My matters aren't as simple."
Huyan Dazang said: "In these matters, men should take the initiative, you wouldn't let the girl speak first, would you?"
Mulang Shenjun stood up and said, "This is not the time to talk about private affairs."
Huyan Dazang said: "Tuocheng Junzhu is a good girl, you have to cherish her, if you miss her, you may lose her."
Mulang Shenjun said: "The more you cherish, the harder it is to get sometimes."
Huyan Dazang and Mulang Shenjun exchanged smiles and left together. Fang Baoyu said: "Even if I get beaten to death, I want to go to Baiyun view."
Zuixian said: "Mr. Fang Baoyu, this is a very dangerous step that Fang Baoyu is forcing me to take. You better think it through."
Fang Baoyu said: "I have thought it through."
Zuixian took out a book from his bag.

Zuixian handed a book to Fang Baoyu and said: "This book is the secret sword manual passed down from ancestors.""You must bury yourself underground for nine days to complete the cultivation, remember to be free of distractions."
Wang Dian suddenly remembered the sound of footsteps from outside the door, and Bai Sankong's ear was twitching. Wang Dian said, "You're here."
The scene shifts, and Wang Dian comes to Tuocheng Junzhu's room. "With you in Baiyun Guan, I'm assured."
Bai Sankong asked, "Is everything arranged properly?"
Wang Dian said, "Chisong has been killed by Huyan Dazang. Wudang is now in chaos and they vow to confront Zi Yi Hou and Huyan Dazang for a clear explanation."
Bai Sankong said: "How can Zi Yi Hou and Huyan Dazang not fall into our trap when we swap sincerity with insincerity?"
Wang Dian said, "You're still as cunning and deep-planned as ever. On the ninth day of the ninth month, we will definitely catch them all."

Bai Sankong said: "Isn't the position of the martial arts alliance leader yours by then?" Bai Sankong looked at Wang Dian and said: "Our next task is to remove all the obstacles," "to completely destroy Shaolin and Wudang."
Zuixian said: "I know, I shouldn't have given him the secret manual. Fang Baoyu only knows a few rudimentary martial arts skills. How could he possibly achieve what those martial arts masters can't?"

movie101_7026623602615452196_2160_2340.text: Zhang Dan looked at Amber and said: "Stop following me." Then he turned and left.

Amber, who was sitting in the last seat, saw the person she was looking for through the window. She immediately got up and got off the bus. The street was deserted, and the bus was the only source of light.

Pierre clicked the send button, and the pop-up window showed 'Transmission Complete.' Amber looked at the screen in disbelief. Pierre sighed and looked at the screen. The first photo that popped up was a selfie of Zhang Dan and Amber.
Pierre said: "Interesting." He took the wanted poster and looked at it while saying: "We have a suspect. His name is Ah Cang."
Pierre looked at the photos on the computer, and suddenly clicked on a thumbnail. Amber looked at the screen and said: "Really?" "Try this one."
Amber, after finishing the necklace, saved it and sent it to Pierre. Pierre looked at the necklace on the screen and said: "GALA"
Amber looked at the computer and said: "Look in the last folder." "That's him." "You must have met him." "I met him." "He's quite handsome."
Xiao Bao took the listening device and said: 'This is quite clever. Should we inform King Kong to suspend the operation?'
Zhang Dan shook his head and said: "No."
Xiao Bao said: "Why?" "We might be watched."
Zhang Dan said: "We need to change the initial plan. I've decided to use Plan B now."

Xiao Bao said: "Plan B." Then, Xiao Bao rode his motorcycle to the tunnel, Zhang Dan and Xiao Bao stood back to back in the tunnel, waiting for Ye Hong. As soon as Ye Hong arrived, the three of them rushed towards the newly arrived black car.
Ye Hong pushed Xiao Bao away and said to Zhang Dan: "You're the only one who thinks I'm crazy" "I'm not crazy, I'm smart"

Ye Hong smiled and nodded, the two of them laughing and driving off into the distance. The car sped along the country road, surrounded by sunflower fields that stretched endlessly, with the sun overhead casting a warm light over the earth.
Zhang Dan said: "Rest stop." He then opened the car door, walked to the other side, and ran into the sunflower field, touching the heads of sunflowers as he went.
Zhang Dan looked around, then got up and walked to the passenger seat, opened the door, and sat next to Amber.
Ye Hong said: 'I'll pass.'
Xiao Bao said: "Actually, it's not good for women to hold their urine." "But I already considered that." After saying this, Xiao Bao got off the car
Xiao Bao took out a pink portable urinal and showed it to Ye Hong. Ye Hong asked: "What is this?"
Xiao Bao took out a female urinal device and said: "This allows women to pee outdoors." "You can stand and pee just like men." "How about that? I can accompany you."
Ye Hong turned his head and said: "Are you sick?"
Zhang Dan ran to the jeep, picked up a paper airplane from the back seat, and asked: "What's that?"
Zhang Dan took out a female urination device and said: "A device that will allow her to pee standing up."
Zhang Dan started the car and asked: "Is it useful?"
The woman in the passenger seat took the paper cup and said: "Oh no, pervert."
Zhang Dan shouted: "Little Purple!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_1500_1680.text: First said: "But, but, what else can I do?" "He insisted on trying," "If we don't let him, isn't he going to the White Cloud Temple anyway," "Isn't he still going to his doom?" "What do you have to complain about?" "At least you have a son to keep you company here," "What exactly do you want?" "Why aren't you speaking?" "If you don't speak I'll smash this gravestone," "Who are you?"
The woman said, "You're not worthy of knowing." "Why are you causing trouble here?"
First said: "What's the big deal? He is a good friend of mine. He told me, he doesn't want this gravestone anymore. So I'm helping him change it."
The woman said, "This gravestone was handcrafted by me, I won't tolerate your reckless behavior."

The woman's movements were swift and her techniques were fierce. First had no defense and was forced to retreat. The woman leaped into the air and kicked towards First, who was knocked away by her power. The silk dress fluttered as she spun, her face hidden beneath the veil. First was knocked into a stone pillar by her kick.
Fang Baoyu's power was immense, and First was sent flying like a puppet.

Fang Baoyu's face was pale, and he was lying on the ground, unable to move. His mind was in chaos, unable to think clearly. He vaguely heard someone calling him, but he couldn't make out what they were saying.
Fang Baoyu looked at the sun, squinting his eyes, shielding them with his hand, and then stretched out his hand to block the sun's rays.

The woman angrily said, "You destroyed the grave, I will have you torn to pieces." The woman used all her strength to cast a spell, and the three of them attacked First together. First was beaten to the point of being unable to retaliate.

The two were so focused on each other that they didn't notice the change in the wind direction. When they did, it was too late. The woman's veil was lifted by the force of the wind, revealing her face. Fang Baoyu quickly adjusted his stance to meet the new wind direction. The woman's skills were so strong that she could even lift the huge rock in front of her with just a slight push.
Fang Baoyu saw the immobile First, so he raised his hand to interrupt him, then looked at the turbulent river water, and finally smiled at First.
Fang Baoyu said: "I have trained the True God Technique. I have mastered the God Technique!"
The scene shifts, and Fang Baoyu is seen carefully dressing the wounds of the refugees, sitting on the bed with a young boy. First: "You've worked hard."

movie101_6966492004553490981_3900_4080.text: Simon said, "Where's the snake head?" Simon took the stone dragon head from David's hand and said, "The dragon head must be inside."

David picked up a palm frond and said, "Be quiet!"
Simon said, "Accurate, my foot! Let me do it."
Simon said, "Watch my hand!"

The uncle said, "There's no way here! Go this way!"

The group looked up and saw a net hanging in mid-air. They tried to reach out and grab it but failed. Simon said, "It's stuck!"
Simon stood up and walked towards the dense forest, with the others following suit.
Simon said, "No time to explain!"
At this moment, Simon noticed the approaching danger and shouted, "They’re coming!"

The mercenaries quickly surrounded him, but they were all killed by David. Simon crawled out from the pile of leaves, and David threw a grenade at the remaining mercenaries. The explosion shattered the surrounding vines, and Simon looked at David and said, "You have no escape. Come on, don’t shoot! Move!"
Simon said, "Scarves, scarves, quickly!" "Put them on!" "Put them on!" "Simon, put it on!"
Jia Fulian said to Simon: "Put it on."
Simon and David quickly came over to carry Jia Fulian, Simon said, "Treat them with honey!"
A swarm of bees chased Simon and his group, and Simon said, "Didn't I tell you"
The bees swarmed towards the group, and David, who was at the forefront, was hit by a swarm of bees and quickly ran away. David shouted, "Watch out for the bomb!"

David said to Bonnie: "You do it."
David threw the cloth aside and said, "You do it."
Simon said, "Alright, I'll do it," and then a shell was fired from Simon's gun, destroying the remaining vines and blocking the sunlight completely. The group was now in total darkness.

Simon and the others quickly threw out colored smoke grenades, attracting the attention of the entire rescue team. They then swiftly climbed up the trunk of a large tree, with Simon shouting, "It's moving, get on quickly!"
The explosion blasted the chains apart, and the group fell to the ground. Simon quickly got up and threw another grenade, which cleared the remaining enemies.
Simon, David, and the others quickly took cover behind a large tree. The heavily armed Simon and David were still undaunted and continued to shoot forward.

Simon and David were the first to reach the top of the stone stairs. They quickly dealt with the enemies ahead and then turned to clear the surrounding bushes. The two of them worked together to take down all the enemies in the clearing.
Simon shouted, "Stop, you idiots!" Simon and David were tied up by the local tribesmen, while Simon shouted, "It's okay, let them go."

movie101_6991751088659497479_2160_2340.text: Mr. Wu said, "Is this to protect yourself or what"
Zhang Hua said, "Protect yourself," then looked into Mr. Wu's eyes and asked, "Should I trust you or not?"
Mr. Wu asked in fear: "Is the money in the card right?"

Zhang Hua replied, "I haven't checked yet." Then Zhang Hua took off the headphones and threw them to Mr. Wu, saying, "Come on, let's record something." Seeing Mr. Wu still tied up, Zhang Hua said, "Come, say something."
Mr. Wu asked in confusion: "Say what?"
Zhang Hua holding the camera said, "Just say that you're doing well, eating and drinking as you should, alright, I'll transfer that chain to you," "start recording now."
Mr. Wu was tied to a post in the corner of the room, looking extremely miserable. He said, "I'm here," "Why did that light flash?"
Zhang Hua said, "It flashed once"
Mr. Wu walked over and said, "Did it not record?"
Zhang Hua hurriedly said, "Rewind it, rewind it and check." "Not that one, that's fast forward." "Not that one, let me see," "I'll adjust it for you."
Zhang Hua: "What's going on?"
Mr. Wu asked, "What do you mean?"
Mr. Wu asked, "What do you mean?"
Zhang Hua, pressing down on Mr. Wu, said: "You think smashing it will stop me from recording? I'll use my phone instead."
Mr. Wu said excitedly: "What do you mean, didn't you say you'd let the person go once I paid? Why are you recording, what's the point? Is it meaningful?"
Zhang Hua said, "Stop shouting"
Mr. Wu shouted: "What are you doing? You have more people and more guns, I'm not afraid of you, what's so great about you? If you have the guts, put it down"

Mr. Wu said, "We're all men, we need to talk about trust," "I won't say whether you're right or wrong in this line of work," "but you need to have credibility," "right?" "Otherwise, can they obey you?" "Can they obey you?" "I've agreed to pay," "if you play dirty," "I won't respect you," "I despise you."
Mr. Wu was brought to a small room, where a man in a leather jacket was sitting on a round wooden chair with his legs crossed, smoking a cigarette. Mr. Wu asked, "How should I address you?"

Mr. Wu said, "Huazi, the bank is about to open; who will go get the money?"

Xing Feng said while walking, "This Huazi has no rules; he can do anything."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1680_1860.text: Old Sir said: "Thank you for your hard work, healing my wounds must have depleted much of your qi."
Fang Baoyu said: "You should rest well for now."
Fang Baoyu, holding a sword, quickly approached, and upon seeing the person, exclaimed: "Who are you, daring to hide in the graveyard of the Beyond-the-Borders Flying Eagle?"
Fang Baoyu said: "Why lure me to this place in the dead of night?"
White Water Holy Mother said: "I ask you once more, why destroy the graveyard of the Beyond-the-Borders Flying Eagle?"

Fang Baoyu said: "That's none of your business." After speaking, Fang Baoyu drew his sword, and White Water Holy Mother immediately drew hers. Fang Baoyu launched a fierce attack, and White Water Holy Mother parried every move.

Fang Baoyu and Purple Marquis were evenly matched for the time being, neither gaining the upper hand. Seeing that the two were about to continue fighting, White Water Holy Mother hurriedly fled. Fang Baoyu shouted: "Purple Marquis!"
Purple Marquis turned around and said: "Fang Baoyu."
Fang Baoyu said: "Purple Marquis, how come you are here?"
Purple Marquis said: 'Your martial arts have improved a lot. Who taught you?'
Fang Baoyu said: "It's a long story,"

Old Sir said: "You talk about how fortunate this young man is. If you hadn't allowed him to practice martial arts, even the heavens wouldn't have agreed. I regretted giving him the secret manual at first, but if he managed to master the technique, it would truly be destiny."
The scene switches to Mulang Shenjun asking Purple Marquis: "Purple Marquis, what are your plans now?"
Purple Marquis said: "I was originally on my way to the Baiyun Temple to save Benyue."
Mulang Shenjun said: "That's perfect, I'm also heading to Baiyun Manor."
Huyan Dazang says: "I've heard about it, and you've already agreed to do a job for White Water Holy Mother."
Mulang Shenjun said: "There's nothing wrong with that, as long as it doesn't go against my interests, why not work for the Bai Shui Palace?"
Huyan Dazang said: "That's true, after all, those so-called righteous martial arts factions are also out to kill you."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Stop dragging me into this, Tuochen and I are actually quite worried about you."
Huyan Dazang says: "There's nothing to worry about," "I've talked to White Water Holy Mother, and I think some of the things she said make a lot of sense. We can't afford to fight head-on."
Huyan Dazang said: "Tomorrow will be different," "a real contest of martial arts cannot rely on scheming alone."
Mulang Shenjun said: "That's true, but, tactics are still important, just follow my lead when the time comes."

The scene shifts to the palace, where Wang Dian is performing a ceremony. He walks forward with a smile, then suddenly stops and turns to face the crowd, raising both hands to signal everyone to be quiet.

Wang Dian said: "Fellow martial artists, today is the day we elect the leader of the martial world. Originally, we wanted to decide through a contest of martial arts, but the Demon Cult meddled, and now they have surrounded Baiyun Temple, intending to launch a deadly attack on our Central Plains martial community."
Everyone shouted: "Fight them!"

movie101_7026623602615452196_2340_2520.text: The car drove into the forest, the sunlight filtered through the leaves casting a dappled light on the ground. The car stopped in a clearing, and Zhang Dan got out.

Zhang Dan got out of the car and took the binoculars from Xiao Bao's hand. He squatted down and started observing the surroundings. Xiao Bao and Ye Hong also got out of the car and squatted down next to him.

Zhang Dan opened the box and took out a black metal sphere, then squatted down and put it in the ground. The sphere began to emit a faint glow, and Zhang Dan took off the binoculars and squinted at the sphere. Charlie came over and took the binoculars to observe the situation.

Zhang Dan threw the disc, and the drone swiftly flew out of the forest, heading towards the castle in the distance. The castle, built on a hilltop, was surrounded by lush trees and had a majestic presence.
Zhang Dan sat down and started the drone, which displayed surveillance footage of the villa on the screen. The villa was surrounded by a large number of security personnel.
Zhang Dan: "No matter what method you use, you must infiltrate the castle and find the location of the 'Fountain of Soul'."
Ye Hong looked at the tablet and said, "Piece of cake."

The scene switches to a sunny day, with a group of people running into a courtyard, and the camera cuts to Ye Hong's car where a pair of hands is rummaging through the bag. The hands pull out a pair of sunglasses from the bag and put them on.
At this time, Ye Hong was walking in the forest with a backpack, singing a song. Suddenly, she stopped and looked around. She turned her head and saw a castle on the opposite hill.

Zhang Dan squinted his eyes, furrowed his brows, and squatted down to take out his gun. He aimed the laser sight at the villa's surveillance camera, quickly locked on to the IP camera, and started searching each floor of the villa.

Zhang Dan took out a pair of binoculars to observe the situation on the roof. The camera switched to Xiao Bao, who was looking for something on the roof. Zhang Dan locked onto the camera's position, but Xiao Bao noticed it. Zhang Dan quickly put on sunglasses and lowered the binoculars.
The scene switches to a park, where a woman with a bag on her back is walking. She suddenly stops, takes a small dog out of the bag, and holds it in her arms.
Charlie walked over to Ye Hong, Ye Hong picked up the little dog, and Charlie said: "Stop."
Charlie turned and left after speaking. Xiao Bao watched the group of bodyguards through the binoculars and then put them away.
Xiao Bao said: "Is that it?" "This is your method?" "Not talking to him?" "How are we supposed to get the 'Fountain of Soul' like this?"

Zhang Dan said to Xiao Bao: "Let's go." "You wouldn’t understand what a woman thinks." After saying this, Zhang Dan got into the car with Ye Hong. After the car started, Zhang Dan took Ye Hong to the research institute.
Pierre stepped forward and said: "Mr. Luo, please wait."
Pierre walked up to Charlie and said, "Sir, is the 'Fountain of Soul' part of your collection?"
Pierre said: "I believe you’ve been targeted by a theft ring." Pierre looked at Charlie.

movie101_7026623602615452196_2520_2700.text: Pierre: "These are not ordinary thieves," "They have already stolen the other components that make up G4A."
Charlie: "Now they also need your state of mind" "Inspection" "If they can pass the state of mind inspection" "If the security systems are installed"
Charlie: "Let them have it." "Excuse me." The doctor and nurse hurriedly went in to treat the patient. Charlie: "Pierre."
The scene switches to a wine tasting event, Charlie is walking in with a group of people,
Charlie walked through the crowd with a glass of wine, approaching Ye Hong who was sipping her drink. Charlie: "You haven't left yet?"
Ye Hong took a sip of red wine, looked up and saw Charlie, she smiled and said: "I have met you before"
Ye Hong laughed and said, "Can you be more old-fashioned?" "Don't you have any other lines?"
Charlie was a bit puzzled, Ye Hong put down her glass and said, "What's wrong?" "Is this red wine not good?"
Ye Hong sighed and said, "It's not the wine's fault" "It's this place."
Charlie looked around and asked, "What do you mean?"
Ye Hong holding a glass of wine: "Drinking wine cares a lot about mood""This place seems to be very good for everything""But lacks two things"
Charlie asked: "What things?"
Ye Hong rolled her eyes and said, "Music," "and," "friends."
Charlie smiled and said, "Not only do I understand wine," "but I also understand life." "Let me introduce myself." "I'm Rocherli, this winery is mine."
Ye Hong: "I've heard of your reputation." "I produce wine review magazines." "I'm Rose, a wine reviewer."
Charlie: "So, my winery won't get any good reviews?"
Ye Hong: "I'm gratified to meet you." "I have to go first."
Charlie: "Wait a moment", Charlie took out his phone and turned off the ringtone, then handed the phone to Ye Hong.
Charlie: "Now there's music and you're still missing a friend." "Wanna make friends with me?"
Ye Hong laughed and said, "I'm not short of friends"
Charlie: "Then what if I ask you to do an exclusive interview for me? Would you agree?" Ye Hong looked at Charlie and nodded.
Ye Hong: "Call me. Bye bye." Ye Hong put on her glasses and walked away with a smile.
The next day, Zhang Dan is sitting in front of the computer in the hotel suite, watching the surveillance footage, monitoring every move of the four people.
Zhang Dan looked at the blueprint on the table, Ye Hong holding the magazine in her arms, sweat pouring down her face. Zhang Dan asked, "When will he call?"

movie101_6991751088659497479_2340_2520.text: Zhang Hua: "Kong Laoda, we are the police," "Freeze," "Police," "Freeze," "Freeze," "There's a case that might involve you."
Zhang Hua shouted: "They're not cops, call the police!"
Kong Laoda crawled out from under the pool table, shouting as he got up: "Call the police, quick, call the cops!"

Zhang Hua: "Can you cooperate for once?" Zhang Hua pressed down on Kong Laoda, but Kong Laoda grabbed a pool cue and swung it at him. Zhang Hua dodged and grabbed Kong Laoda's wrist, and the pool cue struck the ceiling.

Zhang Hua was about to shoot when Kong Laoda arrived. He wrestled the gun away from the man in floral shirt, and the man in floral shirt fell to the ground. Zhang Hua quickly drove away with the car, and Kong Laoda followed on foot. He shouted: "Hey, car number 507"
Xing Feng: "That day I happened to be working on a case nearby with Cao Gang so we went together," "we didn't catch up to them until almost out of the city."
The two cars sped down the road, with the trunk of Cao Gang's car suddenly opening and a bicycle falling out. The two cars collided with the bicycle, and the police chased them from behind.
Xiao Lei and Qiang Zi got out of the car and started running. Zhang Hua also ran out of the car, chasing after them. Xiao Lei ran across the road and ran into the railing on the opposite side.
The two cars behind swerved to dodge, causing the middle car to hit the guardrail and flip over. Xiao Lei and Cao Gang hurriedly ran towards the flipped car.

Xiao Lei and Qiang Zi were chasing Cao Gang on the road. Cao Gang drove away in a car, while Kong Laoda was knocked down by the car in front. Cao Gang made a U-turn at the intersection and drove towards the two. Zhang Hua said, "Cao Gang, how are things on your end?"
Cao Gang: "I'm on them, almost out of the city."

The truck was opened, and a group of armed men wearing gas masks poured out. The police hiding on both sides of the truck door were scared into retreating. movie101_7026623602615452196_3420_3600.text: Amber looked at the bracelet, then at Pierre (elderly), and asked: "You said you understand the feeling of being betrayed. Who betrayed you?"

Pierre (elderly) said: "When I was young, I admired my father a lot. Everyone loved and respected him. He often went on long trips, always saying it was for work."
Pierre (elderly) said: "Every time he came back, he brought me gifts." "He said that when I grew up, he would take me traveling."
Pierre (elderly) continued: "When I was fourteen," "one day the police barged into my house" "and seized everything."

Pierre (elderly) says: "The police took everything, including him." "He was locked up in a cell and left nothing behind."

Then you should seize the opportunity and do what needs to be done. I just didn't expect it to be so difficult. Although I hate him a lot, I..."
