Pierre said to Charlie: "Mr. Luo," "that police officer is in a hurry to see you," "saying it's an urgent situation."
At this moment, a middle-aged man walked up and said: "Mr. Luo."
Ye Hong, who had just entered the door, was shocked by the scene. She looked around at the people dancing gracefully in the hall, as if she had returned to a fairy tale world.
Ye Hong walked over to Charlie, touched her face and said: "Handsome, your old friend is here again."
Zhang Dan said: "Xiao Bao, we're out of time."
The safe door was cut open, and the circuit board inside was electrified, with current flowing through it.
Charlie turned around and saw Ye Hong, Ye Hong was applying lipstick in front of a mirror, Charlie's eyes were red, Ye Hong asked: "Weren't we supposed to follow the rules?"

Xiao Bao said: "So don't fall in love with me, go." After saying this, Xiao Bao turned and left. The scene shifted to outside the mansion, where a group of people in black were riding motorcycles and quickly surrounding the mansion.

The motorcycle driver was none other than Xiao Bao. He sped through the streets and alleys, leaving a trail of dust. He was wearing a helmet and his face was covered, so it was hard to recognize who he was. Xiao Bao sped all the way to the mansion's gate.

At this moment, Xiao Bao was driving with Ye Hong towards the destination. Meanwhile, the two people who had just escaped from the castle were still on the run, with Ye Hong frequently looking back and Xiao Bao urging her to hurry.

On the other side, Xiao Bao was riding a motorcycle at high speed, heading towards the castle on the hill. The motorcycle kicked up a cloud of dust, and a car was following the direction of the motorcycle, heading towards the fork road.

movie101_6966492004553490981_5160_5340.text: JC said: "Would you mind if we take a look around?"
Teammate said: "I didn't expect there to be such a large verification center hidden underground at the winery."
The scene shifts to the underground complex, and JC says: "It's a forgery center, with tens of billions of transactions every year." "They have the final say on everything big and small."
Teammate suddenly stopped and said: "Hey, isn't this the painting that was stolen from the European museum at the beginning of the year?" "It's very well done."
JC said: "Don't underestimate these artists" "They are all masters" "It's a pity they only become famous after they die" "Pay more attention to upstairs."
Teammate asked: "What are these people doing?"

The guide introduced: "They polish and sand the porcelain," "soak it in manganese dioxide solution," "then further process it," "making it look like it's hundreds of years old." "The Chinese paper has many layers," "all of which can be peeled off." "This is an authentic piece," "when opened," "both of the two pieces are genuine."
Teammate said: "That's not one in five or six."
The staff carefully placed the painting back on the display shelf.
Teammate asked: "What about...that one?"
The staff member replied: "That's silk, they can't separate it, so they sell a long painting in parts, one in six, one in eight."
Teammate said: "I'm amazed they came up with this"
JC said: "Antiques excavated in small pieces" "Reconstructed based on archaeology" "True top, fake bottom" "Fake top, true bottom"
A man in a suit said: "Then they use x-rays to make the brand new porcelain look like it has a history of thousands of years all of a sudden."
Teammate asked: "This is really complicated. How many real ones are still on the market?"
JC said: "Ninety percent are fakes"
Teammate looked at the departing figure and said: "Poor rich people"
Security Guard: "Over there."

At this moment, a man walked out from the side, smiling and holding a ball of snakes. Teammate asked: "Who is that" The man pointed to the ball in his hand and gestured, then walked past the two and headed inside.
JC looked around and said: "It's one of Nine-headed Bird's people"
Teammate asked: "What is this?"

JC said: "This" "high-pressure low-temperature combustion" "simulating the carbon emission process" "specifically deceives antique experts" "this technology isn't well researched yet" "the process of adding fuel and catalyst can only be done manually" "they really dare to do this."
Teammate looked up and said: "Is such a crude equipment dangerous?"
The man in the hat, Nine-headed Bird, heard this and immediately crouched down, hiding under the stairs.
Nine-headed Bird said: "Nice to see you, JC". Teammate and JC looked up to see Nine-headed Bird on the second floor. Nine-headed Bird said: "Aren't you going to talk?"
Nine-headed Bird said: "Don't be like that"
Woman asked: "Who is he"
Nine-headed Bird introduced: "He is JC, a big-shot in this industry."
Woman said: "Reputation is sometimes not reliable"
Teammate asked: "Are you colleagues?"
JC while walking said: "We are not the same, we wouldn't do what he does."
Nine-headed Bird said: "What? Don't be so smug. Whatever you can do, I can do better." JC grabbed the bottle of red wine and ran up the stairs, followed closely by Teammate.
The scene switches, and JC walks out saying: "Nine-headed Bird, you stole a Buddha statue from a temple in Southeast Asia"
Nine-headed Bird said: "Yes, those people thought it was done by their neighbor country."
JC holding a bottle of wine, said: "A war broke out at the border and thousands of people died"
Woman: "People will die eventually". After saying this, Woman walked past JC.
Nine-headed Bird said: "That's their problem"
JC said: "You are the scum of our line of work"
Nine-headed Bird smiled and said: "The last person who said that to me has already gone west."
JC: "Really?" He walked while cursing, "Scum."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Shitai said: "Remember what I just said."

Zhu Er shouted, "Don't do it Shitai". Dazaang was caught between a rock and a hard place, he kicked Shitai to the ground, then turned to fight with the other two. His skills were evenly matched with both of them, and he managed to land a few punches.

Wang Dian was stabbed in the chest by a sneak attack from Dazaang, and the guard who rushed over was also killed by Dazaang. Dazaang leaped up and kicked the opponent flying, and the guard who rushed from behind was kicked in the head by Dazaang, falling to the ground.

Dazaang's sword was kicked away, and Wang Dian took the opportunity to kick him several meters away. Dazaang's sword was then kicked back into his hand. Wang Dian, not giving Dazaang a chance to breathe, charged again with his sword. Dazaang, with a determined look, said: "Do you know you have killed a kind monk?"
The two were still fighting, and Dazaang kicked Wang Dian to the ground. Dazaang said: "Wang Dian, you are going to die."
Wang Dian said: "Not so easy", and then he was kicked to the ground by Dazaang, struggling to get up.

Wang Dian's sword was as sharp as a tiger's tooth, and his skills were as solid as a rock. He was able to parry Dazaang's attacks with ease. Seeing that he was evenly matched, Dazaang became anxious. Suddenly, he kicked at Wang Dian's leg, but Wang Dian used his sword to block the kick, and then thrust the sword straight into the ground.

Dazaang, with his superior sword skills, kept the two at bay. After several rounds, he finally managed to injure the swordsman's left arm. The swordsman, in pain, said, "If the heaven doesn’t take you, I will!"
Shitai cried out: "Zhu Er" "Zhu Er" "Please beg him to save dad please" "Please beg him, Zhu Er"

Zhu Er said: "I remember you are my dad," "I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword." "Now you don't even spare Shitai," "you are not human at all," "you do not deserve to live." "Your life," "your life," "will only bring more harm to others."
Wang Dian said: "Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship."
Zhu Er said: "You killed grandma with your own hands, what family are you talking about?"
The scene switches to Mulang Shenjun pouring a cup of wine and drinking it in one gulp.
Bai Sankong said: "I told you, if anything happens to Baoyu, I won't let you go. Your men are all mediocrity. It would be easy for me to kill you."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Bai Sankong, you've always been dedicated in your work for the court. Is it worth it to ruin your future for a mere Fang Baoyu?"
Bai Sankong said: "Baoyu is my only family, even though I have wealth and influence, and hold a high official position."

movie101_7026623602615452196_4500_4680.text: Xiao Bao picked up Ye Hong and ran towards the forest. The special police behind were all at a distance, waiting for the right moment. Xiao Bao ran through the forest with Ye Hong, and suddenly stopped. He looked around and then jumped into a pit.

Xiao Bao drove the off-road vehicle, stepped on the accelerator, and charged through the trench. The men in black on the opposite side were still searching for Ye Hong's trace. Xiao Bao drove the off-road vehicle into the trench, and the men in black followed closely behind.
The enemy was still chasing them, and the car had already driven onto the road. The enemies were still in hot pursuit, and Pierre was still driving with high speed.

The two men in black were still weaving through the narrow mountain roads, with the tire tracks kicking up dust on the road. The man in black on the motorcycle was holding a gun, ready for battle. The car that was following earlier stopped at the entrance of the mine. The two men in black on motorcycles passed through the mine and stopped behind the car.

The truck sped even faster through the winding mountain roads, with the men in black closely pursuing in motorcycles. The truck made a sharp turn, and the motorcycles followed suit, kicking up dust on the mountain road.
At this moment, the car of Pierre and Amber passed through the factory. The motorcycle driver saw the car and immediately turned into the factory. Amber said: "Wait a minute."
Pierre said while driving: "I won't kill him."

The two quickly got on their motorcycles and chased after them. The motorcycle's engine roared as they sped along the road. Amber sat in the car, watching the two motorcyclists chase after them, feeling very anxious inside.
The enemy's searchlights swept over, and Xiao Bao drove Ye Hong through the woods, with the enemy closely following behind.
At this moment, a motorcycle drove out of the factory. The two in the car immediately braked, and the motorcycle sped past them. The two exchanged a glance and then got out of the car.

The two of them rode the motorcycle out of the forest and onto the road, with the truck following closely behind. They then drove the motorcycle onto the off-road vehicle and headed towards the research institute.

On the other side, Xiao Bao and Ye Hong were still chasing each other. Xiao Bao was riding a motorcycle, with Ye Hong closely following behind on a motorcycle. The two were speeding down the mountain, with the surrounding police cars giving chase. The police behind were relentlessly shooting at them.
Amber, who was driving, saw the two people ahead and immediately braked. Zhang Dan lost control of the motorcycle and fell off. Ye Hong shouted from the shore: "I can't swim!"

At this moment, the car was already in the water, and the tires were slowly sinking. Ye Hong was frantically pulling the handbrake, and the car was slowly reversing. Xiao Bao was desperately holding onto the car door, trying to get in, but was thrown off by the inertia.

On the other side, Pierre was driving with Amber and the others on a small road. The opposite group of people was on a small path by the river. At this moment, a car drove out from the small path by the river.

Pierre got out of the car, holding the door with one hand and raising a gun with the other. He walked towards Zhang Dan, who was lying on the ground, clutching his shoulder where he had been shot. Pierre approached Zhang Dan and said, "Don't move, kneel down."
Zhang Dan, who had been knocked down, stood up and said to Pierre: "If you dare, kill me."
Pierre said: "You think I won't dare to try." Then he pulled the trigger, but Zhang Dan dodged the bullet. Amber in the car was terrified.

movie101_6991751088659497479_360_540.text: Zhang Hua looked up and said, "What don't I dare to act? I once played a cop. By the way, which movie was that?"
Cao Gang said, "That's irrelevant. Where did you hide Mr. Wu?"
Zhang Hua tilted his head and said, "I don't know."
Cao Gang: "Is this fun for you?"
Zhang Hua smiled and said, "No, it isn't."
Xing Feng slammed the table and said: "If it's not fun, then shut up." "Huazi, look at your abilities."
Zhang Hua: "If you're that good, find it out yourself."
Zhang Hua: "Tough, aren't you?"
Xing Feng walked over and said, "Tough?" "We caught you, didn't we?" "With what you've done, do you think you shouldn't get beaten?"
Zhang Hua: "Go ahead if you have the guts."
Cao Gang: "Huazi believes you're not a petty thief." "A smart person wouldn't mess with themselves."

Zhang Hua looked at the two people in the car, Cao Gang and Xing Feng, with a face full of shame. He then walked into the restroom, and Xing Feng, who was washing hands, suddenly noticed the surveillance camera on the corner of the ceiling.
Zhang Hua asked: "How did you catch me?"

The scene shifts to the police station, where Zhang Hua is being questioned by Cao Gang. Zhang Hua, with a swollen face, keeps mumbling, Cao Gang glares at him fiercely. Zhang Hua lifts his head to look at Cao Gang. The interrogating policeman Li Jiehui also looks up at him.
Cao Gang turned around and said, "Chief Zhang, he's been checking his watch."
Zhang Guozheng said, "We don't have much time left. Mr. Wu should still be alive."
Xing Feng asked: "He's not dead, right?"
Zhang Hua replied: "Yes"
Xing Feng pointed at Zhang Hua and said, "It's different if he's alive." "We've given you the chance, think carefully."
Zhang Hua: "According to the usual pattern, his accomplices are watching and waiting for his signal."
Xing Feng said: "Zhang Hua's phone has always been one-way communication. Only outgoing calls. We turned it off now."
Zhang Hua said, "They must have agreed on a specific time."
Xing Feng: "Since we’re here, let’s be sincere. When will your men get the signal?"
Zhang Hua: "Nine o'clock."
Xing Feng: "Nine in the morning or nine at night?"
Zhang Hua: "At night."
Xing Feng asked: '"What will happen in an hour and a half?"'
Zhang Hua: "According to the rules."
Cao Gang: "Tell us, what are the rules?"
Zhang Hua: "Kill"
Zhang Hua said: "I just want to achieve my goal" "I do what I want to do" "If I think you should die, then you die" "If you shouldn't die, then you live"
Xing Feng pointed at the clock on the wall and said, "You're planning to stick it out like this, aren't you?" "I'll tell you, we're at this point now."
Zhang Hua said: "I need to think hard if there's even a glimmer of hope."
Cao Gang: "Your only hope is to atone for your crimes."
The police said, "All of Huazi's stuff is here."
The police brought in two big bags and put them on the table, saying, "These were found on him and in his car."
Zhang Hua looked up at Cao Gang and said, "Can I ask for another condition?"
Cao Gang: "Go ahead."
Zhang Hua: "I help you rescue Mr. Wu," "and you set me free."
Cao Gang looked at Zhang Hua and said, "You really don't know how to talk, do you?"
Zhang Hua said: "Sure I do, that's just what I think" "If I live, we all live" "If I die, we all die together"
Xing Feng pointed at Zhang Hua and said, "I've always considered you a reasonable person."
Zhang Hua said: "You should know that when you caught me, I was already dead." "I'll never make it." "Adding on all my guns, I probably deserve to die several times over."
The police spread out the items they found on the table: "These three guns were found in his trunk." "These two pistols and the flash-bang are on him." "Another was found at his wife's place."
Zhang Hua: "Why kidnap? He should just go straight to Diaoyu Island."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Bai Sankong: "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him?" Mulang Shenjun took a sip of wine, looked at Bai Sankong with a complex expression, Bai Sankong continued, "If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

The guard reported: "Report, sir, Fang Baoyu, he says he wants to see you." Bai Sankong was somewhat puzzled, but he did not stop Mulang Shenjun, who was about to leave. He stayed in the room and waited for Mulang Shenjun to return. Meanwhile, Zhu Er was burning incense sticks in front of the ancestral tablet, and Huyan Dazang was sitting behind her, fiddling with something.

Zhu Er, who was arranging offerings on the table, heard this and sighed lightly. She walked over to sit beside Huyan Dazang and said, "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"
Huyan Dazang: "I knew it a long time ago; I just didn't say it."
Zhu Er asked in surprise, 'You knew?'
Huyan Dazang: "That night in the grass hut, your words and actions already gave it away."
Zhu Er asked, 'Then why didn't you expose me?'

Huyan Dazang said, "Because during this period, these have been the happiest days since we fell in love. I stayed away from the tumultuous life of the martial world and led a carefree life of planting and tending crops. I didn't want to ruin this harmony."
Zhu Er said, 'I also cherish everything here. But it's all over now.' Zhu Er's eyes were filled with sorrow.
Huyan Dazang said, "I've made up my mind." "I want to find the Nine Treasured Swords as soon as possible to fulfill my master's wish and leave the martial world."
Zhu Er said, "But finding all nine treasured swords is bound to be extremely difficult."
Huyan Dazang said, 'I know. Recently, I've heard of a place in southern Sichuan called Jiange that has the remaining six swords. I wonder if you would come with me.'
Zhu Er said, 'From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it.'

Huyan Dazang's smile froze on his face, and he looked at Zhu Er with a hint of confusion. Fang Baoyu's eyes were firm as he stood before Mulang Shenjun and said, 'I came to see you to ask you to release Ben Yue.'
Mulang Shenjun said, 'Alright, I assume your grandfather already told you that if you want to see Ben Yue, you must bring the heads of Ziyi Hou and Baishui Shengmu in exchange.'
Fang Baoyu said, 'Don't even think about it.'
Mulang Shenjun: "Do you have any other choice?" Mulang Shenjun's words left Fang Baoyu speechless.

Zhu Er, who had been hiding in the nearby bushes, saw this scene and her heart leaped into her throat. She knew that the man fighting the bandits was the same Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan from the Capital City. Zhu Er muttered to herself, 'Isn't that Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan? Why is he here?'
Huyan Dazang said, 'I'll take advantage of the chaos to capture him and ask.' The refugees were in a tough fight, and the black-robed man in the mask was none other than Fang Baoyu.
Fang Baoyu pointed the sword at Mulang Shenjun and said, 'Tell me, where is Wang Dian? Don't try any tricks.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_4680_4860.text: Zhang Dan said, "Don't mess around," "Think about it, Amber."
Zhang Dan: "You brought her just for this" "You are smarter than I thought"
Pierre and Zhang Dan locked eyes, Zhang Dan's arm was injured and bleeding. Pierre took out his gun and aimed at Zhang Dan, but suddenly a car drove over and shattered the glass.
Amber, sitting in the car, watched as Pierre walked further and further away. Eventually, she drove off in the opposite direction.

The scene shifts to a forest road, with Zhang Dan driving a car, the vehicle slowly approaching. Zhang Dan's face in the car was very serious, eyes occasionally looking towards the passenger seat, then turned back to look ahead, and the car slowly stopped.
Amber, with tears in her eyes, stared straight ahead, while Zhang Dan kept glancing at her. Amber suddenly asked, 'What are you looking at?'
Zhang Dan: "No, I can't understand" "You suddenly saved me and made me feel" "Maybe there's still a chance for us"
Amber said: 'Can I be with a thief?' 'A leopard can't change its spots'
Zhang Dan said, "I need to find the person who wronged me." "Without GAIA, he won't show up." "If he doesn't die, I won't have peace."
Zhang Dan, feeling guilty, lowered his head. Amber, unable to forgive, turned her head away. At this moment, Zhang Dan's hand began to bleed. Amber asked, "Are you okay?"
Zhang Dan: "I'm fine" "But you're in trouble now" "You're an accomplice"
The scene shifts to a car speeding through the forest. On the edge of a cliff, Zhang Dan and his group stand. Zhang Dan shouts, "Hey!"
The two reached the top of the mountain, Xiao Bao asked, "Hey, are you okay?"
Xiao Bao replied, "I'm okay"
Xiao Bao said, "There’s only one left."
Zhang Dan turned around and said, "You go with them first. I'll follow soon."
Ye Hong said, "I won't go with you"
Zhang Dan said, "Listen to me," "I need to talk to Uncle Gang." "I'll come back and explain after I'm done, okay?"
Zhang Dan said, "Go ahead."
Zhang Dan said, "I'm here," and Amber, seeing this, turned and ran. The mysterious people behind the trees were led by King Kong, with the car's trunk open and a bag of bombs placed inside.
Ye Hong stepped forward and said, "Zhang Dan," "you wouldn't forget your uncle because of this woman, would you?"
Zhang Dan looked at King Kong and said, "What you want is in my hand"
King Kong extended his hand and said, 'Give it to me'

movie101_6966492004553490981_5340_5520.text: JC sat down and said: "Scum."
Nine-headed Bird laughed and said: "I don't even need to leave this couch to kick your ass"
After hearing this, JC looked at the bottle in his hand, then put it down and said: "Let me see"
The two sat facing each other, neither willing to back down. They both kicked off their chairs, and the situation became tense. Their legs kept moving, and the atmosphere became even more awkward.
The two of them bounced back and forth on the sofa like billiard balls, and then Nine-headed Bird was hit by a sofa cushion thrown by JC. JC said: "You lost"
Nine-headed Bird said: "I'm still holding on". Then he lifted his leg and kicked towards JC. JC blocked it with his arm and then hit Nine-headed Bird's chest with his other hand, sending him flying.
The two quickly hid behind the sofa. As soon as they turned around, they were surrounded by the men in black. They stood back-to-back, ready to fight.

The two quickly got up, Nine-headed Bird wanted to continue the fight, but JC grabbed his arm and threw him a meter away. Then, Nine-headed Bird kicked towards JC, but JC blocked it with his leg. After several rounds, Nine-headed Bird's moves were all countered by JC.

Nine-headed Bird said: "You're really something, I've been waiting for a chance to fight you." The two started fighting on the sofa. Nine-headed Bird said: "I've been waiting for a chance to fight you."

The two continued to grapple, with Nine-headed Bird attempting a sweeping kick to JC's back, but JC countered by grabbing his ankle and slamming him onto the sofa. The two then started fighting on the sofa, with Nine-headed Bird delivering a flying kick that knocked JC to the ground. As they wrestled on the floor, Nine-headed Bird landed a punch on JC's face.

The two of them were pushing each other back and forth, neither of them could get close to the other. In a moment of crisis, Nine-headed Bird lifted his leg and stepped on the sofa, trying to find a new way to win. But as soon as he lifted his foot, he was kicked back by the other party. Then, Nine-headed Bird lay on the sofa, trying to move forward with his feet, but was quickly pushed back by JC.

Bonnie, who was nearby, was so angry that she knocked over the water cup in her hand. She kicked the chair next to her and rushed over. The bodyguards who were originally guarding Nine-headed Bird were also knocked down by the frenzied Bonnie. Seeing that the situation was not good, Nine-headed Bird turned and ran.

The cushion under Nine-headed Bird's body was kicked away by JC, causing him to fall to the ground. Then, he picked up the cushion and threw it back. When Nine-headed Bird caught it, he pretended to be injured and wailed. Seeing this, JC laughed and pointed at him, saying: "I'm still holding on"
Nine-headed Bird's underlings were about to act, but he stopped them with a wave of his hand.
Michael said to the bodyguards: "You can go now""Enjoy your vacation."
The vase replied: "Okay, goodbye."
Bonnie turned around, and the scene shifted to a prison guard bringing food to a convict. The convict was eating while playing with a Rubik's cube. The guard asked, "What are you doing?"
Michael came out from the ventilation duct, and said: "Just checking out these pieces of furniture"
After saying that, he threw the chair away and said: "Crude forgery"

Michael stood up and said: "If you two want to fight, go outside, okay? This is authentic, be careful." The two were about to scuffle when Michael stepped in to break it up. Michael said: "Position at eleven o'clock"
Michael walked over to Nine-headed Bird and said: "Old rules""You'll get your money tomorrow"
Michael walked up to them and said: "Your asking price is too high. We will discuss it when my dad comes."
JC: "I can give you a discount, but I want three people."
Michael asked in confusion: "What?"
JC turned to look at the two people behind him and said: "The three students locked up there"
Michael looked at the contract and said: "I don't understand what you mean"
Then he said: "Then I'll go prove it." After that, he walked towards the door, but two bodyguards stopped him.
JC turned around and said: "That will prove I'm right"
Michael said: "Then go prove it if you can"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4200_4380.text: Man said: "I really don't know. I was ordered to wait for him in South Chuan for a month, but he never showed up."
Fang Baoyu asked: "Whose orders?"
Man said: "Of course, it was the order of the chief."
Fang Baoyu asked: "What is the relationship between Wang Dian and the Forbidden Guards?"
Man said: "I really don't know that."
A green-clothed woman ran over and shouted: "Fang Baoyu!"
Fang Baoyu turned around and said: "Zhuer."
Huyan Dazang returned with the wine, looking at Fang Baoyu and Zhu Er, and said: "Why did you bring wine?"

Huyan Dazang: "Since I came to the Central Plains, I have been solely focused on seeking the sword, and often thought we would have a fight. I didn't expect to be fighting alongside you today, it’s delightful. Cheers."
Suddenly, there was a loud crash, and Fang Baoyu rushed out of the inn, only to see the innkeeper's family of three standing at the door, with Fang Baoyu picking up a handkerchief to wipe his hands.
Fang Baoyu: "At dawn tomorrow," "at the fortress gate," "Ben Yue's blood will be spilled on the yellow sand," "Mulang Deity."

The scene shifts to the military camp, where a wooden platform stands in the center, with a long table in front of it. On the platform, Ben Yue is tied to a wooden stake with ropes. Behind her are several rows of sharp blades, and below the platform are numerous soldiers. Mulang Shenjun sits at the head of the table, sipping tea, while the others stand behind him.

The scene shifts to Mulang Shenjun drinking a cup of tea, his expression serious. He had just put down his cup when he saw the two approaching, and his gaze became even colder. Ben Yue was still tied to the cross, looking extremely miserable.
Ben Yue: "Baoyu, don't come over! Don't come over, Baoyu!"
Mulang Shenjun's eyes were sharp, he looked at Zhu Er and said: "You are really loyal, coming here together to die."
Fang Baoyu: "I’m asking you one last time, will you release the person or not?"
Mulang Shenjun asked: "What do you think?" The three siblings of the Protectorate, Fang Baoyu, Huyan Dazang, and Mulang Shenjun, all had determined looks in their eyes.
Fang Baoyu and Mulang Shenjun leapt into the air, their swords colliding in mid-air. The force of their collision propelled them to spin several times before they could separate.

Fang Baoyu saw Mulang Shenjun's wife and children in the crowd and rushed forward, Mulang Shenjun quickly blocked him. The two of them fought together with the guards, and Fang Baoyu was still in the middle. He was about to get stabbed by Mulang Shenjun's sword.

Fang Baoyu's sword was as swift as a flying swallow, and his force was so great that it could directly knock Mulang Shenjun to the ground. The long sword was like a rainbow, pointing directly at Mulang Shenjun's head.
Bai Sankong was not to be outdone, he flipped Huyan Dazang over, and the two wrestled together, evenly matched.
The two fought evenly for a short time, but the advantage was clearly with Mulang Shenjun. The emperor's guard, although highly skilled, was no match for Mulang Shenjun.

The scene switches to the battlefield, where Mulang Shenjun and Fang Baoyu are fighting. The soldiers are all surrounding them, ready to fight. Mulang Shenjun and Fang Baoyu are both skilled fighters, and the battle is intense. The two are evenly matched, with no clear winner in sight.

movie101_7026623602615452196_4860_5040.text: Xiao Bao asked: "Did you bring the money for the goods?"
King Kong, with a triumphant smile, raised his cupped hands, signaling for Amber to hand over the goods. Seeing this, Zhang Dan gritted his teeth and said: "Give me the goods"
Amber turned around and said: "No, if you give it to him, you won't get another chance."
King Kong, with a smile, said: "Bring it here quickly"
Ye Hong said: "He is talking to me", Ye Hong suddenly pulled out a gun and aimed at Zhang Dan.
Xiao Bao said in shock: "Ye Hong, what are you doing"
Ye Hong, with a gun pointed at Pierre, said: "He invited me first"

Zhang Dan, with a grim expression, looked at King Kong. Seeing that Zhang Dan had no intention of shooting, King Kong smiled. Then, Zhang Dan's men fired three shots into the sky. King Kong said: "Take her with you"
Zhang Dan turned around and saw the helicopter slowly approaching. He signaled to stop the helicopter with a wave of his hand.
The police cars were driving in a convoy, escorting the convoy to the helicopter.

Amber, unwilling to be caught, took the opportunity to escape. King Kong, who was driving, was suddenly stopped by the police, but he remained calm and continued driving towards the destination. King Kong said to Amber in the car: "Don't betray me when you get in""She is in my hands"
King Kong got off the helicopter and called out to Xiao Bao: "Xiao Bao, Spider."
The car continued to plummet, and the two men inside were still fighting. The car was about to crash into the forest below.
The police cars slowly surrounded them, and the police began to shout: "Hands up, lay on the ground, immediately"
Zhang Dan, seeing Amber's state, said to King Kong: "Go first, we have to find her."
Xiao Bao asked: "What about you"
Zhang Dan said: "Just jump."
Pierre, seeing this, also jumped off the cliff. The police immediately started a search for him.
The scene shifts to a police station, where Xiao Bao is handcuffed to a table. Zhang Dan walked in, leaned on the table, and asked, "Still refusing to cooperate and confess?"
Pierre walked to the door and said to King Kong: "You have five minutes"
Pierre said: "Okay," and then closed the door.
The scene switches to a police interrogation room, where Xiao Bao is sitting at the table. A man in black asks: "Where is GAIA? I know it's in the hands of your chief King Kong."
Zhang Dan said to the security guard: "Go have a rest"
Inside the interrogation room, Zhang Dan was sitting opposite Pierre. Pierre asked, "Where is he?"
Zhang Dan replied: "I don't know"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3780_3960.text: The police said, "Okay then."
The police asked: "Have you eaten?"
Guo Zi said, "Not yet."

Guo Zi paced back and forth in front of the car, occasionally glancing at the missing person notice from the previous day. The notice stated that the person had been kidnapped 17 hours ago. Guo Zi got into the car, started the engine, and the missing person notice was immediately pasted on the windshield.
Guo Zi replied: "Got it, I'll be right there."
The police said, "This is Xing Feng, I've spotted the suspect's vehicle."
Guo Zi asked, "Is there anyone in the car?"
The police said, "No, but we didn't have prior knowledge of this kiln, and we're not clear on which building he lives in."
Captain General said, "Okay, our people will be there soon."
The person on the phone asked: "Do you want it, do you want it?"
Captain General said, "Hold on, I'm thinking."
The person on the other end of the phone said: "Do you want it? Do you want it?"
Mr. Wu asked, "Brother Cang, after winning the money this hand, are you still going to gamble?"
Brother Cang, eating instant noodles, said, "That's my life."
Da Wei asked, "Which one should I play?"
Mr. Wu said, "I don't know this very well, I'm not familiar with it."
Guo Zi said, "Go with your gut, go with your gut, go with your gut."
Mr. Wu pointed to one of the cards and said, "This one."
The fat man played the cards and said, "A pair of kings."
Da Wei said, "A bomb, huh." "Three, four, five, six, seven, huh." "Pairs of tens."
Da Wei asked, "What's going on?"
Mr. Wu asked, "What kind of cards are those, how would I know about a bomb?"
Da Wei turned to Mr. Wu and said, "You don't know about a bomb? Didn't you once play the God of Gamblers? Is that appropriate?"
Mr. Wu said, "Is it interesting to talk like that? I played a cop, did I arrest you, right?"
Brother Cang said, "Shuffle."
The scene shifts to the street, where the police are monitoring the suspects. Captain General is crouching behind a car, observing the movements of the people at the scene.
The person on the other end of the phone said: "Hey Chao, where are you?" "Ah, okay, hurry up."
The man in the passenger seat said, "Brother, that shot at Dong Zi today was accurate."
Wei Da said: "I thought you forgot." "Don't forget to treat me to a meal, huh?"
The driver in the car said: "Thank you."
The police said, "Alright, let's discuss the situation here."

The police said, "Hua Zi is definitely going down to withdraw money today. There's only one exit from this community. We'll set an ambush in the courtyard and take him down directly when he comes out."
The police said, "This environment is too complicated, too many people, and Hua Zi has a gun. More importantly, he has grenades."

At this moment, Mr. Wu also arrived at the agreed place. He looked around but did not see anyone. He turned and walked a few steps forward, then turned back. He looked around again and then walked forward. A man who was throwing garbage in the alley saw him and waved at him.
At this moment, Guo Zi, who had just arrived, was ambushed by a group of people. He was pinned to the ground and beaten. Seeing this, Captain General immediately turned and ran.

Guo Zi and Captain General hid behind a car, while Brother Cang hid behind an electrical pole, all moving very cautiously. The three of them cooperated seamlessly, successfully ambushing the thugs behind the car.

The drug dealers on the second floor saw Guo Zi hiding behind the car and immediately started shooting. Brother Cang and Captain General quickly got into the car. Guo Zi shouted, "Hey, Li branch," and then the car bomb at the entrance of the snack street was detonated.
The police said, "You have a better handle on the situation on-site. If there is danger to the public, do not engage inside the community."

movie101_7173948149160116773_420_600.text: Li Xiaoran said: "It's not a duel, it's a beating."
Huyan Dacang drew his sword and struck Li Xiaoran's neck. The rest shouted: "Let's go, let's go, let's go, let's go."
Zhu Er asked: "Why did you kill him?"
Huyan Dacang looked at Zhu Er and said: "Didn't you want to kill him just now?"

Zhu Er said: "I didn't mean for you to kill him! That's not what I meant!" Zhu Er realized he misspoke, quickly tried to calm himself, and said: "How am I supposed to explain this to others?" Zhu Er tried to stop him, saying: "Where are you going?"
Huyan Dacang said: 'I have other things to do. I helped you kill him. You helped bandage my wound. We owe each other nothing.'
Zhu Er said: "What do you mean, owe each other nothing?" "Everyone saw you kill him for me." "What am I supposed to do? What should I do?"
Huyan Dacang looked at Zhu Er and said: "He deserved to die."

Zhu Er pushed Huyan Dacang out the door and said: "I'm going to follow you. You have to help me explain. You killed the person. It has nothing to do with me. Otherwise, people will think I'm your accomplice. I couldn't clear my name even if I jumped into the Yellow River."

Marquis read the letter aloud: "My Lord, upon reading this letter, I fear my days are numbered. I have no other attachments in this life. I only leave my daughter Bai Yanzhu's son. I earnestly request that the Lord take him in and pass on martial arts to him."
Servant clasped his hands and said: "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."
Purple Marquis looked at the woman and said: "Your grandfather wants me to take you as a disciple."

Servant said: "Hurry and bow to your master." Fang Baoyu hurriedly bowed. After the servant left, Fang Baoyu whispered to Servant: "I have never seen such a cruel master." After saying this, Fang Baoyu left with a smile.
Zhu Er sat down and said: "The sea breeze is strong here, we must be near the sea."
Zhu Er asked: "What are you planning to do?"
Huyan Dacang was silent for a while, then said: "You should leave."
Zhu Er said: "How many times do I have to tell you, you killed Li Xiaoran, I have no way to survive if I go back."
Huyan Dacang said: "I'm going to a duel this time." "My life is uncertain." "Thank you for taking care of me these past few days." "Please, go back."
Zhu Er said: "If you keep fighting like this, one day you'll die."
Huyan Dacang lowered his head and said: "To die for the way of the sword, I have no regrets."
Zhu Er asked: "What about your family?"
Huyan Dacang said: "I have no family."
Zhu Er said: "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."
Huyan Dacang laughed and said: "Friend?" "Speaking of friends, you're the only one."
Zhu Er stood up and said: "I won't let you leave."
Huyan Dacang said: "If you keep talking, I will kill you too."
Zhu Er, seeing Huyan Dacang's determination, angrily said: "You would even kill friends."
In the room, Brother Wang stood up and said: "My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request."
Purple Marquis said: "I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world."

Brother Wang said: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"
Purple Marquis said: 'Brother Wang, to be honest, I really don't enjoy the days filled with fighting and killing, moreover, what if I were the best in the world at martial arts.'
Brother Wang said: "I would like to show the Marquis something." "Please."
Servant turned around and said: "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

movie101_6966492004553490981_5520_5700.text: After hearing this, JC looked at Michael and said: "I will prove it." Then he turned and left.
The security guards chased after him, shouting: "Stop him," "Stop him," "Stop him."

The security guards chased after him, and as he ran, he grabbed the railing and jumped to the other side. The security guards followed closely, and as they turned the corner, JC immediately jumped to the other side. The security guards were one step too slow and accidentally kicked the railing.

The security guard was caught off guard by this and was kicked to the ground. JC seized the opportunity to punch and kick, knocking down one guard after another. He then flipped over the railing and landed on the lower level.

The bodyguard, who was originally standing on the square pillar, was kicked by JC to the ground. He then rolled off the edge of the rooftop and crashed heavily onto a wooden box below, which shattered upon impact.

At this moment, a man in a suit walked out from the teleportation room. He was holding a hat in his left hand and wore black gloves. As soon as he stepped out, a group of people rushed in from all directions. They were all armed and shouted, "He's here. Surround him."

The men in black were chasing after him relentlessly, so he quickly ran up the stairs to the second floor, and then to the third floor. He looked around and saw a door, which he hurriedly opened and went in, closing it behind him. The men in black were still chasing him, so he had to run again. He went into a room full of scientific equipment, and the men in black followed him in.

The two men in black were still chasing him, and in a blink of an eye, JC found himself cornered in a corner. He kicked over a nearby table and grabbed the long-handled vase on top of it. Then, he smashed it towards the glass door. The security guard was knocked unconscious by the vase, and as the glass door opened, JC said to the guard: "Help me open the door, quick."

The security guard was knocked down by a punch from JC, and then JC slid down the handrail on the first floor, successfully dodging the enemy's firepower. However, he was still cornered by the enemies surrounding him.

The henchmen who were originally blocking the two sides of the stairs were knocked down one by one. At this time, a few more henchmen ran over from the other side of the stairs. JC quickly dodged the incoming attacks and grabbed the arms of two people and kicked them together, forming a chain and knocking down a bunch of people.
Michael said: "JC, what have you proven now?"
Bonnie, seeing the security guards rushing over, quickly jumped down from the second floor. JC, who was being attacked, pushed a wooden crate onto the guards.

The robbers scattered in panic, and the two seized the opportunity to escape. The police chased after them, and the workers who had been scared away by the fight returned. The two stood there, panting heavily.

The two immediately started fighting with the security guards. One of the guards was kicked to the ground by JC, and the other was punched in the face by the master. The two cooperated seamlessly, with the master handling the guards' gunpowder while JC dealt with the guards rushing up the stairs.
Bonnie said: "I soothed a bit of my rage."
Bonnie stood up and looked at Jil, Jil put down her raised hands, and Michael said: "Nine-headed bird, figure something out."

Jil said: "Let's see how capable you are", Jil immediately rushed forward, throwing a punch at Bonnie, but was dodged and countered with a kick to the chest. Jil was sent flying due to the kick, and then was repeatedly punched in the face by Bonnie.

The two were evenly matched for the time being, neither gaining the upper hand. Jil kept attacking, but Bonnie kept defending. Eventually, Jil's attack forced Bonnie to retreat to a chair. Bonnie tried to use the chair to turn the tide of the fight, but was still kicked off by Jil. Jil then used a sweeping kick to make Bonnie kneel on the ground.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5040_5220.text: Zhang Dan said: "I know how to find him" "Without me, you won't be able to find him"
Pierre asked: "What about Amber?" Zhang Dan did not respond, just stared at Pierre. The corner of Pierre's mouth twitched, and Zhang Dan leaned forward slightly.
Zhang Dan said: 'I need to leave here first, rescue Amber, and then deal with King Kong. If we let King Kong escape this time, after he sells 'GAIA', we will never be able to find him again, never.'
Pierre asked: "Why should I trust you?"
Zhang Dan said: "Do you have any other choice?"
Pierre thought for a moment and said: "The only condition" "Bring back 'GAIA'."

Zhang Dan stared at him with fierce eyes, and Pierre, who was used to dealing with criminals, was not afraid of this iron-willed man. The two remained silent for a while, Zhang Dan suddenly grabbed Pierre's hand, but Pierre pulled it back as soon as it was grasped. The two stared at each other for a long time, and finally, Zhang Dan let go of his hand.

The scene shifted to dawn, with the camera circling a towering statue. The statue, with its back to us, held a sword in one hand and a shield in the other. The base of the statue was inscribed with the words 'Liberty'.
The scene shifts to an abandoned factory. The factory is dilapidated, with broken walls and overgrown weeds. Two cars stopped in the open space, and a man got out of the car.

The scene shifted to a warehouse. Amber was tied to a chair. King Kong walked down the stairs, with a group of people standing behind him. Ye Hong was brushing his teeth on a wooden box, and Xiao Bao was standing with his hands in his pockets.
King Kong walked over to the table, opened the briefcase, and inside was a diamond necklace, which was the same one Ye Hong had admired in the store.
King Kong took out his phone from his pocket, and Ye Hong leaned against the wall, smiling at him. Suddenly, a large black spider crawled out from a gap in the wall.
King Kong said: "The buyer has arrived" "Keep an eye on her"
Ye Hong, who was drinking by the side, put down the bottle and followed him, saying: "Uncle Jiang, I'll be right there."
King Kong said: "Sharper." The camera switched to a closer view, and Zhang Dan's face appeared on the screen. He was staring intently at the monitor, with Xiao Bao sitting beside him.
Zhang Dan handed the walkie-talkie to Xiao Bao, who was beside him, and said to him: "I'll go up. You stay here."
Xiao Bao asked: "Hey, about Ye Hong" "So what exactly is our plan now?"
Zhang Dan said: "Plan B." Zhang Dan looked out the window and saw that the signal jammer had already been set up around the venue. Xiao Bao nodded in response.

Xiao Bao looked at the camera in his hand, then raised his head to look at the surveillance screen. He then put on a pair of gloves, took the camera, and went to the backyard of the building. He cut the lock on the door with a pair of pliers and entered the building.
Zhang Dan arrived at the agreed location, where a mysterious person was waiting. This person was setting up signal jammers on a van. When Zhang Dan got off the car, he greeted them: "Hi."
Xiao Bao, who was about to close the door, suddenly turned around and asked, "Why?" "Why did you choose King Kong?"
Ye Hong replied: "He saved my life. There are many things we just can't choose."

movie101_6966492004553490981_5700_5880.text: The security guard, using the advantage of the long stick, kicked towards JC's knee. Taking advantage of the guard's off-guard moment, JC threw a flurry of punches. The security guard was pinned against the wall by JC. In a flash, he grabbed a few rolls of fabric and covered the security guard with them.

The security guard fell to the ground, and the two hurriedly ran to the table. The two pills that had been swallowed by the bodyguard suddenly appeared in the air. JC threw the pills into his mouth and said, "You're not going anywhere."

Bonnie quickly got up and ran towards the stairs, but Jil was one step faster and grabbed her ankle. Bonnie kneeed her in the chest, then lifted her leg and pulled hard, causing Jil to sit on the stairs. Jil held onto the railing with one hand and pulled hard, causing Bonnie to lose balance and fall down the stairs.

Jil looked up at Bonnie on the railing above, then extended a hand to signal her to descend. After receiving the signal, Bonnie carefully stepped down from the pillar, while Bonnie extended a hand to signal her to descend. After receiving the signal, Bonnie carefully stepped down from the pillar.

Jil, who was originally standing on a wooden box, saw Bonnie charging and immediately jumped down to the ground. Bonnie kicked towards Jil, who blocked it with her hands. Then, Bonnie kicked Jil's leg, sending her flying. As Jil was about to get up, she was kicked into a pile of boxes by Bonnie. Michael said to Nine-headed Bird, "Nine-headed bird, go deal with him."
Nine-headed Bird said, "That's not fair! Ganging up on one person is despicable. A one-on-one fight is the true measure of fairness."

Bonnie and Jil were still fighting. Jil kicked at Bonnie, but Bonnie countered with a sweeping kick to her waist. Jil was caught off guard and fell to the ground. Meanwhile, JC was grappling with an enemy, trying to control his waist. The enemy broke free and lifted JC, slamming him heavily to the ground.
The two of them cooperated seamlessly, knocking down the last security guard and successfully protecting the Dragon-Headed Vase. The battle was over in just a few moves.
The bodyguards who rushed over were instantly eliminated. The temperature inside the boiler continued to rise, and the gauges were off the charts. The entire boiler room was in chaos.
The workers were scared and scattered. The gauges reached the critical point, and the glass in the display cabinet started to crack.

The bodyguards, seeing the situation was bad, ran towards the door, but the entrance was blocked by a large trolley. So they had to run to the other side, but they were still attacked by JC. One bodyguard even got his leg caught in the gap and dragged around.

The bodyguards, who were originally standing in a line, immediately scattered in all directions. Seeing this, the man in black quickly hid under a table. However, he was kicked by JC under the table, and his head hit a light bulb. The light bulb shattered upon impact, and the man in black was knocked unconscious by the force.

The security guards rushed into the photo studio, but as soon as they entered, they were knocked down by the large umbrella in JC's hand. All the security guards were knocked down one by one. In a blink of an eye, all the security guards had fallen to the ground, and the large umbrella was retracted.
The bodyguards, wielding long sticks, formed a circle and rushed at him, but JC easily dodged them.

The bodyguards, who were originally numerous and powerful, were no match for the two who were already exhausted. They were knocked down one by one by the two, and soon there were only two left. The two formed a tight formation and rushed towards them.

The bodyguard, seeing his companion fall, raised his club to strike at JC. JC dodged and then lifted a picture frame to block the next attack. The bodyguard pushed the frame aside and kicked at JC, who dodged and kicked away the studio light behind him.
Suddenly, he felt a sharp pain in his heart. He touched his chest and staggered to the door, where he saw a poster on the wall. He ran over and looked at it in disbelief, saying, "Wow, so ugly."

movie101_7026623602615452196_5220_5400.text: Ye Hong said: "It's beyond our control."
Zhang Dan, who had been hiding in the shadows, cautiously surveyed his surroundings. The place was full of clutter, with a small table in the center and a dummy head placed on it.
Zhang Dan turned around and saw the empty bottle of red wine on the table. He squatted down and stared at the bottle, recalling the events leading up to the accident.

He took off the mask, revealing a realistic face underneath. He compared the two masks and found that the one with the realistic face was actually more beautiful. He then put the mask back on the stand, his eyes wandering over the other two masks. He chose the one with the furrowed brows and a slightly open mouth, which seemed to express anger.

Zhang Dan was puzzled, but he had to follow the clues one by one. He found a hollow wooden doll with a woman's face painted on it. The hollow inside the doll was filled with a card reader. At this moment, King Kong appeared behind him.
King Kong said, "The world speaks of balance." "Everything has cause and effect." "There's cause, then there's effect." "There's me, then there's you."
Zhang Dan smiled and said, "It's been five years. Haven't I given you enough?"
King Kong said: "How can you use the word 'repay' with family?" "Then, how would you repay her?"
King Kong said: "Great, everyone is here. A family reunion."
King Kong said: "Alright, I'll tell you. The matryoshka doll behind you, it's a remote bomb. The sensor is in 'GAIA'. Once our deal is done and 'GAIA' is one kilometer away, it will explode."
King Kong, with a laugh, turned around and left, then turned back and said: "This is the chance I'm giving you to 'repay' her for a lifetime." After speaking, he looked at Amber.
King Kong said: "Guard here and don't let them play tricks. I'll call you when the deal is done. Wait for me downstairs, understand?"
Ye Hong looked at Zhang Dan with a smile in his eyes, King Kong patted his shoulder, and then he walked towards Amber.

Ye Hong and Xiao Bao were forced to slowly back away, while King Kong and Zhang Dan walked towards them with guns. The two groups approached each other with guns drawn, the atmosphere extremely tense.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4380_4560.text: Fang Baoyu jumped up and kicked at Mu Lang, but Mu Lang dodged to the side. Seeing this, Mu Lang also jumped up and kicked at Fang Baoyu, who blocked it with his arm.
Mu Lang was about to strike with his knife when Fang Baoyu and Ben Yue leapt down from above, their blades aimed at Mu Lang's vital points. Mu Lang was forced to retreat.

Mu Lang was not weak either, he spun around and slashed at Fang Baoyu's back. Fang Baoyu dodged in time, and then the two fought back and forth, it was really hard to distinguish the winner for the time being.

Mu Lang's gaze softened slightly, but he still did not show any signs of backing down. He looked at Fang Baoyu with a determined look, then turned and walked towards the soldiers. Before leaving, he gave Ben Yue one last look. Ben Yue's eyes were filled with worry and reluctance.

Mu Lang picked up the sword from the ground and pointed it at Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu was shocked and dodged backwards, but was still hit by the sword and flew towards the wooden stake where Ben Yue was tied.

The sword stuck in the ground seemed to have some magical power, attracting all the soldiers around it. They surrounded Fang Baoyu and swung their swords at him. Fang Baoyu was not weak either, he spun around and kicked off the ground, flying into the air. While in the air, he drew his sword and cut the ropes tied to the flagpoles.

Yan Zhu took the opportunity to escape, but was pursued by a large group of soldiers. Purple Marquis used his sword to hook onto the spears of two soldiers and flung them at another soldier who was charging at him.
Purple Marquis was also entangled by several soldiers, his sword skills were great, but he was outnumbered and was knocked down by a soldier with a long spear.

Yan Zhu swung her sleeves, and the soldiers who were just standing in place were cut into pieces. The soldiers in front of her were also knocked down one by one. Ben Yue was shocked by the scene in front of her.
Bai Sankong used his sword to block Huyan Dazang's attack, then lifted him up with a shoulder throw. Yan Zhu swung the ribbon, wrapping it around Huyan Dazang's neck.
Yan Zhu landed and looked at Purple Marquis fighting fiercely, feeling a sense of familiarity.
Purple Marquis ran over and asked, "Yan Zhu, Yan Zhu, are you alright?"
Mu Lang jumped down from the eaves and tried to attack Yan Zhu, but was blocked by Purple Marquis in mid-air.
Mu Lang and Ben Yue were also knocked down by the incoming soldiers. The two who were originally in the lead were also defeated. The soldiers shouted: "Quick, kill them."
Fang Baoyu said to Huyan Dazang: "Go"
The soldiers who had been ambushing outside the city tower quickly followed them, and the pursuers and the pursued were in a hurry, with the soldiers behind gaining ground.
The flower girls were scared and scattered in all directions. Yan Zhu shouted: "Stop!"

Duchess Tuo Chen leaped down from the pavilion, and Mu Lang also jumped down from the pavilion. The soldiers put away their spears and looked at each other in surprise. Both of them stood up straight and looked at each other, their eyes filled with admiration.
Duchess Tuo Chen rushed into the stable, and Purple Marquis also followed. They found Yan Zhu collapsed on the ground, and Purple Marquis shouted: "Yan Zhu"

movie101_6991751088659497479_3960_4140.text: The police said: "This neighborhood is not suitable for capture."
The scene shifts to Chen Chen's room, where a magazine full of beautiful women is thrown on the bed. Chen Chen said, "Can you stop putting this here every time?"
Zhang Hua: "What"
Chen Chen, in a frenzy, reached out to grab the phone, and the two began to wrestle. Zhang Hua said: "Give it to me."
Chen Chen struggled and said, "Let go."

Zhang Hua said, "Such a mood killer." After the argument, Zhang Hua went to the bathroom to take a shower. He turned on the faucet, then turned off the tap, and placed the gun on the bathroom shelf. He leaned against the wall and yawned.
Guo Zi walked to the back of the car, pulled out the jack from the spare tire, and began tightening the screws with a wrench.
Guo Zi walked to the front of the car, bent down, and crawled under the car. Inside the house, Chen Chen was tidying up the bed and asked Zhang Hua who was showering, "Will you come back?"
Zhang Hua: "Come back"
Chen Chen: "When will you come back? In a while, a day, or half a month?" Chen Chen took out a gun and pointed it at Zhang Hua.

Zhang Hua: "Don't play with the gun needlessly." Zhang Hua bent down to pick up the gun on the table and put it in his pocket. Chen Chen looked at the gun in Zhang Hua's hand, then at the empty spot next to him, instinctively pulling back. Zhang Hua sat down beside Chen Chen, wrapping his arm around her shoulder.
Zhang Hua took the coat and said: "Let me tell you" "If I die" "Give birth to the child" "Let him be with my mother" "Okay?"
Chen Chen said: "If you die, I won't give birth to your child."
Zhang Hua pointed at Chen Chen and said: "I'm not joking with you."

Chen Chen pushed Zhang Hua away and grabbed the clothes from his hand. Zhang Hua was stunned, then grabbed Chen Chen's hair and pushed her towards the bed. Chen Chen struggled desperately, and Zhang Hua laughed and walked out of the room. The two of them laughed and talked as they left the house and got into the car. The police chased after them all the way.
Chen Dewen reported to Mr. Su: "The target is out." "The target is out."

The police car blocked the black car, and the police upstairs saw Zhang Hua's figure and immediately notified downstairs. The police downstairs said: "He's in the car." "He's in the car." "Someone upstairs just waved goodbye to him." "Seems like a woman."
The man outside the car took the phone and said: "His car is moving, I'll follow now, you guys be on alert outside."
The driver said: "I'm sorry, very sorry."
The driver of the car she hit: "Hurry up and go."
The driver of the car she hit: "Alright."
Li Jiehui, who was on the phone at the police station, said: "Make sure to keep an eye on him."

The police said: "Don't worry, we'll get him today." The police car sped through the streets, while Xing Feng was driving and making a phone call. The car sped through the streets, with Xing Feng looking around for the suspect,
Liu Wei said: "This bastard is intentionally circling around." "Xing Feng, stop following."
Zhang Hua said: "Alright, I'll head straight. Guo Zi, you take over."

The police said: "Roger that." After saying that, the police hung up the phone. The taxi drove onto the overpass, and Xing Feng, who had just finished a day's work, was already very tired. He yawned and rested his head on the window, gazing drowsily at the night view outside.
Li Jiehui: "You don't need to first"
Zhang Hua said: "You don't need to tell me the location first. I want to see my friend Mr. Wu."
Zhang Hua said: "He's in my car. We'll exchange him for the money soon."
The driver replied: "Just a couple more blocks, and his tire will be flat."
Liu Wei: "I'm waiting at the next intersection"
Zhang Hua: "No problem."
The person on the other end of the phone said: "He's stalling on the phone, hasn't given me the address for the money yet."
Police: "You're circling around so much"

movie101_6966492004553490981_5880_6060.text: The photos on the wall were of JC in various poses. Michael shouted: "What are you waiting for?" "Catch him"
The man in the suit shouted: "It's about to explode, it's about to blow - run for it, run!"
The powerful blast sent the entire second floor of the research institute tumbling down, and everyone in the institute was knocked down by the fierce wind and flying debris.
The glass in the room shattered, and the tables and chairs were swept away by the strong wind. The two people rolled on the ground trying to find cover.
At this moment, JC was climbing the stairs with the support of the handrail. He reached the top and saw Jil sitting on the ground. He quickly rushed over and asked: "Wu Qing" "Are you guys okay?"
Foreigner shouted: "Martin". Michael and Nine-headed Bird got up and walked towards the control panel.

The scene shifts to the second floor, where the four people who were fighting the mummies have already been captured by the real estate brokers. They are all looking around in confusion. At this moment, the real estate brokers are rushing over, and Michael sees them coming and immediately runs away. Michael: "Michael"
The staff upstairs saw the situation and quickly fled downstairs, and then the two of them also ran inside the hall.
Jil said: "I'm fine here."
Foreigner turned around and shouted: "Lawrence"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Purple Marquis held Yan Zhu in his arms, and Yan Zhu said: 'Purple Marquis'
Yan Zhu said: 'Purple Marquis, am I about to die?' 'I really didn't expect my father to still be alive.'
Purple Marquis said: "You will be fine, trust me, you will be fine."

Yan Zhu, who had been falsely accused of being a concubine, was gravely injured by the poisoned arrow and lost all sensation in her body. Purple Marquis, who had been waiting for her response, was deeply moved by her sacrifice, and said: "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"
Purple Marquis said: "Do not come any closer."
Purple Marquis said: "She is really my daughter."
Purple Marquis drew his sword and pointed at Bai Sankong, asking: 'What are you doing here?' 'So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead.' 'What do you want?'

Yan Zhu said: "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"
Bai Sankong took out a wooden tub from his bosom and said: 'If you still recognize me as your father, then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too.'
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong stood up and left, leaving only Fang Baoyu standing in front of the door, frowning and staring at Yan Zhu.
Yan Zhu said: 'I am Fang Baoyu.'

Yan Zhu chased after Fang Baoyu, saying: 'Fang Baoyu, no, Fang Baoyu.'
Purple Marquis held Yan Zhu back and said: "Calm down."
Da Zang said: "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Purple Marquis turned to Da Zang and said, 'Da Zang, this matter also concerns you. Please don't leave yet.'
Da Zang said, 'I am from Penglai, this family matter has nothing to do with me.' Yan Zhu, hearing this, was stunned, and then leaned into Purple Marquis's arms.
Yan Zhu, looking into the distance, said, 'That swordsman Huo Feiteng died under your master's sword.'
Da Zang asked, 'What evidence do you have?'

Yan Zhu, looking at Da Zang, said, 'Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?'
Da Zang replied, 'Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains.'
Yan Zhu stepped forward and said, 'You said the jade pendant you carry is the only thing your father left you, right?'

Yan Zhu, holding back tears, said, 'The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom. You've always treated it as a talisman. Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection, and I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old. The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s. I don't know how your master took you to Penglai, but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me. You are my child.'
Da Zang turned his head and said, 'So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it.'
Da Zang, seeing the two about to collide, hurriedly stepped forward to separate them, then stood behind Yan Zhu, comforting her gently.

Yan Zhu was moved to tears by this scene. She knew that the man before her was the one she had been longing for. But she also knew that even if she were to leave with Purple Marquis today, she would never be able to return to her hometown.
Bai Sankong's fingers danced lightly on the strings, and before long, a tune was born.
Mulang Shenjun said, 'Bai Sankong, you're in quite high spirits today.'
Bai Sankong, with a smile, invited them to sit. When they did, Bai Sankong asked, 'May I have the honor of hearing you play a piece today?'
Bai Sankong replied, 'The ancients played the zither for their own amusement, not for others. I’m just playing by myself today. However, I know you appreciate good music, sir.'

movie101_7026623602615452196_5580_5760.text: Ye Hong was taken away by Zhang Dan, and Yurik and his men were ready to fight at any time.

Zhang Dan: "These are your rules, not suitable for me."

Zhang Dan said: "The Eastern European guy was arranged by you, you also killed him."
Ye Hong, with tears in her eyes, pulled the trigger, but the bullet did not fly. King Kong said, "You shot me."

Ye Hong: "This is the question I should be asking you, right?" Zhang Dan slowly raised the gun, pressing it against King Kong's forehead. King Kong stared at him without flinching. Zhang Dan's eyes were determined, but there was a hint of hesitation.
