movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Supervisor said, 'I'm just here for the fun.'
Bai Sankong said, 'However, since the Supervisor has said so, if I don't give face, it would be too disrespectful.'
Supervisor, with a smile on his face, watched the master intently.
The two looked at each other and then at the lute. Bai Sankong nodded, and Supervisor began to play.
Supervisor looked up at Bai Sankong, and the two gazed at each other for a long time. Bai Sankong then started playing the zither.
Supervisor said, 'Bai Sankong, using this much force, aren't you afraid of destroying this ancient Song Dynasty zither?'
Bai Sankong said, 'Unexpectedly, it seems even you, esteemed sir, understand zithers.'

Supervisor said, 'The satin patterns on the zither face must be snake belly stripes, right? It should be from the Tang or Song Dynasty. Bai Sankong, using such a precious zither, must have a high level of mastery.'
Bai Sankong said, 'Supervisor, you truly are an expert. Come, come, let me play a tune.'
Supervisor said, 'Bai Sankong, be careful, if you destroy this zither, it would be a great pity.'

Bai Sankong said, 'It won't come to that.' Just as Bai Sankong was about to place his hand on the lute, Supervisor grabbed it and then struck his head with the flat of his hand. Bai Sankong was stunned, and Supervisor took the opportunity to push him down and straddled him.
Supervisor, with a swift move, forced Bai Sankong to retreat. He then used the strings of the zither to trap Bai Sankong's hand, flipping him over with great force.
Supervisor was about to approach Bai Sankong when another long stick flew towards him. He dodged it and then leaped up, kicking the stick away.
The two were evenly matched for the time being, and after several exchanges, neither could gain the upper hand.
Bai Sankong, seeing this, was extremely angry. He drew his sword and pointed it at the ground. Bai Sankong said, 'What, Supervisor, do you want to leave?'

Supervisor leaped up and kicked the crossbow from Bai Sankong's hand, then stepped on the crossbow and leaped onto the arrow tower. Bai Sankong was stunned, and Supervisor seized the opportunity to run to the edge of the arrow tower.
Supervisor said, 'Bai Sankong, I have already mastered the Ultimate Unyielding Technique. You can't hurt me; take your playing to the King of Hell.'

Bai Sankong, seeing this, quickly got up and swung his guqin like a weapon, using it to block the sword in Supervisor's hand. Then, he used the strings of the guqin as weapons, entangling them around Supervisor's neck.

The two stood on the platform, each with their own thoughts. Bai Sankong's expression grew more serious as he listened to the sounds coming through his ears. The sounds were coming from the strings of the lute, clear and pure, like a torrential rain, with the strings vibrating rapidly, as if they were about to break apart.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6240_6420.text: At this moment, the two were in a stalemate, neither daring to relax. The ground was getting closer and closer, and they were both preparing to land. Jil, who had no other choice, suddenly extended a hand and pushed against the dragon's chest. The dragon, which was not smart, fell straight down with no resistance.

The three of them were falling in the sky, and the coach suddenly took out a dragon head from his arms. He held the dragon head towards the ground, and the rope tied to the dragon head pulled him down.

At this moment, the team members behind him had already formed a circle. Following that, they executed a rear somersault. In the air, the team members used their limbs to continuously rotate and change positions. At this moment, the team members behind him had already formed a circle. Following that, they executed a rear somersault. In the air, the team members used their limbs to continuously rotate and change positions.

At this moment, the two were completely separated, with JC holding the rope and flying towards Jil. Seeing this, Jil quickly unbuckled his waist and extended his arms to stabilize himself, but he was still uncontrollably approaching JC.
At this moment, the other three members of the Blue Lake team also reached the altitude set by JC. After throwing away their parachutes, they quickly gathered around Jil.

The two people who were originally 10 meters apart, after several rounds of rolling, had become less than 3 meters apart. The man in black reached out to grab the man in white, but was shaken off again.
The man in the yellow suit, JC, was also thrown out. In mid-air, the two were circling each other, with the man in the black suit preparing to tackle him.

At this moment, the two were in a free fall. JC took the initiative to approach Jil, and with a flip of his wrist, he kicked Jil away. Then, he took advantage of the air current and flipped back to the ground.
Unexpectedly, the parachute did not open, and the two were about to fall from the sky.

The two were still entangled in mid-air, with Jil being pushed to the disadvantage. She was forced to change her body orientation, rolling from head to toe. The air around her was filled with the screams of spectators. She saw the ground getting closer and closer, and in a flash, she was caught by JC.
The two people who were originally free-falling suddenly started to fight, and the parachute deployed in time. JC said: "Wake up, wake up, go save her."

The two were still entangled in mid-air, with JC taking the initiative to grab Jil's leg and throw her towards the ground. Jil, unwilling to give up, rolled over and counterattacked, knocking JC off balance and causing her to fall towards the ground. Just as she was about to hit the ground, a parachute opened behind her, and she was pulled back into the air. JC took the opportunity to escape, flipping over and landing on the ground.

The person on the walkie-talkie said: 'The dragon head is out of hand and is falling towards the volcano crater.' The female reporter and the male reporter in the helicopter were shocked. The pilot quickly turned the plane around. The two people in the plane were still filming with their cameras.
The plane flew over the Andes mountains, and the two people on the plane, JC and Jil, successfully deployed their parachutes. They then slid towards the ground.

The instructor, seeing this, quickly stepped forward, intending to take over the parachute deployment. However, the strong wind made it difficult for him to move. In the critical moment, the instructor couldn't react in time, and the bomb fell from the sky due to the strong wind.

The female reporter continues: 'They have reached the minimum altitude for opening parachutes,' 'but none have opened theirs yet,' 'the situation is very critical.' The parachutes of the three people deployed in succession.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Mu Lang's eyes were fierce, and he swung his knife at Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong blocked with his hand and then kicked Mu Lang away.
Bai Sankong said: 'I'm old, can't do it anymore. Didn't expect to lose to Mu Lang.'
Baoyu said, 'Grandpa, stop talking, just lie down and rest.' Bai Sankong was lying on the bed, with Baoyu squatting beside him, gently supporting his head.
Bai Sankong said: 'Baoyu, it’s all Grandpa’s fault, for doing so many wrong and bad things.'
Bai Sankong said: 'Can you forgive Grandpa?' Bai Sankong weakly called out to Yan Zhu: 'Yan Zhu, come over here.'

Yan Zhu looked at the dying Bai Sankong, her eyes filled with reluctance. She gently put her hand on Bai Sankong's neck, but Bai Sankong's hand fell weakly onto Yan Zhu's arm. Yan Zhu took a step back, looking at Bai Sankong, then at Baoyu, who was also holding back tears.
Yan Zhu said: 'Stop talking, let the past be the past, from now on, we should live well.'
Bai Sankong said: 'Alright, the family will live well.' Bai Sankong's hand trembled as he reached out to Yan Zhu. Bai Sankong gently held Yan Zhu's hand and said: 'My daughter.'
Mu Lang and Baoyu were both extremely angry, glaring at each other. Yan Zhu was extremely anxious, and the situation became increasingly tense.

The guards behind him saw this and jumped down from the bridge, but Mu Lang was already prepared. He spun around and slashed, cutting the guards in half with his sword. The guards who had jumped down from the bridge were all his opponents, and Mu Lang dealt with them effortlessly.
The soldiers, holding weapons, surrounded Mu Lang. Mu Lang stood in the center, calmly drawing his sword. With a single swing, he broke the spears in half.

The guards, seeing this, circled around him, forming a tight formation. Mu Lang, with his superior martial skills, easily dodged the attacks from all directions, leaving the guards utterly baffled and unable to get close to him.

The two who were originally soaring in the air, just as quickly as they had come, fell together, Baoyu's weapon was shorter than Mu Lang's, but he held it with both hands, his stance was solid, and his technique was flexible, making it hard to deal with.

The two were evenly matched for the time being, with neither gaining the upper hand. Mu Lang's moves were swift and precise, while Baoyu's attacks were more forceful. The battle was intense, and the outcome was uncertain.

Huyan Dazang, seeing this, leaped down from the high platform and slashed through the air, breaking the wooden structure beneath Mu Lang's feet, causing it to collapse. The wooden planks scattered everywhere, and Mu Lang was nowhere to be seen.
The wooden door broke open, and Mu Lang, with a sword in hand, stood on the city wall. Mu Lang said, 'I knew you would come.'
Huyan Dazang, wielding a long knife, leaped onto the wooden platform, his gaze fixed on Mu Lang. Mu Lang said: 'I won’t let you die.'

movie101_6966492004553490981_6420_6600.text: The female newscaster in a suit said: "Earlier, we captured the fourth parachutist," "but couldn't identify him." The crowd below pointed and said: "It's Martin, Martin, it's him, it's Martin."
CoCo said in disbelief, "How could it be him"
Martin said: "You are the wingless bald eagle," "Don't dream of defeating me."
The reporter on the ground anxiously said: "This mysterious person has no parachute." "What does it matter if he grabs the dragon head"

Martin, with tears in his eyes, watched as the two people he loved the most were about to crash into the earth. He desperately flapped his wings, trying to catch up with them, but the high-speed wind made it impossible for him to move.
The volcano continued to spew out thick smoke, and the parachute in Martin's hand showed no signs of opening. He clenched his teeth and pulled the cord harder.
Martin was instantly sent flying, tumbling down the slope, and finally rolled to a stop at the bottom. The entire mountain was shrouded in ash, and the surrounding area was in chaos.
Martin was thrown out of the aircraft, tumbling down the slope, and then rolled over and fell into a puddle.
Martin rolled down the slope, and Jia Fulian, seeing this, also fell to the ground. CoCo and others watched in great fear.
Martin rolled on the ground, narrowly avoiding disaster as the lava flow came rushing down the slope just a few meters away.
Martin rolled down the slope, and the suit also fell apart. Martin struggled to get up, but the suit wouldn't cooperate.
Martin's nose had started to bleed, and his glasses had fallen off. He looked at the other end of the valley, then at the painful and swollen right foot, and finally knelt down in pain.
Martin staggered to his feet, his eyes gradually turning red. He looked at the chopper, then at the people on board, and finally collapsed to the ground.
The plane landed safely, and the press conference was in full swing. CoCo sat on the steps, looking dejected, while Jia Fulian was also visibly shaken, with reporters surrounding them.
Martin walked over, picked up the bronze dragon head from the ground, and examined it closely.
The man in black walked over and said, "It's yours, brother, you really are something."
Martin struggled to lift his head and saw the two men who had just shot at him. He then turned his head and saw the helicopter that had been shot down by the men.
The helicopter slowly ascended, and the unconscious Martin was still lying on the ground, with the statue of the dragon's head nearby.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4320_4500.text: Zhang Hua: "He pulled the safety pin out."
The scene shifts to the police station, where the team members are watching the live broadcast. The police officer says, "Alright, I got it," "I'm in position," "I have two guns and a grenade on me."
Zhang Hua said, "Bring it right over"
The car stopped, and two men got out. They dragged the unconscious Zhang Hua out of the car and quickly pushed him into a nearby building. Police 1 followed closely, supporting him.
Police 1 asked, "Which room?"
Police 1 said, "Which room?"
Police 1 said, "Careful with the step." Police 1 and Xing Feng, who arrived late, squeezed through the crowd and followed the group into the house.
Police 1 said, "This room, this room."
Police 1 pushed the person against the wall and said, "Stand up against it."
Xing Feng slapped Zhang Hua and said, "Stand up!"
Zhang Hua said, "Can we talk properly now?"
Zhang Hua nodded and said, "Yes."
Police 1 asked, "Do you know what happened?"
Zhang Hua said, "You say the last one."
Zhang Hua asked, "What's the last thing?" "Let's see if you know or not."
Zhang Hua said, "Sure, sure, who is it?" "Tell me a name, let's see if you know or not"
Zhang Hua said, "Wu..."
Zhang Hua asked in confusion, "What Wu?"

Zhang Hua, with a bruised face, says, "Indeed you do know."
Xing Feng leans in close to Zhang Hua's ear and says, "Find it amusing, do you? Do you recognize this person?"
Zhang Hua shook his head and said, "No idea."
Zhang Hua smiled and said, "Our squad leader."
Manager Zhang asked, "How do you know Mr. Wu?"
Zhang Hua said, "Who? I don't know him."
Zhang Hua asked, "No grudges, right?"
Zhang Hua quickly shook his head, saying, "No, no, no."
Manager Zhang asked, "You went specifically for him?"
Zhang Hua said, "At first, I thought he was Chow Yun-fat."
Zhang Hua asked, "Where are the people?"

Zhang Hua, covering his face, said, "Just hear me out, okay? If you're asking me now where he is I can't possibly tell you, can I? I really don't want anything to happen to Mr. Wu. Let me make a call and tell my people to withdraw first. Then I'll take you to Mr. Wu, how does that sound?"
Police: "Withdraw to where?"
Cao Gang said, "Run."
Zhang Hua laughed and said, "Where to run?"
Zhang Hua says, "They can run wherever they want, I can't really control that."
Zhang Hua laughed and said, "You guys think you can run off this planet, what a joke."
Zhang Hua, gasping for air, said to Cao Gang, "Can you loosen the handcuffs a bit for me?"
Zhang Hua cursed, "What on earth are you thinking?"
Police 1 said, "Speak properly."
Zhang Hua said, "How am I supposed to speak properly in this state?""Whoever catches me, I'll chat with them, right?"

The camera switches to a door with a sign that says, 'Baby Sweet Dream.' The door opens, and a woman says, 'Hello, we're from the property management. There's a water leak downstairs from your apartment, could you please open the door for us to check?'
The woman said, "There's no leak in our house. You should check other houses." The police evacuated the residents and searched every household.
The SWAT officer pushed the door open, and the officer behind him shouted, 'Don't move, kneel down, embrace your head and kneel down, don't move.'
Police 1 said, "You better get back here quickly." "Alright, Manager Zhang, this woman's name is Chen Chen, we didn't know about her situation before."
Police 1 said, "This lady is probably his new girlfriend and they haven't been together for a long time."
Police 1 said, "She's feeling unwell so Liu Yun and the others sent her to the hospital." Police 1 and others handcuffed, shackled, and chained Zhang Hua to the chair.
Xing Feng locked the interrogation room door and said, "Zhang Hua, what do you think""Ready to give it a last shot, is that it?"
Zhang Hua said, "I didn't think you'd actually pull it off. When you walked towards me, I thought you were a labourer."
Cao Gang stood up and said, "Can you stop talking nonsense and say what you need to say?"
Xing Feng said impatiently, "Can you speak properly?"
Zhang Hua said with a smile, "I didn't expect you'd be a better actor than me."

Xing Feng stood up and said, "I'm telling you Huazi, if you want to talk one-on-one, then stop beating around the bush. Where are the hostages?" With only 2 hours left, Zhang Hua, who was sitting on the toilet, was completely panicked.

movie101_7026623602615452196_5760_5940.text: Zhang Dan slowly raised the gun and aimed it at King Kong. After a tense standoff, Zhang Dan slowly lowered the gun and said: "It's in your hands now."
Yurik, with hands in his pockets, strolled over and said: "Remember what I just said? That machine can cut through anything."
Xiao Bao: "Spiders in position." "Three." "Two." "One." The three mechanical insects flew towards Zhang Dan.

The signal jammer was triggered, and the bomb fell from the ceiling. The police immediately opened fire. The bomb was triggered, and the cabin was blown open. Yurik and the others were caught off guard. The bald brother was shot in the head and fell to the ground. The blond brother was shot in the arm and fell to the ground.

Zhang Dan and others were still fighting in the factory. The machine that had been repaired was now controlled by Ye Hong. The little robot that had been developed by Yurik and others was also deployed. The little robot equipped with weapons kept attacking the enemies. King Kong and others were still fighting valiantly despite being overwhelmed by the enemies. The enemies kept coming in waves, and the battle was becoming fiercer.
The three of them split up and searched the factory. Zhang Dan and Xiao Bao found King Kong, while Yurik searched the workshop.
King Kong and Yurik were still fighting in the workshop, while Zhang Dan and Ye Hong were hiding behind a concrete slab, Ye Hong holding a gun and panting heavily.

Zhang Dan and Ye Hong were hiding behind a concrete slab, both tense and scared. The sound of bullets hitting the slab made them shudder. Zhang Dan looked at the enemy and slowly raised his gun. The enemy was shooting wildly at the place where Zhang Dan and Ye Hong were hiding. Zhang Dan and Ye Hong could only sit on the ground and retreat slowly. The enemy's firepower was too fierce, and Zhang Dan and Ye Hong could only retreat step by step.
King Kong, who had just thrown the bag into the car, ran to the side of the car with the suitcase. He opened the car door and threw the bag inside.
Zhang Dan: "Let's go." The two drove away in a car.
Amber and Xiao Bao exchanged glances and quickly ran towards the outside of the tunnel. The two cars reached the exit and did a drift to the left together.
King Kong sat in the car, smiling triumphantly. Suddenly, he felt uneasy, leaned forward, and checked his watch. Seeing that the time was up, he shouted: "Stop the car!" "Stop the car!"

The explosive sound of the machine's activation came from the display screen, and the car's central clock started to count down. In an instant, the car sped towards another car, and the explosive sound echoed throughout the sky. King Kong and the others watched the explosion site with expressions of admiration.
Zhang Dan put down his hand and said: "The old fox died because of his own greed"
Xiao Bao: 'Now the "GAIA" is gone,' 'I want to see how you'll get out of this.'
Zhang Dan took out a necklace made of jade and gold from his pocket and said: "Hey"

The scene shifts to the memory of the past, where the three of them are still in the cave. After the three of them got the treasure, they were happily bragging about it. Zhang Dan showed the treasure to Xiao Bao and said: 'Why are you always like this?'

movie101_7173948149160116773_5280_5460.text: Da Zang said: "We're brothers." Hearing this, Mu Lang sheathed his sword, and the two of them charged forward together.
Fang Baoyu and Mu Lang fought each other, with Mu Lang trying to stab Fang Baoyu's back.
Fang Baoyu was not to be outdone, he kicked up his long robe and charged at Mu Lang. The two of them fought back and forth, and in an instant, Mu Lang was beaten to the ground.
Fang Baoyu was not to be outdone, he leaped into the air and spun around, his sword spinning as well, aiming for Mu Lang's head.

Fang Baoyu's sword technique was extremely fast, making it difficult for Mu Lang to defend. He then used a feint to make Mu Lang think he was going to attack, but instead slashed at the guardrail. Mu Lang was forced to dodge and ended up falling onto the stairs. In a critical moment, he quickly adjusted and countered, making Fang Baoyu stagger back several steps.
Da Zang's eyes were fierce, he was ready to fight at any time, and kept changing his tactics. The three of them were entangled in a tough fight.

Mu Lang, seeing this, was not to be outdone. He spun around several times, his body seemingly detached from the ground, and the momentum carried him straight towards Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu, with a flick of his sleeve, sent Mu Lang flying. Afterward, he stood on the high platform and hooked a piece of cloth with his sword, tied it to the opponent's sword, and then, with a strong pull, made him fly towards the high platform.

Fang Baoyu and Da Zang, with their swords in hand, stood on the drawbridge. The soldiers behind them were also on high alert. Mu Lang looked at the two of them, his eyes revealing a hint of admiration.

Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu both leaped up, their blades meeting in the mid-air. Then, Fang Baoyu kicked away Mu Lang, who had just gotten close to the wooden bridge. Fang Baoyu was about to strike with his blade, but Mu Lang used his knife to block the blow. The force of Fang Baoyu's kick was so great that the wooden bridge broke apart.

Fang Baoyu and Da Zang stood on either side of the steps, with the soldiers behind them forming a human wall. The two of them leaped into the air, their swords flashing like shooting stars. The soldiers' formation was disrupted, and they fell one by one. Mu Lang and his group were still entangled in combat with the soldiers, and seeing the unfavorable situation, they also drew their swords and leaped onto the steps, joining the fight with Fang Baoyu and Da Zang.

Mu Lang and his two subordinates were the first to cross the bridge. As they did, they immediately drew their swords and began to search. Fang Baoyu and Da Zang were also on the bridge, but they remained hidden and did not let the others see them.

Mu Lang's face changed instantly, and he immediately drew his sword to a defensive stance. The two faced off, but neither dared to make the first move. Suddenly, two soldiers charged at them. Seeing the soldiers leap into the air, about to fall from the heights, Fang Baoyu and Da Zang quickly caught them.

Fang Baoyu, who had been stabbed in the chest, suddenly grabbed Mu Lang's clothes and threw him aside. Mu Lang, in a fit of rage, kicked at Fang Baoyu, but was countered and had his clothes slashed by a sword. In a moment of desperation, he swung his broadsword at Fang Baoyu's neck.
Fang Baoyu, who had been hiding nearby, saw this scene and immediately got up to take action. But Mu Lang, with a casual flick of his wrist, made the long knife spin and return to its sheath.
Mu Lang, seeing that his scheme was about to be exposed, drew his sword and walked towards Da Zang.
Mu Lang, holding the sword, slowly approached Fang Baoyu, who was lying on the ground, his eyes filled with panic. Seeing the blood on the ground, Mu Lang's expression changed.

Fang Baoyu was stunned, his eyes wide open in disbelief. Mu Lang, with a swift move, aimed his sword at Da Zang's head. Seeing this, the usually calm and composed Da Zang was also filled with rage. He drew his sword to block Mu Lang's attack. The two were evenly matched, and the outcome was uncertain.
Mu Lang and Duchess Tuo Chen stood back-to-back, forming an impenetrable formation with their swords.

movie101_6966492004553490981_6600_6780.text: The plane crashed into the sea, and the volcano erupted, sending ash and lava into the sky.

Jia Fulian took out a rolled-up painting from a gift box: 'Autumn Hunting Painting of Emperor Qianlong'

At that moment, Simon and his partner were discussing something with the staff at the front desk. Coco said: "You guys figure out your own business properly."
A little girl ran towards her, calling out: "Mom!" The little girl was holding a painting. She squatted down and hugged her daughter.

Simon took out a box of wedding rings from his pocket, saying: "If you are willing" "Let's start again."
At this moment, Mr. Liao shouted: "Hey, it's a girl, come see, come and look!"
Simon and his wife came to visit David's Wife, Simon asked: "Congratulations, congratulations, what name have you chosen?"
The nurse said: "So adorable"
Simon: "Shehe (Harmony)"
Coco: "Shehe (Harmony)"
Mr. Liao said: "World peace" "JC suggested four names" "I chose"
Mr. Liao pointed at the nurse and said: "Sister-in-law"

Simon: "I'll be right back."
Jia Fulian beckoned: "Come on, come over"

Doctor: "He's fine" "He's recovering quickly" "He should be able to be discharged in a week or two"

movie101_7026623602615452196_720_900.text: The price of the necklace kept rising, bidding higher and higher. In the end, it was won by a bidder from Hong Kong, who paid a staggering 310 million. The scene shifted to the entrance of the hotel, where the red carpet was laid out, and numerous stars and media gathered, cars stopping at the entrance of the hotel.

Pierre and his entourage arrived at the event site in a luxury car. Ye Hong, seeing Pierre, immediately became alert. Meanwhile, in a hidden room, a man in a white suit was watching the commotion through a live feed on his laptop.
Xiao Bao replied, "No need to check, he's a French officer specializing in international theft. Zhang Dan was looking for you."
Zhang Dan smiled and said, 'Old friend. 4.5 million.'
Ye Hong raised her hand and shouted: "Do you even have a plan B?"

Zhang Dan said to Xiao Bao: 'Stick to the original plan.' 'A cheetah can only chase one antelope.' 'Lao Mo, come down and make an appearance.'
The helicopter pilot responds: 'Received'
The scene switches to a monitoring room. Pierre and Zhang Dan are watching the surveillance footage, with Pierre pacing back and forth in front of the screens.

The scene switches to a large screen displaying the news of the day: 'According to the United Nations, the population of the world has surpassed 7 billion.' 'The number of people with hearing loss has surpassed 700 million.' 'The deaf community is a group of people with hearing loss.' 'Deaf people have the right to communicate equally.' 'Deaf people have the right to live a life of dignity.' 'Deaf people have the right to live a life of happiness.' 'Deaf people have the right to live a life of beauty.'
Zhang Dan's gaze was drawn to a man in a white suit. The auctioneer announced that the item was sold, and Pierre pointed to the man in the white suit, saying there was another bidder.

Pierre pressed the play button, and Zhang Dan's interview appeared on the screen. Zhang Dan said: 'My name is Zhang Dan, and I am the head of the intelligence department of the Hong Kong Police Department.'
Zhang Dan's face changed dramatically. He looked at the smiling Tingting in the distance, then looked down and said to the host: 'Ye Hong, it's your turn.'
Ye Hong, with a bruised face, raised her sign and shouted, "Fur is for beautiful animals, not ugly people."
The scene shifts to a group of protesters holding signs and banners, protesting fur farming in the streets. Police officers block the protesters from advancing, and the scene becomes chaotic.

Protesters from PETA stormed the venue, charging towards the entrance of the Grand Hotel Cinecitta, pushing and shoving security guards and even the staff at the ticket checkpoint. They shouted, 'Stop animal cruelty!'

Pierre watched the live broadcast on multiple screens. In the footage, Ye Hong was surrounded by security guards, trying to stop her from getting close to the auction house entrance. She broke free from the security and ran towards the auction house, causing chaos among the crowd.

The scene shifts to the surveillance footage, showing the entire process of Ye Hong's theft. The two foreign spies look at the screen in disbelief, and the man beside them says: "Transport the auction pieces back to the vault."
Zhang Dan, who was on the phone, was quickly called away by Pierre. He had to put down the phone and head to the stage. Zhang Dan said: 'Xiao Bao, the fate of The Wing rests on you.'
Pierre and his group were blocked by a large number of animal lovers, causing the auction to be canceled. The necklace was safely returned to the box, and the venue was surrounded by protesters.
The protesters in the hall were completely unaware of the situation outside, still shouting loudly: 'Kill the rat, kill the big bad rat.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.text: Mu Lang was left there, watching the departing figure of the princess, feeling a deep sense of guilt.
Mu Lang's hand trembled as he gripped the hilt of the sword, and blood spurted from the wound.
The two drew their swords and swung them down, slicing the air in two.
Mu Lang was furious, and in his rage, he knocked Fang Baoyu to the ground.
Duchess Tuo Chen was the first to lift Mu Lang up, but Mu Lang still clung to her tightly, not letting her go.
Mu Lang looked up and saw Da Zang, his eyes instantly filled with blood.
Mu Lang: "Why, why did you do this?"
Mu Lang asked: "Do you trust me?" "My feelings for you are real."
Duchess Tuo Chen comforted her, saying, "I know, don't be afraid. I'll always be with you."
Mu Lang looked at the child in his arms, tears welling up in his eyes. He gently pushed away the hair covering his face, and Da Zang shouted: "Duchess Tuo Chen!"
Fang Baoyu was stunned, and Mu Lang quickly went to support him. The two children were also frightened and cried out.

Duchess Tuo Chen sat down beside Mu Lang, looking at him for a long time before suddenly pushing him away. Mu Lang fell to the ground, and the dagger in his chest was the cause of his fall. Fang Baoyu said, "You still won't give up."
Da Zang said, "I cannot ignore my master's last wishes." "This battle is inevitable," "but I respect your Central Plains' rules— it will be to the extent."
The two stood still, their eyes locked, and the sound of the swords clashing echoed. Their techniques were equally adept, and the battle was evenly matched.
The two were evenly matched for the time being, and after several exchanges, neither could gain the upper hand.

The two were evenly matched for a while, and the outcome was uncertain. The prince's skills were solid, and his swordplay was both aggressive and defensive. Mu Lang was also no slouch; his moves were both fast and strong. The two were constantly exchanging blows, and the battle seemed to be going on forever.

The two fought evenly for a short time, but as soon as Da Zang switched from a knife to a short sword, the situation changed. Da Zang's short sword was light and fast, leaving Fang Baoyu with no chance to defend.
Da Zang's sword was already held behind his neck. With a flick of his wrist, the sword swung around to his front, and with a swing of his arm, he knocked Fang Baoyu to the ground.
The letter read: "Da Zang, when you read this letter from your master, it means Chang Guang has broken the sword vow."

movie101_7026623602615452196_900_1080.text: Xiao Bao, who had been lying in wait, immediately sprang into action. He bent down to pick up the vent cover, then stepped on it with both feet and reached into the duct to pull out a black bag.
Pierre, who had been standing by, saw the opportunity and immediately turned and left, heading to the kitchen.

Pierre, holding his police badge, said: "There's been a robbery in progress," "open it up," and then walked inside. Xiao Bao, who was eavesdropping nearby, heard the sound of a door opening. Pierre continued: "How is it possible when we never left?"
Pierre said: "Call your captain immediately."
In the evidence room, Xiao Bao was holding a scanner, meticulously checking every corner of the room. He then smiled, put the scanner away, and took out a gun, continuing to search.

Xiao Bao searched for a long time before discovering a hidden door in the wall of the bookshelf. He pried open the hidden door, revealing a secret room filled with various luxurious items. Xiao Bao said, 'Found it.'
Zhang Dan, who had been waiting for a long time, asked a fellow contestant impatiently: "How much longer do we have to wait?"
Zhang Dan said: "Ye Hong" "Position"
Ye Hong hurriedly replied: "I am on my way, are you still inside?"
Zhang Dan replied: "Still inside."

He then took out a bag full of money. Xiao Bao opened the zipper, revealing a weapon inside. He then climbed the stairs, carrying the weapon, and stopped in front of a mirror. Looking at his reflection in the mirror, he nodded to himself.
The scene shifts to the hallway, where the bodyguards are searching for Xiao Bao.
The security guard opened the door, and the security officer said: "I am here."
Pierre walked to the safe and said: "Open the safe immediately" "Someone is inside stealing the Wings of Dreams"
The security guard said, "Impossible."
Pierre turned to Zhang Dan and said, "Listen to me, this riot is just a smokescreen. Open the safe immediately."
The police officer continued, "You need to share your internal information with us."
Pierre said: "You're wasting time" "Open the safe"

Suddenly, a figure flashed across the screen. A man in a suit holding a briefcase in his left hand and a flashlight in his right, he walked straight into the elevator, and the elevator door opened automatically. The man in the suit swung his right hand, and the briefcase fell to the ground.
Zhang Dan said, "Everyone, be alert," "Let's go."
Xiao Bao, who had already unlocked the code, took out a tracker and said: "Open the safe immediately."
The two men in black arrived at the evidence room, opened the iron door, and the room was empty. They looked around and pressed the buttons on the wall, but the room remained silent.
The scene shifted to a dimly lit room where a man in black was picking the lock of a safe. Once the safe was opened, he took out a tool and began to cut the wires inside.
Xiao Bao was puzzled by the data, and the screen went blank. He turned on the flashlight and continued to check the data. At this moment, Zhang Dan's hand slowly turned the safe dial.

Xiao Bao bent down to pick the lock, while the technician on the side held a scanner to scan the code on the door. Once the scanning was complete, the two men in black suits stood by the side, waiting for the next action.

movie101_6991751088659497479_4500_4680.text: Zhang Hua, with a bruised face, asked: "Can we start from the beginning?"

Xing Feng, who had been standing idly by, suddenly felt a chill. With only 2 hours left, he desperately reached out to Mr. Wu for help, but Mr. Wu was busy with the bomb.

The scene shifts to the kitchen, where the cook is stirring a pot of boiling oil with chopsticks. In the dormitory, Xiao Dou and Mr. Wu are sound asleep, while Li Zhidui sits in a wooden chair, idly fiddling with a guitar in his hands. Suddenly, a gunshot rings out, startling Li Zhidui awake.

Be smart like young Shen Mo."

movie101_7173948149160116773_960_1140.text: Zhuer said, 'I don't want to die without knowing why.' Da Zang looked at Zhuer with a face full of guilt.

Zhuer looked up at Da Zang, and seeing the resolute look in his eyes, she knew that even if she begged, he would not retract his decision.

The two practiced in the field, and Daozhang and Zhuer stood in front of the pavilion, each holding a sword, staring intently at each other.

Daozhang's swordplay was extremely fast, making it difficult for Da Zang to defend.

Daozhang's attack was swift and fierce, his palm wind blew away Da Zang's flying daggers, and then he punched towards Da Zang's lower body. Da Zang leaped into the air to dodge, but Daozhang grabbed his leg and slammed him heavily onto the ground.

Da Zang swung his sword towards Daozhang, who blocked it with his sword. The two engaged in a fierce battle, with each move more intense than the last.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1140_1320.text: Soldier said, "Bring a hundred taels of gold, go, go to Beishan to get a familiar ticket."
Deputy Lu said: "Damn, how did you get back alive?"
Soldier said, "They let me come back to report."
A soldier nearby said, '"No way, Deputy Lu! They said they only want Group leader and one subordinate to go."
Deputy Lu said excitedly: "Damn it!" "Group leader is having a meeting at the division headquarters." "I can wipe them all out in three minutes."
Soldier said, "No, Deputy Lu, this will result in casualties."
Deputy Lu pointed at him and said, 'If you nag any more, I'll shoot you.'
Mo Han stepped forward and said, 'Deputy Lu, he's right. We can't underestimate the bandits.'
Deputy Lu said, 'Just a few petty thieves scared you like this, are you from Nanjing? Don't make me look down on you.' After saying this, he turned to the soldiers and said, 'Brothers, move out!'
The scene shifts to the Kuomintang's command post, where the phone rang. Mo Han said, 'You get Lu Xiao to come back immediately. I'll be back soon to handle this personally.'
Mo Han responded: 'Yes, Group leader, about the gold matter.' After hanging up the phone, Mo Han rode his motorcycle with a sidecar to the agreed location.
The scene shifts to the forest where the Kuomintang are ambushing, with a large number of troops and a jeep coming down the mountain.
Mo Han ran over and said, 'Deputy Lu, stop the action, Group leader called.' Deputy Lu asked, 'You called him?' Mo Han replied, 'Yes, I was afraid of any danger.'

Deputy Lu said, 'You sure know how to seize opportunities. No wonder, a graduate of Whampoa Military Academy who studied in Japan.' Mo Han bowed his head in acknowledgment. Deputy Lu said, 'Move aside.'
Mo Han replied: "I dare not disobey Group leader's orders."
Deputy Lu said, 'I'll count to three. If you don't move, I'll run you over.' Mo Han smiled. Deputy Lu continued, 'One. Two. Three.'
Mo Han looked at him with a smile, but the next second, the soldier took out a package and threw it on the ground. The wooden block fell to the ground, and Deputy Lu frowned in disappointment.
Deputy Lu said, 'Alright, you surnamed Yang, the gold bars are ready, so eager to curry favor, huh. Give me the gold.'
Deputy Lu said excitedly: "I have followed Group leader for years." "He is me." "I am him." "Hand it over."
Deputy Lu said, "No way."
Deputy Lu said, "Don't be ungrateful."

At this moment, a car drove over from the distance. Mo Han looked at the car, and when it stopped, a man got out. It was Group leader. Mo Han said, 'Group leader, you are here. We've been waiting for you.'
The division commander turned around and said, 'Lu Xiao, are you here to save people or to endanger my daughter?'

The division commander said to Mo Han, "Secretary Yang, take the ransom and come with me up the mountain." "The rest stay here." After speaking, the division commander turned and walked up the mountain, with the soldiers following. The scene shifts to a rainbow appearing over the forest.
Soldier shouted loudly: 'Is anyone there? Come out and talk if you have the guts.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Listen up, heroes on the mountain. I, Che Zhenshan, have brought enough silver to ransom my daughter.'

movie101_6967711402819584543_1200_1380.text: The scene shifts to the next day. Young Policeman and Woman arrived at the police station early. They went through the hallway and arrived at the stairwell. Young Policeman looked at his watch and said, 'Why are you so late?'
Woman said: "Hey, stop with the sour face," "I'm sorry."

Woman said: "Then don't take care of me anymore."

Young Policeman was stunned by this remark, and didn't respond for a long time.

Woman turned off the engine, opened the car door, and got out. She looked at Young Policeman and said: 'Don't interfere in my matters anymore.'

After watching Woman leave, Young Policeman turned back into the car, his face full of worry. He glanced at Woman's departing figure, then lowered his head, seemingly deep in thought.
Young Policeman parked the car in the deserted parking lot, stood by the window looking at Woman. Woman was sitting on the floor, leaning against the wall, with a large bag on her back.

movie101_6967711402819584543_1380_1560.text: Younger Sister stood at the doorway, hesitating whether to go in. She looked at the door, then at her keys, and finally decided to enter.
She dialed the number, hesitated for a moment, and then spoke: "Hello, can you check if I left my keys in your car?"

The man on the phone said: "I'll bring them over to you." After hanging up, Younger Sister looked at the door, then at his own keys, and finally at the hallway. After hesitating for a moment, he took out the keys and unlocked the door.
Younger Sister knocked on the door and shouted, "Feng Feng." No one responded. Younger Sister continued to shout, "Feng Feng."

Just as she was about to insert the key into the lock, a noise came from behind. She turned her head to see Killer approaching with a frown. Younger Sister was stunned for a moment, but quickly regained composure.
Killer, who had just closed the door, suddenly felt something was off. He looked at the girl in front of him, who looked back at him with big eyes. Killer asked, 'Did you lose your dog?'
Killer, with a stern expression, stared at her.

The next second, the light suddenly came back on. Killer, who was washing his hands, turned to look at the light, then turned back and continued washing. After a while, he turned off the light again and walked out of the bathroom.
Killer took the cloth and threw it on the shelf nearby.
Killer said: 'Is he looking for me?' Younger Sister didn't answer, just stared at the wall.

Younger Sister said: "No, he was taking me home." Younger Sister was dragged into the bathroom by Killer, and then brutally killed by him. Meanwhile, Old Older Brother had already left the house, walking alone through the dim corridor towards the residential building.
Younger Sister, who was tied to the wall, had no strength left and could only weakly shake her head.
The room was in disarray, and the film reel that had been spooled out of the projector lay tangled on the floor. Killer cleaned up the scattered items and walked to the window.
Older Brother walked to the end of the hallway, turned and looked back, seeing no one, he turned and walked towards the stairwell.

Older Brother turned his back on her, not wanting to see her again. Younger Sister, who was still alive, lay on the ground, her face covered in sweat and blood. She struggled to open her eyes and look at him, but soon closed her eyes again, her body slowly going limp.

Older Brother, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally saw the door open from the inside. He didn't rush in immediately, but waited until the person inside had finished what they were doing.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1320_1500.text: Che Zhenshan said: "Please come out and speak, hero."
Mo Han said: "Those who want money, come out." "Those who don't want their lives, come out too."
The bandits quickly stood up, guns raised. The leader shouted: "First, put down your guns, put them all down."
Mo Han and Che Zhenshan both bent down to pick up the gun, but Che Zhenshan was puzzled. He looked up at the two of them and asked, "Where is my daughter?"
The traitor pointed a gun at Mo Han and said: "She's right here with us." "Did you bring the ransom?"
Che Zhenshan said: "A hundred taels of gold, not a single coin less." "Please hand over my daughter."
The bandit leader shouted: "Put the gold down and step back twenty paces."
Mo Han said: "No, what if you take the gold and don't release her?" "I'll go alone," "handing over the money in exchange for the person."
The man in black pointed the gun at him and said: "Deal."
The two reached the top of the hill, only to see a group of guerrilla fighters coming out of the woods. Che Zhenshan asked anxiously: 'Lin Lin, are you okay?'
Mo Han handed the captured food to Che Zhenshan, saying, "Be careful."
The two reached the top of the hill, and Che Zhenshan, seeing the situation was tense, quickly signaled to his men. The soldier holding the gun said: "Throw the gold up here, raise your hands."
Mo Han raised his hands and said: "Release her."
The man pointed his gun at Mo Han and said: "Release her."
At this moment, the Japanese soldiers captured Lin Lin. Mo Han saw this and rushed over immediately.
Mo Han looked at the two captives, then at the female soldier. He stepped forward, removed the cloth from her mouth, and asked, "Are you okay?"
The Japanese soldiers were about to reach the bottom of the hill. At this critical moment, Mo Han arrived just in time and shot the leading Japanese soldier in the head.

The guerrilla fighters, hidden in the tall grass, had already locked on to the position of the enemy and opened fire. The Nationalist soldiers were caught off guard and fell one after another. Seeing this, Lu Xiao quickly ordered a retreat.

The enemy's firepower was intense, and the soldiers behind were quickly running out of bullets. Mo Han took advantage of the enemy's confusion, leaped over a fallen soldier, and tackled an enemy in a black mask to the ground. Che Zhenshan and Lu Xiao also quickly got up and joined the melee.

The man in the black mask, who had been picking wildflowers, suddenly raised his gun and aimed at Mo Han. Lin Lin, seeing this, tried to intervene but was pulled away by Mo Han. The masked man fired, but Mo Han shielded Lin Lin with his body, blocking the shot. Lin Lin turned back to see Mo Han lying on the ground, and in that moment, Lin Lin's heart filled with mixed emotions.

The enemy was still searching for the location of the explosives. At this moment, a Japanese soldier found the position and threw a grenade. The explosion caused a huge hole in the ground, and the masked Japanese soldiers who were searching for the explosives were instantly blown away.
In the hospital, Mo Han opened his eyes and looked around, but still couldn't find Lin Lin.
Lin Lin said: "You're awake?"
Mo Han asked in confusion: "Where am I?"
Lin Lin said: "In the medical room."
Mo Han weakly said: "I'm still alive."
Lin Lin said: "The doctor said the bullet almost hit your heart." "For me, Mo Han, I had misjudged you before."

movie101_6967711402819584543_1560_1740.text: He then pressed the switch, and the lights in the room came back on. He then turned off the projector, picked up his bag and suitcase, and left the room.

Middle-aged Policeman found some white powder on the toilet. He picked some up on his finger, sniffed it, and then rushed out of the bathroom, retching violently.
The two of them were running frantically through the narrow alley, with no one knowing where to go. They could only run back and forth in the alley, passing by one house after another.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2160_2340.text: A Lian asked: "What about my happiness?"
Shen Mo poured water and said: "Come come come" "I'm sorry, Mr. Jia" "Today is special, I didn't take good care of you."
Jia Zong smiled and said: "I said I wouldn't bother you" "We are self-service now" "Come on" "I wish you success and happy birthday"
Jia Zong thanked and said: "Thank you", then Jia Zong started drinking.
Shen Mo was playing with his phone in the kitchen when Yao Zong called out to him. Yao Zong said: "Shen Zong, what are you busy with? There's a big thing here."

Shen Mo smiled and said: "Those guys owe me some money" "It's not hard to understand that debtors are bosses these days, isn't it?" "But Professor Xiaoli Ma" "I believe our upcoming cooperation" "is definitely going to be a win-win situation"
A Lian angrily said: "What are you playing at" "All you men are liars"
Jia Zong said: "Aren't you being too harsh? It's not easy to find a wife these days" "Can you let little Shen Mo play along?" "Let's mind our own business."
A Lian shouted loudly: "Waiter, hurry up and serve the food, why are you so slow?"
Shen Mo scratched his head and said: "Here it comes", Shen Mo turned around to get his bag from the back
Shen Mo smiled and said: "It's fine. Once I pay back the money, I don’t have to save their face anymore."
Shen Mo said: "This debtor really did become the boss, I'll go and ask them."
Shen Mo said: "Professor Xiaoli Ma, it's important here." "Excuse me."

The scene shifts to Du Yu, who is busy in the kitchen. He skillfully stir-fries vegetables, then crushes garlic with a knife before quickly frying it. After the garlic is lightly charred, he adds the prepared sauce and continues stir-frying. Once the dish is ready, he skillfully plates it and brings it out.
Shen Mo and Jia Zong stood up to toast with the guests, while the flambeed dish was brought to the table. Shen Mo and Jia Zong helped themselves to the dishes, and the meal was off to a lively start.

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin came back to the room with the documents, Mo Han was already fast asleep, she sat in the chair and started to work.
Mo Han said, "This music is so nice. Lin Lin, I think I should go back. Living here is not very convenient. You need to work and take care of me."

Lin Lin said, "Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away." Mo Han was already sound asleep, but his body suddenly twitched as if having a nightmare. He frowned and suddenly sat up, gasping for air.
Mo Han said, "Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?"
Lin Lin said, "Okay." Lin Lin put down the pen and stood up, walked to Mo Han's bedside, grabbed his arm, and tried to wake him up.
Lin Lin sat down next to Mo Han, took the hem of his shirt and started to write something.

Mo Han sat on the bed, clutching his chest, unable to move. Lin Lin supported him as they slowly stood up. Just a few steps, Mo Han's chest suddenly tightened, and he knelt on the ground, gasping for air.
Lin Lin said, "Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in."
Mo Han said, "Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now."

Mo Han was still holding Lin Lin's waist, following the direction of Lin Lin's gesture, and walked towards the door. The room was very quiet, with only a few sounds of birds chirping outside. The two of them were like this, quietly opening the door.
Lin Lin said, "It's here."
Xiao Wang said, "Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang."
Lin Lin said, "I'll take care of it."
Soldier said, "Oh, let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it."
Lin Lin rushed in and said, "Hey, don't put it there. How could you be so clumsy? Get out quickly."
Mo Han said, "Yes, yes."

Lin Lin saw the situation was dire and quickly slipped out the back door. Just as she closed the door, she ran into Mo Han who had come to find her. Mo Han picked up the thick stack of documents from the ground and stared at Lin Lin.
The next day, Lu Xiao came to the barracks to find Mo Han. Through the binoculars, Lin Lin saw the two greet each other warmly.
Lu Xiao picked up the phone and asked, "Where did he say he was going?"
Mo Han said, "Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin."
Lu Xiao hung up the phone, picked up the receiver again, and instructed, "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."
Mo Han said, "Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?" "Yes, I'm fine now." "Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven." "Don't worry, I'll be on time."

Soldier hung up the phone, opened the door, and stepped out. He saw Mo Han, who had been waiting at the entrance for a long time. Mo Han had a serious expression, his eyes filled with determination. Soldier followed him closely.

movie101_7052960987330118151_2340_2520.text: The scene shifts to a restaurant, where Shen Mo is introducing the next step of their advertising plan to Yao Zong and Xiaoli Ma. Shen Mo said: "Our next step in advertising is not only to advertise on video sites, but also on major mainstream media across the country." At this moment, Jia Zong brought over a glass of wine and said: "Come, have some wine."
Shen Mo said: "Please allow me to introduce myself."
Shen Mo said with a smile: "This is the leader."
Shen Mo said: "I hope for your success in holding hands today."
Shen Mo smiled and introduced, 'This is our introducer.'
Xiaoli Ma said: "I think this is not a trivial matter after all, we need to understand further."
Jia Zong quickly agreed: "That's right, that's right. I guarantee with my personality, Shen Mo is a very reliable person."
Shen Mo said with a headache: "This girl is a police officer."
Yao Zong looked at the two of them and said: "Young people's affairs, I won't interfere."
Shen Mo laughed and said: "Very well, very well."
Jia Zong said to Shen Mo: "Shen Mo, please come with me."
Jia Zong stood up and said, 'Go ahead and eat.'
Jia Zong walked over and said: "Why are you dating a police officer? Are you seeking death?"
Shen Mo said with a sobbing tone: "I just found out."
Xiaoli Ma said: "Actually, money is not the issue. I need to live up to consumers' trust in me. So, I want to try your product myself first, and then I'll make my decision."
Yao Zong said: "Great, I have a weight-loss pill right now, I have it ready, feel free to take it, I assure you it won't be fatal, thank you so much, Xiaoli Ma."
Shen Mo stood up and said, 'What's your introducer doing?' Shen Mo suddenly felt a bad taste in his mouth, and the people around him looked at him with disdain.
Shen Mo couldn't handle the wine at all, and said: "This wine is really strong," "It's okay," "The elders in their village care about the younger generation like this."
Shen Mo looked at Xiaoli Ma with a smile in his eyes. After finishing the meal, the two walked side by side on the street. Shen Mo asked, "Where did you park your car?"
Xiaoli Ma replied, "I came by a tuk-tuk."
Shen Mo followed behind and asked, "Shall I send a company car to take you back?"
Xiaoli Ma happily said: "Great, thank you."
Shen Mo turned around, took out his phone and said, "Look at my brain, company car."
Xiaoli Ma said with a smile: "It's sent for maintenance and hasn't come back, right?"
Shen Mo said with a smile: "Yes."
Xiaoli Ma said with a smile: 'The restaurant owner hasn't returned yet either, right? That table doesn't look like they owe you money.'

Shen Mo said with a smile: "I knew it. But, Xiaoli Ma, I'll confess." "I'm just a waiter in the restaurant." "I owe a huge amount of money." "I finally found such a decent job in a pharmaceutical company." "I want to perform well."
Xiaoli Ma asked, 'Aren't you tired?'
Shen Mo said, 'Hey, where are you going?' Shen Mo grabbed Xiaoli Ma's hand and stretched out his leg to block her way.
Shen Mo watched the departing car, then turned back to Xiaoli Ma and said, 'Tired, really tired.'
Xiaoli Ma said with a smile: "Help me get straightened up."
Xiaoli Ma, wearing a hat and high heels, staggered towards Shen Mo, who was drinking on the side of the road.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2280_2460.text: Dentist, with nowhere to go, was cornered by Drug Dealer, "Where is my daughter?"
Dentist's eyes trembled, and he swallowed hard.

After a while, he finally made up his mind, took a deep breath, and then walked towards the sleeping Xiao An. As he approached, Xiao An, who was already awakened by the sound of the car, instinctively curled up and hid in the roots of the big tree.
At this moment, a figure suddenly rushed out from the woods and shot the hostage three times. It was Drug Dealer.
The scene shifts, and we see Drug Dealer carrying Xiao An, who is unconscious, walking through the reeds.
At this moment, the sound of a motorcycle coming from afar caught Boatman's attention. He turned his head to look, then turned back and took another drag on his cigarette.
At this moment, a man with a bare upper body ran over from the opposite shore, and upon seeing Drug Dealer, he quickly approached.

At this moment, a pair of young men appeared in the frame. One was carrying Xiao An, who was tied up with ropes, and the other was walking behind. Without looking back, they threw Xiao An into the truck.
Drug Dealer, with a face full of fatigue, signaled to the side with a wave of his hand.
On the wide river, a small boat drifts along with the current, while on the mountain road, a motorcycle is speeding along, with its headlight on.
The scene shifts to a winding mountain road, with a car slowly driving along. Inside the car, Monk is driving with Godfather's Son in the passenger seat, and Xiao An sitting in the back.
The scene shifted, and the monks took the girl to the temple on the mountain, where they sat in the back of a pickup truck.

After entering the yard, the two pass through the lush garden to the back gate, where two burly men stand, one holding a gun to the iron lock on the gate, the other turning the key to unlock it. The two walk straight into the yard, and at this moment, Godfather's Son is sitting on a sofa inside the yard, looking at them with a surprised expression.

At this moment, a man in a black shirt and a short haircut walked out from the depths of the jungle. He was holding a gun and looking around. When he saw Godfather's Son, he immediately knelt down. Godfather's Son approached him, and Drug Dealer asked: "Where is my father?"

At this moment, Drug Dealer, who had been hiding in the bushes, suddenly stood up. Godfather's Son, who had been watching the movements of the police, was momentarily stunned. Drug Dealer walked up to Godfather's Son and said, "He was arrested by the police."
Godfather's Son:"Then why did you come back?"
Drug Dealer said: "Godfather told me to leave first." "The last time you brought those two people, they were the police."
Godfather's Son, after hearing this, glanced at the knife in his hand and asked, "What is this thing?"
Drug Dealer said: "It's the hostage I brought back."
Drug Dealer said: "Just what I needed to blow off some steam." Then, pointing at Xiao An, he charged forward with his stick.

movie101_6991751088659497479_540_720.text: Team Member asked: "Why didn't he go straight to the Diaoyu Islands for the kidnapping" Captain General was silent.
Team Member with Hat said: "There are about two hundred bullets of various calibers"
Team Member said: "Check the guns"
The police loaded the bullets and said: "Five bullets in the magazine" "One in the barrel" "No bullets in the revolver"
Team Member with Hat said: "Nine bullets in the magazine, one in the barrel"
Team Member said: "AK magazine twenty-nine" "One bullet in the barrel"
Xing Feng said: "Honestly, you're pretty skilled. Who did you learn from?"
Zhang Hua said: "Do you believe if I say I learned from Hollywood blockbusters?"
Xing Feng said: "Why didn't you say the Black Cat Sheriff then?"
Zhang Hua laughed and said: "Just a joke"
Detective Chief said: "Alright, you're just wasting your own time now. It would be better for you to bring out the hostage, you should think it through."

Xing Feng said: "Zhang Hua, it seems like you can't get past Mr. Wu today. Let's focus on him. Did he cause any trouble on the road when you were arresting him?" Zhang Hua was stunned by the question.
The scene shifts to a highway at night, where a driver is cursing at the driver in front of him through the rearview mirror, saying: "Your driving is really rough"
Informant asked, "Are you guys aiming at me?" The informant was none other than Zhang Hua.
Zhang Hua said: "Mr. Wu, you're really unlucky" "We didn't intend to aim for you" "but you came out as a big star" "If I don't aim for you, who should I aim for?"
Xing Feng asked: "How long did you drive?"
Zhang Hua said: "I drove that car for about" "Stop trying to trick me", "I've told you all the conditions, you think about it again"
Xing Feng said: "Let's talk about something else." "Let's talk about your gun." "Your gun is nice." "Where did you get it?" "Show me the way."

Meanwhile, the three people who had been driving the off-road vehicle had already parked the car by the river and were standing by the riverbank. The three of them were looking at the river, when suddenly a car from the opposite side came driving over. The three people hurriedly got into the car and drove away.
Informant said: "He says they don't know your big brother"
Xing Feng said, "As long as they know the money, I can pay for the next batch of guns together"
Xing Feng said, "What's happening?"
Informant turned around and said: "They don't want to sell it to you"
Team Member with Hat asked, "Why not?"
Informant said: "They say you look like a cop" Zhang Hua smiled and nodded.
Team Member with Hat said: "Do I look like a cop?"
Detective Chief said: "You? You're just a piece of shit"
Xing Feng said: "Stop looking for trouble and continue telling the story"
Zhang Hua asked: "What are they saying?"
Informant said: "They say we both are cops"

The scene shifts to the seaside, where Informant is crying bitterly. A subordinate holding a knife stands behind him, glaring at him angrily. Zhang Hua, with tears streaming down his face, asks, "How does the friend say it?"

The two seized the opportunity to subdue Informant, and then took the firearms from the car and loaded them into the bag. Informant was shoved into the car by the two. The three of them looked at the frozen lake, and suddenly Informant was hit by something from behind, and then a large amount of water sprayed from the lake.

The scene shifts to the coast, where Xing Feng and Informant are being searched by armed police. Meanwhile, inside the car, Team Member is watching the police at the rearview mirror, when suddenly someone snatches his gun away.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: He looked around, then turned and left. The sun was gradually setting, and the flowers in the meadow had already bloomed.
Mo Han said: "Thank you for taking care of me these days."
Lin Lin said: "The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say. Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?"
Mo Han asked: 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said: "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Mo Han said: "Then it should be well protected."

Lin Lin said: "Could you help me put it on?" Mo Han smiled, took the beaded necklace from Lin Lin's hand, carefully fastened it around her neck, and gently kissed her forehead. Lin Lin, with a shy smile, leaned into Mo Han's embrace.
Lin Lin said: "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said: "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said: "You only live once, cherish it."
Lin Lin said: "Thank you for giving me the courage to love again."
Lin Lin looked at the necklace and said: "You gave me a gift." "Can I take you out for a meal?"
Mo Han said: "Today, huh"
Lin Lin said: "Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes."
Mo Han said: "I can't today, I have an appointment. Let's change it to another day. I'll invite you."
Lin Lin thought for a moment and said: "Hmm, who's more important than me?"
Mo Han said: "An old friend, we've grown up together."
Lin Lin asked: "Is it your childhood sweetheart?"
Mo Han asked: "What are you thinking?"
Lin Lin, shyly covering her face, got up and ran away, leaving Mo Han sitting there, bewildered.

At night, the campus was quiet and dimly lit. Mo Han, dressed in a dark qipao, sneaked into the courtyard with a determined look on his face. He stopped in front of a classroom, glanced around to make sure no one was around, and then climbed up the window sill.

The two of them ran all the way, finally stopping. Lu Xiao arrived at the scene and saw that the two had disappeared. The area was too remote, with only a few sporadic sounds of crickets and dogs breaking the silence.
Lu Xiao watched their departing figures, a mix of emotions welling up inside. After a while, he also left, but his gaze never left the two until they were out of sight.
Suddenly, a bullet pierced his left arm. Mo Han quickly grabbed the wound, using his right hand to hold down his left hand, and his head lowered as he knelt on the ground.
Mo Han's brows furrowed tightly, his face covered with sweat. He struggled to control his emotions, swallowing hard and then bending down to pick up the photo.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2460_2640.text: Drug Dealer stands up and says: "This has its use" "Exchange it for your dad to come back".

The police officer in charge of listening to music during the day had already set up a listening post in the park. He was wearing headphones and using a special machine to extract music from the shoe. After successfully separating the music, he compared it with the original on the computer.
The people behind him were all talking, only Dentist was silent, his eyes were dull, and he seemed to be thinking about something.
The soldier stamped the pass. The story of the past few days was like a dream, and the moment he left the station, he turned around and walked back.

The car sped forward, and after a while, it reached the intersection where the three had parted ways. At this moment, the car stopped, and the driver, who had just left the vehicle, happened to run into the speeding car.
At this moment, a car slowly stopped in front of him. The man in the passenger seat was none other than the boss, Sugar Daddy.

Dentist got out of the car and walked towards the front of the vehicle. At this moment, the rear door of the car was opened, and the drug dealers threw the captured Song Tao into the back seat. The car was filled with the smell of gunpowder and gasoline. The drug dealers sat in the car, holding their guns, and stared at the driver without saying a word.
The two drove away, leaving the two others to continue their conversation. The car gradually disappeared into the distance.

The scene shifts to a vast cornfield, with a tractor in the distance stirring up dust as it moves. The tractor is getting closer, cutting through the sea of corn, and the dust it kicks up is like a moving shadow.
The scene shifts to a bustling street, where a middle-aged man is driving slowly forward.
The car continued to drive forward, and the newspaper was still being read.
Sugar Daddy's Son looked at the newspaper and said: "Why are there no photos?" "Not a single photo." "Why should I believe he's not dead?"

Dentist: "He's really not dead." "When he was first captured, I even checked his teeth." Hearing this, Drug Dealer looked at Dentist in disbelief. Dentist continued: "He's definitely alive." "I guarantee it."

Dentist's son looked at the two people on the rocks and said: "Bring him back, otherwise, your daughter won't survive." After hearing this, the man's smile disappeared in an instant. He turned his head to look at the two people on the rocks, then looked at the feet of the person on top of the rock, who was wearing a leather shoe with a bent sole.

After saying this, he slapped Dentist and then continued: "I'll give you, a week." "If you're a day late" "I'll chop off your daughter's finger." "Ten days late" "I'll kill her." After saying this, he turned and left. The boss, who had been watching the whole thing, was stunned.
At this moment, a pair of leather shoes stepped on the toes of a pair of slippers, and the boss, with his hand on his chin, looked over.
Sugar Daddy's Son pointed to his own eye and said, "If my dad doesn't come back" "you'll die too." Then he punched him.
Dentist, with his head bowed, remained silent for a long time before slowly saying: "Let me see my daughter," "Just one look."
Drug Dealer said: "I'll let you see," "We'll go now."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2520_2700.text: Shen Mo, while eating, said: "Actually, I have brain cancer. I've been working so many part-time jobs just to gather enough money for medical expenses. I haven't told anyone about this. I'm afraid they'll worry about me."

Xiaoli Ma said: "I think lately, a lot of people have been getting this illness. It's almost become an epidemic. Once you get it, there's no curing it. You won't live much longer. So, you should just enjoy life, eat and drink what you like. Take it easy and have a little fun, see if there's any wish you haven't fulfilled yet. Or, if there's still money left unspent, I could help you with that."
Shen Mo, moved by the sentiment, smiled and said: "Sis, how about I give you a foot massage? I also work part-time at a massage parlor,"
Xiaoli Ma, getting off the bench, said: "Taxi." A taxi arrived, and Xiaoli Ma said to Shen Mo: "Give me that medicine." "How are you going to explain it if you take it back?"
Shen Mo said: "Sis, what if it actually works? Give it a try."
Xiaoli Ma said: "Do you think I'd believe what you say? Drive." Shen Mo smiled and closed the car door.
Du Yu, holding a pot, walked to the door of Room 2510, knocked, and asked, "Xiao Wei, are you in?"
The BMW stopped in front of a residential building, and Shen Mo and Xiao Wei got out. They opened the door for Du Yu, who was carrying a hot pot, and Du Yu praised: "How adorable!"
Xiao Wei asked: "What are you doing here?"
Du Yu said: "I've brought some soup." "You must be anxious, sorry for keeping you waiting." "I just couldn't get away earlier."
Xiao Wei asked puzzledly: "Who wants soup this late?"

Du Yu explained: "This soup is meant to be drunk before bed. It’s nutritious, beautifying, and can even help with sleep. You have to drink it while it’s hot. It can't be reheated. Once reheated, it loses its nutrients. Don't you take it, let me carry it in for you."
Xiao Wei angrily said: "What are you doing? Take a good look at yourself holding your soup, you poor jerk. Get lost."
Du Yu looked at Xiao Wei and said: "Then I'll just leave the soup here and go."
Xiao Wei said: "Take your soup and get lost with it."
Shen Mo said: "Hey," and then Du Yu entered the elevator with the trophy.

Xiao Wei, dressed in a bunny suit, stood at the door, unable to help but eavesdrop on the conversation between Shen Mo and Du Yu. After confirming that neither had noticed her, she sneaked away, opening the door to find Shen Mo standing there.
The boss said: "Honey, you look so happy today." The boss patted Xiao Wei's butt and went inside.
Yao Zong was drinking at a table, and Shen Mo came in. Yao Zong was still in his drunken haze when he saw Shen Mo.
Yao Zong approached Jia Zong and said: "Come on, buddy." "You look so familiar to me."
Jia Zong said: "Do we live in the same building?" "Here's a toast to you."

movie101_6991751088659497479_5580_5760.text: The police officer says, 'The safety of the hostages is paramount. Shoot the suspect as soon as they raise their gun. Everyone needs to stay safe as well.'
Xing Feng: 'We should go through the woods for better cover.'
Cang Zi: 'That is,' 'the suspect said he wants to see the first person to go in.' Cao Gang and Xing Feng exchange a glance and step forward.
Zhang Hua: 'Just a reminder, my brothers all have their guns loaded. First in, first dead. Headshot.'
Cao Gang: "Got it." Zhang Hua hands over the package, Cao Gang takes it and says, "Thanks," and then closes the trunk.
The alarm clock on the table shows 8:55 AM, Cang Zi opens the drawer to get a gun, Xiao Lei comes over and says, "Bro, remember what you said, we must succeed."
The scene shifts to the police station, where the fire is still raging outside. Inside, Mr. Wu is handcuffed to a bed frame. Da Wei takes out a key and says to Mr. Wu, 'Hurry up, hurry up.'
Cang Zi: "Fatty," "What are you doing?"
Mr. Wu: "Hurry up, ignore him, and open it quickly."
Da Wei: "He still has two million."
Mr. Wu hurriedly says, "Don't hit him! Stop. Everyone calm down. It's just death."
The scene shifts to the early morning of the next day, an alarm clock sounds, Cang Zi and Da Wei are handcuffed to the radiator, Zhang Hua rushes over and says, 'Brother Cang, what are you doing?'

Cang Zi: "To avoid trouble later." Cang Zi quickly locks Xing Feng's hand with a padlock, Cang Zi and Da Wei work together to lock Xing Feng's hands to the bed head, then Cang Zi goes to lock Zhang Hua's hands, but Zhang Hua dodges, leaving only one hand chained.
Xiao Lei holding a gun says, "It's not time yet."
Cang Zi: 'Shut up.'
Xiao Lei: 'Brother Hua said it's not time yet.'
Cang Zi holding a gun says, 'Put the gun down.'
Da Wei hurriedly says: "Let go, let go, let go."
Xiao Lei: "Hurry up, no more stalling. Together."
Cang Zi viciously slaps Mr. Wu and says, "Accept it, it's fate."
Xiao Lei, seeing the dire situation, forcefully pushes Mr. Wu aside and strangles Xing Feng with a wire. The others watch Xiao Lei in shock, while Xing Feng struggles desperately.
Xing Feng is handcuffed to a chair, unable to move. He looks around in a panic, seeing the chains on his feet and the iron door in front of him.

Zhang Hua is awakened from sleep by the noise, he opens his eyes and realizes that he is being choked by someone behind him, he struggles hard but cannot break free, he looks around and sees that everyone is being taken away.
The scene switches to Xing Feng and Zhang Hua being tied to a chair, with chains binding their hands and feet.

The police push open the door one by one and rush into the room, Xing Feng immediately runs to the back of the room searching for the hostage, the police carefully search the rooms, one after another,

The police swarmed into the house, with Cang Zi being pinned face down on the bed, his hands and feet tightly bound. Zhang Hua, with his back to the police, was also covered in blood. Xing Feng was frantically trying to untie himself, while Da Wei was struggling in the corner.

The SWAT team kicks open the door of the billiard shop, and Cang Zi and Da Wei are arrested. Xing Feng is also tied up together with the boss of the billiard shop, then they are all taken to the police station.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2640_2820.text: The car stopped by the roadside, and after the door opened, the man who got out was none other than Drug Dealer.

After saying that, he pushed Dentist away, got into the car, and closed the door. Then he walked to the other side, pulled out his gun, and pointed it at Dentist, saying, "Your child is dead," "You go see her."
The white clouds in the sky were drifting slowly.
After finishing speaking, he let go of the hand holding the gun, and then raised his hand to hold the gun with his foot, pressing it firmly against the ground.
He then took out a handgun, stepped on the sole of the shoe under his foot, and pulled out the handgun from the bottom of the shoe.

The police monitoring next to the scene heard the gunshot and immediately reported it to their superiors. After confirming the location from the map, the police immediately dispatched officers to the scene. Drug Dealer threw the handgun into the river and got into the car to wait for the police to arrive.

He turned around, only to see the drunken Dentist lying on the ground. He was stunned for a moment, then turned back to look at the unconscious Xiao An in the back seat of the car. After a moment of thought, he carried the shoe in his hand and walked towards Dentist. The drunken Dentist looked at him with a confused expression, and then Drug Dealer kicked the shoe into Dentist's face.
He took out a plastic bag from the toilet, put it in the bag, tied it up, and then looked up at the sky with a sense of resignation.

He then took out a trash can and a plastic bag, tore open the bag, placed the opium in his hand into the bag, and then threw the bag into the toilet. Afterward, he sat on the toilet and flushed the bag away.
He then went to the bathroom, where he used a shovel to burn the plastic bag containing the child's body. After the bag was almost empty, he took it out and spread it over the toilet lid.

He then squatted down, opened the black bag, and after a while, he stood up, walked to the side of the medicine cabinet, and began to search for something. After a while, he found what he was looking for and then returned to the side of the medicine cabinet, opened the cabinet door he had found, and put the object he had found into the cabinet.
He then turned around, raised his hands, and pried open the ceiling tiles above. After lifting the tiles, a round metal box was revealed. He reached up and took down the metal box.
He then went to the bathroom, lifted the toilet lid, and began scrubbing the inside with a cloth. After cleaning, he looked at the shelf filled with bottles of medicine.
After a while, he pushed open the bathroom door, and the toilet was already clean. He stepped on the rag under the toilet, lifted the curtain, and peed.

The man in black who rushed in was knocked down by Drug Dealer's gun. He was hit in the left shoulder and fell against the wall. Xiao An, who was hiding in the corner, saw the man in black fall and let out a sigh.
The scene shifts to the toilet, where Xiao An is sitting quietly on the toilet, looking at the man with a gun in front of her. The man asked, "Is my godfather dead or alive"
Drug Dealer replied, "He was killed on the spot", and then continued walking forward.
