movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Mo Han's face was covered with sweat, and he was panting heavily. He looked at Lu Xiao with a face full of sympathy. Just then, Lu Xiao struggled to stand up, pulled out his gun, and pointed it at Mo Han.
Mo Han said: "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao asked: "Mo Han Secretary, where are you going in such a hurry?"
Mo Han replied with a smile: "I'm just strolling around."
Lu Xiao said: "Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?"
Mo Han looked at him and said: "Lu Xiao, you seem well informed."
Lu Xiao said sternly: "Speak up, who are you meeting?"
Mo Han said: "Do I need to tell you?"
Lu Xiao pointed the gun at Mo Han and said: "Don't play dumb with me. Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists? Speak up."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government."
Lu Xiao said excitedly: "A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life. You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see."
Mo Han smiled and said, "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."
Lu Xiao was surprised and said: "What? Miss Che?"
Mo Han said with a smile: "Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee."
Lu Xiao put down the gun and said: "Darn, why didn't you say that earlier? Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed. Go ahead, go ahead!"
Mo Han said: "Then I'm leaving."
Lu Xiao laughed and said: "Go ahead, go ahead." Mo Han smiled and walked out of the courtyard.
The next morning, Mo Han arrived at the door of Yu Xuan's room as agreed. He knocked on the door and said, "Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper."
Yu Xuan said: "Come in."
The door opened, and Mo Han entered. Seeing the beautiful woman in front of him, he was stunned for a moment. Yu Xuan also turned around and saw him, their eyes met, and the atmosphere became tense.
Mo Han said: "Yu Xuan"
Mo Han couldn't believe it at first, but soon embraced Yu Xuan tightly. He held Yu Xuan in his arms and said: "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"

Yu Xuan pulled Mo Han aside and said: "Comrade Hong Zichen, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him."

Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan and said: "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"
Mo Han said: "Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?"
Yu Xuan said: "Unfortunately, that password is a fake."
Mo Han said in disbelief: "Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber."
Yu Xuan said: "The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2700_2880.text: Man said: "Girl, don't touch everything," "Have some quality."

Man looked at the two of them and said, "The person who just left was not like this, how come he comes back like another person?"
Du Yu came out and said: "How come he's drunk again? Sorry, he's just like this when he drinks too much. Come on, let's go home."
Shen Mo said: "I feel miserable."
Shen Mo said: "Feeling miserable"
Du Yu complained: "Living is so tiring."
Man said to the others: "You guys, don't drink with him in the future." "He's too divisive."

Shen Mo, frustrated, said: "You've had your fun and games, birthday celebrations, and matchmaking sessions. I'm as exhausted as an old man. Just because of your trivial matter today, my lifetime's happiness has been ruined by you. Do you know what the girl called me? Huh? A poor loser. If it weren't for following you, I would just snap my fingers and tens of thousands would roll in."
Shen Mo said: "What's the matter, can't stand it anymore? Nobody is forcing you."
Shen Mo said to Du Yu: "Clean up inside later." After saying this, he turned and left.
Du Yu, who was sitting in the restaurant, immediately took out his phone and sent a message to Xiaoli Ma saying: "I'm sorry, I'll be a little while."
At this moment, a BMW sped past the restaurant, and Du Yu was mopping the floor at the entrance.
The scene switches to Xiaoli Ma's home, where Xiaoli Ma is meditating in the lotus position and asks, "What do you think," "if a guy saw you having a nosebleed," "what would it be?"
Xiaoli Ma said: "I'm done."
Xiaoli Ma said: "Isn't it a sign of liking?"

Xiaoli Ma sat on the couch meditating and said, "Sis, you're overthinking." Xiaoli Ma was meditating on the couch while her roommate was doing stretching exercises behind her. She closed her eyes, took a deep breath, and focused on her weight loss plan. She was determined to reach her target weight of 120 pounds.

movie101_6967711402819584543_2820_3000.text: Dentist looked at the river, recalling the scene of fishing with his father when he was young.

Dentist walked into the bathroom, closed the door, and leaned a stool against it. He stood on the stool, reached up to remove the fluorescent light, and after unscrewing the bulb, he looked down at the light housing. He then took off the light housing and checked underneath.

At night, the alley was pitch black. A man walked out from the shadows, holding a gun and cautiously moving forward. He glanced around warily, his eyes darting left and right. He then turned and hid under a bridge, peeking ahead.
At this moment, the scene shifted to a man in a coat holding a thermos, standing in the shadows of the factory, motionless.

The police handcuffed his hands behind his back. The officer pressed his hand on Dentist's shoulder, but he shook it off. Dentist said, 'You can't arrest me.' 'You've arrested me.' 'What about my daughter?'
Dentist recalled the day he and his father stood by the river, gazing into the distance.

The scene shifts to the kitchen, where Drug Dealer is cooking. He cracked an egg into the pan, and a sizzling sound came from the stove. He turned to look at Xiao An sitting at the dining table, who was staring at the tablecloth, motionless.
After finishing speaking, he turned and walked towards the dining table. He sat down slowly, his eyes staring straight ahead, as if he had lost his soul.

At this moment, Xiao An was quietly eating breakfast. After taking a small bite, she chewed and swallowed, looking up at her father. Drug Dealer rested his chin on his hand, gazing at Xiao An with a smile.
At this moment, Xiao An was quietly eating porridge, occasionally glancing at the door. The father rested his head in his hand, his eyes unfocused, looking rather despondent.
After finishing the last bite of her breakfast, Xiao An looked up and stared blankly ahead.
The scene shifts to the prison, where the guard is waiting for the prisoner transport. The prison guard calls out, "Godfather's Son, Godfather's Son."
The officer in the police uniform nodded slightly, then turned his head to look at the guard outside the door.
The scene shifts to Godfather's Son returning home. He opened the door and saw a police officer standing at the entrance. He didn't say anything, just quietly closed the door.
The security guard bowed to Old Lin, and Old Lin returned the bow. After that, he walked straight into the courtyard.
Godfather's Son sat on the sofa, holding Xiao An in his arms, staring at Drug Dealer. Then, he slowly extended his little finger towards Drug Dealer.
The camera slowly zoomed in, revealing the sad expression on Drug Dealer's face. His eyes were filled with regret and self-torture.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5760_5940.text: Xing Feng walked up to Mr. Wu and whispered something in his ear.
Xing Feng looked at Mr. Wu, the subordinate patted his face and said: "Don't be afraid". Then he took out a cloth bag and covered Mr. Wu's head.
The scene shifts to a dimly lit room, where an alarm clock on the table shows 9:59 PM. An apple is knocked into the air, spinning rapidly. A man lies on the ground, his face distorted in agony.
Xing Feng took out a key and unlocked the chains on Mr. Wu's hands.
Xing Feng was handcuffed to the car door, staring in horror at the police across from him.

The heater was placed on the floor, and the fuse was connected to it. With the ignition of the heater, the bomb was triggered. The police stormed the house, and Mr. Wu walked out of the house. Cao Gang came over and shook Mr. Wu's hand, saying: "You've worked hard."
The police car stopped in front of a special vehicle. Mr. Wu and his men got off the car. Mr. Wu looked back and saw Xing Feng and others standing in the cold wind.
Mr. Wu looked at the vehicle, then with difficulty, supported himself on the car door and got in. The police quickly helped the others into the car.
Cao Gang walked to the back of the car and gently tapped it. A row of police cars with sirens blaring slowly arrived.
The police cars were flashing their sirens as they drove on the road. Inside the armored vehicle, Mr. Wu was holding onto the handle above with one hand, his face showing a trace of nervousness.
Cao Gang asked: "Mr. Wu, why haven't you said a word since we went in"
Xing Feng asked Mr. Wu: "Have you encountered many such scenes when filming"
Mr. Wu: "The shooting is fake""This is real""It really happened""Thank you""Thank you"
Mr. Wu and Cao Gang exchanged a glance, the escort of police cars continued forward, and the reunion of Xing Feng and President Cheng was about to take place.
Mr. Wu hugged Xing Feng tightly, his eyes filled with tears. He had been wronged, but now he had his son back, and he had his life. This was the greatest comfort in his heart.
Mr. Wu cried on Mr. Su's shoulder, the tough facade broken down. He looked up at Mr. Su, who patted his shoulder consolingly. Xing Feng looked down at the scene, feeling a sense of loss.
President Cheng holding flowers said: "The flowers are for the Missus, don’t argue when you get home"
Xiao Dou came over and said: "Mr. Wu bro""This is my girlfriend"
Xiao Dou's Girlfriend shook hands and said: "Thank you, thank you so much" "Really, I thank you"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said: "I translated it wrong, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password."
Mo Han nodded and said: "Alright."
Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han, her eyes filled with worry, and asked, "Are your injuries completely healed?"
Mo Han said: "I'm fine now."
Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han and said: "You need to take good care of yourself."
Mo Han said with a bitter smile: "So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime."
Yu Xuan said angrily: "I forbid you to talk like that."
Mo Han, with a face full of sorrow, turned around and said: "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."
Mo Han said: "You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse."
Mo Han was momentarily speechless, turned sideways to avoid Yu Xuan's gaze, but Yu Xuan stared intently at him.

Mo Han said, "I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you." He took out the necklace from his pocket, put it around Yu Xuan's neck, and gently fastened it. Yu Xuan looked at him with a face full of meaning.
Mo Han said: "Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words."
Yu Xuan asked: "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"
Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan and said: "Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me."
Yu Xuan said: "You must return safely, promise me that."
Mo Han wiped his tears and said: "It's getting late, I should go back now." "Take care!"
Yu Xuan stopped Mo Han and said: "Wait." Yu Xuan followed closely behind Mo Han, adjusting his clothes and said: "Take care."

Mo Han, with a face full of disdain, walked away without looking back. Yu Xuan, who was originally behind Mo Han, stood still, holding the needle in her hand, staring at Mo Han's back with a face full of disbelief.
Mo Han, who had been quietly following behind, saw Che Linlin and immediately turned around and left in haste.
Mo Han was stunned for a moment, then quickly walked towards Che Linlin and said: "Linlin, what are you doing here?"
Che Linlin asked: "Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her."
Mo Han asked in confusion: "What are you talking about?"
Che Linlin said: "Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie."

movie101_6967711402819584543_3000_3180.text: The scene shifts to a temple, where a group of monks are lined up, chanting mantras.

He arrived at the guest room door, hesitated for a moment, and then pushed the door open. After entering the room, he closed the door firmly. The room was simple, with a mirror, a washbasin, and a towel hanging on the wall. He walked to the washbasin and turned on the faucet.

After the martial arts demonstration, the monks led the guests to the dormitory. Drug Dealer, with a smile, took a towel from the drying rack. On the second-floor balcony, Xiao An was drying her hair with the towel. As she passed by Drug Dealer, she gave him a meaningful look. Drug Dealer, sensing something, quickly averted his gaze.
The scene shifts to a monk in a temple, chanting scriptures with a fan. The next day, Drug Dealer returns home, pushes open the door to find his brother still sleeping in bed.

The scene shifts to a small wooden house on the opposite bank of the Yangtze River. A group of people, including Drug Dealer and Sugar Daddy's Son, walk towards the house. Inside, a group of monks is seated in a row, chanting in unison.

After saying this, the young monks quickly left, and then the door was locked from the inside. Drug Dealer, who was repairing the door, was hit in the head by an axe and fell to the ground. It turned out that Sugar Daddy's Son had been plotting all along. Before he died, he looked at the photos of himself and his father in the Buddhist hall.
At this moment, the monks inside the hall were chanting sutras, and Drug Dealer was kneeling in front of the Buddha statue, bowing his head and chanting along.
Drug Dealer stood up, his eyes suddenly becoming firm.

The scene switches to a monk in a temple, methodically placing a headband on a foreigner's forehead. The foreigner closed his eyes in fear, while outside the temple, a group of men in black were incessantly firing their guns.
At this moment, the drug dealer who had just shot the man in the hat was still in the midst of a ceremony, unaware of what was about to happen.
Monk smiled and patted his head. After finishing the ceremony, Monk turned and walked out of the main hall.

The scene shifts to the church in the Golden Triangle. Inside, a young man kneels before a table covered with a cloth, his hands clasped in prayer. He then kneels down completely, bowing his head to the table. On the table lies the body of a young man, his face covered in blood.

The next morning, the sunlight shone through the window onto the table. The bottles and cups on the table were still there, but the person lying beside them was gone. The next second, the sound of a car engine starting came from outside the house.
The scene shifts, and Drug Dealer, accompanied by his daughter, stands on the beach.

The scene shifts to a luxurious villa, where Xiao An and Drug Dealer walk down the stairs hand in hand. The villa's furnishings are lavish, with crystal-clear glass doors and a European-style interior.
The scene shifts to a woman wearing a hat, standing by the river, her back to the camera, looking into the distance. Her hair, not yet shoulder-length, sways in the wind. She is Xiao An.
Xiao An, wearing a hat, stood by the river, her back to Drug Dealer. She said: "I'm out."

movie101_7052960987330118151_2880_3060.text: Xiaoli Ma picked up the photo frame and looked at it, the empty space left by her boyfriend made her heartache. She threw the photo frame on the ground, her emotions completely breaking down.
Xiaoli Ma said: "What are you guys going to do about the contract?" "I signed it anyway."
Lan Lan brushing her teeth said: "The platform is high," "resources are plenty," "we must sign," "I don't want to be stuck in this lousy place anymore."
Qi Qi said: 'Lan Lan sister.'
Xiaoli Ma said: 'Huh?'
Qi Qi asked, "What's your take?"
Xiaoli Ma asked, "Will our boss agree?"
Xiaoli Ma said while reading the box: "Does he have a say?" "He doesn't even sign a contract with us." "It's just a makeshift outfit."

Xiaoli Ma said: "Just give a heads-up later."
Qi Qi walked out while brushing her teeth and said, 'Sister Lan Lan, are you done yet? I'm brushing my gums off here.'
Qi Qi replied: "Yes, sister, the pills are pretty strong today." "You've been glued to the toilet."

Talent Agency Manager said: 'Following your instructions, I have arranged everything for these three girls.' 'Honestly, these three girls have indeed performed well.' 'Your discernment is commendable.'

Talent Agency Manager said: 'Brother Shen Mo, rest assured, we've long stopped those old illegal programs.' 'Following your guidance, we've successfully transformed and found a new profitable model.' 'Here's my business card.' Saying this, he handed over a business card.
Shen Mo took the business card and said, 'Quite a few titles.'
Talent Agency Manager said: "Don't laugh" "The more identities I have" "The less of myself remains"
Xiaoli Ma asked the vendor: "How much are these cucumbers?" "Do you have better ones?"
Shen Mo said, 'Don't touch, I've bought all the cucumbers.'
Shen Mo, who was packing things, looked up and said, "Sister, what a coincidence, what are you doing here?"
Xiaoli Ma said, 'I forgot you live here too.'
Shen Mo looked up and said: 'I'll go check it out.'
Xiaoli Ma said to Shen Mo: "I think, this outfit suits you better."
Shen Mo said: 'Sister, our restaurant buys in bulk, don't mind. If you like cucumbers, I'll save you a couple.'

Xiaoli Ma replied, 'Thank you, but I'm avoiding cucumbers today.' Xiaoli Ma smiled and declined, then turned and left. Shen Mo watched Xiaoli Ma leave, and the woman who had been buying vegetables also left with her basket. Shen Mo pushed the shopping cart and followed Xiaoli Ma, who was wearing a wig and pretending to be a middle-aged woman.
Shen Mo said, 'Sister, I've got two extra cucumbers. Do you want them?'
Xiaoli Ma said, 'No need. Keep it for yourself.'
Shen Mo said, 'Sister, you've lost weight, were you using those pills?'
Xiaoli Ma said: "With your unreliable character and an untrustworthy company, do you think I would dare try it?"

Shen Mo said while walking: "You don't have to try them," "Although the pills are effective," "There can be some side effects initially," "Like diarrhea or so," "But it goes away with use," "And the results get better with continuous use."
Xiaoli Ma said, '"Do you think I would still believe you?" Xiaoli Ma finished speaking and walked away without looking back.
Xiaoli Ma looked at the box in her hand, then glanced at the door, and hurriedly ran to open it. Lan Lan said: 'Sister, hurry up, I can't hold it anymore.' Xiaoli Ma took the box and said: 'Sis.'
Lan Lan opened the door and said, 'Hang in there.'
Du Yu, who was busy with the fish outside, was playing with his phone inside. He saw a group of girls getting out of a car across the street and said, 'They're here.'
Du Yu, with a silly smile, looked like a mischievous child.
"We don't have any," "The place is closed." Du Yu said while picking up the trash and leaving.

movie101_6991751088659497479_5940_6120.text: The four brothers hugged each other tightly, dispersing the sadness of parting.

The broadcast began: "This is China's number one music station from China International Broadcasting Station." "Hello everyone, I'm Matty."

The news broadcast continued: "Next, we have the latest news."
The news reported: "Last night, the local police solved a kidnapping case," "capturing a total of five suspects," "and successfully rescuing two hostages."

The news reported: 'Okay, this is very good news. It is reported that one of the hostages is a famous movie star. Our station will provide further reports on the case.' The city at night is brightly lit, with cars coming and going incessantly.

The scene shifts to a courtroom, and the voiceover continues: 'The Beijing No.2 Intermediate People's Court made the final judgment on the 223 kidnapping case.' 'For crimes of kidnapping and intentional homicide,' 'illegal trading of firearms and ammunition,' 'sentencing Zhang Hua and two others to death,' 'and the rest of the accomplices were sentenced to life imprisonment and fixed-term imprisonment.'
Xing Feng said to Zhang Hua: "Control your emotions, don't get too excited."
Zhang Hua said: "Mom, I'm at peace now, no need to worry."
Zhang Hua said: "Son, it's my fault for not teaching you well."
Zhang Hua smiled and said: "Alright""Take care of your health while I'm not around."
Zhang Hua said aggrievedly: "In the next life, don't do such things again."
Zhang Hua said: "Let's just end it in this life." "I'll be filial to you in the next."

Zhang Hua hung up the phone, crying uncontrollably. He covered his face with his hands and wept. He hadn't realized how much he loved his father until it was too late. His cries echoed in the interrogation room as he was taken out.
Zhang Hua cried out: "Son, oh my son."
Zhang Hua cried and said: "Let this be my bow to you."
Zhang Hua cried out: "Son"
The police escorted Zhang Hua into the prison van. The prison van slowly drove away, and the prison door slowly closed.
The next day, Xing Feng brought Zhang Hua to the police station. Zhang Hua was already imprisoned, and Xing Feng said to him: "I told him it wasn't necessary to come, but he insisted on seeing you."
Mr. Wu closed the iron door, Zhang Hua was crying bitterly. Mr. Wu said: "I really don't know why, but truly I wanted to see you again."
Zhang Hua, with his hands together, suddenly started praying earnestly: "This is the last chat."
Mr. Wu nodded and said: "It should be."
Zhang Hua said: "What should we talk about?" "Educate me, let off some steam."
Mr. Wu smiled and said: "Before coming, I really had a lot to say to you."

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin said: "Strange, then where have I seen you before?"
Yang Muchen said with a smile: 'Could it be in a dream?'
Che Linlin said: "In a dream."
Yang Muchen asked: 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin said: "Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?"
Yang Muchen said: "A bit. 'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'"
Che Linlin said: "Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.'"
Che Zhenshan said: "Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?"
Yang Muchen replied with a smile: "You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan."
Che Linlin asked: "Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?"
Yang Muchen said: "Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?"
Che Linlin asked: "What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?"

Yang Muchen said: "Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words... The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable. However, not every Japanese person is bad, and....' Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan. They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel."
Yang Muchen smiled and said: "So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party."

Yang Muchen raised his glass and said: "Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that." Yang Muchen raised his glass and clinked it with Che Linlin's cup. Che Zhenshan was stunned. Yang Muchen was about to drink when Che Zhenshan suddenly stood up, grabbed the wine bottle, and filled everyone's cup. Yang Muchen was stunned and quickly grabbed the wine bottle to refill his own glass.
Che Zhenshan said: "Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin."
Che Linlin said: "Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey."

Che Zhenshan said: 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said: 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said: "Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?"
Che Linlin said: "My affairs are none of your business."
Che Zhenshan said: 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin stood up and said: "If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me."
Che Zhenshan said: 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin said: "That..."

movie101_6967711402819584543_300_480.text: Father looked out the window and said, "A car is prepared outside", "Let's leave and go far, far away", "I'm all ready".
Xiao An looked at Father's face, full of reluctance, but still reached out to grab his arm.
Xiao An, who was about to leave, was pulled back by Father. She tried to break free from Father's grip but failed. The two of them stood face to face, Xiao An said: "You want to kidnap me too."
Xiao An looked at Father's outstretched hand, then withdrew her hand and turned to leave. Father stood there, watching her leave, feeling a deep sense of guilt.

The screen goes black, and the title 'Murder' appears. The scene shifts to a car driving on a road at night. The car passes through a forest and then stops by the roadside, with buildings visible in the distance.
The car sped through the suburban streets, passing by various houses and buildings, all of which were lit up with lights.

At this moment, the perpetrator's car arrived at a T-junction. Turning left would lead directly to the residential area, while turning right would take them to the outskirts. The perpetrator naturally chose the latter. Little did they know, a police car had been lying in ambush there for a while. The two cars drove side by side for a while before the perpetrator suddenly accelerated and rammed the police car.
Young Police Officer pulled the trigger, and the man in the car slumped over, opening the door to fall out.
He then took out the parts of the surveillance system from the box, and found a set of keys inserted into one of the pipes. He picked up the keys and looked at them.
He looked at the bullet in his hand, his expression complex. He put the bullet back in its place and continued to watch the two in the room.
At this moment, a figure flashed in front of him. Young Police Officer turned his head and saw someone hiding behind a large truck. He immediately turned around and walked towards the other side.

Young Police Officer, who had been waiting under the truck for a long time, saw the opportune moment and immediately pounced. He crawled under the truck as quickly as he could, first checking the rear situation through a gap, then swiftly moving to the front.

Young Police Officer was still pushing the cargo truck. He was getting more and more impatient, his face serious. He didn't even care about the fuel that was splashing on his legs. After a while, he finally got the cargo truck started.

movie101_6967711402819584543_3180_3360.text: Xiao An stood still, staring at him without saying a word.
Drug Dealer sat in the car, looking at the photo with a face full of melancholy.
Dad watched Xiao An leave, standing there in a daze.
Xiao An said: "Dad, I'm fine now." "I'm happy." "Isn't this enough?"
Dad said: "I don't want you to be happy. I want you to live."
Xiao An said: 'I will stay alive.' 'Aren't I living just fine?' 'All these years.' 'Mom was also cared for by him.'
Dad said: "Don't mention him. What caused all this?"

Xiao An said: 'But everything has already happened.' 'There's no going back.' 'We will leave Myanmar someday.' 'If that day comes, I hope Dad will leave with us.' 'But until that day comes, I don't want to change anything.' 'I got used to it.'
Dad looked at Xiao An, his lips quivering slightly, and Xiao An's eyes filled with tears. Dad said, 'I can't understand.'
After hearing this, Xiao An's eyes were filled with tears, and she turned her head to look at Dad.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3060_3240.text: Shen Mo was putting trash in the bin and said, 'Hey, sis, we meet again.'
Xiaoli Ma said, "What bad luck, shouldn't have gone out today. Is there another way home?"
Du Yu said, "Little Shen Mo, didn't you see Xiaoli Ma carrying so many things? We're all neighbors, lend a hand and help carry it over."
Shen Mo said, "Come on, Xiaoli Ma, let me help you."
Xiaoli Ma said: "No need."
Qi Qi handed the lunchbox to Shen Mo and said, "I'll give you a chance, take mine."
Lan Lan pulled Shen Mo's hand and said, "Keep the balance."
Shen Mo said, "Thank you."
Lan Lan said, "Thank you, thank you. Just put it here, right here."

Shen Mo pulled Lan Lan into the house and said, "Everything is nice in this community, except for the many rooms, the toilets that don't work well, electrical circuits and pipes that are aging, a lot needs to be replaced."
Lan Lan asked, "How do you know that?"

Shen Mo said: "I often come here to deliver food, I'm familiar with the property management. A lot of the rooms, things don't work well, I've fixed them myself. Is there anything broken at your place? Might as well fix it now that I'm here."
Qi Qi said: "Our Li Jie has fixed everything. These little things are no problem for her."
Xiaoli Ma said, 'Don't chat with unreliable folks. Hurry upstairs and get things organized.'
Lan Lan stood up and said, "Bye-bye."
Shen Mo said, 'We're neighbors, just shout if you need help.' The two of them laughed and closed the door.
Shen Mo walked ahead with a gloomy face. Xiaoli Ma followed and asked, "Are you afraid of cockroaches?"
Shen Mo crawled under the bed with a lighter in hand.
Shen Mo crawled out from under the bed and asked, "Where was it before?"
Xiaoli Ma said, 'There, there, there, lift the carpet, that side, over there.'
Shen Mo bent down to pick up the fire extinguisher on the ground and said, 'Nope.'
Shen Mo came down from the second floor, saw the book Xiaoli Ma was reading, and picked it up. Shen Mo said, 'Sis, you perform so well, just relying on this book?'

Xiaoli Ma said, 'Enough of that. Fifty-five yuan, money wasted. Sis’s success today, let me tell you, is because of my talent and hard work. Besides, you're so young, why don't you do something more serious instead of fooling around all day?'
Xiaoli Ma turned around and said, 'Sorry, I forgot, you have a problem in your head.'
Shen Mo said, "I'm learning acting, too."
Xiaoli Ma said, "Aren't you just left with the last three months? Why waste that time?"

Shen Mo said: 'Actually, when I was very young, my parents passed away. I grew up with my aunt. My aunt has a strong personality, married three times, and as far as I remember, it’s just continuous transfers, moving, fighting, and running away. I often wonder why I can't be like other kids.'
Shen Mo sat up and said, 'Why do we only live once? There are so many things that there's not enough time to do, so many emotions that we never get the chance to feel.'
Shen Mo looked at the receipts and said, 'I think, maybe acting can make up for these regrets, to experience different lives. If that's the case, three months will be enough.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said: "But I was wrong, why did you hide that you have a fiancée, why didn't you tell me earlier, you can say directly if you don't like me, I didn't force you, you shouldn't lie to me."

Mo Han chased after Lin Lin and shouted: "Lin Lin!"

Lin Lin said: "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"

Mo Han's actions were gentle, and Lin Lin felt a deep sense of guilt. She looked up at Mo Han, her eyes full of grievance and unwillingness, as if she was about to burst into tears at any moment.

Mo Han watched Lin Lin's angry back, feeling very confused. He didn't understand why Lin Lin was so upset about a man's name. But he knew that Lin Lin was determined, so he could only stand by and wait for the right moment to make his move.
Lu Xiao said: "Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line, he has a woman at home and still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin, what the hell is this."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: The group leader turned around and said: "Still the woman who has seen him."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: The scene switches to Hong Zichen who has returned to the office, listening to a phone call from the other side.

What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us. Let's do this instead: you don't disclose my identity, and I'll give you a sum of money. As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?'
Man, with a face ashen, looked at Hong Zichen. Hong Zichen stared back at him, and after a moment, Man sneered.

Man said: "My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late."

Man replied: "No problem"
Hong Zichen said: "Then you go on ahead."

Man replied: "See you, see you." After Man left, Hong Zichen immediately took out his pistol and aimed it at the courtyard, but unexpectedly, the target suddenly ran into the house, so Hong Zichen had to put away his gun and followed.

movie101_6967711402819584543_3900_4080.text: Xiao An, who had been waiting anxiously on the shore with the group, finally breathed a sigh of relief as the boat drifted further away.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3600_3780.text: Boss said: "You can't want nothing", "I give you freedom", "because you brought me happiness", "gave me all the beautiful memories", "how can I bear to let you go"

movie101_6967711402819584543_4080_4260.text: The doorknob of the cell door turned, Killer was standing outside, poking his head in to look at him. Older Brother turned around, glanced at him, then looked back at the door.

Killer tried to open the door, but the doorknob came off in his hand. He looked at the door in disbelief, then at the doorknob on the floor. He kicked it over, and the doorknob hit the ground with a thud.
Killer walked to the end of the hallway, turned to look back, and then turned to walk towards the stairwell.

The sound of the ball rolling came from outside the door. Killer's eyes were fixed on the door, his hand holding the keys, his gaze never leaving the door. Older Brother also noticed the movement outside.

The two of them tiptoed to the door, with Killer pushing the door open first. The dim corridor made it hard to see clearly. The two of them cautiously moved forward, and suddenly, the light in the corridor went out, plunging the place into darkness.

The two walked to the end of the corridor and saw a room with floral curtains. Killer pushed the door in, and the two entered. Killer looked around the room, then closed the door.
Older Brother was silent for a while, then slowly moved to the doorframe, standing still without saying a word.

Older Brother, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally had his patience rewarded. He looked at the door, then at his feet, and then back at the door. He slowly walked towards the door, his steps firm and heavy, as if he was walking on the edge of a cliff.

The light under the door was suddenly turned off, and the shadow of the killer appeared under the door. He reached out and took off his shoes, then quietly walked forward. The shadow under the door moved slowly, corresponding with the killer's steps.
The man in black who rushed in earlier had already reached the cell. He crouched down and pried open the lock on the cell door with a tool.
He then took out a hammer and smashed the lock on the door. After breaking in, he immediately turned on the light, took off his coat, and put it on the chair. Then he opened the safe.

The scene shifts to the door of the house, which slowly opens. Killer, with his head down, stands inside the house. Older Brother, holding a gun at him, cautiously steps forward. Killer looks up at him.

The scene shifts to the bathroom, where the woman is covered in blood, and Killer is nowhere to be seen. movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Mo Han said: "Che Linlin, how did you get here?"
Che Linlin said: "I saw you being chased on the road so I hurried over. Are you okay?"
Mo Han said: "I'm fine, just a little misunderstanding with an old friend."
Che Linlin grabbed Mo Han's hand and said: "I'm glad you're fine."
Mo Han grabbed Che Linlin and said: "Don't run around like this in the future, ok? It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?"

Che Linlin looked back and saw the old man who had just come out of the house. She immediately understood Mo Han's intention and was about to follow. Mo Han said: "You go home first. I still have something to deal with the old friend."
Mo Han looked at Che Linlin, sighed, and said: "Forget it, let's go home together." Then he took Che Linlin's hand and left.
Mo Han took Che Linlin to the second floor of the Zhongyue Department Store, where they saw Little Eyed Man.
Mo Han said: "Speak up, who is he? Speak up, and this is yours."
Little Eyed Man heard this and smiled, saying: "Really?"
Lu Xiao said: "Of course it's real. Of course. You can choose not to say."
Little Eyed Man quickly got up and said: "No, no, no, I'll talk, I'll talk."
Lu Xiao looked at him with a smile, and Che Zhen Shan, after a moment of thought, asked: "Are you saying Yang Mohan is a communist?"

Che Zhen Shan looked troubled, pondered for a moment, and then picked up the teacup beside him to ask: "How much did you give him?"

Lu Xiao asked: "What's happened?"
Che Zhen Shan picked up the teacup, took a sip, and said: "Lu Xiao, if Mo Han was given a gold bar, she would also say you're a communist, you believe it?"

Che Zhen Shan lowered his head after hearing this, sighed, and then said: "I know Che Linlin is with Mohan" "You're not happy in your heart" "But you shouldn't use this way to vent your dissatisfaction."

The scene shifts to the next day, Che Linlin is lying in bed, her face pale and her lips devoid of any color. She was wearing a white shirt, and her long hair was spread out on the pillow. She put her hand on the quilt, ready to get up, but found it difficult to move her legs. The more anxious she became, the harder it was for her to get up.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: Lu Xiao, who had been waiting outside for a long time, saw Little Eyed Man and quickly turned to hide. When Little Eyed Man walked past, he looked up at the building, then turned and left. Lu Xiao, who had been hiding, quickly followed him.

At this moment, Lu Xiao and Che Linlin were strolling in the ancient city. Che Linlin was holding Lu Xiao's arm and introducing the local customs to him. They saw a merchant setting up shop, selling various handicrafts like wooden clappers and shadow puppets.

Younger Sister said: "Then I told my boyfriend""The boyfriend went to find him""When he comes back I asked him where are my glasses""He said sunglasses broken""Buy a new one later""I think it's ok""Buy another one later""Do you know it""He lied to me"

Younger Sister: "He lied to me" "He gave my glasses to another girl!" "That girl is a melon babe" "Wearing my sunglasses and shaking it in front of me" "How could I not hit her?" "This matter" "On the surface is a security issue" "Actually is a relationship issue"
Younger Sister, with a pained expression, tried hard to suppress the discomfort in her body, while Older Brother, sensing her movement, turned his head to look at her.
Older Brother: 'You are just a melon babe', Older Brother looked at her with contempt, and then turned his head away.

The scene shifts to the evening. Older Brother and Middle-aged Policeman are sitting in a hot pot restaurant. Older Brother says, 'This one,' 'I'm still regretting it.'

The scene shifts to a restaurant, where Middle-aged Policeman says to his younger brother: "Wish your action goes smoothly" "So that the innocent don't have to be hurt"

The scene shifts to the first timeline, where Man suddenly stands up and says, 'Let's go home.'

The scene shifts to 1992, in a car, Woman pleads with Jiang Feng: "I beg you" "I was wrong, I am sorry" "Can you let him get off first" "If not, please let him get off."

The car sped forward, leaving a trail of tire marks on the ground. The car drove onto a ramp by the river, the car's front wheels were about to leave the ramp, and then the car was launched into the air. The car was about to fall from the air, and then fell into the river, and the car sank into the river.
The car was about to fall into the sea, Jiang Feng and Woman were about to reunite, and the young Jiang Feng in the weeds was about to see his girlfriend again.

movie101_7052960987330118151_3780_3960.text: Du Yu shouted: "Is a pervert!"

The next day, Shen Mo drove a tractor to the mountain where Du Yu lived. He lifted the tire and saw that the road was indeed under construction. He then lifted the front half of the tractor and sat on the back half.

Shen Mo, who was eavesdropping, heard the key being turned in the lock and retreated in panic. He tiptoed to the door, afraid of being discovered by the landlord.
Shen Mo sat on the stairs, examining the damaged middle finger. He sighed deeply, feeling regret. He covered his face with his hands, unable to believe what had happened.
Shen Mo, who had just returned from work, was walking gloomily in the hallway. Suddenly, he saw Yao Zong coming out from a room with a bag in hand.

Shen Mo ran to the second floor and said to Xiaoli Ma: "Sis, I need your help with something," "as long as you sign the endorsement contract," "you will get 100,000 yuan right away."

Xiaoli Ma said: "No problem, I won't charge a cent, I'll do the endorsement for you for free, But Shen Mo, we should have conscience, and take the right path, do you want to learn acting? I'll give you this opportunity"

The scene switches to Xiaoli Ma and Shen Mo standing in front of a TV, advertising products. Xiaoli Ma said: "Do you want insomnia? Do you want diarrhea? Do you want infertility? Do you want to be thin and pale like me?"

The employees saw Yao Zong coming and all ran away, saying: "President Yao."

Shen Mo said: "Lishen diet" "Kills health."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Che Zhen Shan said excitedly: "How can she be a communist? You have to take responsibility for what you said!"
Lu Xiao said: "Commander, do you think I want to believe it?" "But it is the truth."
Che Zhen Shan: "Enough, stop." Che Zhen Shan walked up to Lu Xiao and said: "Bring that communist to me immediately." "I want to ask him myself."
Lu Xiao: "Yes, I'll go right away."
Che Zhen Shan's face changed instantly upon hearing this. He quickly picked up the phone and dialed a number, saying: "Linlin, come to my place immediately."
Mo Han walked up to Yu Xuan and said: 'For safety reasons, I've secretly taken care of 4321.'

Yu Xuan glanced at Mo Han, turned around, and rummaged through the drawer for a code book, then took out a notebook from the bottom and handed it to Mo Han, saying: "The code you mentioned, is it this version or this one?"
Lu Xiao walked in, removed his hat, and said: "Commander, that communist is dead."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Lu Xiao, Lu Xiao, you really know how to act."
Lu Xiao asked: "Do you suspect that I did it?"
Che Zhen Shan said: "Small-minded." "Adding insult to injury, framing others." "Isn't that enough for you?"
Lu Xiao knelt on the ground and said: "Commander, I've followed you for over ten years."
Che Zhen Shan: "Enough, stop acting." "Considering your years of service with me, I'll spare your life for now." "Your career as my adjutant ends here."
Lu Xiao stood up and said: "Commander, are you really this heartless?"
Che Zhen Shan: "I've been lenient enough. Get out."
Lu Xiao stopped her and said: "Don't go." "Let me ask you." "This afternoon at three, did you go to the silk shop to rendezvous with a communist?"
Lu Xiao turned to Lin Lin and said: "Fine." "You don't admit it." "Let me ask you," "why did you kill our informant yesterday evening?"
Lin Lin asked: "You were following me?"
Lu Xiao said: "I was following that informant. He said Yang Mohan is a communist."
Lin Lin said: "Yang Mohan, huh, Lu Xiao, do you think what you did would make me fall for you? You miscalculated."
Lu Xiao: "Fine, why did you kill that informant? Are you trying to protect Yang Mohan and your comrades?"
Lin Lin: "Simple, because he was working for the Japanese."
Lu Xiao said in disbelief: "How can it be?" "Commander, I never thought it would be like this." "If Linlin is not a communist," "then Yang Mohan must be."
Che Zhen Shan said angrily: "Get out." Che Zhen Shan's subordinates were all stunned by his words, and Lin Lin was also somewhat surprised.
Che Zhen Shan looked at Lin Lin leaving, then said to Lu Xiao: "Linlin, is Mohan good to you?"
Lin Lin replied: "Pretty good."

movie101_6967711402819584543_480_660.text: The car was lifted, and the underneath was thoroughly inspected. Young Police Officer, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally came into the repair shop. He walked slowly, head down, to the oil-stained tire at the entrance of the shop.
Man with a Buzz Cut was hunched over, fixing a tire. Man with a Buzz Cut asked, "Need a repair?" Man with a Buzz Cut was wiping his hands.
Man wiped his hands with a towel and said, "It was here just now, seems to have gone over there."

Young Police Officer said nothing and walked out directly. Man watched him leave, sighed, and then turned to go back inside, but just as he reached the door, he saw a photo on the table. It was a picture of Young Police Officer and Man together.

The scene shifts, and Young Police Officer arrives at the pork processing factory. The weather is overcast, and the factory's large fans are rotating rapidly, stirring up dust from the factory, which is carried by the wind and turns the sky grey.

The scene shifts to a gas station, where a young police officer walks briskly towards the restroom. The gas station is deserted, with only a few trucks parked in the distance. The young officer walks past a bench and a table, heading straight for the restroom door. He pushes the door open and strides inside.

Young Police Officer, who had been leaning on the table, stood up and walked to the door of the office, glanced inside, then turned and walked to the water dispenser, filled a cup with water, and then left.
Young Police Officer stood at the doorway for a long time, then turned and walked towards the water dispenser.
The man in the blue shirt was lying on the ground, his bloodstains spreading on the tiles. The corner of his mouth twitched slightly, as if he was trying to get up.
The man who was sitting on the stone bench in front of the registration office was waiting for a long time. He looked at his suitcase and sighed. Then, he stood up and walked towards the office.
Man finished packing the suitcase, stood up, looked at the man in front of him, then turned and left. The man watched him leave, then opened the suitcase and examined it carefully.

The scene shifts to the next day, Young Police Officer, carrying two large bags of cash, walks through the corridor of an apartment building. He stops in front of a door, turns to look around, and then pushes the door open.
Man looked up at the stairs, then lowered his head to look at Young Police Officer, and finally reached out his hand.
The moment the door closed, the smell of iron and rust hit Young Police Officer's nose.

movie101_6992521335159292452_1440_1620.text: The car was parked on the edge of the pier, The Long-Haired Woman was driving, cursing at Jiang Feng in the passenger seat, 'You treat me like garbage, wanting me to die, to die! Today, right in front of your family, in front of him, I knelt on the ground and you didn't even look at me. Are you satisfied now?' Jiang Feng was crying, banging on the car door, The Long-Haired Woman picked up a water bottle and threw it at Jiang Feng.

The Long-Haired Woman kept pushing Jiang Feng away, her face full of disgust. Jiang Feng said: "Tell me, will you dare to leave me again?" The Long-Haired Woman kept pushing Jiang Feng away, her face full of disgust. Jiang Feng said: "Answer!"
The next day, Shen Hanqiang was walking through the archive room, looking through files. At that moment, Officer Lei came in with coffee and asked, "Whose files are you looking for?"
Officer Lei replied: "Li Huilan."

Officer Lei, holding a drink, walked over and said: 'Shifu, do you really believe what Jiang Feng said? Li Huilan wasn't drowned at all. Don’t forget, he hit the hospital director; maybe the surgery did mess with his brain.'
Officer Lei asked: "Is Jiang Feng a well-known writer?"
Officer Lei said: "I'll calculate it for you."
Shen Hanqiang said: "Really?" "Then why would a famous writer come to the police station and lie?"

Officer Lei said: "Publicity, definitely for publicity" "Nowadays, celebrities do this all the time" "If they can't make entertainment news, they make social news" "He must be coming out with a new book"
Shen Hanqiang asked: "When is the new book coming out?"
Officer Lei looked at Shen Hanqiang and said: "I don’t know."
Officer Lei said: "I'm looking for your Captain Shen Hanqiang."
Officer Lei said: "I haven’t…"
The scene shifts to Shen Hanqiang being stopped by a police officer. The officer says: "Uncle, I'm sorry, could you please wait outside for a moment, just a moment."
Officer Lei said: "Captain Shen Hanqiang."
Shen Hanqiang said: "I have an urgent matter."
An officer comes over and says: "Mr. Jiang Feng says he wants to see you."
Shen Hanqiang said: "I understand." The officer nodded and left. Shen Hanqiang took out a wallet from his pocket and handed it to Officer Lei.
Shen Hanqiang: "Understood."
Jiang Feng sat at the table, his head in his hands. The police asked: "According to your story, the killer not only murdered Li Huilan but also an unknown woman. Is this a serial killer?"
Jiang Feng said: "Yes."
Shen Hanqiang said: "But you just said Li Huilan was drowned." "Now you're saying the killer murdered two people?" "Did the ending of the novel change?"
Shen Hanqiang asked: "What's the phone number?"
Shen Hanqiang said: "Yeah."
Shen Hanqiang said: "Didn’t you say you saw Li Huilan calling home? What’s the number? You can’t remember a single digit?"
Jiang Feng said: "Let me think." Jiang Feng thought for a while and said: "9." "9."
Officer Lei looked up at Jiang Feng and said: "I'm not done yet."
Jiang Feng said: 'How could I remember that clearly?'
Shen Hanqiang asked: "When did you have your memory surgery?"
Officer Lei looked at Jiang Feng and said: "On Friday, the day of the shooting incident."
Officer Lei took the business card, Jiang Feng continued: "Alright then, I'll go back and think things through carefully, I'll contact you once I have a clear understanding."
Shen Hanqiang said: "Officer Lei, detain him."
Officer Lei looked at his watch and said: "Ah," then turned to look at Shen Hanqiang.
Jiang Feng said in surprise: "Huh?"
Officer Lei said: "Hey, I'm here to provide you with clues." "Do you believe me or not?"
Officer Lei said: "You don't believe what I say."
Shen Hanqiang looked at Officer Lei and said: "I believe you."

movie101_6967711402819584543_660_840.text: Man closed his eyes, recalling the past.
He knocked on the door, but there was no response. He knocked again, still no answer.
He crouched down to pick up the tools he had dropped, then stood up and looked up at the chandelier in the corridor. After a long thought, he made up his mind.
The intercom in the hallway suddenly rang, but there was no sound coming from the intercom. Man had no choice but to leave with his suitcase.
Chapter 1, The Dog, begins. Little Q is walking in the hallway with Xiao Q following behind.
The night was deep, and the man walked with Little Q through the dim alley. The man was wearing protective goggles, welding something in the dim light.

He then took out a few more centimeters of PVC pipe, placed it on the cutting machine, and cut it into two pieces. Man then sat at the table, methodically placing the cut pieces on top of the remaining whole pieces.
He tore off a small piece of the ointment, folded it into a rough rectangle, and stuffed it into the pipe. After a few taps with his hand, the ointment fell out. He repeated the action.
The scene shifts to the small dog standing at the door, barking and waiting for Luo Xia to return. The dog barks, "Fengfeng, come back."
The housekeeper said, "Go in." The woman entered the house and locked the door behind her.

The dog ran to the door, hesitated for a moment, then lifted his leg to pee. The sound of the dog attracted the attention of the man in the room. The dog lifted his head, and the man looked at the dog.
The girl walked down the corridor with little Q. When they reached the stairwell, little Q suddenly stopped and looked back at Man. Man noticed something was wrong.
The camera pointed at the man in the leather jacket who was hiding behind the wall.

Man's eyes were filled with despair and helplessness. The scene shifted to the living room, where Man sat at the table, staring at the computer screen. He was typing on the keyboard, but his eyes were fixed on the screen. Suddenly, he stopped typing and placed his hand on his stomach, as if he remembered something.
In the bathroom, little Q watched Xiao Bai's retreating figure. When she came out, she immediately rushed towards little Q.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill said: "If you're going to go with him now,"
Lin Lin asked: "What about him?"

Station Hill waved his hand and said: "Nothing much, you go first." Lin Lin nodded and turned to leave. Station Hill watched Lin Lin's back as she left, then turned on the desk lamp, picked up the pen, and began to wait for the report.

Station Hill said sternly: "Just received an urgent call from the master" "saying there are three important communist underground members" "who will be escorted to Nanjing today" "having lunch in my department" "For safety" "I command you two to go and meet them" "You can't make any mistakes" "Understand?" "If there's a problem" "no one is immune" "Especially Lu Xiao" "Whether your adjutant status can revive" "depends on your performance this time"
Mo Han said: "Station Hill, I promise to complete the task."
Station Hill, with a serious face, said to Mo Han: "Mo Han, this is the first time I have given you a task, I hope you won't let down my trust in you."
Lu Xiao responded: "Yes, Station Hill." Then he walked towards Station Hill.

Lu Xiao, who was originally standing outside the pharmacy, saw the girl and immediately hid behind a wall. After the girl left, he came out and bought two packs of medicine. He then went to the pharmacy entrance and said, "I'll come back another day to pick up the two missing packs of medicine."
Lu Xiao, who was on guard outside the pharmacy, heard this and recalled his own observation that day: "I saw him enter that pharmacy with my own eyes, his behavior was quite suspicious."
Station Hill looked at him and said: "What can that prove"
Mo Han said: "It proves that he must have gone to send a message."
Station Hill asked: "What do you plan to do?"
Mo Han said: "I hope that Station Hill will put Mo Han under house arrest."
Station Hill asked: "Is it necessary?"
Mo Han said: "Station Hill, if there is a problem with the transport at noon, is it on him or me, it's not clear."
Station Hill said: "Lu Xiao, you are really like a monkey, you are really smart."
Mo Han asked: "Station Hill, do you agree?"
Station Hill said: "Do you think I want you to leave the adjutant position?"
Mo Han said: "Thank you, Station Hill." "Lu Xiao swears to complete the mission."
Station Hill looked up and said: "If there is a communist interception, must capture alive."
Mo Han answered firmly: "Yes."

Mo Han was walking and suddenly heard Station Hill say: "What, I'm not needed anymore, why?" Mo Han stopped in his tracks, his face filled with confusion. He watched as Station Hill walked away without looking back.
Lu Xiao ran over and asked: "Station Hill, why didn't you use me anymore?"
Station Hill said: "Mo Han, come, sit sit sit, sit," "No need at all."
Mo Han asked: "What do you mean?"
Station Hill put down the teapot, thought for a moment, and said seriously: "There is no communist escort to Nanjing. There are only a few guards from the regiment in that vehicle."
Mo Han asked: "Then why did you do this"
Station Hill said: "Just want to test Lu Xiao."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao."
Station Hill said: "He first suspected that you were a communist." "Then it was Lin Lin." "Who knows next he might suspect me."

movie101_6967711402819584543_840_1020.text: Crazy (Animal) was standing in the middle of the bathroom, obediently waiting for Policewoman Sister's reward.
That Man was pacing back and forth in the corridor, wearing flip-flops, then he took them off and continued to pace barefoot.
At this moment, Policewoman Sister was walking outside. She stopped in front of a door, her eyes were slightly red, and she was panting heavily.
After a while, Policewoman Sister came to the door, hesitated for a moment, then pressed the doorbell.
Crazy (Animal) ran towards Policewoman Sister, who quickly opened the iron gate. Policewoman Sister took out a treat and said, "Sit, sit."
Policewoman Sister stood at the door, not knowing what to do. She leaned against the door, her head hanging low, her eyes vacant.

Policewoman Sister was startled by the visitor. When she turned around, it was That Man. Policewoman Sister was stunned for a moment, but That Man's piercing gaze made her feel intimidated. Policewoman Sister glared back at him, and at that moment, Crazy (Animal) started barking non-stop.
That Man looked at Policewoman Sister's messy hair, lowered his head in disappointment, and then noticed her feet, which were covered in black paint.
That Man looked at Policewoman Sister inside the house, and Policewoman Sister avoided his gaze. That Man asked, "Where are your shoes?"
Policewoman Sister was startled by his words. She didn't expect that the man in front of her would be so serious. She lowered her head and started whistling again.
Policewoman Sister said, "It, it keeps barking." Policewoman Sister looked at That Man, then at the dog, and asked, "Do you have a dead rat in your house?"
That Man looked at Policewoman Sister, then at Crazy (Animal). Policewoman Sister nodded. That Man said, "I'll check."

After a while, Policewoman Sister took Crazy (Animal) out for a late-night walk. She put on her slippers, opened the door, and the two walked out. Policewoman Sister picked up the slippers and put them on, then picked up Crazy (Animal)'s leash and walked forward. After a while, she put down the leash, walked a few steps, bent down to pick up the slippers again, and then walked away.
At this moment, Policewoman Sister rushed into the theater, looking around in a fluster. She found the performance schedule and started scrutinizing it carefully.

The women's voices were not uniform, but they kept singing. "Due to the warming weather in Europe, migratory birds have delayed their southward flight." "Just as the faint dawn light streams through the window." "Ah, my beloved one." "Why don’t you come sooner?" "Ah, my beloved one."

movie101_7052960987330118151_4140_4320.text: Yuan Pengjun frowned, glanced at Lan Lan, then walked towards the elevator. Lan Lan quickly followed, pressed the elevator button, and the elevator door opened. Yuan Pengjun turned back and said, "The elevator is about to go."

Yuan Pengjun stood by the window and set up a telescope to observe the building opposite. Through the telescope, he could see the movements of Lan Lan and Xiao Wei inside the building.

He Dachang was at the clinic, Yuan Pengjun was at the bank, after withdrawing money, he looked around, entered a small store, and began to gamble with his cards.
After saying this, Yuan Pengjun left, and Shen Mo went to the ATM to withdraw money.

The phone rang, and the screen showed a call from He Dachang. Yuan Pengjun answered the call. A message from He Dachang came, asking if he could come over. The phone rang again, and the screen showed a call from an unknown number. A message came with the call, containing a virus that wiped out all data on the phone.

The next day, Yuan Pengjun was woken up by a phone call from Lan Lan. He looked puzzled at the phone, which was calling from a hair salon in the same building as Lan Lan. He answered the call, and the person on the other end said, "Yuan Pengjun, are you there?"

In the darkness, Yuan Pengjun was methodically processing the drugs. He poured the white powder from a small bag into a measuring cup and carefully weighed it on a scale. Then he mixed the powder with a liquid to create a solution. His eyes were extremely focused, and his movements were very precise.

He lit a burner on the distillation kit and heated the round bottom flask until it was boiling. Then he took out a small bottle, lit it with a lighter, and slowly poured the liquid from the small bottle into the round bottom flask. The liquid quickly turned into gas and filled the entire flask.
Yuan Pengjun took out a small bag from the drawer, carefully opening it. Inside was a white powder. He sniffed it and grinned with satisfaction.

Xiao Wei and Du Yu took out the candies they had prepared earlier and put them into their mouths. They chewed for a moment, then both leaned back in their chairs, tilting their heads back to swallow the candies. The candies were sour, and both of them made faces.
Yuan Pengjun, who was originally smiling, immediately became serious upon hearing the doorbell, and Lan Lan, who was being strangled, also stopped struggling.
Lan Lan said: "Hi," "I thought you might not have eaten yet," "This is my favorite cake," "I really like this cake."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1620_1800.text: Officer Shen said: "I suspect that you're involved in this case" "Cooperate a bit"
Officer Lei walked out while putting on his clothes and said: "Master" "Jiang Feng is talking nonsense" "Why are we keeping him?"
Officer Shen said: "Look at Li Hui Lan's home phone number" "Read it out loud." Officer Lei took the paper and read the number to Officer Shen.
Officer Lei looked at the numbers and said: "0909914" "914". Officer Lei looked up and said: "Master, this is just a coincidence."
The man in the white shirt was Jiang Feng, who had been missing for many years. He stood in the center of the room, his back to everyone, his hands in his pockets, looking around.
Officer Shen said: "There's a new guy, bro, what did you do?"
The man in the white shirt asked: "Is this your first time in here?" The man in the white shirt was Jiang Feng, who had come to find Officer Shen.

The man in the yellow vest said: "Your first time, huh? Then I need to enlighten you. What if they bully you next time you come in? Right? Do you know what this is for? It's specifically for those drug addicts. Once they are in here, they use all means to hurt themselves. There are many ways. There's stabbing with bars, there's pulling out rings and swallowing, Once in the south city, I encountered a woman. It was amazing. She hid needles in her hair and swallowed them. The police were all scared."

The man in the yellow vest jacket said: "This shitty place" "All kinds of people are here" "There are robbers, prostitutes, men who visit prostitutes, fighters, arsonists, and thieves" "Bro, you still haven't told me why you're in here."
Officer Shen said: "Fighting"

The man in the white shirt asked: "What kind of thing?"
The man in the yellow vest slowly approached Jiang Feng and asked: "Have you ever seen a murderer's eyes?"
Officer Shen looked at Officer Lei, then turned and walked away. Officer Shen's inner monologue: "Officer Lei, don't be so stubborn, I have a date tonight, okay?"
Xiao Feng turned and sat down: "Ignoring me now? I didn't even want to chat with you, I've been talking all by myself."
Officer Shen: "Stop" "Zoom in on this" "This is Jiang Feng" "Who's this guy?" "Zoom in"
Officer Lei looked at the monitor and said: "He seems to be picking something up"
Officer Shen looked at the screen and said: "He seems to be picking something up" "I'll go to the Memory Master" "Call me if anything". After speaking, Officer Shen turned and left.
Officer Lei: "Print it out"
The scene flashed back to when Li Hui Lan first came to Jiang Feng's house. Li Hui Lan asked: "What are you here for?"
Jiang Feng: "I received a call and came to check because I was worried"
Li Hui Lan said: "I'm fine, you can leave"

movie101_6969128384144081416_1020_1200.text: Director Jin said sternly: "If no one recognizes you, I'll send you to a psychiatric hospital."
Xu Zhengtai spread out the cards on the table and said: 'These four cards need to add up to 24 points.'

Xiao Ma laughed and said: "Big brother, your face is all messed up." Liu Yi looked at his own face and was stunned. He stared at Xu Zhengtai in disbelief.
Liu Yi, in a fit of anger, left the yard and jumped into the pond. Xiao Ma and Xu Zhengtai looked at each other in shock.

Director Jin asked: "What do you do for work?"
Xiao Ma replied: "Programming and software development."
Director Jin thought for a moment and said: "So, unemployed. Go back for now."
Director Jin turned around and looked at Xu Zhengtai, then walked up to him and asked: "Do you recognize this person?" "What's your relationship with him?"
Xu Zhengtai looked at Xu Tailang, who was staring at him, feeling a bit at a loss. Then, Xu Tailang smiled and called out: "Brother."

Xu Zhengtai introduced: "This is our Director Jin, he's called Jin Suo."
Xu Zhengtai said: "Director Jin, Director Jin."

Director Jin pointed at Xu Zhengtai and said: "You don't speak."
Director Jin turned to Xu Tailang and asked, 'What was your father's name?'
Liu Yi said helplessly: "I really forgot his name because grandpa died too early."
Director Jin asked: 'What are you muttering?'

Xu Tailang continued: 'So I went out to work when I was very young.' 'Actually, I...' 'I've never received fatherly love in my entire life.' 'So when he died, I wasn't sad at all.' 'Really.' 'If you don't believe me you can go inside and check.' 'In the portrait, he's wearing a plaid shirt.' 'The urn is dark red, placed next to the TV.' 'And there's a white cloth covering the TV.' 'You can go see for yourself.'
Director Jin pointed at Xu Zhengtai and said: "Alright, you wait here."

Director Jin came over, Xu Zhengtai covered his mouth, Director Jin asked: "What are you whispering about?"
Director Jin beckoned and asked: "Come here, come here. Tell me, what's the brand of the TV?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Che Zhenshan said: "This time, I set a trap. If Lu Xiao is killed by the Communists, either way, he will be in big trouble."
Mo Han asked: "But doesn’t the Commies not know the news yet?"
Che Zhenshan leaned back on the sofa and said: "I've already let the word out, they will know."
Mo Han leaned back in his chair with a smile and said: "Che Zhenshan, this move is really clever."
Che Zhenshan said: "Mo Han, fortunately you were specially assigned here." "Otherwise, I almost assigned Lin Lin Xu to Lu Xiao."
Mo Han stood up and said: "Che Zhenshan, now that you mention it, it reminds me." "The cheongsam custom-made for Lin Lin should be picked up today."
Che Zhenshan said: "The cheongsam can wait, stay here and watch the show with me first."
Mo Han's words were straightforward and to the point, leaving no room for emotional entanglement. Che Zhenshan was not pleased, but he couldn't say much.

The scene shifts to the training ground, where the soldiers march in step, their movements uniform and powerful. Che Zhenshan and Mo Han walk side by side, observing the troops. Inside the office, Che Zhenshan sits in a leather chair, his face serious as he reads a document, then tosses it aside.

The scene shifts to the office, where Che Zhenshan is still sound asleep on the sofa, while Mo Han is dozing off on the sofa next to him. Suddenly, the phone rings, and Mo Han, who is the first to react, quickly gets up and answers the call.
Mo Han turned his head, looking at Che Zhenshan with a shy expression, and said: "Che Zhenshan, I still want to discuss the cheongsam with Lin Lin."
Che Zhenshan raised his hand and said: 'Make a call.'
Mo Han's words were straightforward and to the point, leaving no room for ambiguity. Che Zhenshan, who had been dozing off, was woken up by the sound, and Mo Han also took the opportunity to leave.
The scene shifts to the entrance of the command post, where Lin Lin is opening the door for the commander. Inside the room, Mo Han saw Lin Lin enter and said: "Lin Lin, you’re here."
Lin Lin ran over and asked, "What do you need me for?"

Lin Lin said with a smile: "Then I'll go get it now."
Mo Han stopped Lin Lin and said: "Wait. Show it to me when you get back."

Mo Han said: "The order." After saying that, Mo Han turned and left. Che Zhenshan immediately got up and followed him out.
Che Zhenshan closed the door and walked towards the desk with a frown. He looked at the empty medicine bottle, sighed, and said to Mo Han: "Help me pick up some medicine."
Lin Lin took the letter and happily ran off. Che Zhenshan returned to the room, sat down on the sofa, and took out a handkerchief to wipe his mouth.

I shamelessly served you. I admit to all of this. But can you just give me a way out now? You are cold-blooded. Do you understand love? If you don’t give me my money today,

Xiao Yun turned around, her eyes filled with reluctance. She knew that Jiang Feng's condition was deteriorating, and she didn't know how to face him. She knew that Jiang Feng loved her deeply, but she didn't know how to respond.
Xiao Yun looked up at the clock on the wall, the hands of the clock slowly stopped at 11:55.

Xiao Yun said, "100," and then she faintly heard Jiang Feng's voice from her memory. She looked at Jiang Feng lying on the ground, then at the unconscious Xiao Yun. The two of them lay on the ground, looking at each other.

The screen gradually fades to black, and the film 'The Battle of Memories' officially begins.
The dressing room was filled with various suits, and the lighting was dim yet warm. Jiang Feng walked in and pressed a button on the display cabinet.

He took out his phone from the safe, entered the password on the screen, and the safe opened automatically. He was surprised to find a thick stack of banknotes inside. He took out a bill and sniffed it, then took out a wad of cash and held it in his hand.
Jiang Feng was sound asleep when a thunderclap startled him. He quickly got up and ran outside, leaving Zhang Daichen alone in the room.

The scene shifted to a high-rise in the city. Jiang Feng was standing on a suspended platform, harnessed with insurance, with a workbench beside him. He was carving a piece of wood with a chisel and hammer.

Jiang Feng looked around, then slowly walked to the chair in front of the console, bent down to sit, and pressed the armrests up and down to test the comfort. After sitting down, Jiang Feng took a deep breath and stared at the console. The display screen on the wall immediately lit up.

Jiang Feng's eyes were filled with tenderness, and he felt as if he had found something. The title of the novel was 'The Night Rain'. Jiang Feng held the manuscript in his hands, and the first chapter title was 'The Night Rain'.

The machine started operating. A row of tubes glowed with electric currents. Jiang Feng's fingers pressed on the metal keys, and his eyes stared blankly at the ceiling. Xiao Yun asked, "Mr. Jiang, did you feel any discomfort, anger, or any other significant emotions just now?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: Che Linlin said: "Alright, if he won't go, I will!"

Che Linlin stood there in a daze, unsure of what to do next. She turned around and walked to the desk.

Che Zhen Shan: "First, her mother was killed by Japanese soldiers, then, her boyfriend was brutally murdered by a Japanese bayonet. After her boyfriend died, Linlin became emotionally withdrawn. She has rejected every man I introduced to her, including Lieutenant Lu. I know she blames me. She blames me for not avenging her mother all these years. Since the death of her mother, she has never called me father."

Secretary Yang: "No, no, no, I think I..."

movie101_6992521335159292452_1980_2160.text: Li Hui Lan said, 'He was questioned by the leaders,' 'If I disappear again this time,' 'he would lose his position,' 'I'll be fine,' 'It's been over a dozen years,' 'Nothing is going to happen to me.'

Jiang Feng: '"He's scum," "He's not going to cherish you,"'

Jiang Feng: 'Leave him,' 'Come with me,' 'Leave him,' 'Alright?'

Jiang Feng's eyes were filled with panic and fear, and Li Hui Lan's hands were trembling. Suddenly, Li Hui Lan lost balance and fell backward, and Jiang Feng quickly reached out to catch her but ended up falling down the stairs together.
Jiang Feng slowly walked to the end of the hallway, where he saw Li Hui Lan lying motionless at the bottom of the stairs.

Li Hui Lan was still half-lying on the ground, her head propped up by her hand, her eyes vacant, her face as pale as if she were devoid of any emotion. She struggled to prop herself up, supporting her body with her arms, and then slowly knelt on the ground. Jiang Feng walked towards her, rolling up his sleeves as he approached.

Li Hui Lan looked up at the sky, tears streaming down her face, then she slowly lowered her head, looking at the hand that had been holding her forehead. She reached out to touch her nose, still wet with tears.

Li Hui Lan was still on the ground, Jiang Feng kicked the rest of the money under the staircase. Li Hui Lan covered her head in pain, Jiang Feng looked at her with a cold expression, then kicked the remaining money under the bookshelf. Li Hui Lan propped herself up with her hands, Jiang Feng stood in the middle, bending down to pick up the money.
Li Hui Lan was still crying, struggling to crawl forward. Jiang Feng walked over, grabbed her hand, and pulled her up.

Jiang Feng looked down at Li Hui Lan, who was kneeling on the ground, holding his leg. Li Hui Lan looked up at him with pleading eyes, then let go of his leg and collapsed to the ground. Jiang Feng grabbed Li Hui Lan's hair and forcefully pushed her towards his chest.

Li Hui Lan struggled desperately, but Jiang Feng covered her mouth with one hand and pressed down on her head with the other, shaking her head and saying, 'No, don't move.' Li Hui Lan screamed in fear, but Jiang Feng ignored her, pressing down on her head with both hands.

Li Hui Lan struggled to turn her head, but Jiang Feng covered her mouth with one hand and pressed her forehead with the other. Li Hui Lan tried to look at Jiang Feng, but the hand on her face wouldn't let her move.

movie101_7052960987330118151_4680_4860.text: At this moment, a car slowly approached from the front.
