Xiaoli Ma said: "I've called for an ambulance." "Why is it him?" "Lanlan can't be found." "She's been with him all the time before." "Look." Xiaoli Ma pointed to the tattoo on Yuan Pengjun's neck, and Yuan Pengjun was so scared that he screamed.
Shen Mo immediately opened the car door, took out his phone, and started scrolling through Weibo. He said to Xiaoli Ma: "Wait here for me." Then he ran towards the hospital.
Jia Zong looked up and said: "The IV costs three thousand, are you robbing me, this clinic is a scam."
The doctor exclaimed in surprise: "Hey, hey, hey, young man, you should be careful what you say, slander can have legal consequences, you know."
The doctor said: "So you're not getting it, right?"
The doctor said: "No no no," and Jia Zong was breathing heavily.
The doctor said: "Do it, do it."
Du Yu, carrying Jia Zong, walked into the ward and said: "Get up!"
The man in the suit said: "Three thousand it is then" "What's your hurry"
Yuan Pengjun cried out: "I'll do it, I'll do it"
Du Yu said: "Move, go!" Du Yu pressed Xiao Wei's chest with both hands and said: "Xiao Wei, Xiao Wei!"
Xiao Wei was lying on the hospital bed, and Da Ma was by her side, changing her bandages. Shen Mo arrived at the scene, looked around, and then took out his phone to make a call.
The tall building was shrouded in darkness, with only a few windows lit. Yuan Pengjun was slumped in the driver's seat of the car, his face covered in blood. Xiaoli Ma stared at the car in disbelief.

Xiaoli Ma said: "You're awake," "Are you okay?" "Right," "Where's my sister?" "My sister, her name is Lanlan," "You two were taking pictures together before, right?" "Where is she now?" "Hey, I'm asking you," "Say something, will you?"
After a while, Shen Mo took out a key from his pocket and crouched down to unlock the door.
After Xiao Lian left, Shen Mo closed the door.

The next day, Shen Mo was flipping through old newspapers at home when suddenly a headline caught his attention: 'Konojima's Dark Secret Exposed.' The article stated that the long-missing Konojima Masao had been found dead with a noose in his hand, and his son, who had been secretly living in the city, had actually hanged himself. Shen Mo frowned, seemingly recalling something.

The scene shifted, and Shen Mo was using a telescope to spy on Xiao Li's house. He then turned around, put down the gun he was holding, and walked to the desk. On the desk, there was a photo of him and Xiao Li.

Xiaoli Ma followed him out and said: "Say something, will you" "I've been asking you forever" "Just answer me" "I'm asking" "Where is my sister" "What have you done with her" "Not speaking, huh" "I'll call the police right now"
Xiaoli Ma said: "What are you doing?" Yuan Pengjun strangled Xiaoli Ma from behind, and Xiaoli Ma struggled.

movie101_6969128384144081416_120_300.text: The scene switches to a winding mountain road, where Xu Tailang is driving a car, practicing drift driving on the mountain road. Xu Tailang asks the navigator beside him: "What's the current oil temperature?"
Navigator said into the headset: "The oil temperature is 100, which is normal"
Xu Tailang said excitedly: "Give me 3.5 Bar" "The Anti-Lag (turbo lag reduction system) is fully on"

The race car driver Xu Tailang is fully focused on driving, while the commentator in the studio is closely following the race through real-time vehicle data and video, accompanied by enthusiastic commentary, with Father standing in front of the screen analyzing the race situation.
The scene switches to the inside of the car, where Xu Tailang is fully focused on driving, while Navigator, sweating profusely, nervously keeps an eye on the side mirror.

The scene switches to the competition, where Xu Tailang is driving a car, drifting on the race track, leaving tire marks on the road, gaining an advantage over the competitors. Xu Tailang is drifting on the race track, leaving tire marks on the road, gaining an advantage over the competitors.

Xu Tailang's eyes were filled with tears, his Adam's apple moved slightly, and his whole body trembled a bit. At this moment, he crossed the finish line, and the people behind cheered for him.
The commentator excitedly shouts: "Xu Tailang wins!" The audience bursts into cheers and applause. Confetti pops out from the side of the track, and Xu Tailang drives the car out of the track.
Xu Tailang got out of the car, closed the car door, and the crowd immediately surrounded him. He raised his right hand and waved to the crowd.
Xu Tailang: "First of all, I want to thank my team and my sponsors." "I also want to thank my Navigator, my brother from another mother." "Come on, give little strong a shot."
Xu Tailang: "Finally, I want to thank one person" "The most important person in my life" "He also came to the race today" "I want to tell him" "Dad, thank you"
Xu Tailang got out of the car and said to the reporters: "Thank you for not supporting my choice" "Thank you for not understanding my hobby" "And thank you for not respecting my profession"
Xu Tailang: "I invited you here today" "to witness all this" "to witness that you were wrong" "that I won the annual championship" "that I succeeded"
The reporter continued to ask: "Your words to your father are very special." "What about your mother?"
Xu Tailang said sadly: "I never met my mother." "She died when I was born."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Yu Xuan said: "I'm ready to sacrifice at any time."
The Japanese army's listening room was in a state of confusion, Che Zhenshan took off his headphones and asked Mo Han: "Why is there no sound?"
Mo Han: "Wait." Mo Han hurriedly stopped him and then turned up the radio knob.
Yu Xuan said: "Tsk, if you want to kill me, just do it quickly." "Stop touching me, you stinky ruffian!"
Mo Han said: "I'll check if you have any documents on you," Mo Han searched Yu Xuan's body while saying, "Tell me, who are your superiors and subordinates?"
Mo Han angrily said: "Don't pretend to be confused with me"
Yu Xuan said: "Beat me to death, I’ll take you all to the underworld, are you scared now, I'm not made of paper and paste."
Yu Xuan: "Come on, you coward who is afraid of death, hit me, whip me."
Mo Han was puzzled by Yu Xuan's words, standing still and looking at her. Suddenly, a flash of white light streaked across the sky, followed by the sound of thunder.
Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan with a complex expression, filled with mixed feelings. Yu Xuan was also looking at him, her eyes filled with pleading and reluctance.
Mo Han stood there, tears streaming down his face, but he never uttered a word. The secret radio was still transmitting messages, and the battle in the jungle was still raging.

Mo Han's eyes were filled with anger and a desire for revenge. He looked at Yu Xuan, who was already crying, and his heart was in turmoil. He didn't know whether what he did was right or wrong, but he knew that he couldn't let go of his hatred. He stared at Yu Xuan for a long time, then suddenly rushed forward and stabbed her.
Yu Xuan clenched her fists, tears streaming down her face, while Mo Han was also in tears, his face filled with pain.

The heavy rain poured down from the eaves, just like the heavy rain in Mo Han's heart. The raindrops hit the tiles and the eaves, making a dripping sound. The Japanese army's eaves were soaked, and the sound of rain was very loud. Mo Han stood in the room, his eyes dull, his face extremely pale, and his lips trembled slightly. Che Linlin pushed open the door and shouted: "Mo Han, stop it!"
Che Linlin pushed Yu Xuan aside and angrily said to Mo Han: "Are you crazy? I didn't expect you and Lu Xiao to be the same kind!" Che Linlin then pushed Mo Han against the wall.
Che Zhenshan took off the headphones, thought for a moment, and said: "Okay, tell Mo Han to stop interrogation for now, and don’t let him get involved in this matter again"
Che Linlin turned around in shock, only to see Yu Xuan with closed eyes and a rope loosely tied around her neck.
Che Linlin walked over to Yu Xuan, loosened the rope a bit, and looked at her with a complex expression.
Che Linlin took the bell from Yu Xuan's hand, fastened it to her own neck, and then took out a pair of handcuffs from her pocket.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2160_2340.text: The girl weakly closed her eyes, tears streaming down her face. Jiang Feng looked at the girl in front of him with a face full of regret.

Officer Lei replied, "I don't believe you."
Officer Lei took the photo and said, "Excuse me." "Is this you?"

Officer Lei: "Remember this person, OK?" Officer Lei took out a photo from his bag and handed it to Jiang Feng. Jiang Feng looked at the photo and then at Officer Lei.
Officer Lei asked: "What about this person?"
Officer Lei said, "I watched the surveillance video." "I noticed you two were picking up something at the same time."
The man in the yellow vest knocked on the glass and said: "Officer, I'm hungry. Do you have afternoon tea?"

Jiang Feng suddenly stopped Officer Lei and said, "Hey, hey, hey," "Officer Lei," "You need to send someone to protect my wife right away."

Officer Lei said, "Think about it carefully," "the previous two victims were both people the suspect liked."
Officer Lei said, "Let's talk about this later."
Jiang Feng shouted: "Officer Lei!" "Officer Lei!"
Officer Lei, on the phone, said: "Master, why haven't you come back yet?"
Officer Shen said: "I'm still at the Memory Master." "Any progress on your side?"

Officer Lei: "Jiang Feng just remembered something." "It seems to be related to the case." "He said Li Hui Lan couldn't see clearly." "I remember that the autopsy report mentioned." "Li Hui Lan is severely myopic."
The person on the phone said, 'This detail is very important.' 'Get moving now.' 'We'll meet at Li Hui Lan's house.'
Officer Lei responded, "Oh, okay," and then hung up the phone.
The man in the yellow vest walked up behind Jiang Feng and said, "Buddy, you're asking him to protect your wife. You might as well ask him to open the door and let us both go."
Officer Shen turned around and left, leaving behind the stunned Ah Hui. The next day, in the bustling city, the aroma of food filled the streets and alleys.
Officer Lei walked over and said, "Master, the objects that can solve the case have been taken away by the forensics team." "Why are we still here?"
Officer Shen: "You tell me what can solve the case?" "Every seemingly unnecessary object at the scene" "had a specific role at the time of the incident."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1380_1560.text: Liu Yi shouted: "Mumu"
Xu Zhengtai shouted: "Louder!" "Mumu"
Liu Yi shouted: "Mumu", Xu Zhengtai suddenly stopped, raised his hand to signal Liu Yi to go on ahead, and then left with his subordinates.
The four of them climbed up the roof and saw Mumi. Liu Yi said: "Mumu, how did you get so skinny?"

Xu Zhengtai said: "Hey, wait, Xu Tailang," "Look, that leader, the one in the middle," "His surname is Luo," "He's called Luo Li," "He's my archenemy," "I didn't expect him to be involved in smuggling cars now."

Niu Aihua came in with a tray and said: "The fish is ready." "Forgot to add vinegar."

Xu Zhengtai took the dish and said: "Wow, hot!"
Niu Aihua said: "So hot!"
Xu Tailang called out: "Sis-in-law"
Niu Aihua said: "Just call me Xiaohua."

Xu Zhengtai said: "Alright, just call her Xiaohua."

Niu Aihua lowered his head and said: "Niu Aihua."

Xu Tailang said: "I have no memory of my mother." "I've only seen a blurry wedding photo." "The year I was born, my father went to jail." "My mother's name is Zhang Suzhen, not Niu Aihua." "This woman is the same type as my mother." "It seems that my dad likes this kind of a match." "No, I can't let them continue like this." "I have to find Zhang Suzhen and introduce her to my dad." "If not, I wouldn't be here."
Xu Tailang asked: "How far have you two gotten?"
Xu Zhengtai said: "Getting married next month."
Niu Aihua raised his glass and said: "Have some wine."
Xu Tailang said: "Take a sip." The two of them drank.
Xu Tailang frowned and said: "Marriage is a big deal. You need to think it over. At least know each other for one or two years. Know each other's background. How long have you known each other?"
Niu Aihua smiled and said: "Over twenty years."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Ling Ling, dressed in a cheongsam and wearing a beaded necklace, had a heart-shaped pendant on her chest. She quietly took off the necklace and placed it in the hand of the unconscious Yu Xuan.
Lu Xiao's face changed instantly, but his voice remained calm. He said: "I'm sorry."
Ling Ling, seemingly unaware, tugged at the hem of her dress, pulling out a handful of beads.
Mo Han said: "What do you think living is for?" "For the country, for the faith? Or for money and status?"
"I live only for the people I love," Ling Ling said, pulling the safety catch on the gun at her waist.
Mo Han said: "Look how beautiful this tree is," "It's a pity it's twisted by living in such an environment. What do you say to moving it one day?"
Ling Ling hesitated and said: 'But, won't it die if we do that?'
Mo Han said: 'No, it will grow even better.' Mo Han reassures, 'Ling Ling, I'm tired of the deceit in officialdom. Would you leave it all behind and come away with me?'
Ling Ling asked: 'Just the two of us?'
Mo Han paused and then said: 'Maybe there's one more person.'
Ling Ling turned around helplessly, her eyes red but trying to hold back the tears. She tugged at the collar of her cheongsam, trying to compose herself.
Ling Ling asked: 'Mo Han, have you ever given this kind of pendant to another woman?'
Mo Han asked: 'No, why do you suddenly ask?' Ling Ling felt it was suspicious.

Ling Ling said: "I have always felt that we are not on the same path." "Like a swan and a shrimp pulling a carriage together," "The swan yearns for the sky, while the shrimp never dares leave the water." "No matter how hard we try, we can never head in the same direction."
Mo Han, seeing Ling Ling's sorrow, said to her: 'There's always a way.' Hearing this, Ling Ling cried even harder.
Mo Han said: 'Ling Ling, don't cry. What's wrong? Do you not want to leave, or are you reluctant to leave your father behind?'
Ling Ling turned around and said: 'Mo Han, let me think. My mind is really confused right now.'
Mo Han tried to comfort her: 'Don't overthink; sometimes life is very simple.'

movie101_7052960987330118151_5040_5220.text: Shen Mo said: "Are you in that clinic right now?" Yuan Pengjun nodded, and Shen Mo continued: "Du Yu, I am Ichiro Kitano, Japan's number one assassin. Your best friend has been eliminated by me, and you're next."

Yuan Pengjun, holding the phone, said: "Biceps, triceps, biceps, triceps, pectoralis major, pectoralis major, pectoralis major, central nervous system."

Yuan Pengjun, who had been standing idly by the window, immediately turned around upon hearing this and looked at Shen Mo with a face full of hatred.

A man in a suit said: "That's right," "She is a police officer," "I know it."

Yuan Pengjun said: "You can't do it, Shen Mo, I'll do it instead."
Shen Mo paid the money and left the room, closing the door behind him. Yuan Pengjun watched Shen Mo leave, then turned to look at Du Yu.

Shen Mo, who had been leaning against the wall, suddenly showed a ferocious expression, then turned and walked towards the door. Xiaoli Ma, who had been lying on the bed, immediately got up and rushed out, but was blocked by Yuan Pengjun at the door. Yuan Pengjun said: "Don't go."
Shen Mo, who had just returned from the pharmacy, was about to open the door when he encountered Yuan Pengjun. Shen Mo threw a flying kick at Yuan Pengjun, but Yuan Pengjun easily dodged it.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2340_2520.text: Shen Hanqiang said: "Everything had its specific role" "How many times have I told you" "Do not casually decide what can break the case and what cannot"
Officer Lei scratched his head and said: "Got it"
Shen Hanqiang said: "What do you know""What are we here for"

Officer Lei: "Master," "look what I found" "Master," "Master, look at this"
Officer Lei: "Move aside," Officer Lei pushed Shen Hanqiang away and dragged the body to the side, leaving Shen Hanqiang alone at the scene.
Shen Hanqiang asked with a smile: "Are you okay, Officer Lei?"
Officer Lei weakly said: "Master"
Shen Hanqiang lowered his head in sorrow, then knelt down beside Officer Lei, using his own blood to write on the floor, writing 'I love Officer Lei'.
He took out the jade pendant, looked at the name on it, and then typed it on his mobile phone: "Jiang Feng"
The scene shifts, Officer Lei knocked on Mrs. Zhang's door. Mrs. Zhang opened the door and said: "How many times do you need to ask?" "I have a life too"
Shen Hanqiang said: "Mrs. Zhang, sorry for the inconvenience" "We went back to check the statements and found some issues" "Could we trouble you again?"

Shen Hanqiang continued to ask: "According to your statement, the time you knocked on Li Xiaoyun's door was at nine o’clock and one minute. At that time, Li Xiaoyun said there was nothing wrong at home, but according to the police station records, Li Xiaoyun's time of report was nine o’clock and three, only two minutes apart."
Mrs. Zhang said: "I definitely did not remember wrong" "The time I arrived at his house was precisely nine o’clock and one minute"
Officer Lei asked: "How could you remember so precisely?"

Mrs. Zhang said: "It's simple""Every evening I am watching the drama series 'The Silent Bird'""That day I heard noises of arguments from her house""I didn't leave right away as I was watching TV""After all, their house is often like this""This TV drama""Airs the preview of the next episode every night starting at fifty-nine minutes past eight""It switches to commercials at nine o'clock""I left immediately after watching the summer preview""Just a few steps to her house""At most a minute, right?"
Officer Lei looked at Shen Hanqiang in shock, and Shen Hanqiang turned to look at Officer Lei and said: "It hurts, doesn’t it?"
Shen Hanqiang asked: "Do you know where Li Huilan might have gone after leaving home?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Yang Mo Han said: "Sometimes it’s complicated."
Che Linlin hesitated and said: "Maybe."
At this moment, a soldier came to report: "Secretary Yang, the commander wants to see you." Che Linlin quickly wiped away her tears and tidied up her appearance.
Yang Mo Han comforted her: "Linlin, don’t cry, go to bed early. I’ll go first."
Che Zhenshan turned and left, leaving Che Linlin alone, crying helplessly.
The jade pendant, which had been passed down for generations, was accidentally dropped and fell to the ground. The girl picked it up and held it in her hand, covering her face and weeping bitterly.

Yang Mo Han closed the door and walked to the other side of the room, hesitated for a moment, then slowly turned around and said: "Commander, I might not have been tough enough during the interrogation this afternoon."

Che Zhenshan said: "Don't talk about that. A secret order just came from the division commander. We are to launch a large-scale attack on the Communists soon. Mohan, I intend to send you and Linlin to America."
Yang Mo Han answered: "The United States."
Che Zhenshan walked and said: "Yes, I’m worried Linlin might have unclear dealings with the Communists."
Yang Mo Han said: "Do you mean Linlin and that female Communist?"
Che Zhenshan said: "Promise me, leave immediately, go to Shanghai tomorrow, but before you leave, you need to do something important, kill this person."
Yang Mo Han replied: 'Japanese.'
Che Zhenshan replied: "Yes, Shan Ben Ichiro. Linlin's mother was killed by him. He just arrived in Liu City. He will be at the Baixiao Gate tonight for entertainment."
Yang Mo Han turned around and said: "Commander."
Che Zhenshan asked: "Is there a problem?"

Yang Mo Han said: "No, I just want to know. How do you plan to deal with that female Communist?" "I mean Linlin, if she is really with that woman." "I almost beat her to death this afternoon." "If anything happens to her, I'm afraid Linlin will resent me, so."
Che Zhenshan said: "As long as you bring back Shan Ben Ichiro's head, I’ll release her immediately." Lu Xiao was moved by Che Zhenshan's sincerity and the comrade-like trust between the two sides.
Che Zhenshan grabbed Che Linlin who was about to leave and said: "Linlin, don't get excited." "Didn't I send Mohan?"
Che Linlin said excitedly: "You sent him alone, isn’t that sending him to his death? Why aren’t you going?"
Che Zhenshan grabbed Che Linlin and said: "Che Linlin, listen to your father."
Che Linlin shouted: "I don’t have a father like you. Let me go, I need to find Mohan."
Che Zhenshan said: "Do you think you can find him?" "Do you think he will really avenge you?"
Che Linlin said: "He will definitely come back, he told me to wait for him. He doesn't lie."
Che Zhenshan said: "Going alone, he’s walking into the lion's den. Do you think he can come back alive?"
Che Linlin asked: "Then why did you let him go?"

movie101_6969128384144081416_1560_1740.text: Xu Zhengtai continued: 'I probably met my wife when I was less than four years old' 'I lived right next to her' 'Her mother had just given birth to her' 'She was still being breastfed' 'I took a fancy to her at first sight'
Xu Tailang scoffed: 'What could a four-year-old possibly know?'
Xu Zhengtai: "Of course, I knew something. I was not a three-year-old child anymore."
Xiao Hua: "That's right." Xu Tailang massaged his temples.
Xu Zhengtai glanced at Xiao Hua and said: "I'll handle it." Then he got up and left.
Xu Tailang looked up at the ceiling and said, 'You did it.'
Xu Zhengtai: 'Found it.'
Xiao Hua said, 'Mwah.'
Xu Tailang turned to look at Xu Zhengtai and said: "Their relationship is really good" "It seems that I can only do it myself" "Sorry, Dad"
Xu Tailang, looking at the woman beside him, said: "I feel like I've seen you somewhere before."
Xu Tailang picked up the chopsticks again, picked up a piece of meat from the plate, and put it in his mouth.
Xu Tailang nodded in agreement: 'Hmm'
Xiao Hua smiled and said, 'Maybe.'
Xu Tailang picked up a chopstick of food and said, 'Do you like watching movies?'
Xiao Hua took a bite and said, 'Love it.'
Xu Tailang asked, 'Do you want to go together?'
Xiao Hua picked up a chopstick of food and put it in their mouth: "Sure."
Xu Tailang: "Tomorrow night at seven, I will wait for you at the bridge."
Xiao Hua put down her chopsticks, looked up, and said: "Sure, I don't have shifts in the evening." After saying that, she continued eating.

"By the way, Ah Zhen," Xu Tailang stood up and said as he walked to the door: "I'm leaving first," "You guys take your time eating." Xiao Hua watched Xu Tailang leave, and then Xu Zhengtai drove away in his car.
Luo Li, who was still in shock from the explosion, touched his head and looked back at his wife, asking: 'Wife, are you okay?'
Xu Zhengtai got out of the car and said: 'Are you trying to get yourself killed?' Then closed the car door and looked at the bodyguards, 'Ah, you guys, why did you hit my car?'
Xu Zhengtai: "Is this your car?" "Is it a car given to you by Brother Zhiqiang?" "Brother Zhiqiang can't wait that long."
Luo Li adjusted his pants and said: 'Soon' 'It will be settled in a day or two.'
The man said: "Hurry up and resolve this issue." "Time is not on your side. " "And you're still thinking about picking up chicks."
Luo Li, scratching his head, said: 'It's not a chick, it's my wife.'
Luo Li and Xu Tailang stood outside the car, watching the frightened couple inside. Luo Li said, 'Wife, you're scared. Let's go home.'

The scene shifted to a man standing on the steps, lost in thought. The man was Xu Tailang's father. As night fell, Xu Zhengtai, Xu Tailang, Xiao Hua, and Jia Yi sat on their motorcycles, all smiling as they looked ahead.
Xu Zhengtai and Jia Yi sat behind Xu Tailang on the motorcycle, with Liu Yi trailing behind them on another bike.
Liu Yi, riding the motorcycle with Jia Yi, sped up to overtake Xu Zhengtai and Xu Tailang. Jia Yi looked at Xu Zhengtai with a face full of resentment.
Jia Yi looked up at the sky, Liu Yi watched Jia Yi with a smile, and the two left the pool table.

movie101_7052960987330118151_5220_5400.text: Yuan Pengjun kicked Shen Mo's knee, causing Shen Mo to fall to the ground. Yuan Pengjun said, "My knee" "Brother" "I'm sorry" "I won't take interviews for you anymore" "Leave quickly" "The police are coming soon, I'll take the fall for you"

Yuan Pengjun angrily said: "You're acting" "Wasting my expressions" "Did you have fun playing with me" After saying this, Yuan Pengjun punched Shen Mo in the face, then grabbed Shen Mo's hair and threw him onto the bed. Shen Mo struggled to get up and pushed Yuan Pengjun away.

Yuan Pengjun suddenly rushed forward, grabbed Shen Mo's neck, and pushed him hard against the wall. The two started fighting, and Shen Mo was pushed to the ground. Shen Mo said, "You wanna play, I'll play with you"
Yuan Pengjun kicked Shen Mo onto the counter, Shen Mo hit his head on the medicine cabinet, and blood trickled down from his temple. Yuan Pengjun looked at Shen Mo with a face full of disgust.
Yuan Pengjun suddenly stepped forward, grabbed the table, and jumped onto the table. He kicked Shen Mo off the table, and the two started fighting on the floor.
Yuan Pengjun, seeing the situation was dire, kicked open the glass of the observation room and rushed in with Shen Mo.
Xiao Wei: "Xiao Yu, I am Xiao Wei, so you were not hypnotized."
Du Yu replied, "He's over there, 'uh la uh', 'uh la uh', how would I know what he's saying, I don't understand Japanese, go along with him, save some face for him, come, let's go."

Xiao Wei, who was being carried, couldn't stand it anymore and spat out a mouthful of blood. The nurse nearby was so scared that she stepped back repeatedly, and Shen Mo and Yuan Pengjun were shocked.
The man said, "There are still people here," "Hero, come back," "I have money," "Save us, please."
Du Yu asked, "Are you alright, Xiao Wei"
Xiao Wei, panting, said: "I say, let's just go like this, is it fair to your brothers?"
Du Yu said: "Don't worry, he can fight."
Yuan Pengjun said: "For better scene control, I must control my body freely."
Yuan Pengjun angrily said: "I hate those who impersonate others" "Go to hell"
Shen Mo struggled and said, "You really are the number one killer in Japan"
Yuan Pengjun was cornered and beaten by the two, falling to the ground. Xiao Wei and Xiaoli Ma rushed over to help, and the three of them beat Yuan Pengjun until he couldn't get up.

Yuan Pengjun suddenly lunged forward, trying to strangle Shen Mo. Shen Mo quickly grabbed a nearby wooden board and smashed it towards Yuan Pengjun. The board didn't break and Yuan Pengjun continued to press forward.

Shen Mo kicked Yuan Pengjun out of the door, then closed the door and walked inside. Yuan Pengjun fell to the ground, unable to get up. Shen Mo looked at Yuan Pengjun with a cold expression, turned around, and walked inside. Yuan Pengjun, lying on the ground, clutched his head and rolled over.
Shen Mo rushed into the ward, Yuan Pengjun immediately rushed towards him, Shen Mo quickly grabbed his neck, Yuan Pengjun raised his fist ready to punch, but couldn't bring himself to do it.

Xiaoli Ma cursed, "Bastard," and then swung a punch at Shen Mo. Shen Mo dodged the punch, and the fight began again. At this moment, a doctor pushed open the door, and Xiaoli Ma immediately stopped and ran towards Shen Mo.

movie101_6992521335159292452_2520_2700.text: Mrs. Zhang said: "I'm not sure about that" "but during that time" "her daughter would go to school and come back as if nothing had happened"
Officer Lei took out a notebook and asked, "So, does Li Xiaoyun know where her mother is?"

Mrs. Zhang said: "I'm even less sure about that," "but during the time her mother ran away," "I saw Li Xiaoyun being driven home twice," "The odd thing was," "each time the car was parked a long way off," "and Li Xiaoyun would get out and walk back home by herself."
Mrs. Zhang took the glass and said: "Oh, and" "I once overheard a fight between her and her father" "Li Hang asked Li Xiaoyun" "Where is your mother?" and guess what Li Xiaoyun said?
Officer Lei asked again: "What did she say?"
Mrs. Zhang said: "The girl said" "Why do you care where she went" "Even if she's dead, it's better than being with you."
Jiang Feng, who was combing his hair, suddenly sat down heavily beside him and asked, "What's wrong?"
Jiang Feng looked at Officer Shen and said, "Hey, I want to ask you something."
The man in the yellow vest, with a mouthful of chewing gum, said: "Don't ask me, I don't know anything."
Jiang Feng turned his head and said: "You said before" "Why did that woman swallow the needle into her stomach?"

Officer Shen looked at him and said: "What do you think?" "For medical parole, of course," "If you hurt yourself here," "the cops are scared someone will die," "so they'll for sure send you to the hospital."
Jiang Feng looked at Officer Shen and asked, "What about the stuff you hid?"
Officer Shen looked at Jiang Feng in surprise and said, "Me hide something?"
Officer Shen chuckled and said, "I've heard of the grass being greener on the other side, but have you heard of the water being cleaner?" "I'm planning to switch sides."
Jiang Feng thought for a moment and said, "I can give you money," "I want out."
Officer Lei: "Master"
Officer Shen: "Hmm"
Officer Lei: "Snap out of it"
Officer Shen looked at his watch and asked, "What's the time?"
Officer Shen glanced at his watch and said, "7:05." He then put the siren back in its place.
Officer Shen turned his head to the other side, suppressing his emotions. Officer Lei struggled to get up from the ground, his hands still tied behind his back.
Officer Lei: "Master," "Have you thought about getting a new car?" Officer Lei took out a piece of paper from his pocket.
Jiang Feng took out the packaged piece of tape and said, "It's wrapped in tape," "it won't kill if swallowed," "you can spit it out or pass it later."
Officer Shen said: "As long as the cops think you’re not faking" "They'll definitely send you to the hospital"
Officer Shen scratched his head and said: "Hey, buddy," "You haven't told me how much you'll give me yet."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Che Zhen Shan said: "Yang Mo Han might be a Communist member."
Che Linlin said: "So, you intend to eliminate him through the Japanese."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Yes, for you."
Che Linlin said: "It's for your own good, isn't it?"
Che Zhen Shan said: "Linlin, no matter what you think, daddy will always love you!" Che Zhen Shan said this and turned to leave.

Che Zhen Shan picked up the phone and said: "Hello, what?" Che Linlin's expression changed instantly. Che Zhen Shan continued: "Lu Xiao and the female Communist fled together, are they accomplices?" Che Linlin frowned, Che Zhen Shan said: "Order the third company to assemble at once."

Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, tried to say something, but the words on the tip of her tongue faltered and she couldn't utter them. Che Zhen Shan, seeing her state, felt a pang in his heart and quietly left.
Just as Che Linlin was about to shoot, the door opened and it was Yang Mo Han. Yang Mo Han said: "Che Linlin, it's me."

Che Linlin was stunned, and Yang Mo Han threw the bundle of wedding gifts at her, then turned and walked towards the window. Che Linlin stood there, stunned, as Yang Mo Han picked up the wedding dress and said: "You can now console your aunt’s spirit in heaven."
Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, said: "Yang Mo Han, thank you. I can't repay you for your kindness in my lifetime."
Yang Mo Han puzzled: "Why are you so polite with me?"
Che Linlin, leaning on Yang Mo Han's shoulder, said: "I will follow you even if I have to cross fiery waters."
Yang Mo Han said: "All right, then let's go now." "Shanyamoto will never let us go after killing the Japanese." "But before we leave, I need to bring someone along."
Che Linlin said: "Bring the female accomplice." "She has been taken away by Lu Xiao."
Yang Mo Han: "Taken away by Lu Xiao."
Che Linlin said: "My father suspects that they are Communists and has sent someone to follow them."
Yang Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao being a Communist is a joke."
Che Linlin asked in confusion: "What did you say?"
Yang Mo Han said: "I just feel Lu Xiao doesn't seem like a Communist."
Che Linlin said: "You seem to know a lot about the Communist Party."
Yang Mo Han said: "I wouldn't say that I know them well," "but this time, killing Shanyamoto," "I have to thank the Communist Party." "They have helped me both inside and out."
Che Linlin asked in confusion: "Why would they help you?"
Yang Mo Han said: "They want the encryption key in return. I know the key is with you, so I agreed to their terms."
Che Linlin said: "The key is not with me. It seems to be in the commander's office safe. Apart from my father, no one has seen it."
Yang Mo Han said: "But it's okay. If necessary, we can kill the donkey after it's done working. They wouldn't dare do anything."
Che Linlin asked in confusion: "Why?"

Yang Mo Han said: "All right, you should rest early. I'm going to meet the commander." After speaking, Yang Mo Han turned and walked towards the door, Che Linlin stood in place, watching him leave. Yang Mo Han went to the safe, turned the combination, and lit the lamp on the side.

movie101_7052960987330118151_5400_5580.text: Xiaoli Ma cursed: "You bastard, you murderer, you beast!"
Yuan Pengjun said: "Sis, I'm still alive." Hearing this, Xiaoli Ma shouted and ran out.
Xiaoli Ma helped Yuan Pengjun up and said: "How did he beat you up like this?" "No worries." "I've already knocked him out."
Shen Mo said: "Let's hurry and call the police."
A Lian, holding the door frame, shouted: "Let go of that boy, he's mine."
Da Ye and Da Ma hid behind a car, carefully observing the two who were chasing A Lian. Da Ye said: "The one just now was too dangerous. This one's safer. Surround from the front and back."

Yao Zong said: "I knew it right away," "He's not from the Bureau of Industry and Commerce." "You nincompoop!" "They ask something; you just answer anything?" "Are you that naive?" "I'm telling you three," "If we can't get the money back," "no one thinks about going home for the New Year." "When the time comes, if he doesn't pay up," "you three give him a beating for me."
Da Ye walked up to the car and looked at Yuan Pengjun through the rearview mirror.

The scene shifts to the outside of the house, where Da Ye is still lying on the ground. Yao Zong is sitting on a tricycle, ready to take Da Ye away. Da Ye looks up and sees Da Ma lying on the ground, staring at him. Da Ye gives a thumbs up to Da Ma, and Da Ma gives him a thumbs up back.
The woman who drank with Liu Dong said: "Don't run after hitting someone!"
The old lady shouted: "Stop reversing, stop reversing, stop reversing!"
At this moment, the massage parlor's boss, Yao Zong, and his underlings also came in. Yao Zong said: "Oh no, boss! I think these guys are trying to run away."
Yao Zong asked: "Are you the new doctor? Where's your boss?"
Yuan Pengjun said: "I am Japan's number one assassin."
Yuan Pengjun said: "Stop pretending to be an assassin. Settle the bill."
Everyone in the village was happily watching the big screen, even the old lady on the sofa was smiling. The movie was playing loudly, everyone was laughing happily, the scene was very lively.
Fandian Laoban and Qizi entered the restaurant.
Fandian Laoban took the passbook and said: "Oh my, how did the money in the card get into the passbook?"
Qizi said: "So, let's not do bad things anymore in the future, someone's watching us."
The screen goes black, and then Shen Mo delivers food to Xiaoli Ma's home, saying: "Sis, your meal."
Xiaoli Ma said: "Thank you."
Shen Mo handed the book to Xiaoli Ma and said: "The book you wanted." "Didn't you say this book is useless?"
Xiaoli Ma said: "I have an exam tomorrow. I need to borrow it for a bit."
Shen Mo said: "I only have one copy, and it's not easy to find."

Xiaoli Ma said: "Stingy! Just let me borrow it." "I lost my copy, I'll return it when I'm done." "I'll write an IOU for you." "You know, you." "Someone who's about to leave." "Why keep holding onto a book and not let go?"
Xiaoli Ma said: "The signature's all there."
Shen Mo said: "Sis, you'll definitely become a big star in the future. Afterward, more and more people will be chasing you for autographs. You gotta practice your signature."

Xiaoli Ma continued: "Actually, when I first saw you, I felt like we'd met somewhere before. Maybe, this is what they call fate. I hope this kind of connection can continue endlessly. I hope one day..."

movie101_6969128384144081416_1740_1920.text: The two rode their motorcycles to the cinema, Xu Tailang asked A Zheng: 'A Zheng, do you know a woman named Zhang Suzhen?'
A Zheng said: 'I know, below Qingcheng Mountain.'
Xu Tailang answered: "Her name is Bai Suzhen."
Xu Tailang put down his popcorn and asked: 'So, how many brothers are there in the gang altogether?'
A Zheng said: "There are four." "Not many people can pass the ultimate test that I have specially designed." "As a result, many have left." "Only Liu Yi and Xiao Ma managed to hold on."
Liu Yi touched Jia Yi's shoulder and asked: 'Does that mean I have passed?'
A Zheng looked at him and said: 'You haven't even started. You're just on probation now.'
Liu Yi said: "Look how good I am, Jia Yi. No tests can trouble me."
Jia Yi said: 'Liu Yi, move your head away, don't block my view of my brother.'

Liu Yi said: 'Wait for me.' After speaking, Liu Yi turned around, stood up, and walked out of the cinema. He then bought a large pot of red roses and placed it in front of the flower shop's glass window. After arranging the flowers, he lay down on the ground, covered with the rose leaves, and fell asleep.
The movie started again, but the projector suddenly jammed. The audience became restless. A man said: "This is the third time the movie has jammed!" "Can we watch it or not?"
Xu Tailang and Liu Yi squeezed through the crowd and finally caught up with A Zheng. A Zheng asked in confusion: "What's going on?"
Xu Tailang said to Liu Yi: 'Liu Yi, why did you bring a stick in here?'
Liu Yi took out a daisy from his pocket and said to Jia Yi: 'Jia Yi, this is for you.'
Jia Yi shyly said: 'Liu Yi, I already have someone I like.'
Liu Yi stood up and said: 'Where is he now? I want to challenge him.'
Jia Yi looked at her watch and said: 'I need to go, Xiao Hua. My time is almost up.'
Xu Tailang: "Thank you for your hard work."
Xu Tailang stood up and said: "Jia Yi."
Xiao Hua said: 'Don't chase after her. She already has someone she likes. If a girl doesn't have you in her heart, there's no use in whatever you do.'
Xu Tailang patted Liu Yi's shoulder and sat down beside him, saying: "It's clear that there's no spark between you two."
A Zheng looked at Liu Yi and said: 'When confessing, be relaxed.' 'Casual.'
Xu Tailang nodded and said: 'Exactly.'
A Zheng said: 'Surprises come out of the blue, just like me.' Then he took out a ring and said: 'Marry me.' 'It has a diamond on it.'
Xiao Hua took the ring and said: "Kneel down." A Zheng obediently knelt. Xiao Hua put the ring on her own finger and said: "Okay, it's settled then."
A Zheng suddenly hugged Xiao Hua from behind, lifting her up. Xiao Hua struggled and said: "Go home."
The scene shifts to a ramen shop. Liu Yi ordered three bowls of ramen and said, "Today we're celebrating a new brother, let's enjoy."
Xu Tailang looked at A Zheng and asked: "A Zheng, what does" "our gang do?"
A Zheng said: "Since you have already reached our top management level,"

movie101_6992521335159292452_2700_2880.text: Jiang Feng, with a furrowed brow, swallowed the gold in his mouth, then reached out to Jiang Feng and said, 'How much would it take for you to swallow this?'
The man in the yellow vest laughed and said: 'I'll swallow it.' 'Are you crazy?'
The man in the yellow vest, with a face full of smiles, pulled Jiang Feng's little finger, saying: "Police Officer." Jiang Feng's expression turned cold instantly.

Jiang Feng covered his mouth and nose with one hand, pulling the man's hand away from the glass with the other. He then lifted the man's legs and threw him out of the elevator. The man struggled to get up and asked, "What are you doing?"
Security Guard: 'He swallowed a blade.'

The police quickly subdued the agitated Jiang Feng, and Officer Shen came over to help: "Move away, I'll handle it." He patted Jiang Feng's face and said, "Damn it, he swallowed the blade! Spit it out!"
Officer Shen: "What are you doing? Open the door!"

He coughed a few times and quickly walked into the office, wiping the sweat from his forehead with his sleeve. He pushed open the glass door, his steps heavy with fatigue, and his expression growing more grim as he approached the desk.
Jiang Feng walked to the front desk and said, "Zhang Daichen."
Zhang Daichen said: "Jiang Feng", "Why are you out first?" "I was just arranging your bail."
The doorman blocked Zhang Daichen and said: "Sorry, you can't leave."
Jiang Feng grabbed Zhang Daichen and said: "Listen to me first." "In the next few days, be cautious of strangers around you."
Zhang Daichen asked: "What strangers? What do you mean?"
Jiang Feng struggled and said: "Let go of me! Let go of me!"
The police officer stopped the waiter and said, 'Let him go! I just arranged his bail.'
Jiang Feng: "You have the wrong person."
The man in the gray coat grabbed Jiang Feng's collar and dragged him over, saying, "Don't move."
Officer Shen: 'I am formally detaining you for assaulting an officer.'
Zhang Daichen walked over and said: "I just arranged his bail."
The security guard said to the two: "Let's go, behave yourself."
Officer Shen: "Who are you?"

Zhang Daichen said: "He's my husband, officer." "My husband is normally a very gentle person." "I don't know what's gotten into him these past few days," "but please trust me," "he's really not a bad person."

Officer Shen looked at Zhang Daichen and said: "You need to take care of that wound." Zhang Daichen looked down at the wound on her arm. Officer Shen said to Officer Shen: "Kim, take this lady to Dr. Chen."
Zhang Daichen turned around and said: "It's just a scratch, it's fine."
Officer Shen: "We need to follow procedure." "As his family member, please cooperate." Zhang Daichen looked at Officer Shen with a bit of impatience.

Officer Shen: 'If you can hold on for ten more minutes, your wife's bail process will be completed.' Jiang Feng looked up at Officer Shen, Officer Shen: 'I trust you. 'I've been to the Memory Master place. They were very uncooperative. They insisted I produce a search warrant. Given the current situation, even applying for a search warrant will take at least ten days to two weeks. So, for now, I can't confirm who exchanged memories with you.'
Officer Shen: "How is my wife?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Mo Han, who had been hiding in the dark, suddenly emerged. The two faced off, guns raised. Mo Han asked, 'Lin Lin, what are you doing here?'
Lin Lin asked, 'What are you doing?'
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said: 'At this point, I don't want to hide it from you any longer, actually, I am...'

Mo Han, with a face full of reluctance, glanced at Lin Lin, then turned to the desk and pressed the switch. The desk, which had been moved by Lin Lin, instantly slid back to its original place. Mo Han said: 'My life is in your hands, go ahead and shoot.'

Lin Lin said: 'Mo Han, you've been using me all along, haven't you? Using me as a shield, gaining my father's trust, getting a foothold here to gather information. Am I right? Aren't you afraid of exposing yourself, aren't you afraid of dying?'

Mo Han, with a solemn expression, walked up to Lin Lin and said: 'Ever since I embarked on this path, I've regarded myself as already dead. To console the countless unjust souls like your mother's, for the happiness of hundreds of millions of suffering compatriots, for a new world, my death means nothing.'

Mo Han said: 'Lin Lin, the Japanese devils are now burning, killing, and looting everywhere, destroying our homes. Our countrymen are in deep suffering. We are all Chinese, and as a conscientious Chinese, facing national disaster, the Kuomintang not only fails to resist but also targets the communists. How can one not be angry, how can one not be heartbroken?'

Mo Han walked up to Lin Lin and said: 'Lin Lin, for the harm I've caused you, I solemnly apologize. This apology has been weighing on my heart so heavily that I could hardly breathe. That's why I planned to take you away and make it up to you with my actions.'
Lin Lin said: 'Thank you for your kindness and honesty.'
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han's face and said: "Try my birthday."
Mo Han tried to open the safe with his military knife but couldn't. He said to Lin Lin: 'It won't open.'
Lin Lin said: 'Try my mother's birthday, 1208.' Mo Han tried the combination, but the safe didn't open.

Secretary Yang said: "Hello, brother, I want to send you some money. You mentioned last time about moving. Didn't move, right?"

Secretary Yang said: 'Okay, our special agent will arrive at noon tomorrow. From the division to the regiment headquarters for an inspection. I might go back to Nanjing or maybe another place, so don't reply after receiving the money.' He hung up quickly after finishing.

The scene shifts to the command room where a map is being discussed. The leader unfolds the map and says: "Comrades, Special Agent Bai is coming from the division to the regiment headquarters. He'll pass through one of these routes. Tonight we'll plant mines here and ambush with machine guns at this high point."
Guard ran to the front of the formation and shouted: "Look to the right, look forward."
Guard ran over and said: "Report, Colonel. Just received a call from the division." "Special Agent Bai has switched to a plane and is expected to arrive shortly."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Got it, you may go."
Guard said: "Yes."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Secretary Yang, Special Agent Bai is arriving soon. You must be excited."
Secretary Yang said: "Indeed, a bit."
Che Zhen Shan said: "I'm not excited, I'm nervous, extremely nervous."
Secretary Yang said: "Colonel, with you saying that, you've made me nervous as well." "Whenever I get nervous, I feel like going to the restroom."
Che Zhen Shan thought for a moment and said: "Alright, go quickly and come back soon." "Your superior will be here shortly."
Secretary Yang, who had been waiting for a long time, finally saw Che Zhen Shan, and seeing his serious expression, he knew that the meeting was likely to be very tough.
He then returned to the office, but found that the room was empty. He hurriedly ran out to search.
Secretary Yang picked up the phone, dialed a number and said: "Please connect me to 4321."
Che Zhen Shan looked at his watch; it was already 2:05 PM. He anxiously said: "Special Agent Bai will be here soon." "Where is Secretary Yang?" "Lu Xiang, go check."
Secretary Yang listened to the phone call from the battalion commander, his face full of worry, and then he slowly put down the phone.

Secretary Yang, who had been called out by Che Zhen Shan, was somewhat panicked. He quickly looked around the office, fearing that someone might come in. After making sure no one was around, he stealthily left the office, descended the stairs, and arrived at the bathroom door.
Guard shouted: 'Secretary Yang Secretary Yang!' No one responded to Guard's call. He had no choice but to open the door of the toilet and take a look.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2280_2460.text: Luo Li, who had already taken off his glasses, put them back on and then took them off again, saying: "Can you give me back my glasses?"
Luo Li said: "Stop talking and eat," Luo Li brought the bowl of instant noodles close to Xiao Ma's mouth, but he refused to eat. Seeing this, Luo Li became furious.

A colleague said: "Boss, please stop feeding him, you might develop feelings if you keep feeding him." Luo Li ignored the advice of his colleague, but stood up and walked towards the back of the warehouse.

Luo Li said: "We probably haven't captured the core management. Logically speaking, in this underworld, even if we captured an intern, their boss should have come to rescue. Their inaction to our activity puts us in a very passive position."
Another man said: 'Just tear up the ticket' 'Shoot him dead' 'Throw the body at the KTV entrance'
Luo Li angrily said: "Are you crazy? Killing is illegal. Do you want to be a death row prisoner? Let me tell you, you absolutely cannot kill people."
Xiao Ma, with a bowl of noodles on his lap, said: "Thank you."
Luo Li, with a face full of regret, said: 'We've shown our hand.'
Xiao Ma shouted: 'Boss! Boss! Boss! Boss!'
Luo Li walked over and slapped him, saying: "I told you to shut up."
The man in the floral shirt walked to the other side of the table, scratching his head and circling around while everyone remained silent.
The man in the floral shirt suddenly turned his head, picked up the bottle, and smashed it towards the wall. The others also threw the bottles in their hands towards the wall.
Luo Li, who was sitting opposite, saw this and adjusted his own collar, then picked up the wine glass on the table and drained it in one gulp.
The man sitting next to him said: 'Boss, I don't think this is any strategy. They haven't even noticed that someone is missing.'
Xiao Ma replied: "I think so too."
A man in a blue shirt suddenly stood up and said to Luo Li: 'Boss, how about we kidnap that woman?'
Luo Li leaned back in his chair and said: "We can't touch women."
The man said: 'Then let's kidnap Liu-yi'
Luo Li replied: 'We can't touch children either.'
The man in black clothes said: 'How about we directly kidnap their boss then?' Luo Li pinched the bridge of his nose and said: 'Do you even have any sense of rules anymore?'

Luo Li said: "What are our demands?" "It's to resolve this through negotiation," "so we just need leverage." "If you kidnap the negotiation target directly," "isn't that shameful, disgusting, ugly?" "Ah, I, Luo Li, will only be a street thug." "How am I supposed to transition to the political and business world?"
The man said: 'Boss, then there's only one person left we can move against now.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_3420_3600.text: Officer Shen asked: "What is the relationship with the murderer?"

Jiang Feng continued: "He thinks the murderer came to help his mom." "There's one more thing I couldn't figure out—" "In my memory, I was so ruthless to Li Huilan, but at the moment I saw her take her last breath, I had a very strange feeling."
Officer Shen asked: "What feeling?"
Jiang Feng replied: "Happiness for her." Officer Shen looked at Jiang Feng in disbelief, then lowered his head in thought.
Jiang Feng covered his face and wept, Officer Shen continued: "Oh right, there's one more thing, the last call from Li Huilan's house was made to the murderer."
The camera switches to Zhang Daichen's home, where the doorbell rings. Zhang Daichen opens the door to find Officer Lei standing outside, holding a bag and a bouquet of flowers.
Shanshan Chen: "I brought you some medicine." "This medicine I have is very effective in removing scars." "I'll give it to you."
Zhang Daichen said: "How could I trouble you so?"
Zhang Daichen: "It's no trouble."
Zhang Daichen: "Oh, sorry, please come in and sit." Zhang Daichen invited Officer Lei in with a smile.

The next day, Zhang Daichen walked into the kitchen with a bottle of water, opened the fridge, and Officer Lei walked in with a cup of coffee. Zhang Daichen took out a bottle of mineral water from the fridge and handed it to Officer Lei.
Zhang Daichen: "In such hot weather, you specially came to deliver medicine. It's really too kind of you."
Shanshan Chen: "Actually, I was passing by." "I also wanted to ask you something." "I have a ticket to a concert." "I really couldn't find anyone to go with me. I wonder if you'd be interested."
Shanshan Chen picked up the water on the table and took a sip, while Zhang Daichen continued: "I'd love to go. But—"
Shanshan Chen said: "How about this, I'll give you my business card." "It has my phone number." "If you change your mind," "or your wound has any issues," "give me a call anytime."
Zhang Daichen said: "Okay, thank you."

Zhang Daichen: "Then I won't disturb you further." "I need to get back to the hospital." The two said their goodbyes in this manner, with Zhang Daichen smiling and walking away. The scene shifted to the library, where Jiang Feng was helping Xiaoyun Ji study.
Officer Lei stood up and said: "Master"
Officer Shen walked while saying: "I'm sorry""I'm sorry""I'm sorry"
Officer Shen said: "Hello Xiaoyun, is it convenient for Uncle to ask you a few questions?"
Officer Lei bent down and said: "The police uncle is asking you a question." Officer Lei sat down next to Officer Shen.
Officer Shen said: "Don't be nervous, we just want to confirm a few details with you."

Officer Lei asked: "Xiaoyun Ji, do you know where your mom went during the time she went missing?" Jiang Feng shook his head. Officer Lei asked: "Little girl, don't lie. How could your mom leave home without telling you?" Jiang Feng shook his head. Officer Lei asked: "And I also heard that some time ago, someone gave you a ride home. Who was that person?"
Xiaoyun Ji replied: "I just hitched a ride with a classmate."
Officer Lei said: "A classmate?" "Which classmate?" "What's the name?" "Take me to find him."

movie101_7176565114756137528_60_240.text: The scene shifts to the outside of the Kuomintang stronghold, where a car is driving out. A soldier salutes and says: "Salute."

The scene shifts to a car slowly stopping in front of a building. The car belongs to the First Art Design Studio of the Ministry of Culture, with the director of photography and art director seated inside. The studio staff, armed, stand guard at the entrance. Two people get out of the car, and the scene fades to black.
Lu Xiao: "Commander, we've arrived."
Che Zhen Shan: 'Identity confirmation.'
Lu Xiao responded with an 'Mmm,' then turned and walked towards the car. He opened the car door, and several officers got out of the car. Lu Xiao looked at Che Zhen Shan and smiled.
Che Zhen Shan responded: "Commander of the 101st Regiment Che Zhen Shan welcomes the special envoy's secretary for guidance."
The soldier replied: "I'm here to learn."
Che Zhen Shan replied: "Secretary Yang, you're too kind. I originally planned to personally receive you but I couldn't leave due to an urgent matter. I hope you can forgive me."
Lu Xiao quickly replied: 'Ah, not at all, not at all.'
Lu Xiao: 'Please.'
Lu Xiao: "Good."
Che Zhen Shan: "Secretary Yang, you must be tired from your journey." "I have organized a welcome banquet for you at Si Xi Grand Hotel, the best restaurant in Liucheng."
Hong Zichen said: "Commander, you're too kind."
Lu Xiao extended his right hand and said: "Please, come in."

The cadre continued: "Comrade Hong Zichen, the organization has decided to send you to infiltrate the Nationalist 101st Regiment. Your primary mission is to obtain the code. You will go disguised as the secretary of the Nanjing government's special envoy, Yang Mohan, and inspect their work."
Lu Xiao's father said: "We have already captured the real Yang Mohan," "you must act cautiously," "obtain the code by clever means, not by force."
Hong Zichen answered: "Yes."
The scene shifts to the interior of a room, where a soldier leads the way, showing Hong Zichen around the room.
Che Zhen Shan said while walking: "Secretary Yang, you are so young, yet you have gained the appreciation of the special envoy. You have a bright future ahead."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Oh, why didn't you bring your family along for some fun?"
Lu Xiao said: "I'm not married yet."
Che Linlin said: "I have hands and feet; I don't need anyone to take care of me."
A soldier said: "Miss Che Linlin, this is black chicken soup personally ordered by Lu Xiao to rejuvenate you."

Che Zhen Shan said: "This is my daughter Che Linlin, she is in charge of the radio translation work, she was frightened a few days ago, her mood hasn't been great, I hope Secretary Yang can excuse her."
Hong Zichen looked at the signboard of the bar, then turned to Lu Xiao and said: "Since Miss Che is upset, why not invite her to join us for a few drinks, to help ease her mood?"
Che Zhen Shan said: "That doesn't seem very appropriate."
Hong Zichen asked: "Is there any inconvenience?"
Che Zhen Shan declined: "No, no, it would indeed be an honor for my daughter."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Linlin, Secretary Yang from Nanjing, is inviting you to dine at Si Xi Grand Hotel." Che Linlin was somewhat surprised.
The beggar gratefully said: "Thank you, you two are such good people, thank you."
The scene shifts to a bar, where Che Linlin is reminiscing about the past with Hong Zichen. Che Linlin said: "It was snowing that day, it was exceptionally cold, and the old lady also said."
Hong Zichen said: "Miss Che, you must be mistaken."
Che Linlin said: "No, I think it was you. Think again."
Hong Zichen said: "But I have never been to Liucheng."
Che Linlin said in surprise: "How is that possible? That's strange."

movie101_7052960987330118151_900_1080.text: Shen Mo glared at them, stood up, and walked out. Dr. Chen said to the departing Shen Mo: 'You don't seem short of money, what about my payment,' 'just delay it another two days.'
Yao Zong stood up angrily and said: "Still delaying? It's been months!"
Dr. Chen said: 'It's been three months! A few more days won't matter.'
Yao Zong said: 'Don't tease me, Dr. Chen,' 'I'm a straightforward person,' 'Why do you keep teasing me?' 'Look at me, always delivering goods for you.'
Yao Zong said: 'We don't play like this,' 'Is that right?' 'Just wait until the day you call me 'boss', then it'll be too late.' 'Dr. Chen, do you want me to have a heart-to-heart with you?'
Old Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioner said: "The pulse is weak," "indicating a disturbance in the heart meridian."
Old Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioner's words hit Da Ye's sore spot, he was at a loss for words, Old Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioner: "Alright, alright."
Dr. Chen said: "No more words."

Da Ye said: "Yao Zong, take care." Old Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioner, who was waiting at the door, saw Da Ye and immediately put on his sunglasses and chased after. Da Ye ran while looking back, and Old Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioner ran while looking forward, completely unaware that he was being chased.
Da Ma said: "Don't worry about me, go on, hurry" Da Ma chased after Yao Zong, and Da Ye, while running, said: 'Hey old man,' 'What's happened to you?'
Da Ye said: "Forget it, forget it, no more acting."
The two pranksters laughed even harder, while Shen Mo behind them frowned and suddenly burst into laughter.
Shen Mo said: "Laughter is a sophisticated expression of human sentiment" "It most effectively reflects our inner self" "Yet for me" "It's just a means to create my persona"
Shen Mo leaned back in his chair, lost in thought.
The scene shifts to an office where three people are gathered around a computer, watching Xiaoli Ma livestreaming on QQ Space.
Shen Mo's face changed, and he crossed his arms in front of his chest, looking disdainfully at everyone.
The three said in unison: "Wait, wait, I'm going to throw an egg at her first."
The man with the big tattoo on his arm said: "Right, right, add two pieces of dog poop."
Shen Mo said: "I must have seen this girl somewhere before, but I can't seem to remember." "Perhaps," "my memory is starting to fade."

Xiaoli Ma was broadcasting live, wearing headphones, and reading the comments on the computer. The comments were overwhelmingly supportive, with one user saying: "Xiaoli Ma, you are the best, we all love you"
Xiaoli Ma was deeply moved and started to sob.
Xiaoli Ma said: "Okay, thank you very much," "I appreciate everyone's support," "Performance is my life," "I’ll persist," "Until the day I can perform no more."

movie101_6969128384144081416_2460_2640.text: Xu Zhengtai, who was tidying up his pants, stopped and said: "Grab that, grab that, the 'Top Gun'"

Xu Zhengtai said to Tai Lang: "Ah Lang, take a look," "You've never seen so many videotapes," "Not bad, eh?" Xu Zhengtai took out a pair of sunglasses and handed them to Tai Lang, saying: "Try these on," "Look sharp," "Come on."
Xu Zhengtai, while walking, said: "This cinema thing," "it's definitely got no future," "the society is all about video parlors now."
Tai Lang turned to Xu Zhengtai and said: "Shouldn't VCDs and DVDs be the trend in this era?"

Liu Yi replied: "What's a VCD? My big brother just installed an air conditioner in the video parlor. See how many places can afford air conditioning? That's why you have to go to video parlors to watch."
Xu Zhengtai said: "To make more money, we need to invest more." He then asked Tai Lang: "Ah Lang, do you have any money?"
Tai Lang adjusted his sunglasses and said: "Yes, I do"
Xu Zhengtai said to Tai Lang: "How about we open one together?"
Tai Lang replied: "I didn't bring any." "Nah, video parlors have no future, we should open a cinema."
Xu Zhengtai gestured with his hands and said: "How could I possibly be wrong?"
Tai Lang said: "You'll understand when you grow up a bit more", Tai Lang said while walking to the car, leaving the two to look at each other.
Xu Zhengtai called out to Ah Lang: "Ah Lang, come here, I want to tell you something." "I've just brought in five hundred tapes, and we'll be redecorating in a few days." "You just wait and see."
Tai Lang said: "No wonder we were so poor when I was a child"
Xu Zhengtai and the other two walked while talking: "Being with one woman for over twenty years" "Don't you get tired of it?"
Xu Zhengtai said: "Tired, yes." "I'm going to the toilet."
Liu Yi said: "I'm too busy to bother."
Xu Zhengtai and Liu Yi chased after Luo Li, and after they left, Xu Zhengtai said: "But I like this sticky feeling"
Tai Lang said: "Let me tell you, a man's life..."
The screen goes black and the man in the car says: "Hey, I'm saying, the one we've got this time should be more useful than that one surnamed Ma, right?"
Tai Lang straightened up, put on his sunglasses, and said: "You've kidnapped Little Ma"
Luo Li slapped Tai Lang and said: "Shut up!"
Tai Lang, sitting in the back, leaned forward to look through the rearview mirror, then sat back upright and looked out the window. At this moment, the car was approaching a railroad crossing ahead.
Tai Lang suddenly pulled the handbrake, causing the car to drift and the two men to fall out.
Tai Lang's foot was on the gas, and the car sped up. The drug dealer still tried to grab the steering wheel, but Tai Lang kicked him to the ground.
Tai Lang, who was driving, was also tied up. Seeing Xu Zhengtai's car coming, he quickly started his car and drove straight towards Xu Zhengtai.
Xu Zhengtai turned around and said: "Ah Lang, you can drive, huh?"
Tai Lang grabbed Xu Zhengtai and said: "Little Ma has been kidnapped"
Tai Lang said: "Get in, I'll drive, I'll drive," and then pushed Xu Zhengtai towards the car. After getting in the car, Tai Lang closed the car door and started the car.
The scene shifts to a police station, where two policemen are inspecting a motorcycle when a speeding car splashes water all over them.

movie101_6992521335159292452_3600_3780.text: Xiaoyun Li said: "Uncle," "Are you questioning me now as a police officer?" "Did you come to find me with the knowledge of the station?" "You should be very clear that I'm a minor."
Officer Lei got angry too and slapped Xiaoyun Li, saying: "What kind of attitude is this?"
Officer Shen smiled and said: "Why scare her?"
Officer Lei said: "I think she definitely has a problem."
Officer Shen asked: "What do you think about her relationship with her mother?"
Officer Shen took a bite of the hamburger and said: "I think it's not bad." He then picked up some sauce and added it to his hamburger.
Officer Shen asked: "Then what do you think," "why would she cover for the murderer of her mother?" Officer Lei didn't answer, just kept eating his burger.
Officer Shen said: "I know," "Li Xiaoyun must be fed up with her parents' quarrels," "so she simply killed her mother and framed her father."
Zhang Daichen said: "Yeah, I also find it strange," "Jiang Feng, yeah," "definitely something is wrong," "really?" "That's great," "then I am relieved."
Officer Lei's Wife hung up the phone with a smile, but the smile quickly faded as she recalled the recent events, and she lowered her head in contemplation.
Officer Lei said: "Master," "I can't figure it out," "What do you think?" "Is it more likely that Li Xiaoyun is protecting the murderer," "or that Jiang Feng has lost his mind?"
Officer Shen said: "Here they come." The two of them hurriedly hid as Li Hang walked in with shackles on his feet and hands.
Officer Lei said: "Li Hang," "We'd like to understand more about what happened on the night of the incident." "Please cooperate."
Officer Lei said: "I'm talking to you." "Lift your head up."
Officer Lei looked at Li Hang, then turned to Officer Shen and said: "Li Hang," "Can you recount what happened on the night of the incident?"
Li Hang replied: "I drank," "I hit her," "then she died."
Officer Lei asked: "Can you be more specific?"
Li Hang said: "I've already explained everything I have to say."
Officer Lei said, "Say it again"
Li Hang replied: "I've already confessed."
Officer Lei asked again: "So you're sure that you personally bludgeoned Li Huilan to death?"
Officer Lei asked: "Or what?"
Officer Shen looked at Li Hang, and then Officer Lei gestured to Officer Shen to take over the interrogation.
Officer Lei asked Officer Shen: "Do you know about your daughter's recent social activities?"
Officer Lei asked Li Hang: "During the time the incident occurred," "did you see anyone drive your daughter home?"
Officer Lei asked again: "Answer." Li Hang still shook his head.

movie101_7089369392055583246_1140_1320.text: Da Xu and Wang Xiaopo looked at each other, then turned their heads, put down their tools, and stared wide-eyed, asking, "What's going on?"
Da Xu said: "Behave, aim precisely."
Da Xu said: "What a coincidence, you two again." "It's fate, huh?"
Da Xu said: "What's going on? The last time you bumped into us, was it these two?" "Behave," "Bumper Car Association, right?"
Xiao Teng said: "Big brother, you see me, I, we didn't do it on purpose, right?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "Look at this, what should we do about this?"
Da Xu said: "What to do?" "Pay up, a thousand bucks."
Wang Xiaopo, covering his mouth, said: "Let go of the thousand bucks, just settle for three hundred and help them with the repairs."
Da Xu said: "Three hundred bucks?" "Not even enough to fix a door with three hundred bucks."
Da Xu said: "Why should I? It's like you're boss of my car repair shop."
Da Xu glanced at Wang Xiaopo, then turned to Xiao Teng and Zhang Li and said: "Xiaopo, you talk to these two. I'll take them to get the car fixed."
Da Xu said: "Hurry up, we still have work to do."
The train sped forward, taking people to their destinations, and Wang Xiaopo also left Beijing with the train.
Wang Xiaopo and Da Xu walked out of the repair shop. Wang Xiaopo said: "Just fix it up casually, what took you so long?"
Da Xu said: "Oh right, they've changed out their generator, can you believe that? What for? It looks dead, are you going to pay for a new one? Seriously."
Reporter Chen: "Ah, hello."
Zhang Li said: "Good day, sir. Is there anything I can assist you with?"
Reporter Chen: "Let's get acquainted. My surname is Chen, like the 'Chen Shimei' Chen. I'm a reporter for the Jiangnan Express."
Zhang Li said: "Mr. Chen."
Reporter Chen said: "I'm a reporter for the Jiangnan Express."
Zhang Li said: "Jiangnan Express."
Reporter Chen asked: "Could you talk about the homebuyers' response to the current real estate prices?" "Could you discuss this with me?"
Zhang Li said: "So many customers around, ask them."
Reporter Chen: "Then, miss, may I have your name, Zhang Li?"

Class Monitor said: "Can't you give me a few more days? I'll definitely gather the money." "Rest assured, I won't default on the payment," "Yes, yes, that's right, this sum isn't much." "But my recent capital..." "...turnover is a bit tight." "Okay, thank you, thank you!"
The scene switches to Zheng Jin's office, where he slammed the phone down angrily and cursed: "What kind of quality is that?"

Class Monitor said: "Hey, hey, where is your mind during work time?" Class Monitor pointed at the other person and said: "And you, hairy ghost, get your hair cut tomorrow." Class Monitor sat down and started working.

Class Monitor said: "Recently, the company held a work meeting for team leaders and above, reminding everyone not to neglect production safety. Also, whenever you have the time, dip into your studies on electricity."

movie101_7176565114756137528_780_960.text: Lu Xiang called out from inside the bathroom: "Secretary Yang."
He then went to the men's restroom, knocked on the door, and after a long time, the door opened slightly before closing again.
Lu Xiang, who was originally standing straight, slouched and then left with the document bag.
Secretary Yang and Che Linlin then entered the room one after another. The three of them split up and searched separately.

Lu Xiang, who had just entered the restroom, heard the noise and immediately drew his pistol, ready to rush out. Che Linlin opened the door and said: "Get out, you pervert, get out quickly." "You shameless lackey." "You actually came into the women's restroom."
Lu Xiang asked: "What's the matter, Secretary Yang?"
Secretary Yang squatted down and said: "Deputy Lu Xiang, I suddenly had a stomachache, I didn't see the sign clearly."
Che Linlin said: "Didn't see clearly, my foot! You did it on purpose."
The soldier said: "Miss Che Linlin, I'm really sorry, I just can't hold it anymore."
Secretary Yang asked: "Linlin, are you okay?"
The soldier said: "Oh no, I can't hold it any longer." He rushed into the bathroom.
Lu Xiang quickly ran to the bathroom, closed the door, and said to Secretary Yang: "Hurry up, the commissioner will be here soon."
Secretary Yang, seeing this, was momentarily at a loss, but quickly adjusted his state, drew his pistol from his waist, and aimed at Lu Xiang.
Secretary Yang quietly left the bathroom, only to see Lu Xiang walking with his head down in the square.
Secretary Yang opened the door and looked around, seeing no one, then turned and went to the office of the political department.
The guard said, "Commissioner Bai has arrived."
Secretary Yang said: "Commissioner Bai, he... he"
Lu Xiang asked: "What's wrong with him?"
Lu Xiang said: "He had an accident."
Lu Xiang said: "What's wrong, spit it out quickly"
The officer in the guard tower said: "As soon as he got off the plane, a beggar with a bomb strapped to him rushed out of the bushes." "When he got close, the commander shot him." "But, but..."
Lu Xiang asked: "The commander is dead?"
The soldier said: "The commander dodged quickly and injured his leg, but Commissioner Bai, he... he..." Secretary Yang looked at the soldier, then turned to look at Lu Xiang.
Secretary Yang rushed to the window and said: "What kind of guards are you?" Then he turned and walked to the window, saying: "Oh my, Commissioner Bai, how did you die so suddenly?"
Lu Xiang said: "Alright, Secretary Yang, he's not your real father. Just wail a bit and it's enough."
Lu Xiang cried and said: "He is my real father"
Lu Xiang said: "The man is already dead, what's the use of crying?"
A soldier said: "Deputy Lu Xiang, the commissioner might still be alive."
Lu Xiang said: "Huh?"
Secretary Yang said in disbelief: "What, not dead?" Secretary Yang couldn't believe it, stood up and walked towards the door, then burst into tears.
Lu Xiang said: "Damn it, didn't you say he wasn’t dead earlier?" "Secretary Yang, let's go and check now, hurry, let's go and check."
The scene shifts to the hospital. The nurse on duty called out to the two soldiers, then hurriedly followed them. The two soldiers ran down the stairs and arrived at the ward.

movie101_6969128384144081416_2640_2820.text: The police said, "Sun, chase him." The two policemen immediately got on their motorcycles and left. In the private room, Luo Li and Zheng Tai were having dinner together.
Luo Li asked, "Wife, how's the Japanese cuisine today?"
The scene shifts to a Japanese restaurant. Songzi said, "Husband, you're so kind"

Luo Li said: "Brother Huang Zhiqiang said that after finishing this batch of cars, he will not do the smuggling business anymore and will do real estate with me. Then I don't need to watch the cars here anymore."
Songzi: "You don't have to work so hard"

Luo Li picked up a piece of sushi and said, "Maybe a little illegal. How can I drive a fancy car and take my wife out for a ride without taking some risks?" Songzi laughed and picked up a piece of sushi.
Songzi said, "When I start making money, I will buy you a real gold chain"
The two raised their cups to each other, then Songzi took a small sip first, followed by Luo Li drinking it all in one go.
Luo Li said, "Wife, I know you like Japan, but with my current ability, I can only give you this world."
Luo Li said, "I learned a Japanese song, let me sing it for you"
Luo Li said: "My love" "I can only give you a piece of the world" "This piece of the world" "belongs to you"
The boss's car was riddled with bullet holes. The police arrived in no time. The subordinates scattered in panic, with one of them grabbing a brick and hurling it at Tai Lang.
Tai Lang untied the ropes on the car. The three men from the car rushed out, and Zheng Tai and the rest fought with the men from the car.

The man in the striped shirt picked up a bottle from the ground and smashed it towards Zheng Tai. Zheng Tai rolled to the side to dodge. The man in the suit grabbed Zheng Tai's leg and dragged him to the ground. Zheng Tai grabbed the man's hand and twisted it, then kicked him to the ground.
Zheng Tai climbed up from the ground and said, "I'll help you."
The three of them were knocked to the ground by the chair. Zheng Tai and Tai Lang were complaining about the boss while hiding under the table.
Zheng Tai was still beating the two men, shouting, "You guys really don't know how to die."
