movie101_7228950501038293560_1320_1500.text: Feng Yucheng said: "I don't deserve to be a man."

The scene shifts to Feng Yucheng returning home in the rain. He rode his bike in the rain, soaked through, and then staggered into the shelter, dropped his bike, and collapsed on the steps, gasping for breath.

Feng Yucheng held his head in his hands, tears streaming down his face. He furrowed his brows, looking incredibly pained. His body trembled as he cried, his poor little nose was red from wiping. He kept crying and shouting, the pain in his heart too deep to bear.
The director said: 'Facing this grieving man before me, I don't know how to console him. Actually, Feng Yucheng having a woman like Shui Xiu, he is fortunate.'
The male voice said: "Shui Xiu went to the county town for her legal rights. Though we don't know the outcome, she was courageous."

The rain outside was still relentless, showing no signs of stopping. Shui Xiu sat on the steps, holding her bag tightly, her body wrapped in her coat, appearing extremely frail. The cold rain soaked her clothes and hair, making her look even more miserable.

The camera shifts, and Shui Xiu is seen sleeping on the steps outside the textile factory. She is holding her shoes tightly in her arms. She looks disheveled and dirty, clearly having slept rough for several days. She stands up, looks around, and then heads inside.
Shui Xiu was riding her bike home, tears streaming down her face as she wiped them away.
Shui Xiu was pedaling hard, her face full of worry and regret. She knew she needed to find the child as soon as possible, and for the sake of the child, she was willing to endure all hardships.
The next day, Feng Yucheng rode his bicycle to the repair shop.
The scene shifts to the village entrance, where Shui Xiu is pushing a bicycle slowly along a country path, surrounded by lush trees and bathed in the warm sunlight.

Shui Xiu was still on her way, pedaling her bicycle as fast as she could, trying to get there before dark. She wiped the sweat from her forehead with her hand, but the more anxious she became, the harder she fell.

The sun was rising, casting a gentle light on the earth. Shui Xiu rode her bicycle along the village path, the wheels of her bike stirring up the dust on the road. The morning sun filtered through the leaves, shining on the small courtyard of the village.
Shui Xiu was stunned for a moment, then fell off the bike.

movie101_6969128384144081416_300_480.text: Xu Tailang: "Mother died."
The female reporter apologized: "Oh, I'm sorry."
Xu Tailang: "Alright, thank you everyone, that will be all." The staff and the audience below the stage were all cheering for Xu Tailang.
The crowd shouted: "Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang Xu Tailang"
Xu Tailang walked out of the conference room with a dejected look, leaned on the railing, and Father, who was smoking, came over and said, "Congratulations."
Xu Tailang said: "You don't have to congratulate me with a special gesture." Xu Tailang looked down at the race track, while Father stood behind him, silently watching.
Father took a puff of his cigarette and said, 'I've loved driving since I was young. I never imagined you'd get this good at it.'

Xu Tailang: 'You always force me to do things I really don't like. As a kid, it was studying math. As I grew up, it was medical school. When I said I loved driving, you arranged for me to drive an ambulance.'
Xu Tailang's Father: "Your mother once said" "that it's especially good for a child to grow up and become a doctor."
Xu Tailang continued: "Did she also say it's especially good that her husband, before having a child, went off to fight, ended up in prison for six years?"

Xu Tailang: "Come on." Xu Tailang sat in the car, buckled up, and with a wave of his hand, the car slowly started. Father stood not far away, watching the car leave, his expression growing more and more serious.
Xu Tailang drove up to Father, looked down at Father, then rolled down the window, and stared at Father for a long time without saying a word.
The scene switches to the rally race, where Xu Tailang is driving at high speed. The team member reminds: "Slow down, Xu Tailang. Don't go too fast, ahead..."

The scene shifts to a dilapidated factory. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust. The car drifts into a turn, kicking up dust.
Xu Tailang said: 'I think I'm going to be sick.'
Xu Tailang said: "Go ahead, throw up. It's my co-driver's helmet anyway." Xu Tailang remained expressionless, focusing on driving.
The car drifted out of the alley, and Xu Tailang drove the car to the abandoned factory. The car jumped up, and the car landed steadily on the ground.
Doctor looked up and saw Xu Tailang lying on the stretcher. He put down the oxygen mask and looked back. Doctor said: "There's another person in the car."
Xu Tailang thought: "They say that when a person dies, their life flashes before their eyes." "Will mine?"
The scene shifts to the police station, where Xu Tailang is locked in a cell. The baby bottle on the table is filled with formula. Xu Tailang slowly extends the bottle towards the visiting room.

movie101_6992521335159292452_4140_4320.text: Officer Lei said: 'My wife is out there in danger at any moment,' Officer Shen released his hold, Officer Lei asked: 'What are you doing?'
Officer Lei said to Jiang Feng: 'Please take Mr. Jiang Feng back,' then he took his hand off Jiang Feng's shoulder.
Officer Lei said: "Mr. Jiang Feng, leave," and Jiang Feng, with an angry face, was forcibly taken away by the prison guard who came in.
Zhang Daichen: 'Sis Daichen, you're here,' Zhang Daichen greeted while walking upstairs arm in arm with Officer Lei.
Officer Lei walked out of the office with his clothes in hand, Policeman followed him and said: "Officer Lei," "No blade was found in Gu Haibo's stomach"
Officer Lei: 'Got it, go on' Officer Lei patted Policeman's shoulder and left.
Zhang Daichen sat down and said to Officer Chen Shanshan: 'Could you do me a favor? You're so close to Officer Shen, could you ask him when my husband can come out?'
Officer Chen Shanshan: "I'll try"
Officer Chen Shanshan smiled and said: "Thank you."
Officer Chen Shanshan smiled and said: "You're welcome"

Zhang Daichen replied: 'Actually, it's been a long time since I've been to a concert. After getting married, even the number of new friends I make has dwindled. Did you know I used to be a writer, but then I stopped writing'
Officer Chen Shanshan said with a smile: "It would be great if you continued writing"
Zhang Daichen: "I will." "Anyway, it's never too late to write a book." Zhang Daichen smiled and nodded, looking at Officer Chen Shanshan with admiration.
Officer Chen Shanshan looked at Zhang Daichen with a smile, Zhang Daichen smiled back, then turned to look at Officer Lei on the other side.
Officer Lei: "I'll be right there."
Jiang Feng lowered his head in shame, then raised it again to look at his reflection in the glass. He turned around, only to see Officer Lei swaggering in with his hands in his pockets.
Jiang Feng walked to the door and knocked, saying: 'Officer, I need water'
After a while, Policeman heard the sound of a door closing and looked around. He then walked to the spot where the surveillance video was stored.

Jiang Feng looked at Officer Lei, then lowered his head to pick up the shattered remains from the cup. The shattered remains, with fragments of the original intact glass in it, looked like a sharp blade. Jiang Feng held it in his palm and gently stroked it with his thumb.
Jiang Feng stood there in a daze, as Policeman came over with a cup of water. Jiang Feng took the cup and stared at Policeman for a long time.

Jiang Feng scooped up a spoonful of ice cream, put it in his mouth, and slowly ate it. Policeman: 'I'm warning you, don't mess around,' Policeman was startled by the sudden appearance of Jiang Feng, who was eating ice cream.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1500_1680.text: Shui Xiu said: "I'm fine." Shui Xiu looked at Yu Cheng with tearful eyes and said: "Yu Cheng."
Yu Cheng said: "Shui Xiu, as long as you're okay, we won't fight for anything."
Shui Xiu said: 'Why not fight? I just want to fight to keep my dignity.'
Yu Cheng said: "Shui Xiu"
Shui Xiu weakly said: "Dad."
Yu Cheng said: "Uncle Lao Qing has come."
Uncle Lao Qing rushed into the room anxiously, only to see Shui Xiu lying on the bed, sleeping soundly. Uncle Lao Qing said: "Shui Xiu, you really are something, huh."
Shui Xiu, seeing Uncle Lao Qing, called out in surprise: "Uncle Lao Qing!" Yu Cheng quickly patted Shui Xiu's arm, signaling her not to speak.

Uncle Lao Qing said: 'Our village of Yingtan.' 'For decades, no one has ever lodged a complain.' 'You are really breaking new ground.' 'Shui Xiu, just listen to your uncle, stop causing trouble, okay?'
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Lao Qing, don't be angry. Now it's not just a matter of our family and Yu Cheng. I didn't intend to blow things up. I've checked, his Liu Yuhai's slate factory is illegal."
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Illegal? What law does it break?" "That Liu Yuhai has been operating legally for many years." "He pays so much tax every year."
Shui Xiu said: "I don't care about what taxes he pays. I just know it's illegal."

Uncle Lao Qing interrupted: "Alright, alright, that's enough. Let's stick to the facts. This matter, let it go already. Why should you demand that he bears all the responsibility when you guys get hurt?"
Shui Xiu interrupted Uncle Lao Qing and said: "Uncle Lao Qing, please stay out of this. I must get to the bottom of it."
Uncle Lao Qing said: "Fine, go ahead and sue then, go on and sue, you're just like this, straightforward, go ahead and sue to the end."
Uncle Lao Qing left the room, and Shui Xiu sat on the bed, panting heavily. She pulled out a carrot from her pocket, took a bite, and began to gnaw on it frantically.
Shui Xiu's face was flushed with red, her eyes reddened, and she swallowed hard. The next day, Er Niu came to Liu Yuhai's office, asking, "How did it go?"
Er Niu said: "Shui Xiu came back from filing a complaint. Guess what? No luck."
Liu Yuhai said: "What does this show?" "It shows that with reason, you can walk the world," "without it, you can't take a step."
Er Niu said: "Exactly. But it's just that, that."
Liu Yuhai asked, 'Just what?'
Er Niu said: "It's just that Shui Xiu filed a complaint this time. Against you."

movie101_6969128384144081416_3180_3360.text: Xiao Hua turned around, walked towards Xu Tailang, and the two looked at each other with smiles.

Xiao Hua looked at Xu Tailang with a smile, and Xu Tailang gave a shy smile back. Then, the two of them danced together in front of the window. Xiao Hua's long hair was tossed around, looking very pretty.
Xiao Hua said, 'Let's change the channel.' Xu Tailang turned off the TV and leaned in to kiss Xiao Hua.

Xiao Hua sat on the bed, and Xu Tailang sat behind her. Xu Tailang picked up the remote control and changed the channel. The TV was showing a live broadcast of a beauty pageant. Xiao Hua said, 'Let's watch this one.'

Xiao Hua looked at Xu Tailang with a smile in her eyes, then turned her head to look at the side. Xu Tailang pulled her into his arms, and Xiao Hua leaned her head on his shoulder. Xu Tailang touched her hair, and Xiao Hua said, "Niu Aihua."
Xiao Hua said, 'I don't like this name.' Xu Tailang then lifted Xiao Hua's head and gently stroked her hair.
Xiao Hua said, "I also used to dislike my father."
Xiao Hua closed her eyes and said, "Because he almost never spends time with me."
Xu Tailang said: "Don't talk." "I also used to dislike my father."
Xiao Hua said: "I really like the name Bai Su."
Xiao Hua said: "I feel like my fate is similar to hers." "Before I get married, I want to make a trip to the police station" "to change my name."
Xiao Hua said: "I still want to take my mother's surname." "What do you think of this name?"
Xiao Hua said, 'Zhang Suzhen.'
Xu Tailang was stunned, then suddenly realized something was wrong, and quickly got up to explain: "We... We can't do this. How can this be right for a straight man?"
Xiao Hua said, 'It doesn't matter.'
Xu Tailang said: "It matters." "It really does matter."
Xiao Hua said: "Alright, you've withstood the test. Come out of the closet, husband."
Xiaohua's Husband walked over and grabbed Xu Tailang, saying: "Brother, it's a man."
Xu Tailang broke free from Xiaohua's Husband's grip and said: "You guys are too twisted."

Xiaohua's Husband said: "A-lang, you can't say that. It's necessary. Without going through some things, without setting some tests, how can you see a person's true character? I know your feelings are very complicated right now. I really understand how you feel."
Xu Tailang said: 'Understand my ass.'
Xiao Hua asked with a smile: "Husband, how was my performance?"
Xiaohua's Husband said: "You were amazing, so engaged this time."
Xiaohua's Husband said: 'Not many can pass this level, so in our Straight Guy Gang, it's just the three or four of us back and forth.'

movie101_6992521335159292452_4320_4500.text: Jiang Feng took a sip of water, and Prison Guard, who was watching him from outside, saw his reflection in the glass. Jiang Feng tilted his head back and drank the rest of the water in his mouth. Just as he was about to swallow, he felt a sharp pain in his stomach, then he bent over and vomited on the ground.

Jiang Feng gasped for breath, covered his mouth and nose with his hand, and then collapsed on the ground, gasping for breath. He lay on the ground, his face twisted with pain, his teeth gritted together, beads of sweat on his forehead, and his eyes filled with tears.

The police officer said, 'Don't move. The more you move, the bigger the wound gets. I'll give you a sedative injection first.' Prison Guard, who was sweating profusely, suddenly opened his eyes and stared at the ceiling.

Police Officer opened the drawer and took out a pair of scissors. At this moment, Jiang Feng was taken to the ambulance by Prison Guard. Police Officer was cutting the man's neck with scissors and said, 'Don't move.'
Jiang Feng said to Police Officer: 'You now have two choices. Either I kill him and you shoot me, or you put the gun down and no one gets hurt.'
Police Officer said: 'Alright, alright. Don't be impulsive. I'll put the gun down.' Police Officer put down the gun, and Jiang Feng put down the knife.
Jiang Feng instructed Police Officer to throw the gun farther away.
Jiang Feng looked at Police Officer, then at Doctor, and asked: "Is that okay?"
Jiang Feng said: "Handcuff your hand to his hand."
Police Officer said: "Okay."
Jiang Feng, gritting his teeth, said: 'Give him a sedative injection.' 'Do it.'
Jiang Feng continued to bandage Prison Guard's wound, while Police Officer held a syringe, slowly injecting medication into Prison Guard's arm.

Police Officer took the scissors from Jiang Feng's hand and cut the rubber band. Prison Guard glared at Police Officer, who then injected Jiang Feng with a syringe. Police Officer said, 'Alright, can you put the scissors down now?'
Police Officer and Jiang Feng struggled to control the crazed Prison Guard, constantly saying, 'Freeze, freeze.'

Police Officer took out handcuffs from his pocket, crouched down, and unlocked the man's hands from the car door. After unlocking, he put away the keys, rested his head in his hand, and rubbed his forehead with his hand. He looked at the man in front of him, then turned and walked out of the car.
Zhang Daichen was sitting in the cinema, her eyes filled with tears. She smiled and nodded, looking forward. After the movie ended, she took out her phone from her bag and dialed a number.
The scene switches to a flight returning to Beijing. Zhang Daichen's phone rang. She hesitated for a moment, then answered the call.
Jiang Feng: 'Zhang Daichen'
On the other end of the phone, Zhang Daichen said: 'Xiaofeng, what's wrong with your voice?' 'Hello?' 'Did you get out?' 'Don't ask these things now.' 'Where are you?'
Zhang Daichen replied: "Wanxiang Music Hall."
Police Officer asked, 'Who are you with?'
Zhang Daichen covered her mouth and said: "With a friend. What's the matter?"
Jiang Feng said into the phone, 'Stay there, don't move. Wait for me.'
Zhang Daichen, covering her mouth, said into the phone, 'Hello.' 'Hello.'
Zhang Daichen and his partner looked at each other in shock, Zhang Daichen asked: "What happened?"
Zhang Daichen said: 'Nothing.'

movie101_7089369392055583246_1860_2040.text: Da Xu climbed up and said: "It's over, it's over, it's over, oh my, it's over." "How did you drive this thing, take a look." "Come on, get out." "How did you drive, you even hit a tree, look."
Wang Xiaopo complained: "What's going on inside here? It's so hot, is it a furnace for alchemy? It's so hot I'm about to die."
Da Xu said: "Forget it, let me do it. With your small build, can you handle it?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "Then I'll get out first."
Wang Xiaopo responded with an "Ah."
Wang Xiaopo hurriedly shouted from below: "Hey, hey, hey, be careful, be careful with the barrel."
Da Xu said: "Don't worry, it'll be fine, I've got this."
Wang Xiaopo, who was hiding in the shadows, was scared by Da Xu's words and stumbled. He quickly brushed off the dust and walked towards Da Xu, saying: "Geez, are you trying to kill me?"
Xiao Bainian said with a smile: "Hello, I'm Xiao Bainian."
Zhang Li said: "Pretty boy," but you're not even white?"
Xiao Bainian said: "No, I am Xiao Bainian, Xiao, Bainian."
Zhang Li said: "You sit down first. I'm getting dizzy with you standing up."
Xiao Bainian said: "Okay, okay, okay."
Zhang Li said: "Thank you." Zhang Li looked at Xiao Bainian with a shy smile. Xiao Bainian also smiled back at her, their eyes meeting, sharing a smile of understanding.
Zhang Li said: "Excuse me, I have a call." Zhang Li picked up the phone and said: "Hello, what's up?"
The man on the phone asked: "Where are you?"
Zhang Li said: "Weren't you busy? How come you have time to look for me today?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "Let me tell you, I got the tickets, how should I give them to you?"
Zhang Li said: "Really, then do this, bring them to me. I’m at Costa Coffee."
Wang Xiaopo responded: "Alright, I'll be there in a bit, bye."

On the other side, Xiao Bainian was riding a bicycle on the road, speeding up to escape from the police. He skillfully made a U-turn, but unexpectedly, the bike hit a bump and he lost control of the direction, falling off the bike.
Wang Xiaopo walked into the coffee shop, Zhang Li greeted him warmly. Wang Xiaopo stood awkwardly in front of Zhang Li, and Zhang Li asked, "Where's the ticket?"
Wang Xiaopo said: "This is..."
Zhang Li said: "Oh, let me introduce you, this gentleman here is Dr. Xiao, who just returned from Japan, and this is my classmate, Wang Xiaopo."
Wang Xiaopo said: "Sea turtle." Xiao Bainian laughed and agreed. Wang Xiaopo then said to the boss: "Okay, you guys continue talking, I'll be going now." After speaking, Wang Xiaopo left.

movie101_7228950501038293560_1680_1860.text: Second-Rate said: "What?" "Destroying the environment?"
Liu Yuhai said: "Destroying the environment?" "Isn't this woman possessed or something?"
Liu Yuhai said: "In that case, for the next couple of days, don't go to work." "Keep a close eye on Shui Xiu for me." "If anything happens, hurry back and notify me."
Second-Rate replied: "No problem," and Liu Yuhai also smiled in agreement. The photo showed Shui Xiu and another villager working together, smiling as they cleaned snails.
Shui Xiu asked in confusion: "This photo?"
Wu Zheng said: "This was taken inadvertently when I was in England for the talks." "Also, Shui Xiu, I have something I'd like to discuss with you."
Shui Xiu said: "Whatever it is, just tell me."
Wu Zheng said: "I'm thinking of organizing a photo exhibition in a while, and would like to use your portrait rights. What do you think?"
Shui Xiu said: "What?" "The rights of the portrait?"
Wu Zheng said: "It means that I want to use your image from my photos, I need to have your consent."
Girl looked at the photo and said: "You've made my sister-in-law look so good in the photo," "why wouldn't we agree?" Right, sister-in-law?
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, I don't know much about this portrait right thing, but if you want to use it, just do it."
Wu Zheng said: "That's great."
Wu Zheng took out a thick book and said: "Look at this," "This is your fee for the use of the portrait rights."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, what are you doing?" "You take my picture and then offer me money; that's not acceptable."
Wu Zheng said: "Shui Xiu, listen to me... When I use your portrait right, it is a requirement to compensate you."
Shui Xiu firmly said: "I don't care about rules or regulations, all I know is I can't take this money."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng brother, if you keep doing this, then I won't allow you to use my portrait rights at all."
Girl said: "Wu Zheng brother, can I give you some feedback on this photo?"
Wu Zheng said: "Sure, go ahead."
Girl said: "There are so many beautiful spots in our village, why didn’t you take pictures of them?"
Wu Zheng said: "Oh, there are places more beautiful than this?" Girl said: "Of course, sister-in-law, when you're feeling better, let's take Wu Zheng brother for a tour around." Shui Xiu nodded.
Wu Zheng said: "Okay."
The next day, the three of them went to the mountain. The woman said: "This is truly beautiful."
Shui Xiu said: "We used to walk up there before, but because of the sinkhole, we now go this way."
The next day, the sun shone on the mountains, and the village was still quietly nestled in the valley.

Shui Xiu said: "The scenery of the English countryside is beautiful, but there's no way to promote it. It would be great if people from outside the mountain could come see our beautiful landscape. Our village intellectual here is quite anxious, he wants to do something for the village."
Shui Xiu and the children watched from a distance. Shui Xiu came over and asked: "Wu Zheng brother, what are you thinking about?"

Wu Zheng said: "Shui Xiu, look, this place of yours, with its mountains, waters, stone fortresses, Gong, and an abundance of historical legends and revolutionary relics, if tourism could be developed here, it would definitely become a famous tourist destination." Shui Xiu looked into the distance following Wu Zheng's direction.

movie101_6969128384144081416_3360_3540.text: Xu Zhengtai continued, "I was thinking, what if something happens to me and I'm not around anymore? There should still be someone to carry on the Zheng Tai Gang."
Xu Tailang said, "I don't even know how much longer I'll be around. Isn't there Liu Yi? Liu Yi could do it."
Xu Zhengtai said: "Liu Yi isn't smart enough." "He can't handle big tasks." "He is only suitable as a lackey."
Liu Yi opened the closet door and looked at Xu Zhengtai with a face full of disbelief.

Liu Yi looked at Xu Zhengtai, then turned to look at Xu Tailang. He didn't know how to respond to the two, so he just nodded and left. After Liu Yi left, Xu Zhengtai turned to look at Xu Tailang again. The two of them decided to start a new life together.
Xu Zhengtai shouted to Liu Yi: "Liu Yi" "Come down."
Liu Yi replied, "I'm not coming down, you come up."
Xu Zhengtai angrily said, "Be honest with me. How long have you been in the cabinet? What were you doing in there?" Liu Yi didn't speak and lowered his head.
Liu Yi said, "I came early to find you and saw the room door open, so I went in. When I realized no one was there, I heard Sister-in-law calling for Lang Ge, so I hid in the cabinet."
Xu Zhengtai said, "Luckily, you weren't hiding in the same cabinet as me."
Liu Yi said: "Xu Zhengtai Ge, do you really look down on me that much?"
Xu Zhengtai looked at Liu Yi with a piercing gaze, put his hand on his shoulder, and said, "Liu Yi, everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses."
Liu Yi asked: "Then tell me, what are my strengths?"
Xu Zhengtai frowned, looking at Liu Yi with a puzzled expression. He scratched his head, then let go of Liu Yi's shoulder, turned around, and said, "There must be some."
Liu Yi asked from behind, "Ah Lang," "What would you say are my strengths?"

The three stood on the rooftop, each with a grim expression. Xu Zhengtai and Liu Yi looked at Xu Tailang with a sense of helplessness, while Xu Tailang gazed into the distance, tears welling up in his eyes.
Liu Yi said, 'I understand now. Just wait.' Liu Yi nodded and followed Xu Zhengtai downstairs.
Xu Zhengtai shouted, "Liu Yi"
Liu Yi, while descending the stairs, said: "One day, I'll show you my strengths."
Xu Zhengtai asked, "What?" "What did you say?" Xu Zhengtai turned around and looked at him.
Xu Zhengtai saw that Xu Tailang was troubled and hesitated to speak, then asked, "What's wrong, Ah Lang?"
Xu Tailang replied, 'I want some peace and quiet.'
Xu Zhengtai nodded and said, "Alright."
Xu Tailang sighed and said, "This era is so nice. When you say you want some peace, no one asks who 'Peace' is, and I can still find my mother."
Xu Zhengtai asked, "Who is your mom?"

movie101_6992521335159292452_4500_4680.text: Jiang Feng, who had been waiting for a long time, finally couldn't wait any longer. He took a deep breath, grabbed the railing, and began to climb down. Below, Officer Shen's car was still moving slowly with its hazard lights on. Jiang Feng was halfway down when he suddenly heard a car door closing.
He bit off a piece of the burnt sausage, and as he tore it off, the charred skin fell off with a crisp sound.
Officer Shen asked while walking, 'What's the situation now, huh? Why aren't you out there looking for Jiang Feng? What are you doing here?'
Officer Lei said, "Master," "I found a lead."
Officer Shen asked, "What lead?"
Officer Lei turned around and asked, "Let me ask you," "What do you think is the relationship between the killer and the mysterious victim?"
Officer Shen replied, "Lovers."
Officer Lei said, "Wrong, not quite. Let me rephrase it. What do you think is the relationship between the killer and the mysterious victim's husband?"
Officer Shen replied, "Rivals in love"
Officer Lei said, "Wrong again." "Alright, let me ask you this. If one day you got married, and came home after work to find someone having an affair with your wife, what would you do?"
Officer Shen threatened: 'I'd castrate him.'
Officer Lei said, 'What if there's nothing to castrate?'
Officer Lei took a sip of water and said, "So, I think there's another possibility in the relationship between the killer and the victim."
Officer Shen took the pen and crossed out the words 'my husband', and wrote 'my best friend' on it. Then he walked up to Officer Lei, who was staring at the sticky notes on the wall.
Officer Lei said, "Master," "Isn't it possible that the killer could be a woman?"
Shanshan Chen walked into the room with groceries and said, "I brought you food, medicine, books, and some clean clothes."
Shanshan Chen replied, "Thank you."

The scene shifted to a bathroom, where Li Hui Lan was soaking in the tub and called out, 'Hey, bring me two painkillers.' Shanshan Chen, holding the medicine, walked towards the bathroom, her steps slow and her expression heavy.
The camera cuts to a sticky note on the wall that reads: Who's here? Xiaoyun Li, crying, lifted the headphones from her head and placed them on Shanshan Chen's neck.
Shanshan Chen hugged Li Hui Lan and said, 'Leave him.'
Li Hui Lan cried even harder, burying her head in her shoulder. After a long while, she lifted her head and asked, 'Do you want me to leave my husband?'
Shanshan Chen said, "Don't you understand?" "He's just a scumbag."
Li Hui Lan said, "Stop dreaming." "I will never love you." "You make me sick."

The scene shifts to the second timeline, where Jiang Feng is putting on gloves in front of a mirror, and Shanshan Chen suddenly appears behind him, silently watching him. After a moment, she turned and left.
The scene shifts to the security guard, Jiang Feng, who said to Shanshan Chen: "Sister Dai Chen" "How about I wait at the entrance with you?"
Li Hui Lan replied, "Alright."
The scene shifts to the present, with Jiang Feng hiding in a dark corner, eavesdropping on the conversation between his ex-wife and his lover.

Officer Lei, who had been waiting outside for a long time, hid behind a stone pillar, pulled out his phone from his pocket, and pressed the call button. The scene then shifted to a black-and-white memory, where Jiang Feng angrily tore up a marriage certificate.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2040_2220.text: Zheng Jin, while tidying up the office chair, said: "Why report it, why call the police? The police are so busy, can they help you find a dog? Listen to me, I'm telling you, don't go looking around everywhere. Stay at home, Sesame will come back on its own. How can I not be upset? After all, I'm its owner too."
He hung up the phone, unbuttoned his shirt, and took out his cellphone from his inner pocket. He put the phone in his shirt pocket, picked up a tissue from the desk, and wiped his neck.

The camera switches to Wang Xiaopo practicing basketball in a factory. He shoots the ball, but it doesn't go in. He gets ready to shoot again, but the basketball breaks a window. Wang Xiaopo rushes to pick up the ball and starts running, only to find that the ball has already bounced out in front of him.

movie101_7089369392055583246_2220_2400.text: Mrs. Zheng, who was about to take off her shoes to wash her feet, felt a sharp pain in her foot. She winced in pain, grabbed her ankle, and sat down on the steps. She took out her phone from her pocket and answered the call: "Hello?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_2580_2760.text: Shui Xiu said: "You should rest first, I want to stay here alone for a while."

Shui Xiu looked at Wu Zheng with a face full of grievance, her eyes filled with tears. She knew Wu Zheng was a good person, but she couldn't understand why fate treated Wu Zheng so unfairly. She looked at the stars in the night sky and sighed deeply.
The next day, Shui Xiu got up early to prepare breakfast. Just as she placed the dishes on the table, Feng Yucheng walked out of the room.

Shui Xiu bent over and said, "Wu Zheng big brother, it's time to eat."

Shui Xiu put down the basin, stood up and looked around. She looked at the unfamiliar surroundings, her eyes were panicked. She walked towards the door of the house, looked at the door, and hesitated.
Shui Xiu knocked on the door and called out, "Big Brother Wu Zheng."

She pushed open the main door and walked straight into the room. The room was empty, only a few pieces of furniture were left. She picked up the letter left by Wang Youquan and read it carefully. The letter said: "Shui Xiu, Feng Yucheng, please forgive my unannounced departure." "The village tourism project needs funds." "I’m going back to discuss with my friends." "Thank you very much for taking care of me during this time." "Wait for my news." "Wu Zheng"

Shui Xiu took the letter, her eyes instantly filled with confusion and worry. She never expected that the seemingly simple Feng Yucheng would bring her so many difficulties.

I should help the honest and simple Feng Yucheng brother. The virtuous and hospitable Shui Xiu, and those simple and kind villagers of Yingtan."

At this moment, Reporter Chen climbed out of the pit and asked: 'Where's my armored vehicle?'

The security guard pointed at Officer Zhang and said: "The police are here."

Officer Zhang turned around and said: "Get in the car, everyone."
Officer Zhang opened the car door and signaled the driver to come over. Then he looked at Reporter Chen and said: "Driver, take them to the hospital."

movie101_6969128384144081416_4800_4980.text: Xu Zhengtai took the microphone and said: "Don't forget, don't forget," "I am a person without skills," "This whole family relies on you," "All relies on you, all relies on you."
The scene shifts to the police station, where Huang Zhiqiang and others are gathered. Huang Zhiqiang said: "We have to hide out in Hong Kong again."
Xu Zhengtai and Xiao Hua were very happy after finishing the song, Xu Zhengtai quickly hugged Xiao Hua, and the people below the stage were also very happy, applauding continuously.
Xu Zhengtai walked over, patting him on the back and saying, "Congratulations," then joined the hug.

Liu Yi, who had been shot in the chest, was lying on the ground, his eyes dim and his mouth bloodied. He seemed to be in a trance, with a faint smile on his lips. The scene shifted to a morgue, where a body was laid out on a bed, covered with a white cloth, and Jia Yi stood beside it, sobbing uncontrollably.
The scene shifts to a rainy night, with a beam of light illuminating the alley. Xu Tailang stands in the rain, holding a guitar, his silhouette appearing lonely and desolate.

The scene shifts to a room where Huang Zhiqiang is watching TV. He sits in a chair, staring blankly at the screen. Huang Zhiqiang thinks to himself: 'In the future, I'll definitely be the one with the most money at this table.'
The next day, Xu Zhengtai returned to his hometown. He parked his motorcycle outside a small restaurant, wiped the dust off the body, looked at the old motorcycle with a smile, then got on and left.
Huang Zhiqiang sat on the ground, surrounded by scattered books and tapes, while Liu Yi was practicing martial arts in the yard.
The two chased each other with sticks, running back and forth in the alley. After a few rounds, they were both exhausted and stopped. Liu Yi looked at Xu Tailang with a face full of sympathy.

Xiao Hua leaned on Huang Zhiqiang's shoulder, watching Xu Zhengtai's back with a smile. On the other side, Xiao Hua's mother was leaning against the wall, smiling as she listened to the conversation between the two on the phone.

The scene shifts, and the two brothers are walking on the railway tracks, with Liu Yi's arm around Xu Tailang's shoulder. The strong wind blows, and Xu Tailang turns to look at Liu Yi, then they continue walking forward.

The funeral scene was heartbreaking, and the two brothers left in different ways afterwards. Xu Zhengtai returned to the rented house in the suburbs, where he burned the condolence letter he wrote to his father in front of the ancestral tablet. He smoked a cigarette, his face filled with sorrow and regret.

Xu Tailang walked over, squatted down to add some wood to the fire, stood up, and the two looked at each other for a moment. Then, Xu Tailang picked up a stone from the ground and threw it into the fire pit. The stone fell into the fire, instantly igniting the charcoal, and the two stood there watching the fire grow bigger.
The scene shifts to the office, where the tables and chairs are overturned, and the floor is covered with scattered documents. Xu Zhengtai and Xu Tailang pushed the door open and walked in.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3120_3300.text: Liu Yuhai said: "Having no money is absolutely not an option. I only recognize one word, and that is money."

Liu Yuhai continued, "So, here and now, let me make a statement to everyone, I'm going to expand my slate factory to fatten the wallets of more of our fellow villagers. When that time comes, I will help everyone make more money and let our villagers live the life of the wealthy sooner rather than later."
Liu Yuhai's speech ended, and the crowd burst into enthusiastic applause. Liu Yuhai smiled and sat down.
Liu Yuhai said: "Please welcome Li Shuixiu to speak." Er Niuzi stood up, bowed to the villagers, and then sat back down.

Li Shuixiu said: "Fellow villagers, I, Shuixiu, am not good at speaking. But today, I want to introduce a concept to everyone. That is soil and water conservation and environmental protection. Maybe you all, don't understand the concept I'm talking about, so let me put it another way. We live at the foot of the big mountains, relying on the mountains for our livelihood. It's natural, but if we use up the mountains, what will our descendants rely on? Quarrying slate is profitable, but we all understand its dangers. Moreover, quarrying slate also damages our ecological environment."
Mei Feng said: "What you're saying, we also can't understand, right? If we can't understand, then explain it clearly."

Li Shuixiu continued, "Then let's talk about tourism. As long as everyone trusts me, Shuixiu, I will lead everyone to vigorously develop our Yingtang's tourism, promote our village far and wide. As long as we can make tourism work, every family in our village could become wealthy."

The bald man said, "Oh, women these days are too realistic. As long as you have this, they'll throw themselves into your arms." The bald man gestured with his hands and said, "Hey, brother, are you still single now, got a target yet?"

The scene switches to a restaurant, where the fat man says to Wu Zhen: "Did anything develop with the girl you filmed last time? You have to seize the moment and not let the duck that's in your hands fly away."
Wu Zhen said: "Alright, alright, you're right, I can't argue with you. Let's talk business, have you looked at the tourism planning proposal I gave you last time?"
The audience below the stage said: "I've seen it, it's good."
The man said: "You want me to invest."
Wu Zhen said: "Nonsense, if I'm not asking you to invest, what am I asking for?" "Once this tourism project kicks off, a significant amount of funds needs to be invested. What do you think?"
Big-ears said: "Buddy, let me tell you, I've always wanted to be a miser in my life, not spending a penny, but if you're asking me for a loan, I might consider it."

Officer Shen said to Jiang Feng: "Jiang Feng" "You must stay calm" "No matter what you see, don't act rashly"

Officer Shen asked incredulously: "Don't you know your wife is pregnant?"
Dai Chen said to Officer Shen: "Can you wait for me a bit longer?" "I have something to tell you."

Officer Shen grabbed Jiang Feng and said: "Jiang Feng" "Listen to me" "Your wife's death" "I will make Shanshan Chen pay for it" "Don't act rashly"

Officer Shen was stunned by Jiang Feng's words. He shook his head in despair and collapsed to the ground, while Jiang Feng also knelt down beside him. The two of them, in a state of utter devastation, began to unravel the webbing around the old man's body.

The scene switched to the past, in the memory, Jiang Feng was electrocuted on the operating table, and Officer Shen was sitting in the hall, staring blankly at the chair in front of him. Jiang Feng suddenly grabbed Officer Shen's gun-wielding hand, and the two of them fought desperately. Jiang Feng asked, "Who is this person?"
Officer Shen replied, "I went to see the memory master."

Officer Shen suddenly pulled out a gun and shot Jiang Feng in the leg. Jiang Feng fell to the ground, and Officer Shen took the opportunity to grab his gun. The mouse pointer clicked, the numbers changed from 8120 to 829, Officer Shen pulled Jiang Feng up and said: "Underage"

movie101_7228950501038293560_3300_3480.text: Er Niuzi said: "I can no longer call you brother, I'll just call you Village Chief Liu."
Er Niuzi asked with a smile, 'Brother Hai, what's wrong with you?'
Liu Yuhai replied: "Lost my voice during the village head election."

Er Niuzi said: "Hey, no matter what, brother," "Now I'm the biggest in the village, no, you're the biggest." "Shui Xiu is sidelined, she’s trying to do tourism, but does she know anything about tourism?" "Uh, if no one comes, what can she even do?"
Er Niuzi, with a sinister smile, sat down beside Liu Yuhai and asked, "Do you know what they're up to now?"
Er Niuzi, rubbing his hands, said: "Shui Xiu, Yao Yao, and that pretty-boy photographer," "They went to visit some tourist attraction."
Liu Yuhai, with wide eyes, said: "Visit?"
Er Niuzi said: "What visit? I think they're just out having fun." "I really don't understand what Feng Yucheng is thinking, how can he bear to watch his wife mess around with others every day?"
Er Niuzi, with hands behind his back, looked at Liu Yuhai and said, 'That man of hers, he's just a worthless bum.'
Liu Yuhai took the napkin and wiped his chin, then looked at the two of them and said, "This is your tourism plan."
Shui Xiu said: "Liu Yuhai village head, the more detailed parts are later on, please take a look."
Liu Yuhai glanced at Yao Yao, then picked up the jar of pickles on the table and took a sip. After a sip, he said: "No need to look at it."
Liu Yuhai looked at the two of them and said: "Shui Xiu, I just want to ask you one thing." "Since you want to develop tourism, you need funds, right? Where are you going to get that money?"
Shui Xiu said: "Village head, we've calculated it." "Right now, to develop tourism, we don't need that much money." "As long as we can get the word out, the tourism will take off."

Liu Yuhai nodded and said: "I understand what you're saying. My principle is still the same: money. If you can make money, I'll support whatever you do. But, look at our village committee, we can't even squeeze out a penny."
Liu Yuhai thought for a moment and said, "How about this, if you can get the money, you go ahead. If not, then let's drop the matter."
Shui Xiu said: "Alright, as long as you agree, I'll find a way to get the money." Liu Yuhai nodded in agreement and then left.
Liu Yuhai looked at the notice on the wall, turned his head and said to Yao Yao: "Money." Then he turned back to the notice and continued, "You're a bloodless knife."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3480_3660.text: Shui Xiu asked: "Wu Zheng brother, what is this?" Shui Xiu asked, placing the item Wu Zheng handed over on the table.

Our place here, with its beautiful mountains and clear waters, and so many ancient villages. Why can't we do easy and profitable tourism business. Today I, Shui Xiu, take the lead in opening up the Zhonghe Hall in the old residence for tourists to visit."

Shui Xiu said: "Everyone, you can participate in our tourism cooperation in the form of equity. Men can be guides and security guards, women can cook. Take out our knitted handicrafts to sell as artworks, sell all the walnuts, chestnuts, and persimmons, and we will all make money."

Shui Xiu: "I'm not lying to you."
Er Niuzi said: "Then I'm in, I will buy shares."
Shui Xiu said: "Well, the method of equity participation is written in detail here. All of you should read it carefully. Yao Yao, you distribute it to everyone."

movie101_7228950501038293560_3660_3840.text: A Villager asked: "Does tourism really make money? How much can it give us a year?"
Another Villager said: "Exactly, don't lose all the money we have made."

Shui Xiu said: "Listen to me, everyone. It depends on the number of tourists and the size of everyone's income. As long as we have a Phoenix tree here, we are not afraid of not attracting this golden phoenix. What do you guys think?"
Er Niuzi said: "Shui Xiu, if we really lose, and I can't find a wife, I have to go with you."
Shui Xiu said: "Okay, I happen to lack a son."
Er Niuzi climbed halfway up the ladder, gripping the top of the plaque with both hands, and began to pull himself up. The onlookers below were very anxious, yet they also held back their laughter.
Wu Zheng climbed down the ladder, and the villagers applauded.
Shui Xiu stood at the door and said, "Today our Yingtan small chef's farmhouse restaurant officially opens. Welcome everyone to come and taste!"
Yao Yao and Er Niuzi brought the dishes out of the kitchen, chatting and laughing as they served the food. They looked at the villagers eating happily, their faces filled with smiles.
Yao Yao said to Shui Xiu: "Shui Xiu, Wu Zheng is really good, you see tourists say they will come."
Shui Xiu said: "Wu Zheng took beautiful pictures of Yingtan, these tourists want to see how beautiful Yingtan is based on his photos. He really helped our village a lot."
Yao Yao said: "No, Wu Zheng is really a good man."

Yao Yao was busy in the kitchen preparing dishes. She took out a small notebook and pen from her pocket, ready to jot down the recipes. But as soon as she opened the notebook, she realized it was already filled with recipes. She then took out a calculator and started calculating the costs.
Shui Xiu said: "Everyone sit down and rest for a while, Feng Yucheng, come!"
Yao Yao sat down, handed out the surveys, and started to explain the purpose of the village visit to the villagers.
Yao Yao said: "One day, from catering and tourism, the net earnings are two thousand and eight." Everyone laughed.

At this moment, a villager said: "Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, Shui Xiu, we also want to buy shares." Everyone was very happy, even Er Niuzi stood up to greet Mei Feng. Mei Feng was carrying a chicken and a bag of grain, looking very happy. Yao Yao followed behind Mei Feng, looking at the chicken in her hand.
Er Niuzi said: "Not possible, not possible. When we asked you to invest, you didn't want to. Now you see that we are making money, you all want to. This is too opportunistic."
Mei Feng said: "Er Niuzi, don't be a toad yawning - it's not like you can bite. Do you hear me? Go away!"
Mei Feng said: "Shui Xiu, I'll listen to you!"
Shui Xiu said: "Mei Feng, as long as you all trust me Shui Xiu, I welcome you to join."
Mei Feng said: "We trust you, let's work sisters!" After saying this, Mei Feng turned around and left with the crowd. The villagers all got to work cheerfully.

movie101_6969128384144081416_5160_5340.text: The scene shifted to an alley, where a group of people were fighting fiercely, throwing punches and kicking, with shattered glass under their feet.

After confirming that the man was dead, Zheng Tai left the kitchen and went to the rooftop. He looked up at the sky, seemingly making a decision.

The police chased after them, and they ran towards the rooftop. The thug followed closely behind, and the two wrestled with each other. The thug pressed Tai Lang down, and they began to scuffle. The thug lifted Tai Lang and threw him aside, knocking over a chair in the process.
Tai Lang was forced to retreat to the stairwell entrance, but he was kicked into the second-floor stairwell by the opponent.

Tai Lang lay on the rooftop, his right hand hanging outside the edge. He struggled to lift his body, his eyes red and fierce, baring his teeth and cursing.

Huang Zhiqiang turned around, ready to throw the bottle, but Zheng Tai leapt up and grabbed his hand. Unexpectedly, Huang Zhiqiang used his momentum to throw Zheng Tai towards the opposite building. Zheng Tai was caught off guard and fell straight down.

movie101_6992521335159292452_720_900.text: Zhang Daichen said: "In other words," "if I want to have my memory erased again," "I would need to undergo another surgery within seventy-two hours."

And it's not about taking it out, it's about permanent deletion, currently, there is no technology capable of extracting memories twice. During this time, Mr. Jiang Feng, you may also want to think it over. If you really decide to undergo the surgery, please let us know in advance."
Jiang Feng thought for a moment and said: "Then I'll make a reservation first."
Zhang Daichen, after thinking for a moment, asked: "Can't we wait until all the memories are restored before we decide?"

He remembered the scene when he was diagnosed with leukemia, the doctor shaking the pill bottle in his hand. The endless loop of memories made him feel suffocated, and the tears that had been suppressed all night finally burst out. He gasped for breath, trying to control his emotions.
Jiang Feng leaned back in the chair, hands clasped on his stomach, gazing blankly out the window. He sighed deeply, closed his eyes, and fell into deep thought.

The scene shifts to a dilapidated old house in the reeds. Jiang Feng was dozing off on the sofa when a knock on the door sounded. Jiang Feng groggily opened his eyes and saw Hui Lan at the door. He then said, "I was just about to order takeout."

Hui Lan was stunned. She looked at Jiang Feng in disbelief, then lowered her head and took a deep breath. After a moment of thought, she looked back up at Jiang Feng and said, 'You're right.'

Zhang Daichen said, "No need, I can handle it by myself."

Jiang Feng's smile gradually faded. He stood still, digesting this shocking news. He remembered the scene of Hui Lan's death, her hand weakly hanging by the bathtub, and the desperate struggle he had shown to save her. He then locked the door with a padlock.

The scene shifts to the past, when Zhang Daichen was about to leave with a stack of books. Jiang Feng, who was about to go out, turned around and saw Zhang Daichen. He handed the books to Zhang Daichen.

movie101_7228950501038293560_3840_4020.text: Liu Yuhai followed Shan Tao to the construction site, seeing the neatly arranged marble slabs. Liu Yuhai asked Shan Tao: "Shan Tao, what's going on? Why are there so few people here?"
Shan Tao said: "I heard that everyone has been going for tourism with Shan Xiu recently." "The number of tourists here has been increasing."
Liu Yuhai said: "Tourism? Isn't this strange? I, in slab factory, can't compete with tourism?"

Shan Tao said: "Liu Yuhai, don't be disheartened." "I have a piece of good news here." "The boss from Guangzhou called me this morning and said that he wants to order thirty thousand square meters of slabs at once."

Er Niuzi quickly stepped forward and said: "Liu Yuhai brother, you you you, calm down, calm down, I'm not afraid of death, I just think Shan Xiu's tourism business is very prosperous, really."

Liu Yuhai said: "Stop mentioning 'tourism' to me." "I find that word annoying now." Liu Yuhai squatted down and said to Er Niuzi: "Oh boy, you are such a smart aleck, leaving my slab factory and running to Shan Xiu's to curry favor."

movie101_6992521335159292452_900_1080.text: Jiang Feng held the necklace, and Hui Lan looked down at it for a long time before taking it back and fastening it around her neck.

Jiang Feng's eyes were filled with reluctance, as he watched Xiao Yun's silhouette gradually fade away. He turned his head helplessly, sat on the edge of the bathtub, staring blankly at the water in the tub. The water was already frozen into ice, and he was frozen in his memories.

The scene shifts to a dimly lit room, where Jiang Feng is lying in bed, unable to sleep, staring blankly at the ceiling. In the flashback, Jiang Feng said: "Your hospital really must have messed up my memory"

Chen Shan Shan said: "Mr. Jiang, we do have a confidentiality agreement signed," "we won't look into your memory content," "that is to say," "we are only responsible for the security of the memory chip," "not the content itself."
Jiang Feng said: "But the memory should be continuous, right?" "It can't just pop out of nowhere like this, can it?"
Doctor said: "Didn't I tell you it would take three days to fully recover? Maybe in a couple of days, you'll remember everything from start to finish."
Doctor said: "How about I go over it again with Mr. Jiang"
Doctor said: "If it's our problem, we will definitely take responsibility. But as of now, all your suspicions have no proof. They're all just your conjectures."

Doctor put down his foot that was on the table, stood up and leaned towards Jiang Feng, saying, "Mr. Jiang, do you know how modern plastic surgery started?"

Doctor stood up and said: "Let me tell you, after World War I, many soldiers suffered facial injuries""At that time, the development of plastic surgery not only helped them reconstruct their faces but also rebuilt their self-confidence""allowing them to return to normal life better""Now, cosmetic surgery has evolved from negative rescue to positive improvement""everyone has the opportunity to become a better version of themselves"
Jiang Feng said, "Why are you telling me all this"

Doctor said: "Let me finish," "such a surgery that helps people seek beauty," "was once pointed out as potentially allowing criminals to change their appearance," "and escape legal sanctions," "do you think that's reasonable?"

Doctor said: "Our memory surgery is the same as plastic surgery" "One is to remedy physical imperfections" "the other is to heal emotional wounds" "Our surgery's intentions are clearly good" "It depends on how the person using it chooses to think"
Jiang Feng asked, "What do you mean?"
Doctor said: "What I mean is" "How would I know whether you stored your emotional memories" "or your memories of committing a murder"
