Er Niu continued: "I think, bro, 'you should come up with a way to outshine the water show' 'otherwise there surely won't be many people' 'working at your stone slab factory,' 'yeah, really.'"
Liu Yuhai looked at the scene in front of him, thought for a moment, and then said to Er Niu: "It seems," "I really need to think of a strategy," "let's discuss this together."

He turned his head to glance at the side table by the bed, noticed something unusual, and immediately turned back to search. He moved the pillow on the bed aside, rummaged through the quilt, and finally found a stack of account books hidden underneath.
He picked up a backpack, rummaged through it, and found a stack of photos. He took the photos and looked at them closely.
Feng Yucheng looked at the photos on the table, then limped to the village entrance. Liu Yuhai was leading a group of people towards the village.
Er Niu said: "Welcome, welcome." "Hello everyone, hello everyone."
Er Niu watched the departing Liu Yuhai, then turned to Feng Yucheng with a smile, "Brother Yucheng, feeling any better?"

Er Niu said: "You see, these city folks are really something,' 'coming to our mountainous area for a visit' 'just to give us money.' 'Your Shuixiu is really amazing, perceptive, and knows how to make money."
Feng Yucheng said, "What money? She's just making, and what she earns is all hard-earned money."
Er Niu said: 'Oh come on. Think about it,' 'that pretty boy Wu Zheng' 'brings customers to your family for no good reason,' 'helping Shuixiu achieve her dream of tourism,' 'what's in it for him?'
The village chief's expression turned sour, and he glared at Er Niu with a face full of disdain.

Er Niu said: 'Brother Yucheng, there is ambiguity between those two,' 'the villagers gossip all day,' 'it doesn’t sound good,' 'but then again,' 'who cares as long as it brings you a god of wealth,' 'even if it means wearing a green hat, it's not a loss, right?'

movie101_7228950501038293560_4200_4380.text: Er Niuzi said: "Ah, hey hey hey, bro, bro bro bro, even, even if I didn't say anything, even if I didn't say, I'm leaving"
The scene switches to the evening, Shui Xiu returns home with two bowls of noodles. She asked, "Where is Feng Yucheng?"
Shui Xiu put down the bowls and said: "Brother Wu went to the county to attend a photography exhibition."
Feng Yucheng said: "This Wu Zheng, busy with everything, is promoting our village to help us develop tourism" "What is he aiming for?"
Shui Xiu said: "Brother Wu has a good heart."
Feng Yucheng said: "Good heart?" "Give me a break." "What are people outside saying?" He came to our village to develop tourism for you" "He has a purpose."
Shui Xiu asked: "What purpose?"
Feng Yucheng said: "What purpose? He came for you." "No wonder people outside say you are attractive." "You should manage your feelings."

Shui Xiu put down his bowl and said: "Feng Yucheng, why do you think so?" "What do you think of me and Brother Wu?" "I know, I haven't been taking good care of you while I was outside." "But me, Shui Xiu, have not done anything sorry to you."
Feng Yucheng said: "Whether you did it or not, you know it in your heart"
Shui Xiu stood up and said: "Feng Yucheng, others can say that, but you can't, you know me best, I'm not as dirty as you think."
Feng Yucheng said angrily: "Shameless."

Shui Xiu's face was full of tears, she was so aggrieved. She rubbed her face hard, trying to release the emotions inside her. She looked up at Feng Yucheng, then turned and ran out of the house. She ran to the village entrance, and the night was already very deep.
Feng Yucheng looked at the steamed buns on the table, angrily picked one up and threw it on the ground, then grabbed a chair and smashed it against the table.
He looked up at the portrait on the wall, then opened his mouth wide and screamed.

Shui Xiu was so scared that she ran home as fast as she could, but she couldn't find the way home. She ran through the alley, and the stone wall beside her was very high. She climbed over the wall and ran down the path on the other side.
Shui Xiu heard this and slowly moved her body, leaning against the wall. She touched her cheek with her hand, her face full of sorrow.
Feng Yucheng shouted: "Xiu'er! Xiu'er!"
Feng Yucheng heard the sound of breaking through the door and rushed out immediately. He shouted in the dark courtyard: "Xiu'er!"
Feng Yucheng came out with crutches, calling as he walked: 'Xiu'er, Xiu'er.'
Feng Yucheng called out while walking: "Shui Xiu."

movie101_6969128384144081416_660_840.text: The scene shifts to a desolate road, where a car slowly descends from mid-air.
Xu Tailang, sitting in the car, stared intently at the back of the off-road vehicle, his brow furrowed as he planned his next move.
The scene switches to a desolate road, where a train crashes into a Subaru car, sending it flying into the air.
The car crashed through the railroad tracks, flew into the air, and then heavily landed on the ground, overturning several times.
The two people in the car were unconscious, Xu Tailang woke up and immediately pulled the overhead handle, but the roof didn't budge at all.
The scene switches to a race car, where Xu Tailang is wearing a helmet, speeding forward.
The Subaru car was completely overturned, the trophy fell from the co-driver's hand, and the champagne also shattered in the overturned cockpit.
The car spun out of control, flipped over the bridge, and crashed into the pond below. The shattered car was left with only a vague outline of its original shape.

Xu Tailang's eyes gradually became moist. He stared intently at the oxygen mask in front of him. Memories flooded his mind, and the face of his late mother appeared before him. He remembered the days when his mother was taking care of him, and tears couldn't help but fall. The camera slowly zoomed in on his eyes, and the scene gradually disappeared. The title 'Duckweed' appeared in the rolling clouds.
The scene shifted, and the door of the restaurant opened. Xu Tailang walked out, looking around in confusion. He was dressed in a floral jacket, a plain t-shirt, and high-waisted trousers.

Xu Tailang stood at the entrance of the KTV, looking around aimlessly. He didn't even know where he had parked his car. Just as he was about to go inside to look for it, a bus passed by and blocked his view.

Xu Tailang, who had been wandering aimlessly on the street, suddenly stopped in his tracks. He looked around in confusion, not knowing where he was. After scanning the surroundings, he finally spotted Mr. Chen at the entrance of the snack street. He hurriedly walked over and called out, 'Mr. Chen.'
Mr. Chen asked: "Whose parent are you from our school?"
Xu Tailang said: "I'm from the class of '04, Xu Tailang, you are my homeroom teacher. When I was young, you always held me and said, 'too wild, too wild,' 'you can't be too loose in your life'"
Mr. Chen said: "Class of '04? It's only '98 now. Are you crazy?"
Xu Tailang, after pondering for a moment, said: '98, '98, is this real or fake?'
The thief said: "Catch him, catch the thief!"
Xu Tailang pointed and shouted: 'Thief!' He chased after the thief with all his might, but the thief was too quick and disappeared around a corner.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1020_1200.text: Customer Service: 'May I ask your location?'
Xiao Xing said into the phone, 'I'm at the No. 53 bus stop on Nanhu Middle Road'
Customer Service: 'Currently there are no available cars. However, we will resend your car request. Please wait a bit longer.'
Xiao Xing said, 'Thank you,' and then Xiao Xing held the phone in one hand and the white cane in the other.
The girl behind Xiao Xing said, 'Hey, how can you steal my cab?'
The driver grabbed the item and said, 'Hey, what are you snatching? What's the matter with you?'
Xiao Xing said, 'Of course I was here first. Are you hailing a cab or robbing one?'
The driver opened the door and said, 'Are you sick or something? Are you blind?'
The person in the car shouted, 'I was here first'
The person who drank with Liu Dong said, 'Hey, don't go, wait a moment,' and Xiao Xing, with tears in her eyes, watched as Liu Dong left, and the rain-soaked streets were once again drenched.

The scene shifts to a bus stop on a rainy night, where Xiao Xing and Girl are among the last remaining passengers. A car slowly pulls up to the curb, and Xiao Xing opens the door and gets in, followed by Girl.
Girl angrily said, 'What's the situation here? Are we meeting or not? I've been waiting for twenty minutes.' 'Still have the nerve to say 'It's enough to have your company'. Go play around.'
Girl stood in the rain with a cold face, and Xiao Xing shouted, 'Stop the car.'
Xiao Xing stood aside, watching Girl. A taxi pulled up and stopped in front of the two. Girl quickly got in, closed the door, and the taxi slowly drove away.
Xiao Xing said, 'Master, Sunshine Apartments.' The driver took the address and drove away.
Xiao Xing stood in the rain, extending her hand in the hope of catching the bus, but the bus came and went without stopping. Xiao Xing stood there, feeling lost.
Xiao Xing stood on the street, extending her hand to catch the falling raindrops. The rain was sparse, but Xiao Xing seemed to feel the warmth of Guo Yang's hand on hers.
The scene shifts to a taxi stopping in front of Xiao Xing. Xiao Xing, who is waiting at the bus stop, turns around and sees the taxi. The driver asks, 'Hello, did you book the ride?'
The driver said, 'Come on in,' and Xiao Xing got into the car.
Xiao Xing apologized, 'Sorry, I got your car all wet.'
The driver said, 'It's alright,' 'The person who should apologize is me,' 'I'm late.'
Xiao Xing comforted, 'It's fine, with this heavy rain, you got here quickly which is really good.'
Yichen asked, 'Where are we headed to?'
Xiao Xing replied, 'Nanhu Middle Street, Sunshine Residences.'
The driver asked, 'Are you cold? I'll turn on the heater.'
Xiao Xing sat in the car, suddenly noticing a strange smell, and asked, 'Is there a strange smell in the car?'
The driver replied, 'The scent of the cleaner, I just had it serviced.'
Xiao Xing said, 'Then I'll crack the window'
Xiao Xing touched the seat beside her, looked at the rain outside, and gently closed the car window, saying, 'Rain will get inside.'

movie101_6969128384144081416_840_1020.text: Xu Tailang, who had been hiding in the alley, immediately gave chase. The narrow alley made it difficult to run, and Xu Tailang could only take big strides forward. The two ran all the way to a T-junction, where the man in black suddenly turned right, causing Xu Tailang to miss and have to run back.

Xu Tailang, with a smile on his face, stood still. The young man drew a dagger from his leg holster and pointed it at Xu Tailang. Terrified, Xu Tailang said, "I'm already dead," "Why should I be afraid of dying?"

The young man was not intimidated by Xu Tailang's attitude and kept advancing. Xu Tailang had no choice but to retreat step by step. When the young man was close enough, Xu Tailang suddenly raised his head and threw a dart, hitting the young man right in the chest. The young man fell to the ground, and Xu Tailang took the opportunity to run away.
Xu Tailang was stunned. The young man in the denim jacket, sitting on the ground with a cape, a helmet, and two nunchucks, looked cool. Xu Tailang said in disbelief: "Rural Batman?"

The two stood still, looking at the man in front of them. The young man in the floral jacket suddenly rushed forward, but was quickly stopped by the man in the red shirt. The young man in the floral jacket looked at the young man in the floral jacket who had rushed forward, then turned to look at Xu Tailang. The young man in the floral jacket and Xu Tailang exchanged a glance, then the young man in the floral jacket turned and walked past Xu Tailang, heading towards the alley.

The man in the helmet walked towards him with a large knife in his hand. Xu Tailang calmly drew his knife from its sheath. The man in the helmet raised his hands and slowly stepped back. Xu Tailang said, "This isn't very fair, is it?" The man in the helmet lowered his head, unwilling to look at Xu Tailang.

The three men looked at each other, the situation was exactly the same as Xu Tailang had imagined. The long sword was thrown to the ground, and the three men simultaneously drew their knives. The man in red was the first to strike, but his opponent, wearing a helmet, easily dodged. The man in the helmet then slashed at the man in red, who blocked the attack with his forearm. The man in the helmet immediately switched to his right hand and slashed at the man in red's left arm, but the man in red dodged again.

Xu Tailang rushed out from the alley, but the thugs were already there. He was knocked down by a flying elbow and had to lie on the ground and counterattack. The two on the ground started wrestling, and Xu Tailang used his agile advantage to get up and escape.
Xu Tailang said: "Untie my belt, untie my belt, quickly, tie him up." The two cooperated perfectly and tied the man up.
Xu Tailang walked up to the figure and said: "Dad."
Xu Tailang asked in confusion: "Dad? What dad?"
Suddenly a police officer shouted: "Police" "What are you doing?"
Xu Tailang said: "Bro," "See you next time."

Xu Tailang shouted: "Stop!" He threw the knife at the man in black, who staggered backwards, dropping his axe and running away. Xu Tailang took out his baton and shouted again, "Stop!" The man in black ran off in another direction. Xu Tailang chased him, shouting, "Stop!" Xu Tailang chased him down the alley.
Director Qin looked at the photo and said, "It's been a whole night," "and you still haven't explained where you're from."
Xu Tailang said helplessly: "I've explained it very clearly, but you don't understand."
Director Qin asked: "This is your ID?"
Xu Tailang said, "Yes, it's my ID." Director Qin looked at the ID and then at Xu Tailang.
Director Qin took out an ID card and said: "This is an ID card, look closely."
Director Qin took out a pen and asked: "What year were you born?"
Xu Tailang looked at the calendar on the table and said: "Me." "Next year."

Director Qin said sternly: "Do you think catching a bad guy gives you the right to answer questions flippantly?" "You have the right to remain silent," "but you don't have the right to talk nonsense, got it?" "Where are you really from?"
Xu Tailang said helplessly: "I really am a local."

movie101_7228950501038293560_420_600.text: Shui Xiu, who was still feeling guilty, went straight to Old Man's house after leaving the laundry shop. Girl was still playing chess with Old Man, and upon seeing Shui Xiu come in, quickly put down the bowl and chopsticks, rushing to greet her.
Girl: "Dad, I've heard many people in the village talking," "saying that Brother Yucheng and Shui Xiu are in a particularly pitiful situation." "Please help them."

Old Man said: "What do you know? More than half of the people in our village work at Liu Yuhai's slate factory to earn a living. If you push him too hard and he shuts down the factory, how will everyone survive? Besides, Liu Yuhai isn't refusing to compensate, it's just that Shui Xiu insists on him taking full responsibility." "Yaoyao, think about it. Shui Xiu's family has no children, which means Liu Yuhai would have to support him in his old age. Isn't that a bit too much?"
Girl said: "What's so excessive about that? I think Shui Xiu is right. If he got hurt, Liu Yuhai should take responsibility."
Girl asked: "Is Uncle Lao Qing at home?"
Girl stood up and said: "Sister-in-law."
Shui Xiu asked: "Are you eating?"
Girl said: "Okay, do it, over here." The two of them went to the old man's side, and Shui Xiu sat down.
Shui Xiu took out a medical certificate from the bag and said: "This is Yucheng's medical certificate. The doctor says he still needs further treatment."
Old Man said: "Shui Xiu, haven't we settled the medical bills already? I think you've done enough."
Shui Xiu said: "Uncle Lao Qing, I've already approached him several times and he just doesn't care."
Old Man said: "Shui Xiu, we're all neighbors. Don't overdo it."
Shui Xiu said: "What if Yucheng ends up disabled? Who will take care of him for the rest of his life?"
Old Man said: "Who will take care of him? The village will."
Shui Xiu said: "He's my husband, not the village's responsibility. I can take care of him myself."
Old Man said: "Aren't you being unreasonable?"

Shui Xiu said: "How am I being unreasonable? I just want him to take responsibility. Why can't he?" "Uncle Lao Qing, you're the village head. I came to you to hear a fair word." "If you won't handle this, I'll go to the township. I can't believe this can't be resolved."
Old Man said: "Go, go ahead."
Shui Xiu stood up and said: "Sister-in-law, Dad, why do you talk like that?"
Girl shouted: "Sister-in-law!"
Old Man sat there in a daze, and the next day, Girl returned home with her mother.

After a while, she scooped a ladle of hot oil from the pot and carefully poured it into the pan. The sizzling sound of the hot oil in the pan signaled Shui Xiu that it was ready. She then picked up a clean porcelain bowl and walked out of the kitchen with a steady pace.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4200_4380.text: Fenfen said: "I went home late at night." "Guess what I saw?"
Xiao Tang asked: "What is it"
Fenfen said: "An armored vehicle."
Fenfen said: "It rushed past my eyes." "Too fast to catch up." "It's like a ghost tank."
Xiao Tang said: "Well, you're bluffing," "even the cows are flying in the sky," "Fenfen, tell us how you fell into the pit yesterday," "were there any beauties in the pit?"
Fenfen said: "This is a work injury, count it as a work injury, got it?"
Xiao Tang said: "Nonsense," "You didn't even conduct an interview on site," "and you still have a work injury." "You've let our editor-in-chief down."
Fenfen said: "You don't talk to me about this, I..."
Xiao Tang touched Fenfen's head and said: "Slow down."
Fenfen picked up the phone and said: "Hello, who is it?" "Hello hello hello, really?"
Xiao Tang asked: "Who was it?"
Fenfen said: "Fine, fine, alright," "I'll be there right away, wait for me," "Hey."
Xiao Tang asked: "Who was it on the phone?"
Fenfen said: "You guys just wait for me."
Xiao Tang said with a smile: "Here he goes again, take it easy, brother"
Fenfen, while walking, said: "Get up, get up, get up," and then left the office.
Mrs. Zheng said: "Don't leave, wait a minute, wait a minute, wait a minute, hello"
On the other end of the phone, Wu Ming said: "Hello."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Honey, I'm looking for Sesame, I put the money there, but she didn't give me the dog back."
Mrs. Zheng said: "She said you behaved well and didn't call the police, so she agreed to extend the deadline." "Just leave the money under our street lamp."

Mrs. Zheng, while on the phone, said: "Okay okay, okay okay, I'll be right back, okay okay, goodbye." Then she started to pull Wang Xiaopo, saying: "Hey, I'm sorry, I was wrong, I've wronged you." "I, I was wrong." "I, I, I..." "Hey, could you please help me move this wheel, that plastic bag is mine, okay?"
Wang Xiaopo pointed at himself and said: "I'm so skinny and thin," "Do you think I'm Superman?"

Mrs. Zheng, holding Wang Xiaopo's hand, said: "Oh sir, please I beg you, my Sesame has been missing for two days already. It never eats strangers' food, I don't know how it survived these two days, you you you, please."
Wang Xiaopo said: "Wait a minute," "I'm answering a call, I'm answering a call," "Hello"
Wu Ming said: "Wang Xiaopo?"
Wang Xiaopo, while walking, said: "Hey, Wu Ming."

Wu Ming said: "I saw the armored vehicle you made on TV, what a piece of junk. It's not what I wanted at all. Didn't I give you the blueprints? I tell you, I don't want that armored vehicle anymore, I just don't want it"

Wang Xiaopo said: "You, let me explain, hello..." Before he could finish, the call was abruptly disconnected. Wang Xiaopo angrily hung up the phone, and Mrs. Zheng, seeing this, hurriedly tried to smooth things over.
Wang Xiaopo said: "I'm making a call, I'm making a call."
Wang Xiaopo took out his phone from his pocket, ready to call, when the phone suddenly connected. Wang Xiaopo said: "Da Xu pick up the phone"
Da Xu said: "Who said that? How could it be possible? He dare to refuse? I'll call him right now."

movie101_7010686199291445773_1200_1380.text: Man took out a thermos from the car and said: "Oh, by the way, this coffee is still hot." "It'll warm you up when you finish it." "Here, take it."
Xiao Xing took the teapot and said, "Thank you."
Xiao Xing sat in the back seat, feeling the texture of the leather seat, and said: "This seat is genuine leather?" "Is this a luxury cab?"
Xiao Xing said: "There's no need to check, I can't see," as Xiao Xing suddenly lunged forward.
Man glanced at Xiao Xing, then turned his head and said: "Give me the coffee, I'll open it for you."
Xiao Xing said: "Ah, it's okay, I can do it myself."
Man said: "No, your eyes are inconvenient," "Hand it over."
Xiao Xing said: "I'm fine, I'm fine, on my own."
Man said: "I'll help you open it."
Xiao Xing said: "I can do it."
Man said: "Give it to me," "I asked you to give it to me, didn't you hear?"
Man said: "Give it to me."
Man was driving when he suddenly saw Xiao Xing fall to the ground. He immediately stepped on the brakes and ran to the side of the road. It was raining heavily, and Xiao Xing was nowhere to be seen.
Man furiously kicked the corpse's body, Xiao Xing covered her face in the car and didn't dare to look outside.
Xiao Xing, who was lying on the ground, hurriedly picked up the lighter on the ground.

Xiao Xing, who had been hiding in the trunk for a long time, was soaked by the rain. She pushed her hair back, pulled down the rearview mirror, and looked at herself in the rearview mirror. Then she opened the car door and got out.
Xiao Xing asked, "Did we hit someone?"
Man said: "It's nothing, it was a dog."
Xiao Xing said: "Dog."
Man said: "Stray dog, get in the car."
Xiao Xing said: "How could a regular dog smash the windshield?"
Man said with a smile: "It really was a dog."
Man took out his phone and handed it to Xiao Xing, Xiao Xing took the phone and looked at it, Man said: "Give me the phone."

Xiao Xing, kneeling on the ground, cried and said, "What are you trying to do?" Then she dropped the phone and crawled forward. Man stood beside her, watching her in a daze. A car approached from a distance, and Man quickly hid the phone.

Man said: "Get in the car." Xiao Xing, who was still holding the knife, was pushed to the ground. Man crawled towards his fallen phone. A car with its headlights on was slowly approaching from a distance.
Man got out of the car and ran to the other side of the road, Xiao Xing also crawled out of the car, and Man picked up the mobile phone that had fallen into the puddle.
Xiao Xing, who was still kneeling, turned her head to look at the car that had come to her rescue. The screen gradually went white.
The man said: "Molten Giant? Are you messing with me? Is this an ID card? Set it up, set it up."
Man with Glasses said: "What are you doing?"
Man with Glasses looked at Xiao Xing in confusion.
Man with Glasses said: "The ID card isn't."
Man with Glasses said: "You mean the accident happened after the hit-and-run driver hit someone and then fled?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_4380_4560.text: Feng Yucheng shouted: "Shui Xiu". He called out with a trembling voice, his body leaning on the crutches, and hobbled towards the gate.
Feng Yucheng walked a few more steps and then fell to the ground. He quickly got up and shouted, "Shui Xiu!"
Feng Yucheng shouted: "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu"
Feng Yucheng shouted while running: "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu" "Shui Xiu"

Shui Xiu, hearing the sound of the door closing, was scared and ran towards the outside of the house. She looked around and saw that the courtyard was pitch black. She ran towards the only place that was lit, but it was still too far away. She kept running forward, hoping she could reach there before Feng Yucheng came back.
Shui Xiu ran into the room, only to see the glass on the door shattered, the table overturned, and the dishes on the ground smashed.

Shui Xiu turned around in shock and saw a photo of herself and Feng Yucheng hanging on the wall. The picture was taken at a time when Feng Yucheng was still very young, and they were both smiling happily. The glass of the picture frame was cracked, and Shui Xiu stared at the photo with a face full of disbelief.

Shui Xiu, hearing the commotion outside, was momentarily stunned. She had never thought that her husband would come back like this. She wanted to stop him, but her legs were like rubber, unable to support her body.
Shui Xiu shouted: "Feng Yucheng" "Feng Yucheng"
Feng Yucheng saw Shui Xiu coming out and asked, "What's wrong?"
Shui Xiu said: "Big brother Wu Zheng, Feng Yucheng is missing."
Feng Yucheng asked, "What happened?"
Shui Xiu said: "I was arguing with him, and he smashed up the place."
Wu Zheng said, "Ah, shouldn't we go look for him?"

The two of them ran all the way, not daring to stop for even a moment. Finally, they arrived at a place that looked like a dead end. Feng Yucheng, with his quick thinking, saw a big tree on the right side ahead and decided to run that way.

Shui Xiu and Wu Zheng were running on the road, calling out for Feng Yucheng. They ran to the place where Feng Yucheng had gone before. Shui Xiu picked up the wooden board that Feng Yucheng had fallen with, and Wu Zheng looked at the wooden board and said: "What is this?"
Shui Xiu shouted: "Doctor!"
Feng Yucheng said: "Shui Xiu, you go ahead and look for people."
Shui Xiu said: "Got a hold of it."
Wu Zheng shouted while running: "Doctor, doctor!"
The man in the maroon suit stood up and said: "Er Niuzi, well done." He patted Er Niuzi's face and left with a smile.

movie101_6969128872847770149_1140_1320.text: The complex machinery in front of Jin Taonian started to operate, and the sound of the machine filled the entire room. Jin Taonian stared at the machine with a serious expression, but soon a smile appeared on his face.

Cui Minho and his group arrived at the airport, where they were met by a group of agents. After exchanging documents with the agents, they were led to a private jet. Cui Minho and his group walked briskly towards the plane, carrying briefcases and exuding an air of nonchalance. As they boarded the plane, they were stopped by a female agent who raised her gun to check their identities.
The plane landed, and the captain led the two to the person in charge. The person in charge shook hands with Cui Minho and said: "Welcome to Hong Kong". Fan Jiaming came over to greet Cui Minho.
Cui Minho took out a translation device from his pocket, switched it to Korean, and said to Fan Jiaming: "I am the Anti-terrorism Special Duty Squad Inspector Fan Jiaming."

Cui Minho looked at the two and said, "It's been a while since we last met." Park Yuzhe and Fan Jiaming shook hands with Cui Minho. Cui Minho then walked towards the plane, and Fan Jiaming said, "Welcome, this way please."

The scene shifts to the road, where a plane is flying overhead, and two cars are driving side by side. Inside the car, Fan Jiaming said: 'Based on intelligence from the UK and the US, and the Hong Kong police's investigation, we believe these buyers will be conducting a transaction in three hours.'
Park Yuzhe's phone rang, he answered, "Hello, Jin Taonian?" "I'll transfer the call to the chief."

The person on the other end of the phone, Park Yuzhe, had a cunning look in his eyes. He said, "Fan Jiaming sir, we just received the latest intelligence. They've changed the transaction location to Jordan, Tak Hing Street."
Park Yuzhe, who was in the car, was also watching the news. The streets of Hong Kong were brightly lit, with neon signs glowing everywhere.
The motorcycle sped through the narrow alley. The two people on the bike were wearing helmets. As they passed a road sign, Jin Taonian suddenly noticed the character for 'happiness' on it.
The police cars arrived at the crime scene, and the officers were busy maintaining order. Cui Minho and Fan Jiaming were also driving to the crime scene.

The police car lights flashed as the police car arrived at the scene. The female police officer walked to the back of the car and opened the door. Jin Taonian was taken to the police car by Li Jiangjun.
The female officer walked up to Li Jiangjun and said: "Li Jiangjun sir, we will be ready in ten minutes." Li Jiangjun nodded in response.
The informant said, "The police are coming."
Shen Meijing, with a smile in her eyes, looked at the two of them and said, "You two really are like a couple," "Can't even pretend to feign innocence."
Shen Meijing said: "I am Shen Meijing, I am 28 years old," "I have a college diploma," "I am a journalist," "I am originally from Hebei, Qinhuangdao."

Zhang Yijun took out a grenade from her bag, threw it on the ground, and Fan Jiaming shouted: "Grenade".

The bomb under Mai Jia Laoda's car exploded, and the flying Mai Jia Laoda was thrown onto the car roof. He then smashed down onto the windshield, shattering it. Fan Jiaming was also thrown out of his car due to the strong blast, crashing into the wall and then flying out again.

Mai Jia Laoda was lying on the ground, clutching his injured left arm. Zhang Yijun looked at him with heartache. Mai Jia Laoda struggled to get up and walked towards Zhang Yijun. Zhang Yijun, seeing Mai Jia Laoda approaching, quickly hid behind a wall. Mai Jia Laoda grabbed Zhang Yijun's shoulder, and Zhang Yijun screamed in fear.
Zhang Yijun, who had just changed clothes, was searching for a place to hide. Mai Jia Laoda, hiding behind a car, peeked out to observe the situation and then quickly got into the car.

The car of Cui Minho drove into the parking lot, directly crashing into the back of the car of Mai Jia Laoda. The two cars collided heavily, and the rear of Mai Jia Laoda's car was severely deformed. The undercarriage of Cui Minho's car was also lifted up.
The police quickly set up a spike strip. Fan Jiaming's car reached the downhill section, and the front part of the car hit the spike strip.

Mai Jia Laoda crashed into the police car, and the vehicle spun out of control. Mai Jia Laoda, who was in the back seat, was thrown around. Cui Minho and the others were also shaken. Mai Jia Laoda cursed, "Go to hell!"

The police car behind him was riddled with bullet holes. Park Yuzhe crouched behind the car, observing the situation. Mai Jia Laoda lay on the ground, his chest rising and falling rapidly. Cui Minho squatted down, and Park Yuzhe turned to look at him.
Park Yuzhe took the sniper rifle from the hands of Cui Minho and then loaded it into the vehicle. The police quickly loaded their gear.

Mai Jia Laoda, who had just gotten out of the car, was shot in the left shoulder by Cui Minho. Park Yuzhe, seeing Mai Jia Laoda fall, quickly crouched down and fired several shots at the people in the car.
The car drove into the car wash, and Jin Taonian hid behind a car, shooting back at the bald man. Mai Jia Laoda drove the car out of the car wash. Jin Taonian said: "Let's go."

The mercenary driving the car was hit and fell out of the vehicle. His companions quickly took his place and continued the chase. A mercenary in the car shot Jin Taonian in the leg. Jin Taonian was hit and fell to the ground.
Fan Jiaming, who had just rushed out of the fire, was blown away by the blast wave and smashed into a car.
Fan Jiaming's helmet fell off, and the car continued to run over the helmet. Fan Jiaming yelled: "Stop!"

Fan Jiaming fired back at the enemies. The hit drug dealer was thrown out of the car, and the drug dealers kept coming. The rear of the car was hit, and the left rear wheel was blown up. Despite the car being damaged, Cui Minho drove away.

The driver was shot dead, and the car drifted out of the tunnel. Fan Jiaming's bodyguard, seeing this, raised his gun and fired wildly at the rear of the car. The hostages screamed in fear. The car continued to drift out of the parking lot, and Fan Jiaming and Cui Minho, seeing this, quickly got up.

movie101_7089369392055583246_4560_4740.text: Da Xu looked at the two of them and asked, "How did you guys find out?"
Reporter Chen said: "Dude, stop pretending, you're a celebrity on the internet now."
Da Xu said: "Where's the armored vehicle?" "Let me take a look."
Da Xu said: "What armored vehicle? There's none. Don't bother me, I need to get tools to fix something. Move, move, move away."

Grandpa said: "This time, the decline in China's stock market is completely due to this, the country's subprime mortgage crisis." "You see how they borrowed money to spend here and now they can't settle their accounts, affecting our stock market."
Auntie said: "I'm telling you, you old man, how can you have your feet in two boats?"
Grandpa: "I haven't, you're mistaken, you're mistaken. How could I do such a thing? No."
Auntie: "Are you being dishonest in your speech now?" After saying that, Auntie turned and left.
Grandpa: "Ma'am, how could you just say I have my feet in two boats?"
Auntie continued to ask: "Are you still not admitting it?"
Grandpa: "But you've never made your intentions clear to me, willing to be with me."
Auntie: "I'm saying, shouldn't you men always take the initiative a bit?"

Grandpa: "If you put it this way, I understand completely. I want to tell you that I, as a person, would never have my feet in two boats. If I ever have my feet in two boats, let me fall off this iron tower."
Grandpa looked at the distance and said: "What's the big deal?"
Da Xu arrived at Mrs. Zheng's house on his bicycle, dismounted, and seeing Mrs. Zheng tending to the plants, asked: "What are you up to?"
Mrs. Zheng came out from the vegetable garden, and Auntie asked: "What? What's going on?"
Da Xu pointed at the vegetable and said: "Do you even know what this is?" "Mucking around with it without a clue."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Mucking around? Isn't it just a waste?"
Da Xu said: "Goodness, you even know it's a tank? Knowing it's a tank and still messing with it? I should take you to the military court straight away."
Mrs. Zheng said: "Military court? Do you think you're an uncle from the People's Liberation Army?"
Da Xu pointed at Mrs. Zheng and said: "I'm just joking with you." "What are you doing?"
Mrs. Zheng: "Hurry up, move this vehicle a bit. My stuff is trapped underneath."
Da Xu: "Huh? What stuff?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "If I can't get the thing out, my precious is gone." "Do you get it?" "My sesame."
Da Xu asked: "What happened? Is your child in trouble?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "It's even more precious than a child to me."
Da Xu said: "Oh, is it your own child? In danger? Kidnapped? Call 110."
Mrs. Zheng said: "It's not a child. It's a puppy."
Da Xu pointed at the sign and said: "Kidnapping a dog is also illegal."
Mrs. Zheng: "Oh, hurry up and move the vehicle a bit, would you? You, you"
Da Xu: "Alright, alright, I'll move it right away." "Have you seen my friend? A guy."
Mrs. Zheng: "I saw him."
Da Xu asked: "Where is he?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "He left. He's even more annoying than you. I begged him for ages, and he wouldn't move the vehicle either."
Da Xu looked around and said: "He's gone off?"
Da Xu: "Just wait a moment. I'll call him."

Da Xu took out his phone from his pocket, but it was turned off. He quickly put it to his ear, only to hear a busy signal and then a 'call cannot be completed' message. Da Xu angrily said: "What's with this lunatic, turning his phone off?"

movie101_7228950501038293560_5100_5280.text: Shui Xiu watched as her daughter got further and further away, her heart aching with pain. Meanwhile, Yao Yao, having fulfilled her wish, stood in place and waved enthusiastically.
Shui Xiu watched Feng Yucheng's departing car with a heavy heart, tears welling up in her eyes.

Feng Yucheng wrote in the diary: "During my time in Yingtan, I deeply appreciated the beautiful scenery of the mountains. At the same time, I experienced the simplicity of the people living here. I have left Yingtan. But I don't know why, a sense of nostalgia always lingers in my heart. I feel a deep, unbreakable connection with this place."
The next day, Shui Xiu accompanied Feng Yucheng to the county for an appointment. Shui Xiu said to Feng Yucheng: "Take your time, there's no rush."
Shui Xiu, seeing this, quickly grabbed Feng Yucheng's arm, trying to stop him from falling.

A villager anxiously said: 'Something's wrong, something's wrong, there's been an accident. The quarry exploded, go check it out!' Shui Xiu and Feng Yucheng were both shocked and quickly walked towards the direction of the accident.

The village chief continued: 'Liu Yuhai not only forged documents to illegally operate a quarry but also used explosive materials illegally, causing a fatal accident that led to more serious public incidents. Now, the offender Liu Yuhai has been criminally detained. At the same time, there will be a thorough safety inspection of all quarries in the county. Those with proper documentation will be strictly reviewed, and those without will be immediately shut down. Comrade Feng Lao Qing will temporarily serve as the director of the village committee in Yingtan Village. Shui Xiu will assist with the work, quickly calming the public and actively guiding them. Shui Xiu's case against Liu Yuhai will be concluded soon with compensation awarded.'

The scene shifts to the inside of the house, where Shui Xiu returns home and is shocked to see the table full of delicacies. She walks into the room in a daze, her eyes fixed on the dining table. After a moment of thought, she suddenly becomes angry.
Shui Xiu, who was still in shock, didn't notice Feng Yucheng's arrival. Feng Yucheng came in with two plates of food, placed them in front of Shui Xiu, and said: "Don't move."
Shui Xiu looked at Feng Yucheng with a smile, Feng Yucheng looked back at her with a smile, their eyes met, and they smiled at each other.
Feng Yucheng said: 'This time, it's my turn to take care of you.'

movie101_7010686199291445773_1560_1740.text: Xiao Xing, who had just regained consciousness, slowly opened her eyes and saw a familiar figure standing at the door.

Xiao Xing, who had been awakened by the sound, suddenly opened her eyes wide, but found that her hands and feet were tightly bound to the bed by iron chains. She struggled hard to free herself, but to no avail.
Tang Zheng said, "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to hit you. Actually, you could have been let go, but then I found the 'OnlyMeet' app on your phone. Do you think playing like this is thrilling?"
Xiao Xing said, "Please, let me go."
Xiao Xing looked at Tang Zheng and said, "You're the one who saved me."
Tang Zheng's expression was one of deep affection as he looked at the dog food bag in his hand.
Tang Zheng placed the blood-stained letter on the table, picked up the scalpel, and continued to perform. The blood-stained letter was left on the table, with the phone number clearly visible.
Tang Zheng looked at the sharpened dental drill with a gleam in his eyes.
At this moment, Tang Zheng was performing surgery. He looked up and saw a portrait of Xiao Xing on the screen. A smile slowly appeared on his face.
The screen gradually fades to black, and time rewinds to before Cong Cong (Animal) was taken away. Tang Zheng, who was previously at home, was suddenly called to the police station.
Xiao Xing said, "Alright, I know I was wrong, I'm sorry, I won't leave you alone at home again." "Hey, Cong Cong."

Xiao Xing came out of the bathroom and saw Cong Cong (Animal) at the door. She was startled and didn't know what to do. She looked at Cong Cong (Animal) and then at the door, feeling a sense of helplessness. She walked to the intercom and pressed the answer button.
Xiao Xing opened the door and greeted Tang Zheng.

Lu Li said, "Are you an idiot?" Then continues, "Miss Xiao Xing, good day, following the clue you provided yesterday, we've investigated the accident site, and it turns out someone did go missing, a woman."
Lu Li looked at Cong Cong (Animal), who was obediently lying on his own bed, and said: "Usually, we would ask..."
Xiao Xing said, "Usually, you should be asking me if I saw clearly the car's make, license plate number, and the driver's age, physique, and such questions."
Lu Li nodded and said, "Yes, that's right."

Xiao Xing continued, "I can't describe the car's shape, the driver was over 1.8 meters tall, around 182 or 183 centimeters, as for the license plate number, I think even if you're not blind, it's very hard to see clearly and remember it in such heavy rain."
Lu Li nodded and said, "Yes."
Xiao Xing said, "You seem to not trust me very much."
Lu Li quickly denied, saying, "No, no, no, I just want to understand more."
Xiao Xing said, "Lu Li Officer, you're probably about 35 years old, 1.75 meters tall."

movie101_6969128872847770149_1860_2040.text: The car burst out, crashing into the signboard on the roadside, and the billboards hanging on the wall were knocked down one by one.
Jin Taonian was the first to react, quickly starting the motorcycle and chasing after Shen Meijing. Park Yuzhe followed closely behind, shooting as he rode.

The police said, "Be careful". Jin Taonian sped up and left the construction site, weaving through traffic on the road. He overtook a taxi and a van, then sped past a row of small shops on the roadside.

Jin Taonian sped up and overtook Park Yuzhe. Park Yuzhe was stunned for a moment, then quickly turned the handlebars and braked, stopping the motorcycle on the side of the road. Jin Taonian also braked, and the two motorcycles came to a standstill facing each other.
Jin Taonian was still weaving through traffic, completely ignoring the rules on the road. The police chased after him, but Jin Taonian didn't panic and kept his cool, even performing a few drifts.
The police chased after him on motorcycles. Jin Taonian was fearless, swerving the bike left and right. The police kept up the pursuit, and the sound of the chase echoed through the street.
Jin Taonian was closely following Park Yuzhe on his motorcycle. Suddenly, a car blocked their path.

The police car sped down the street, with Park Yuzhe closely following on the motorcycle. The street was crowded with cars, and the police car weaved through them, heading straight towards the mall. Park Yuzhe was right behind, but the gap between them kept closing, so he had to speed up.

The motorcycle sped down the street, weaving through traffic. Jin Taonian was carrying a large bag, and the motorcycle's rear light was on. It turned into a road by the roadside, and the motorcycle's speed slowed down. It stopped next to a small wooden house.
Jin Taonian was thrown off the motorcycle and rolled on the ground. Park Yuzhe arrived in time and stopped the motorcycle. He got off the bike and ran towards Jin Taonian.

The police car stopped at the gate of the research institute, and Park Yuzhe got out of the car. The place was in chaos, with scattered papers and a blood-soaked helmet. Park Yuzhe looked around, then turned to look at the laboratory building.
The person on the other end of the phone, Jin Taonian, was getting ready to leave. Park Yuzhe turned around and said to Jin Taonian, "I'll come find you."
Park Yuzhe said: "Director Cui, the weapon has fallen" "The bag is shot" "Yes, it was hit."
Cui Minho and Shen Meijing got out of the car, Cui Minho opened the back door of the mobile laboratory, he lifted the window of the analysis room, and a briefcase fell out.

Cui Minho and Shen Meijing exchanged a glance and then looked towards the sandbag barrier in front of the police headquarters. The sandbags had been neatly arranged, but now they were cracked open, and the situation inside was unknown. A helicopter was flying overhead.
The helicopter slowly descended, and the mercenaries on the ground were already in position.

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: The scene shifts, and Shui Xiu returns home. She walks into the house with a bowl in her hands, only to see Yu Cheng sitting on the sofa reading a book.
Shui Xiu came out with the medicine and said: "Yu Cheng, this is the prescription from Doctor Wang from Shitou Village. You should drink it."
Yu Cheng watched Shui Xiu's back and said: "Oh, it's been so long and there's still no improvement."
Shui Xiu walked over and said, 'Injuries take a hundred days to heal. You can't just expect them to get better right away.'
Yu Cheng, sitting on the sofa, asked Shui Xiu who was folding clothes: "Did you go to see them again?"
Shui Xiu said: "Don't worry, I know what I'm doing." "We're not people who make false claims." "But if they don't admit their mistake, I won't let it go."
Yu Cheng said, 'You've been wronged.'
Shui Xiu smiled and said, "Who else but your wife could do this? You should just focus on getting better. I'll handle everything else."
Yu Cheng said: "It's not appropriate for a woman to be out in the open like this."
Shui Xiu walked over with clothes and said, "Why isn't it appropriate? Winning a lawsuit depends on reason. Liu Yuhai has bullied us too much. I can't swallow this anger."

Yu Cheng looked at the bowl on the table, then at the two crutches beside him. He picked up the crutches and stood up, but after just a couple of steps, he couldn't help but exclaim: "I'm just afraid you'll be overworked."

Yu Cheng, supporting himself on the crutches, sat down on the sofa and said, "The word 'people' has one mouth, 'official' has two. No matter how reasonable you are, we only have one mouth." "If it doesn't work, let's just endure it a bit longer."
Shui Xiu asked while mending: "Yu Cheng, why are you so weak now?"
Yu Cheng said: "I'm already crippled like this, can I not be weak? You always wanted a child."
Yu Cheng said: 'In the future, I can't give you anything and will only drag you down. If it really doesn't work, let's get a divorce.'
Yu Cheng was silent for a while, then slowly stood up, his eyes red and his face full of guilt.
Shui Xiu, surprised, said: "Yu Cheng, why are you saying this? Didn't we agree to stay together for a lifetime?"
Shui Xiu said: "I will take care of you for a lifetime." Yu Cheng nodded in agreement. Shui Xiu continued: "Don't say such things in the future."

The next day, Shui Xiu took the laundry to the village entrance to dry. Unexpectedly, she ran into Shan Tao who had come to the village to find her husband. The two looked at each other in silence, not knowing what to say.
Shan Tao said: "Take this." "Our man doesn't know how to talk, please don't take it to heart."
Shan Tao, holding the towel, said: "Use this money to buy something nourishing for Yu Cheng."
Shui Xiu: "Shan Tao."

movie101_6969128872847770149_2040_2220.text: Cui Minho and Shen Meijing put down their luggage and take out the prepared equipment. Cui Minho says: "Let's start." He opens the electric shock gun, and Shen Meijing takes out the necessary items.
Park Yong-cheol turned around and said to Cui Minho: 'The glasses are already connected to the NIS management officer's office,' 'We can start anytime.'
Cui Minho said: "November 6th, 6:10 AM Hong Kong time" "NIS Cui Minho, begin weapon program verification"

Cui Minho squatted down and said, "I'll open it." He took over the pliers and slowly pried open the clasp of the bag, then handed the pliers to Park Yong-cheol. Park Yong-cheol continued to record the process on the tablet.

Cui Minho said: "The suspected portable weapon" "is placed inside a dark brown genuine leather briefcase." "We need to separate the briefcase from the weapon," "only then can we verify the authenticity of the weapon." After speaking, Cui Minho took out a small iron hammer and gently struck the top of the briefcase. The briefcase immediately split open.
Park Yong-cheol and Shen Meijing are inspecting the bomb. The pilot says to Zhao Zhiren: 'You haven't been willing to assess its power because you've never seen this weapon.'
Zhao Zhiren calmly said: 'If something goes wrong with this weapon, simply put,' 'everything you see will disappear.' Li Yanming looked out the window in despair.

Cui Minho said: 'This device's appearance is 90% similar to the DC8 prototype,' 'But it seems the suspected weapon hasn't been officially activated,' 'For safety considerations,' 'I suggest we connect with the suspected device to verify.'
Cui Minho looked up and said, "It's probably safe" "I'll go check it out"
Shen Meijing suddenly asked: "Wait" "Apart from an official connection" "Is there any other way to verify the authenticity of the weapon?"
Park Yong-cheol said: 'Cui Minho, your NIS and our communications,' 'never mentioned that the verification process would activate the weapon.'

Cui Minho said: "Li Yanming sir" "If this is a counterfeit" "Connecting won't cause harm" "Conversely" "If it's the lost portable weapon" "I can use the activation program" "to set the weapon to shutdown mode" "In any case" "It's safer than doing nothing"

The pilot in the co-pilot seat, Li Yanming, listened to the conversation between the two and then said to Cui Minho: "Mr. Cui, I agree with the Korean side verifying the weapon" "The police escort convoy for the weapon is ready" "Once the procedure is finished, leave immediately"
Cui Minho took out a tablet and compared the data on it with the sealed bag. After inputting the data, the tablet showed a 3D structural model of the sealed bag.

Cui Minho said: 'Confirming the portable weapon DC8,' 'We are entering the weapon activation program.' After speaking, Cui Minho handed the tablet to Shen Meijing, then took out a small tube from his pocket and handed it to Park Yong-cheol.

movie101_7010686199291445773_1740_1920.text: Officer Lu: "I" "When I was 20 years old" "People said I looked like 40" "They said I looked older" "You, you can see it" "Or rather, you can hear it" "Unlike some people" "Heart blind" "Yes, heart blind."

Lu Xiaoxing continued: "A person's height can be judged by the pitch of their voice, their build can be inferred from the weight of their steps, many things don't need to be seen to be known. For example, this morning, the two of you ate chive dumplings." Officer Lu laughed after hearing this, and Lu Xiaoxing continued: "You didn't even have time to chew properly."
Lu Xiaoxing: "Then, let's continue."
Officer Lu said: "Ah, okay, let's continue. You mentioned earlier, that the driver hit a dog."

Lu Xiaoxing recalled: "Around 9 o'clock, I got into a taxi at Shuncheng Road. After starting the meter, we drove west for about 10 minutes. I heard the sound of something rolling under the car, and the sound of the taxi's top light breaking. Even if it were a big dog, it wouldn't make such a large noise."
Officer Lu said: "So, what you're saying is, he was lying about hitting a dog."
Lu Xiaoxing added: "Also, he should be left-handed."
Officer Lu: "Left-handed."
Lu Xiaoxing explained: "Because he wore his watch on his right wrist." "Usually, watches aren't worn on the dominant hand."
Officer Lu looked at his watch and said: "Right, how did the accident happen?"
Lu Xiaoxing replied: "He said he wanted to help me open the coffee."
Officer Lu asked: "Coffee or tea?"
Lu Xiaoxing replied: "I could open it myself, but he insisted on helping."
Officer Lu put down the pen and said: "Alright, let's stop here for today." Then he looked up at Lu Xiaoxing, smiled, and said: "Oh, by the way, I wanted to ask, how did you know about my leg?"
Lu Xiaoxing said: "Because your steps are uneven." "Also, the smell of musk pain relief plaster is strong." "Anyone can smell where it's coming from."
Young policeman asked with concern: "Captain, are you okay?"
Officer Lu quickly comforted: "Ah, it's okay, it's okay, it's okay."

Lu Xiaoxing's smile was full of joy. Meanwhile, Lin Chong was still practicing skating with his teammates. He was wearing protective gear and had just finished a spin when he fell on the ground. His teammates rushed to help him up.

The four of them split up and regrouped several times, chasing each other in different directions. They were as agile as swallows, darting left and right, their movements light and swift, their skating techniques varied and impressive.

The scene shifts to Lin Chong who has arrived at the police station, looking at the reward notice for the capture of the 'Little Town Kingpin' posted on the wall. He stops in his tracks, takes a deep breath, and approaches to read the notice carefully.
Lin Chong looked at the notice and said: "Reward offered." Then he turned his hat around and put it on his head. He looked at the notice again and said: "Reward offered."
Young policeman said: "Here are the photos of all male luxury taxi drivers." "A total of 568 individuals."
Officer Lu was stunned for a moment, then Young policeman continued: "Shouldn't we investigate the left-handed individuals among them?" Officer Lu stretched out his arms.
Officer Lu sat in the chair with his hands behind his head, saying: "This case is" "odd, definitely something off about it."
Young policeman said: "Captain Lu" "Do you really believe that?"

movie101_7089369392055583246_4740_4920.text: Da Xu: "A machine?"
Da Xu said: "Wait, wait, wait a moment."
Mrs. Zheng impatiently said: "Could you hurry up?"
Da Xu: "Ah, okay." After saying that, Da Xu turned around and left.
Zhang Li answered the phone: "Hello, Da Xu"
Da Xu asked: "Zhang Li, is Wang Xiaopo with you?"
Zhang Li said, "I don't know. Shouldn't he be with you all the time?"

Da Xu said: "How should I explain it to you?" "Let me tell you, aren't you guys supposed to get married?" "Wang Xiaopo, well, he wants to buy a house, but he doesn't have money." "So, I introduced him to a business opportunity." "It's for my friends who are making a film." "They need a tank prop." "And now, you two want to break up." "Aren't you pushing him to his limits?" "You can't treat him like this."
Zhang Li said: "You're not telling me that the armored car that caused the accident is yours."

Da Xu said: 'No, it's not. Our car was lost on the street, how would we know it broke down? And my friend from the film, he just called to say that they don't need the car anymore. I think Wang Xiaopo is about to lose his mind. What should we do?'
Zhang Li said: "He deserves it."
Da Xu said: "Oh dear, you can't talk like that. He's only trying to do what's best for you, don't you know?"
Zhang Li: "You figure something out, I'm going to look."
Da Xu: "Okay, I understand, I understand."
Zhang Li, who was arranging flowers in the hotel lobby, received a call from Wang Xiaopo. After listening, Zhang Li put down the phone and continued to arrange flowers.
Shen Yan asked: "Am I heavy?"
Wang Xiaopo replied: "Not heavy."
Shen Yan: 'If I'm not heavy, why do you look so miserable?'
Wang Xiaopo said: "Am I miserable?" "I really don't want to do this anymore."
Zhang Li asked: 'Then what do you want to do?'
Wang Xiaopo replied: "There's no time to figure that out now. If I had gone to college, I wouldn't be in this position where I can't even afford a house."
Wang Xiaopo said: "I'm telling you, if one day I can't think straight and I jump off a bridge into the Yangtze River, I won't bother telling you first."
Zhang Li said: "Don't try to be a tough guy, if you want to jump then jump."
Da Xu said: 'Are you trying to drive him crazy?'
Zhang Li, who was arranging the counter, heard the noise and picked up the phone to make a call, but there was no response. She put the phone back and continued her work.
Mrs. Zheng, who was nearby, heard the noise and quickly hid behind the bushes.
Shen Yan exclaimed: "Goodness, this is too cool." Shen Yan took out a cellphone, ready to capture this moment.
Reporter Chen: "What's the matter, did Mrs. Zheng not come again?" "Alright, then hide." "Hmm."
Reporter Chen said: "Alright, I won't chat with you now. I have a small issue."
Shen Yan asked: "What happened to Old Zheng?"
Reporter Chen explained: 'Last week, he insisted on attending a charity auction. He donated money to a poor student.' 'But you need to know this.' 'Mrs. Zheng’s wife is notoriously stingy.'
Shen Yan looked at him and said, "No way."

Reporter Chen said: "It's not about the donation, it's about how if she hadn’t leeched off of me during the dinner, he would now be one, not daring to go home and two, the creditors constantly coming after him. His only choice is to hide."

movie101_7228950501038293560_60_240.text: Wu Zheng was still observing the village from afar. He saw the women washing clothes in the river, but the children on the cliff were all holding guns and aiming at the women. Wu Zheng was stunned by the scene before him. He quickly turned off the camera and looked up at the cliff. The children on the cliff were all armed, standing on the protruding part of the rock.

Wu Zheng, who had just finished taking photos of the girls, was walking up the slope with his camera. He saw the girls washing clothes by the river and immediately put down his camera to start taking pictures. He walked closer and closer, and just as he was about to snap a photo, he suddenly felt a drop of water on his face.
The two young girls washing clothes by the stream couldn't help but burst into laughter, while on the other side, the workers were still diligently pounding the stones.
The two workers lifted the stone slab, revealing the smile of the Yang family. Wu Zheng captured this moment with his camera, and the Yang family's love for each other was vividly displayed.

Wu Zheng said: "I am Wu Zheng, a professional photographer. I heard from people in my circle that Yingtan Village is an ancient village hidden deep in the Taihang Mountains. Unbeknownst to me, my arrival has disrupted the tranquility of the previously peaceful small mountain village, and it has never been the same."

The girls washing clothes by the river looked up to see a huge hole suddenly appear in the mountain wall above, rocks falling down. They exchanged puzzled glances, and Wu Zheng turned his head to look but didn't see anything unusual. The girls looked again and again, and the girls washing clothes by the river were all in a state of panic.
The woman, upon hearing this, looked up at the sky, then at the river, and in a fit of rage, threw the clothes into the basin. She then started to frantically search for something in the river.
The villagers were running in the woods, and Wu Zheng was taking photos of them. The villagers ran from the river to the woods, and Wu Zheng followed with his camera.

The scene shifts to a woman in a red shirt, who is also Wu Zheng, running on a mountain path. The sun shines on the mountains and forests, making everything look particularly peaceful. However, Wu Zheng's expression is serious and her pace is hurried. She occasionally looks to the side and then quickly turns back, continuing to run forward.
The photos on the wall are of the villagers before they became famous, capturing their youth and vitality. The plump photographer, with a big belly, is admiring the photos with a short-haired woman.
The Chubby Photographer said: 'Wow, brother Wu Zheng, you are something. You transitioned from urban human scenes to rural life in one step. This click captures a beautiful aunt.'
The Chubby Photographer said: 'I'll say, a master is a master. Although I don't understand much, from the lighting and composition, it's really excellent.'
The male judge said: "I think nobody should participate in this Taihang Culture Photography Exhibition. It's hopeless."
The Chubby Photographer said: "Hmm, there are definitely some prize-winning photos among these."
Wu Zheng said: 'Forget it, I haven't resolved the portrait rights for my photos yet,' while saying this, he stuffed the photo into his mouth.
