Li Yanming said: "Mr. Lee; has an appointment with Martin Koc."
Martin Koc: "Why urgently seek me out, what's the matter?"
Li Yanming said: "Don’t tell me you don't know about what happened in Tsim Sha Tsui last night."
Martin Koc asked: "Was it that serious last night?"
Li Yanming said: "A weapon of mass destruction was found" "It’s now in the warehouse"
Li Yanming turned to Martin Koc and asked, "How much do you know?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_1140_1320.text: Bao Liang said: "All my sewage disposal equipment has been inspected."
Zhang Dong nodded, and Bao Liang continued: "If you get involved in any illegal activities, I won't be able to help you."
Bao Liang said: "Director, I've always worked under your watch." "There's no way I'd tarnish your reputation."
Zhang Dong turned his head to one side, thought for a moment, and said: "Bao Liang."
Bao Liang responded: "Oh."
Zhang Dong said: "We are family, and we will be honest with each other."
Bao Liang said: "That's right."
Zhang Dong said: "Although I'm the village chief, there are two committees in this village." "I'm the village chief and the old secretary Zhang Tiegui, so not everything is up to me."

Bao Liang said: "Our village is about to have elections. Isn't this a great opportunity? I've heard that the old Party Branch Secretary is getting on in years and might not run again. Who else but you would be the Party branch secretary in this village? Don't worry, I'll campaign for you and ensure you get the position."
Zhang Dong raised his hand to signal, and then said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Zhang Dong nodded and said: "Oh."

Zhang Dong said: "Visit those few farmers again," "do some work," "give some gifts," "treat them to a meal," "and hand out a red envelope at crucial moments." "These things can easily be resolved in the countryside, alright?"
Zhang Dong said: "Alright, alright."
Zhang Dong looked at his watch and said: "It's about time for lunch now. Let's go eat."
Bao Liang said: "Alright, I'll listen to you." "Let's go eat, Director." Bao Liang stood up and walked out, with Zhang Dong following behind.
The next day, Zhang Dong and Liu Mengting went to the village committee office. At the door, Liu Mengting greeted: "Hello, please come in."
A man said: "Let's sit inside." Everyone went inside the house.
The man in the suit said: "Mayor Yang, hurry, let's go welcome them."

Zhang Dong, who had just returned from the village committee, happened to meet Mayor Yang and his spouse on the small bridge over the pond in the village. Zhang Dong said: "Mayor Yang, long time no see." "Mayor Yang, you've come a long way from the town to preside over our village's elections." "Thank you."

Mayor Yang said: "The triennial reshuffling of rural Party organizations" "is a major event in the political life of rural Party members." "As the township Party committee, we attach great importance to it."
Zhang Dong said: "Alright, as the village leader, I will actively cooperate."
Zhang Dong said: "Liu Mengting, is everyone here yet?"
Liu Mengting said: "Lin Chunhu hasn't arrived yet. He had an urgent matter at his cooperative but should be on his way now."
Zhang Dong said: "Oh, let's go in first then." The group greeted each other and then headed towards the village committee building. The village was quiet, with lush trees and a peaceful atmosphere.
Lin Chunhu ran over and said: "Mayor Yang, oh dear, oh dear, Mayor Yang, I apologize for being late due to some matters."
Mayor Yang extended his hand and said: "This is..."
Mayor Yang extended his hand and said: "This is our village's Deputy Secretary Lin Chunhu."

Zhang Tiegui said: "This is the king of turtle farming. He not only makes money from raising turtles but also leads our village to prosperity. We are counting on him for our village's future prosperity."

movie101_7010686199291445773_2280_2460.text: The phone screen showed a picture of the two of them. Suddenly, the phone was knocked away, and then shattered into pieces. The phone's owner, Lin Chong, was taken away by a car.

The scene shifts to the police station, where Lin Chong is reporting the incident to the police: "Well, I don't know who the tempestuous one is, I just stopped for a moment and he scratched me a lane. This job doesn't pay much anyway, damaging the car just makes it worse. Do you think it can go without repair"
Lu Li asked: "Why did you remove the dash cam?"
The mysterious person: "What aunt, whose aunt?" "You mean the meter, right?"
"On the phone": "Our taxi company recently has required switching to this new standard thing"
The dog trader said: "I mean, who would bother, huh, to make that little money, is it enough to eat?"
The trainer continued: "Nowadays, there are more and more dash cams."
The staff adjusted the volume and said: "Who would go out in this weather? It's better to stay at home and have some tea."
Xiao Xing said: "It's not him. His voice was not so shrill."

Lu Li took off the headphones and said: "Today we only listened to a tenth" "Tomorrow" "We still have a bunch of nonsensical voices from the old fools" "And the lies are returning" "So don't get hurried" "Tomorrow we will continue to search for a needle in a haystack"

Xiao Xing's eyes were red, she didn't know how to face Lu Li, nor how to face herself. At night, the two of them sat in the car, Lu Li said to Xiao Xing: "We listened to the recordings all day, are you hungry? Here, have one."
Xiao Xing said: "I don't have the appetite"
Lu Li took out a hamburger from the bag, took a bite, and began to cry. He wiped his tears with a napkin, then took another bite of the hamburger, and wiped his tears again.
Lu Li turned around and said: "Yo, I forgot you." "Here..." "Ah, I can't give this to you, it's dog meat."
Xiao Xing said: "Officer Lu Li..."
Lu Li quickly said: "Just kidding, just kidding." Cong Cong curled up in the corner of the car.
The car sped along, with Lin Chong running wildly on the road. He ran to a police station, frantically pounding on the door.
Lin Chong cursed: "Taxi, damn luxury taxi, it's nothing but a Golf 6, you're accusing me of lying, which part of it is false?"
Lu Li was driving, and the rain outside was pouring. The windshield wipers were struggling to clear the rain. Lin Chong was cursing: "So what the blind said is true."
The phone rang, and Lu Li said: "Ah, the little brat is calling."
Lin Chong said: "Hello, it's me, Lin Chong, I'm saying it again, the car that hit the person is a Golf 6, not a taxi, whatever car it is, it is that car, believe it or not."
After leaving the pet association, Lin Chong drove alone into the night. The howling of dogs from the neighboring carriages kept him company as he drove home.
Lu Li driving said: "What does this little brat mean?"
Xiao Xing said: "Officer Lu Li."
Lu Li responded with a simple 'Hmm'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2760_2940.text: Li Yanming looked at Ma Tingku and said: 'Tell me what you know, no more, no less.'

Ma Tingku shouted, 'Everybody out.' The staff hurriedly left their posts. Ma Tingku walked to the center, looking at the large screen in front of him, and then turned to Li Yanming and said, 'You can go now.'

Ma Tingku said: "The United States has been a market maker for decades" "Opposing other countries' weapon development" "Under the guise of maintaining international order" "But in reality, it is all about their fundamental interests" "If you don't give, someone else will want" "Where there's a buyer, there's a seller". After saying this, Ma Tingku turned and left.
Li Yanming interrupted Ma Tingku and said: "We don't need your analysis of the situation" "Do we have any means to contact them?"
Ma Tingku said with a smile: "All the weapons are with you guys now, why are you still looking for him?"
Li Yanming said: "British and American intelligence are all over us, yet, Hong Kong is unusually quiet."
Ma Tingku said: 'No news is good news.'
Li Yanming said: "If everyone is silent, there must be a problem."

Ma Tingku said: "Do you know how many people around the world are watching the equator?" "If there's any news, I'll keep you posted." Li Yanming looked at Ma Tingku with a puzzled expression, then turned his head to look at the surveillance screen.
The car pulls up to the curb of the memorial site, and the two slowly get out. The site is covered with memorial banners and flowers.

At this time, a pair of legs appeared in the frame, and then the camera moved up to the face of the person. It turned out to be Zhao Zhiren, who was peeping through the door crack. He was wearing a vest and bow tie, with a serious expression. After a while, Song An opened the door and walked out. Zhao Zhiren quickly hid.
Song An said: "Take off your shoes." Zhao Zhiren turned his head and smiled, and Song An added: "Sorry about that, never mind."

Song An said: 'Why not use them, of course, they should be used?' 'I've never been formally introduced,' 'Song An,' 'The 'Song' of the Song Dynasty, the 'An' of the saddle.' 'This is my assistant Yuan Xiaowen,'
Song An asked Zhao Zhiren: "Professor, do you understand Mandarin?" Zhao Zhiren nodded. Song An said: "I think she understands." Zhao Zhiren gave a slight smile, then turned and left.
The scene shifts to the office, where Zhao Zhiren carries two cups of tea to the table, handing one to Yuan Xiaowen. Yuan Xiaowen says, "Thank you."

Song An said: "Thank you" "Good tea, truly refreshing" "I knew the professor was busy before coming, but I didn't expect it to be this much" "Nevertheless, I must implore the professor to keep a close watch on DC8" "Its security is vitally important to our future actions."
Zhao Zhiren paused for a moment, then continued: 'Li Yanming promised me unrestricted access to the intelligence center,' 'As for how often DC8 needs checking,' 'I don’t need you to tell me.'
Song An said: "Of course, needn't it be said?" "Although Hong Kong has always been the intelligence hub of the Far East," "it has never been attacked," "right?"

Song An looked at the two of them and said, 'I don’t want to see anything happen to Hong Kong, the professor feels the same, right?' Zhao Zhiren glanced at Song An, then turned to look at Yuan Xiaowen. Yuan Xiaowen shook her head.

movie101_7089369392055583246_5280_5460.text: Zhang Li said: 'Are you crazy?' 'I just wanted to annoy you; it's your fault for leaving me on the mountaintop.' 'I don't want anything else; I just want you to be all right.'
Wang Xiaopo said: "Stop messing around." Just then, Officer Zhang came over and separated the two.
Officer Zhang said: "What's all this about? Isn't this embarrassing? Get in the car." Wang Xiaopo was about to explain when Officer Zhang handed him a piece of paper, then turned and walked away.
Officer Zhang picked up the walkie-talkie and said: "Report to Officer Zhang, report to Officer Zhang. An armored vehicle has been spotted on Zhanjiang Road, driving recklessly on the road."
Officer Zhang anxiously said: "Stop causing trouble, hurry up and seal off the area, block it immediately."
The armored vehicle slowly drove into the alley, and the villagers curiously looked at the visitors, discussing amongst themselves.

The scene shifts to the main street, where a tank is blocking the road, and a crowd is gathered. People are running around in panic, and a woman hanging clothes by the window yells: "My clothes, my clothes."
Reporters from various media followed, crowding around the tank. The residents nearby were also attracted. Someone said: "What's it got to do with me?"

The man who was taken away was the suspect in the egg smashing case. The police took him to the police station to question him about the case. The fire in the heart of the man was not extinguished, and the road to justice was long and winding.
The police car stopped next to the off-road vehicle, and the door on the side of the car opened.
Officer Zhang got out of the car, pointed at Da Xu, and made a gesture of disapproval. Da Xu hurriedly ran over, clasped his hands and said: "Uncle Officer Zhang, so sorry, so sorry, so sorry."
Officer Zhang asked: "What are you up to?"
Da Xu said: "I, I'm saving someone."
Officer Zhang said: "You're saving people with this big thing? You're saving people and you think you're in 'Saving Private Ryan' or something?"
Da Xu hurriedly explained: "No, seriously though, Wang Xiaopo had an accident, they said he was lying up on some kind of iron tower."
Officer Zhang said: "He's already down"
Da Xu said: "Ah, down."

Officer Zhang said: 'Take that red cover off the antenna for me,' 'How shameful is this! You, you, you all get in the car.' Then he turns to a worker and says, 'Hey, Xiao Wang, make a call, tow this big thing away.'
Da Xu said: "Yes."
Da Xu said: "Let's see."
Officer Zhang said: "Enough talk."
The scene switches to Zheng Jin's home, Zheng Jin is flipping through a newspaper, his daughter Mrs. Zheng comes back from outside, slumping into a chair.

Zheng Jin said: "He's back. Your son just called, he won a second-class scholarship from the school, he wanted to share the good news with you." Mrs. Zheng sat down on the sofa, Zheng Jin massaged her shoulders from behind.
Mrs. Zheng asked: "Did you get the money back?"
Mrs. Zheng hummed in response.
Mrs. Zheng asked: "Where did you put it?"
Mrs. Zheng said: 'Placed it where they told me to.'
Zheng Jin massaged Mrs. Zheng's shoulders from behind and asked: "Where's that?"
Mrs. Zheng said: "Under the streetlight."

movie101_7235213933035192887_1320_1500.text: The old secretary said: "We will depend on him to lead us to a better life."
The man in the plaid shirt said: "Alright, alright, let's start the meeting."
The man in the plaid shirt extended his hand and said: "Come, come, please, Chief Yang, please."

Town Mayor said: "Today, I will be presiding over the recommendation work for the Party branch personnel candidates of our Camellia Village, and the candidates will be selected by the Party members and villagers together."

Town Mayor said: 'Let's consider who has made the greatest contribution to our village,' 'who can do practical things for our villagers,' 'and we will then nominate the person whom we all deem most suitable.'

The villagers clapped happily, and the announcement continued: "After an examination by the township Party committee, the following six new candidates for the Party branch are now being announced: Wang Qiuhong, Lin Chunhu, Liu Mengting, Zhang Dong, Zhang Tiegui, Zhang Yibao."
The village committee is very supportive of the village's cultural heritage, and the village has retained its ancient architectural style.
Old Secretary replied: "It's decent enough; this has a history of over three hundred years."
Town Mayor said: "It's truly outstanding." "Hey, Old Secretary, you've worked for this village for decades now, haven't you?" "Respected and esteemed indeed."

Town Mayor said with a smile: "I heard that there is a strong call for you to serve another term, and some villagers even hope that after you serve another term, you will take on the role of village chief again."
Old Secretary said: "That's because they don't want another village director who holds an office but does nothing."

Town Mayor said: "Is that so? I've also heard some of the villagers' discussions. Zhang Dong, when he ran for village chief three years ago, he was beating his chest, guaranteeing to do a lot of work for the building of our village."

Old Secretary said: "How many of his promised actions have been fulfilled? But I'm also to blame. I'm getting old, and my health is failing. The slow development of our village these past few years is mainly my responsibility."

Town Mayor said: "Come on, don't say that." "You've been the secretary of this village for over twenty years." "How can we blame you when your health is not good?" "You are a meritorious figure for Camellia Village."
Old Secretary said: "Chief Yang, this election is an opportunity" "We in Camellia Village can't miss another chance to develop further."
Old Secretary said: "I've been thinking, I do have some experience in work, but when it comes to leading the entire village to prosperity, my abilities are limited."

Old Secretary said: "Moreover, I am getting on in years and my spirit is willing but my flesh is weak." "I think that this election should focus on selecting a capable person who can lead the village to prosperity and a better life."
Town Mayor laughed and said: "Old Secretary, do you already have someone suitable in mind?" Old Secretary smiled and nodded, then the two walked forward together.

movie101_7010686199291445773_2460_2640.text: Xiao Xing asked: "Do you really believe me?"
Lu Li said: "I believe yeah, why wouldn't I believe?" "I trust" "Your matter" "Yanan has told me all about it"
Lu Li driving said: "Aren't you going to resume your studies?" "Actually, you should go to that surveillance class" "It would be quite suitable for you."
Xiao Xing said: "I can't go back anymore."

Lu Li said: "Xiao Xing, I don't know what you're thinking right now, but I can't and will not back down. We're in this together, we must only charge forward without looking back, go as far as we can, there's only one road. If you think about taking a side turn in the middle to doze off, that's not happening."
Lu Li, looking at the rearview mirror, waved his hand and said: "Don't even think about it. ""About to get into a fight with him"
Lu Li laughed and said: "Those were my words," "I'm quite the talent," "I can't believe I said such things," "I should go on 'Chinese Dream Show'."
Lu Li glanced at the rearview mirror, then turned on the car radio, waiting for the music to start.
Xiao Xing unbuckled her seatbelt, opened the car door, and stepped out. She closed the door and walked towards the back of the car.
Xiao Xing asked: "Lu Li Officer, what was that sound just now?"

Lu Li explained: "That was the sound of the wind," "my car is all good except for being noisy," "usually cars have separate trunks and back seats," "but mine is a hatchback," "meaning the back seat and the trunk are integrated." "Once you drive a bit fast," "the wind rushes to the back," "making it very noisy."
Xiao Xing said: "But on that taxi, I also heard the sound of a hatchback."
Lu Li, after thinking for a moment, turned to Xiao Xing and said: "Didn't you say it was a luxury taxi?" "Which luxury taxi has a hatchback?"
Lu Li suddenly slapped Xiao Xing across the face, the taxi crashed, and the three of them fell onto the seats.
At this moment, Lu Li drove the car to the entrance of the restaurant, parked the car, and then got out.

Lin Chong, who was nearby, saw this and hurriedly got into the car. He took out a music box from his bag and placed it in the middle of the car's console. The music box was very delicate, with a little ballet dancer inside, dancing to the music.

At this moment, a man wearing a hat and a leather jacket got out of a car and covered his face with a scarf. Inside the car, Lu Li was ready to leave, but the phone kept ringing. Xiao Xing said: "The number you're dialing is busy, shall I connect another?"
Xiao Xing said: "Nine o'clock sharp" "Antlers Road, practice field" "Do you remember?" "He had a date with friends there."

Lu Li said: "Let's go take a look." After speaking, Lu Li increased the speed of the car. The car left the highway and drove on the less-traveled road. On the other side, Xiao Xing was roller skating on the road.
Lin Chong said: 'What?' 'You're going to be late?' 'Forget it, forget it, forget it, don't make excuses.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_2940_3120.text: Song An said: "I choose to resolve this matter through diplomatic means"

Song An continued: "First, we need to review why their security system is so fragile," "Second, we need these buyers to back off when they know it's tough," "What do you think?" "Underground weapons trafficking is just one form of smuggling," "But it definitely cannot be considered terrorism." "However, we need to prevent it before it happens." "If they want to do something bad in Hong Kong," "I want to tell them," "Where is this?" "Hong Kong, a part of China," "Opposing Hong Kong means opposing China." "Do you understand, professor?"

Zhao Zhiren said: "I think" "When you came in just now" "You should've seen my door full of slogans" "I tell my students" "They need to uphold a very important value" "That is respect for individuals' freedom of speech" "Mr. Song An, please have some tea" "We can agree to disagree" "I don't think your method" "Is the only way to ensure the safety of Hong Kong"

Song An said: "It seems that the professor is very suspicious""Is this what you mean""The relationship between the security of a single area""and the entire country's interests""If you can't grasp it well, you would end up in a car crash and casualties""My job is to protect your cars""Which is to protect the safety of the people of Hong Kong""Do you think this is what I mean"
Zhao Zhiren walked up to Song An and said: "Mr. Song An" "I fear" "that your current way of handling things" "has not yet aligned with the outside world."
Song An laughed and said: "Is that so?" "In that case," "Mr. Lee really did choose the right person." Zhao Zhiren looked at Song An with a smirk.

Zhao Zhiren stood in the office, staring blankly at the window. He wore a shirt and a vest, his neatly trimmed hair and sideburns accentuating his scholarly demeanor. His eyes were filled with melancholy and helplessness, as if he had lost his soul.

Song An said disdainfully: "Bookworms are really troublesome." The car drove into the hotel, stopping at the entrance. Security opened the door for them, and a bodyguard escorted them to the car. Zhao Zhiren got in the car with a group of people.

movie101_6969128872847770149_3120_3300.text: The two men who got out of the car with him earlier were Jin Taonian and Foreign Leader. The trio arrived at a shooting range, where Jin Taonian led the way, looking around.
Jin Taonian stood in front of the dog racing track, with Foreign Leader and others beside him taking notes and asking questions. "Do you feel any remorse for what you have done?"
Jin Taonian said, "If I were to run away, I wouldn't have agreed to meet you."
Foreign Leader said, "We had already completed the transaction."
Jin Taonian said, "The weapons you want are now very safe."
Foreign Leader said, "Right, in those damn cops' hands."
Jin Taonian turned his head to look at Foreign Leader, Foreign Leader said: "My brother died because of you."
Jin Taonian said: "Boss," "we all know the risks of this line of work."
Jin Taonian said: "We stole the core material and the implosion device separately" "Ensuring the weapon is operable is my responsibility."
Jin Taonian said, "This has not changed," and Foreign Leader gave him a look.
Jin Taonian said: "DC8 is the smallest weapon in the world," "breaking the limits of physics," "Without being activated," "what you've got is merely junk."
Foreign Leader said, "Why not simply capture a tech person?"
Jin Taonian said: "In South Korea, there are fewer than five" "who know how to input the launch codes." "To activate the weapon, this is the only way."
Foreign Leader said: "Why didn't you discuss this with us beforehand?" Foreign Leader's eyes were fierce, glaring at Zhang Yijun.
Foreign Leader said: "The most cunning strategy is when even those in charge are totally unaware," "until Mr. Song made things a bit complicated."
Jin Taonian said: "Aren't we all working for 'His Highness'?" "We assist you in obtaining what you desire," "the power of a god."
Foreign Leader said, "Don't let my brother's sacrifice be in vain,"
Foreign Leader looked at the photo and remembered the narrow alley where he had met Zhang Yijun.

The streets were narrow, and the houses were densely packed. A woman with short hair and wearing sunglasses walked briskly. She looked up at the buildings on both sides and then walked into a dimly lit passageway. A man with glasses peered from behind a wall, watching her.

The scene switches to a room where a girl in a leather jacket and sunglasses barges in. She looks around at the clutter and the various action figures and comic posters on the walls. She then approaches the boy who was playing video games and stands beside him.
The girl took out a stack of cash from her pocket and handed it to the man. The man counted the money and put it in his shirt pocket, then picked up a plastic bag from the ground.

The girl, wearing a white jacket, stood up and walked towards Jin Taonian. Jin Taonian, who was playing a game, looked up and was stunned when he saw the girl wearing sunglasses. The girl said, "You're from the police, right?" Jin Taonian nodded. The girl said, "I know you're from the police. Why are you here?" Jin Taonian didn't speak and just stared at her. The girl said, "I heard you're the one handling the case involving the Japanese and the Americans. Is that right?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: The scene shifts to a small pavilion in the park, where Lin Chunhu is explaining to Old Secretary: "I, no, no, no, no, the turtle farming cooperative is just getting started, I have a lot of work to do."
Old Secretary said: 'You set up the cooperative to enrich everyone, and you became the secretary for the same reason. Aren't these two tasks essentially the same?'

Lin Chunhu said: "I am young and lack experience." "I am afraid I cannot bear this responsibility." "If I fail as the secretary," "it might hinder the development of the cooperative and cause trouble for the entire village."
Old Secretary said: 'You have seen the results of this recommendation; your popularity was the highest.'

Old Secretary said: 'This shows that you have earned a lot of respect from everyone. Over the past few years, your turtle farming has led everyone to prosperity, and your capability is evident to all. Everyone chose you, so if you don't become the secretary, should we let Zhang Dong take over?'

The scene switches to a meeting where Lin Chunhu says: "Our cooperative will introduce a new breed next year, and we will have experts come over to provide guidance. Let's see if anyone has any objections."
Lin Chunhu said: 'Alright. I will pick a few representatives from those present to go for training at the agricultural school. Let's see who will sign up first.'

A villager said: 'Lin Chunhu, Lin Chunhu, it's not good, Baotang and his group have blocked the cooperative's door. Hurry and have a look.' Everyone rushed to the door, and Baotang was happily taking photos with the villagers.
Lin Chunhu said: "Excuse me, excuse me, let's talk it out, what's the matter?"
A villager said: "So many turtles have died, what should we do?"
Lin Chunhu said: 'How could this happen? Did you check the cause?'

Baotang said: 'What other reason could there be? We were fine using our own feed before, but as soon as we used yours, there were problems. Look, we've taken loans for tens of thousands, what should we do now?'

Lin Chunhu said: "Quiet, quiet, quiet, quiet, quiet, everyone, please be quiet and listen to me. I will immediately take the feed and the dead turtles for testing. If there is indeed a problem, I will definitely compensate you. I give you my word."

Lin Chunhu said: "Really." After getting the turtle, Lin Chunhu put it on the table in his office, sat in his office chair with a sense of responsibility, and started to fantasize about the future with the turtle. He imagined the turtle being his lucky charm, bringing him wealth and happiness.
He carefully examined the turtle, turning it over in his hands, admiring it from all angles. After playing with it for a while, he placed it on the table and took out his phone to make a call.
Lin Chunhu picked up the phone and said: 'Meng Ting, I need your help with something.'
Meng Ting said: 'Looking at the test report, the feed's indicators all meet the standards. I think the death of the turtles should not be directly related to the feed.'
Lin Chunhu sighed in relief and said: 'That's a relief. But then, what is the real cause?'

movie101_7089369392055583246_5460_5640.text: Zheng Jin walked over and sat down beside Zheng Taiwu, saying: "Money is but an external possession, as long as our sesame comes home safe, that would be lovely." Zheng Taiwu gave Zheng Jin a look.
Officer Zhang angrily said: "Lawlessness, pure lawlessness!" He then sat down in his chair in frustration.
Zhang Li said: "Can you really blame us? We just wanted to make some money for marriage, who does it hinder? Can't afford a house, the family disagrees, you tell me, what should we do?"

The woman in the red dress said: "Yeah, right now the most troubled ones are us young people. Back then, we missed the welfare housing allocation. When it comes to affordable housing, we are not eligible to buy. Who really takes care of us, I wonder."
Da Xu patted his chest and said: "That's true."
Officer Zhang said: "I'm talking to you, you think watching Korean dramas you're stirring what emotions, take proper notes, see how attentive others are taking them."
Officer Zhang stood up and said: "Why is it you again? What are you doing here?"
Reporter Chen showed his credentials and said: "Hello, I am the reporter from 'The Southern Fast News,' last name Chen, as in the Chen Shimei."
Officer Zhang pointed at Chen Shimei and said: "Chen Shimei, let me tell you, you hit someone yesterday, weren't you satisfied with the mess you caused? Go, go, attend to your duties, out you go!"
Officer Zhang said: "Let me tell you, it really infuriated me."
Another officer said: "Officer Zhang, this man, he's his apprentice, went back to get parts."
Officer Zhang helplessly said: "In that case, I'll recuse myself from this," "you deal with it," "do what needs to be done, follow the regulations."
Officer Zhang said: "Alright, I'll go check it out."
Da Xu was walking along the flowerbed outside the window, with the moonlight casting his lonely silhouette even more desolate.

Zheng Jin was still at the park, stuffing the plastic bag full of money into his coat pocket. Suddenly, he heard a noise from behind, quickly stuffed the bag into his coat pocket, and confirmed that no one was there. He then got up and left.

Zheng Jin, who was originally lying on the other side of the bed, suddenly sat up, then quickly lay back down. After a while, Zheng Taiwu turned over and snuggled up to Zheng Jin. In the dead of night, the couple who had been in a relationship for many years finally made their move.
The scene shifts to the police station, where Zhang Li and his party were interrogating Da Xu. Zhang Li and his party were all present, looking somewhat guilty.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2040_2220.text: Zhang Dong said, "So, can the two of you try to understand each other a bit?"

After finishing, Chun Hu and Meng Ting also followed Bao Liang out.

The next day, Chun Hu and Meng Ting walked on the road, Meng Ting asked, "Do you think the village head will help us solve this?"

Bao Liang laughed and said, "Hmph, you think you can report me? No chance, I’m telling you. Zhang Dong is my cousin, and this election... I’m sure to be the Party Secretary. See what you can do about me.”

After saying that, Bao Liang turned and left, leaving Chun Hu and Meng Ting standing there.

If he becomes the Secretary, what will our lives be like in the future?"
The woman in the black dress said: "At this election, you must definitely run for the Secretary."

The woman in the pink coat said: "The cooperative is trivial; the village is what’s important. If we don’t elect a good Secretary this time, our village is doomed. If this pig farm continues to operate this way, how are we supposed to live? Right?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_300_480.text: The man in the car said, "Sis, come quickly. Save me."
Lu Xiaoxing was about to get up and run when the car behind crashed into her, throwing her onto the windshield. Her brother anxiously said, "Sis, get up quickly." "Please, get up."

Lu Xiaoxing's face was covered with blood, her head resting against the ground. Her hands were bound above her head, and she was unable to move. The car was flipped over on the ground, and the cargo at the back was spilling out. The car body was smoking, and the emergency lights on the cargo truck were flashing.
Lu Xiaoxing was lying on the ground, barely breathing, with a pool of blood beneath her.

Three years later, in the law firm, a large roll of paper is fed into the machine, and the calendar shows August 13th.
The camera switches to Lu Xiaoxing's dog, which is barking at the door and pulling at the curtain.
The next morning, sunlight streamed into the room, illuminating the bed. Lu Xiaoxing was still asleep, and little Q quietly jumped onto the bed, gently nudging Lu Xiaoxing with its nose.
Lu Xiaoxing weakly said, "I got it. I’m waking up." The little dog licked her face. She groggily turned over and saw the phone on the bedside table. She reached out to pick up the phone.
Lu Xiaoxing picked up the phone, which showed an unknown number. She pressed the answer button, and the phone started playing a pre-recorded message, informing the caller that there was no signal.

The weather forecast on TV said, "Today's weather in the city is cloudy to clear," "the highest temperature is 20 degrees," "the lowest temperature is 15 degrees," "suitable for wearing long sleeves."

News anchor: "Recently, the case of female college student Zheng Huiying disappearing at midnight" "has attracted widespread attention on social media" "The police have launched an investigation" "In this era of new media where social networking is common" "various stranger dating apps keep appearing on our phones"
The host continued: "Among them, 'Only Appointments' has rapidly increased its registered users in just three months and has become a leader among many similar products."

She stood in front of the wardrobe, carefully arranging her clothes and shoes. She took out a leather jacket and a pair of leather shoes, then carefully hung them on the wardrobe. The clothes in the wardrobe were all neatly arranged with tags, and the wardrobe itself was very spacious. Lu Xiaoxing carefully selected her clothes.
Lu Xiaoxing picked up the guide dog manual on the table and tucked it into her bag, then put on Little Q's guide dog harness.
She walked to the door, gently touched the guide dog's head, and calmed it down. Then she reached for the door handle, but the door was locked from the inside.

movie101_7235213933035192887_2220_2400.text: The father angrily said: "You were still raised by me." "You're siding with outsiders, eh?" "Your mother has gone on a trip to Hong Kong." "Wait until she comes back to see how she deals with you."

Someone called out to him: "Wang Xiaopo, it's your phone." Wang Xiaopo replied: "Bring it to me."

Wang Xiaopo was tightening screws under the car, and suddenly his phone rang. He showed the phone to Da Xu, who snatched it away. Wang Xiaopo said: "Zhang Li, Zhang Li." Da Xu snatched the phone again, and Wang Xiaopo had no choice but to hand it over.
Wang Xiaopo said: "Oh my, do you think I'm playing? I'm exhausted. And then you nag at me?"

Wang Xiaopo said: "I'm also helping build our new house." Da Xu turned around to repair the car. Suddenly, Wang Xiaopo's phone rang again. Wang Xiaopo said: "Ah, don't scare me, I am scared easily." Wang Xiaopo answered the call and put it to his ear.

movie101_6969128872847770149_4200_4380.text: Zhang Yijun looked around for a way out, and saw a rolling shutter door. She hurriedly ran over, but it was locked. Li Yanming and Jin Taonian ran over too. Zhang Yijun tried to pull down the shutter door, but it was too heavy. Cui Minho and others were getting closer.

Zhang Yijun, with tears in her eyes, stabbed at the person in front of her with a dagger. The latter fell to the ground. Zhang Yijun then ran to the front of a taxi, jumped onto the hood, and lay down.

Zhang Yijun was hit by a car and fell to the ground. The informant Li Yanming and Jin Taonian rushed to check the situation. Seeing Zhang Yijun getting up from the ground, they breathed a sigh of relief.

Li Yanming and Jin Taonian were running desperately on the street. They turned a corner and saw a van parked in an alley. Jin Taonian ran over and kicked the iron gate of the van, and Li Yanming quickly followed. They both got into the van.

Zhang Yijun was still in pain from the impact. She tried to get up but couldn't steady herself. Li Yanming grabbed her arm and pulled her out of the car. Zhang Yijun's arm was twisted behind her back. Li Yanming then pulled her into the back seat of the car. He quickly got in the front seat and started the car, driving through the narrow alley. The car was almost at the entrance of the residential area.

Zhang Yijun and Jin Taonian were knocked to the ground. They quickly got up and ran towards a nearby car. Zhang Yijun was about to open the car door when Jin Taonian pulled her back. He held onto the car door and tried to pull him in. Zhang Yijun struggled to break free and ran towards the back of the car.

Zhang Yijun, who was locked in the cage, tried to break free by biting the netting. Jin Taonian immediately helped her out and locked her in the cage. Zhang Yijun, in pain, bit the netting desperately trying to escape. Jin Taonian, who was nearby, was hit in the head by a flying bottle and fell to the ground.

Li Yanming was pinned down by Zhang Yijun, unable to move. He quickly adjusted his position and grabbed Zhang Yijun's waist, flipping them both to the ground. Zhang Yijun used her legs to lock Li Yanming's neck, trying to control him.

Zhang Yijun and Li Yanming were wrestling on the ground, Zhang Yijun was holding Li Yanming's waist, Li Yanming was trying to turn over, but Zhang Yijun's legs were blocking his way, so he hugged Zhang Yijun's waist and rolled over together, pinning Zhang Yijun underneath.

Zhang Yijun was pinned down by Jin Taonian, unable to move. She struggled desperately, trying to break free from his grip. But Jin Taonian was stronger and pinned her down again. Zhang Yijun kicked at his face, but he quickly grabbed her ankle. Zhang Yijun tried to twist her body to break free, but Jin Taonian held on tight.

Zhang Yijun was pressing down on Li Yanming, using her knee to hold down his arms. At this moment, Li Yanming suddenly grabbed Zhang Yijun's hair and pulled her up. Zhang Yijun struggled to stand up, only to be pushed down again by Li Yanming. At this point, the police arrived and caught everyone.

Li Yanming struggled to get up, and the police immediately aimed their guns at him. He shouted: "Officer Li, keep calm." But the long-haired Zhang Yijun was caught by the police and thrown to the ground.
The police took Li Yanming away, and the policeman said: "Take her back."

At this time, a black Toyota car slowly drove into the parking lot and stopped in front of the police. Jin Taonian, sitting in the passenger seat, stared intently at the group of people walking towards him.

Jin Taonian watched as Zhang Yijun got into the car, the bodyguards closed the car doors on both sides. Zhang Yijun, with a bleeding mouth, sat in the car and looked at Jin Taonian through the rearview mirror. Jin Taonian also stared at her. After a while, Jin Taonian started the car and left. Zhang Yijun watched Jin Taonian leave from the rearview mirror.
The scene shifts to a bustling night market. Cui Minho is eating hot pot at a stall, sipping on a glass of cold beer. He looks troubled, his brow furrowed and his eyes filled with worry.
Cui Minho said: "Shen Meijing," "since we left the temple," "you've been telling us to turn off our phones."

movie101_7235213933035192887_2400_2580.text: Zhang Xi said: "We know what's going on, right?"
Lin Genxing said with a smile: "We got it."
Zhang Xi said, "Alright, I have some business to attend to, so I'll leave now." Lin Genxing watched Zhang Xi leave, then looked at the medicine on the table and fell into thought.
Lin Genxing took out a can of liquor from the box, and Father of Genxing grabbed his hand and said, "Return this item to the sender."
Lin Genxing said, "This isn't very appropriate. How can we return it after we've opened it?"

Father of Genxing said, "Lin Genxing, you really are a fool. How dare you accept something from their family? Accepting their gift means you owe them a vote. Do you even know what kind of people their family are? As for Zhang Dong, who's the village chief now, since he took office, has he ever done anything for the village? I'm telling you, son, I've lived a long life and I know better. If you want a better future for the village, we need a good leader. I think Chun Hu is a good choice. In tomorrow's election, I'm definitely voting for him."

Lin Genxing said, "You want to vote for him, that’s up to you. Anyway, no one knows who you vote for. Besides, we’ve already accepted the gift. Refusing it would offend them, so we might as well take it."
Father of Genxing said: "Buy an identical one and give it back to them."
Lin Genxing rushed out of the door, looked at the money in his hand, and said to himself, "Only a fool would return it."
Ma Mei was sweeping the yard when she saw her husband coming back with gifts. She said: "Wow, hubby, you’ve done well today. Let me see what you got."
San'er replied: "Of course, the village chief is generous, isn’t he?"
The woman said: "So, according to you, the village chief might be re-elected in this term."
The man pointed at her and said, "Not necessarily."

Zhang Baoliang said, "Think about it, we accepted the gift." "But in the end, who gets our vote is up to us." "It’s a secret ballot; only we know who we voted for." "I think Zhang Dong might end up with nothing."
The female villager asked, "Then who do you think in our village will get elected? Who are you planning to vote for, hubby?"
Lin Genxing said: "I'll vote, but I won't tell you." After saying that, he went into the house and closed the door.

Zhang Baoliang placed the dishes on the table and said: "Son, come quickly, it's time to eat! Today, we have pork trotters, pork stomach, pork ears, and pork intestines—all your favorites! Just smelling and looking at it makes your mouth water. Come quickly!"

movie101_7010686199291445773_3360_3540.text: Xiao Xing said, "Stop, stop, stop!"
Chen Mo said, "But it's worth him dying this way," "because he died in the arms of his sister."
Xiao Xing angrily said, "Shut up."
Xiao Xing, in a panic, scratched the draft paper on the table, and said, "You read my diary"
Lu Li said, "It's easy to buy a Braille reader"
Lu Li said with a chuckle, "To be honest, I really like your diary."
Xiao Xing asked, 'What do you want to get from me'
Chen Mo said into the phone: "Wait a little longer, you will understand me more."
Xiao Xing angrily said, "What exactly do you want". After hanging up the phone, Xiao Xing furrowed her brows, looking very upset.

Lu Li looked around the entrance for a while and said, "Yulu disappeared here before she disappeared," "The camera also captured her getting into the Golf 6," "I've checked the license plate," "It's fake."
Lu Li took a drag of his cigarette and said, "He hit Zheng Huiying," "Ding Peipei's car is also a Golf," "The license plate is also fake."
Xiao Xing picked up the dog leash from the table and called out, 'Cong Cong.'
Xiao Xing shouted, 'Cong Cong!' Cong Cong ran over.
Xiao Xing crouched down and called out, 'Cong Cong.'

The next day, Lin Chong was packing his luggage at the hospital, preparing to return home for the competition. He said while packing, 'There won't be many days before the competition, I have to hurry up and practice.'
Lin Chong put on a woolen hat while saying, "Then what if I get injured again"
Lin Chong said, 'Brother is an indestructible body, don't worry, give me the power bank.'

The scene shifts to Lin Chong who received a message from Xiao Xing. He unlocked his phone and opened the chat page, filled with messages from Xiao Xing. Lin Chong read, 'I really can't give up Cong Cong.'
Xiao Xing came out of the ward and saw Lin Chong packing. Xiao Xing asked anxiously, 'Lin Chong, where are you'
Lin Chong looked back and said, 'She's looking for you.'
Xiao Xing shouted, 'Lin Chong!'
Xiao Xing walked in and stopped Lin Chong, saying, "Lin Chong".
"He Zhi": "Hey, he's here."
Lin Chong asked: "Where?"
Xiao Xing pushed Lin Chong away, saying: "Get out of the way"
Xiao Xing grabbed Lin Chong and said, "Lin Chong, listen to me first"
Lin Chong grabbed Xiao Xing's hand and said, "What on earth do you want"
Xiao Xing grabbed Lin Chong and said, "Can you wait for Lu Li to come before leaving?"
Lin Chong questioned, "Why should I wait for him"
Xiao Xing said, "That offending driver has already targeted you. It's very likely that he was the one who hit you. Can you listen to me?"
Lin Chong: "Why should I believe you?" "You should take care of yourself first." "And," "I don't have a sister like you."
Lin Chong said, 'Let go.' Xiao Xing tugged at the backpack strap, trying to take the bag away.

Xiao Xing called out to Lin Chong again, but Lin Chong ignored her and walked away. Xiao Xing stood still, holding Cong Cong's leash, watching Lin Chong's departing figure. At this moment, Jingkuang appeared in the corridor, secretly observing Xiao Xing and Cong Cong.
The man in the red shirt said: "Didn't get the bonus" "Almost lost your life" "You might as well find a job on 58 like us."
A passerby said, "Hey, isn't that the woman from just now?"
The bus arrived, and Cong Cong obediently went into the car. Lin Chong sat on the bench, looking dazedly at the bus that had taken Cong Cong away from him.

The bus stopped at the station, and Lin Chong got up to look at the bus. The bus slowly started, and Lin Chong hurriedly ran after it. The bus driver saw Lin Chong and quickly drove away, leaving Lin Chong anxiously watching the bus leave.

movie101_7101937153785102885_1140_1320.text: The scene shifts to a library, where Yuan Xiaoou is carefully selecting books. He watches a girl sitting on the sofa reading intently, as if he is fixated, unable to take his eyes off her.

The scene shifts to the second floor of the library, where Liu Chong is cleaning the shelves. He sees A-Feng reading a book on the sofa and playfully takes the book from her hands, then picks up little Q and hugs it to his chest.
Yuan Xiaoou, who has been secretly hiding in the library, suddenly sees Qi Jia in front of him and quickly hides again.

The next day, Yuan Xiaoou was reading a book by the window when Qi Jia suddenly opened their eyes. Yuan Xiaoou turned around and saw Qi Jia, sitting on the bed with a dazed look, and said, 'You’re awake.'
Yuan Xiaoou struggled to stand up and Qi Jia said, "You've been crying."
Yuan Xiaoou rubbed his eyes and said, "Ah, no," "You must be thirsty," "Let me get you some water."

Yuan Xiaoou, who was tidying up the books on the shelf, went out without looking back. Qi Jia, who was behind him, leaned against the doorframe, slowly stood up, and looked at the room with a heavy heart.
Yuan Xiaoou asked, 'What's wrong?' 'Stomach ache?' 'Here, take this,' 'I’ll get you some medicine.'
Qi Jia quickly refused: "No need, no need, it will pass after a while." Qi Jia took the cup of water from Yuan Xiaoou and walked aside to drink it.
Qi Jia, with a comb in hand, suddenly froze upon hearing this. After a moment, she smiled and asked, 'What did you dream about?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I" "Dreamed about the silly things I did on graduation day."
Qi Jia said: "What you did can hardly be called silly." "What I did was truly foolish."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Well, it's all in the past now. Let's look forward. Alright?"
Qi Jia said: “I can’t forget it.” “As soon as I sober up, it all comes rushing back.” “Didn’t someone say that unconditional love is the most powerful voice in this world?”

Yuan Xiaoou said: "You must have seen that on social media." "What is unconditional love?" "That’s just a weak awareness of security leading to high bad assets." "Balanced give and take, that’s love." "You gave too much, do you understand?"
Qi Jia said: 'There’s such a thing as giving too much love? I just want simple happiness, but why?'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Who doesn’t want that? It’s just that you chose the wrong person."
Qi Jia, with tears in her eyes, looked at Yuan Xiaoou, then lowered her head and said, “I should have left with him earlier.”

Qi Jia pushed Yuan Xiaoou away and walked to the dining table to sit down. Yuan Xiaoou followed and said: 'You two are like two ships sailing in opposite directions, yet you insist on tying them together. That only leads to going in circles.'
Qi Jia put down the bag and said: "I'm willing. I'm willing to go wherever he goes."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "You don't mind eating a hundred beans for the stench, do you? You’re already perimenopausal and still haven’t let this go."
Qi Jia, with a cold and angry voice, said: 'Get out, and close the door on your way out.'

movie101_6969128872847770149_420_600.text: Cui Minho said, "Park Yuzhe, if we wait any longer, we won't make it."
Park Yuzhe turned his head and looked at Cui Minho with a smile, "Give him five more minutes."

Cui Minho, holding a glass of wine, walked briskly towards the banquet hall. He bypassed the seated guests and headed straight for the bride, who was having her makeup done. He took the bride's hand and led her to a seat.
Cui Minho approached the grandmother and said, "It's time. Can we start the banquet?"
Grandmother said, "We can start now."
Grandmother asked, "Where did Daddy go?"
The mother hurriedly took Ming Jian back to her side. Cui Minho stood aside, looking at his phone, while Yun Hee-sun was also busy with her phone. Only Ming Jian was left alone with Grandmother.
Yun Hee-sun: "Husband, it's starting, go in quickly."
Cui Minho said, "Let's go, let's go."

The guests below the stage were also very excited, applauding and expressing their joy. Yun Hee-sun and Cui Minho were also very happy, smiling at everyone. Then, Cui Minho handed Ming Jian to Yun Hee-sun.

The two of them laughed and lifted Ming Jian up. The guests applauded and cheered. At that moment, a group of people entered from outside the venue. They were all well-dressed and walked with a sense of purpose. The two looked at them with curiosity. The group made their way to the center of the hall and then stopped.

At this moment, two bodyguards escorted Park Yuzhe to the stage. Cui Minho was holding Ming Jian, and Grandmother took the child from his hands and kissed him. Park Yuzhe watched the scene and said, "Team Leader."
Yun Hee-sun looked at Park Yuzhe and said, "Didn't we agree on tomorrow morning?"
Park Yuzhe apologized, "Sorry, Mrs. Cui Minho," "the timing is tighter than we imagined."
Yun Hee-sun said: "You weren't invited to this banquet, you came uninvited. Do you understand manners?"
Cui Minho: "Wife"
Cui Minho said, "Sorry," "Wait for me outside."
Cui Minho kissed his mother's cheek and left. Yun Hee-sun stood still, watching Cui Minho's departing figure. She seemed to be waiting for something else, but didn't know what it was.
Cui Minho called out, "Wife," and Yun Hee-sun turned around.

Yun Hee-sun, looking at Cui Minho, said, "Before we got married, I already knew everything you sacrificed for the country." Yun Hee-sun placed a package in Cui Minho's hand and continued, "I was going to give this to you tomorrow." "Remember to buy it back." "Don't worry about us."
Cui Minho, holding Yun Hee-sun's hand, said: "Ming Jian, I leave him to you."

The next day, the city of Hong Kong was shrouded in dense fog, with very low visibility. Fire trucks and police cars were quickly parked at the disaster relief site. Firefighters equipped with protective gear were rushing to the scene.

movie101_7235213933035192887_240_420.text: Suihuayi Yuan Cun Nan said: "The old village secretary of our village was admitted to the hospital these past few days."
Lin Chunhu asked: "What illness?"
Suihuayi Yuan Cun Nan said: "His high blood pressure acted up again." "Given his health," "I reckon he won't be able to carry on much longer, right?"
Suihuayi Yuan Cun Nan said: "Yes, yes, yes."
Zhang Dong flipped through the book and said, 'That's all.'

The man in black continued, "There’s also this Lin Chunhu, who has established a turtle farming cooperative in Tea Flower Village. I heard that over 80 households have joined. They even offer free technical support, promise to buy the products centrally, and help with finding customers to integrate into the domestic market."
Zhang Dong put down the contract and said, "Buying people's hearts, huh? Alright then, this time elder brother brought back some gifts, let’s hand them out to everyone."
The man took the phone and exclaimed, 'Wow, a gold one!' The scene shifts to a picturesque lake, with a small island in the middle and clouds rolling in from afar.
Lin Chunhu said, 'In a few days, we must change the water in this pond, the turtles are getting ready to hibernate, and the water quality must be kept clean.'
Zhu Da Pao said, 'Alright, alright.'
Gen Xing ran out shouting, 'Lin Chunhu, Lin Chunhu ah, there's going to be a disaster, someone's going to die.'
Lin Chunhu said, 'Don't panic, speak slowly.'

The man in the blue sweater said, 'Gen Xing's mother is threatening to jump off a building, the village head and secretary are not at home, you have to go have a look, I can only turn to you now, hurry!'
Lin Chunhu said: "Alright, let's go quickly."
Gen Xing looked up and said, 'Mom, please come down.'
Lin Chunhu said, "Gen Xing’s mom, come down quickly, we can talk this through. Come on, everybody, help get some straw to cushion the ground, Gen Xing’s mom."
Gen Xing said, 'Mom, please come down.'
The camera switches to the villagers' courtyard, where everyone is busy gathering straw. Everyone is looking up, praying earnestly to the sky.
Gen Xing knelt on the ground, crying and saying, 'Mom, please come down.' 'If anything happened to you,' 'what would happen to my brother and me?' 'Mom, please come down.'
A woman shouted, 'That’s right, let's talk it out, please come down quickly.'
Gen Xing's mom said, 'I just want everyone to see how I am being driven to death by you two unfilial sons.'
Lin Chunhu shouted, "Be careful! Careful! Where’s Gen Xing's dad?"
Gen Xing said, "My brother went to pick him up in the car."
Lin Chunhu said, 'Be careful, Gen Xing's mom, please come down!' 'Come down, come down!'

Genxing's Dad shouted, "Old lady, you better come down right this moment!" "What are you doing?" "If you die, what am I going to do?" "If you're gone, I won’t want to live either." "I’m telling you, I’ll go back and drink pesticide right now, and we can simply die together."
Gen Xing's mom, unable to contain her sorrow, cried out loudly, 'Mom, please come down.'
Lin Chunhu said, "Gen Xing's Dad, Gen Xing's mom, both of you, don't be anxious. If there's any grievance, tell me, I’ll help you solve it."
Gen Xing's Dad said, 'Lin Chunhu ah, the old lady and I, we’ve lived our whole lives together, but now that we are old, we have to live separately. What’s the point in that, tell me?'
Lin Chunhu pointed at the two and said, "Gen Wang, Gen Xing, what’s going on here?"

movie101_7101937153785102885_1320_1500.text: Qi Jia, who was sitting on the floor, quickly got up and closed the door. Just as she was about to leave, Yuan Xiaoou came out holding a magazine.
Yuan Xiaoou: "Look at this, look at what you used to be, look at what you've done to yourself now," "What’s the big deal? It's just premature aging, if we're sick we take medicine, that's all."
Doctor said: "Don’t worry," "I will definitely cure you."
Qi Jia picked up the photo from the ground, looked at it carefully, and then stood up.

Qi Jia, looking at the photo, said: "I dare not look at this photo because I can clearly see that fate has drawn different paths for us," "Four years have passed, I'm still standing still, while he has never looked back."

Qi Jia leaned against the door, breathing heavily. She looked at the tall building in front of her, which was the hospital where Yuan Xiaoou worked. She had made up her mind to find Yuan Xiaoou and get a satisfactory answer.

Doctor: "Nowadays life is fast-paced and stressful" "Which really can cause some women" "To experience premature aging of their bodily functions" "Just like your friend" "Look, she is panic-stricken" "Irritated" "Hypersensitive" "Violent tendencies" "Agitated" "And her skin is becoming slack"
Yuan Xiaoou: "Doctor," "We already know all this; what we want now is to see if there is any way you can help her revert to her younger self."
Doctor: "Sure." "How about time travel then."
Lin Shuer pleaded: "Doctor," "please help her," "she's only twenty-six and doesn't even have a boyfriend yet."
Doctor: "Not having a new life" "is also a main reason for premature aging."
Lin Shuer: "So, please guide us on what kind of medication we should give her."
Doctor: "Medication is necessary." "But what's important is to combine it with life's rhythm," "exercise," "and, you know, romance."
Lin Shuer said: "Romance."
Doctor: "This comrade seems to be in good health, right?" "You could very well complete this mission for her with your own physical effort."
Yuan Xiaoou looked at Doctor and said: "What are you talking about?"
Doctor: "Don't be agitated" "It's only those who can’t do it that avoid this topic."
Lin Shuer: "Yuan Xiaoou, what are you doing?" "Let’s go."
Lin Shuer: "Why do you have to be so annoying?"
Lin Shuer said to Yuan Xiaoou: "Hurry up." "I'm sorry."

Doctor shouted: "Neurotic! Next one." At this moment, Yuan Xiaoou pushed the door open and walked in. Doctor looked up and saw Yuan Xiaoou, immediately grabbed a small cactus by the door and pretended to be busy.
The scene shifts to the rooftop, where Lin Shuer is pouring a drink and muttering to herself: "Have you actually come up with a solution?"
Yuan Xiaoou: "Just as Doctor said," "let her take some medicine," "get some exercise."
Lin Shuer: "That's nonsense." "Don't skirt around the issue."
Yuan Xiaoou: "How about you come back and keep her company for a while?"
Lin Shuer: "How can I live in that tiny place when I go back?"
Yuan Xiaoou: "Didn’t you live there just fine before?"
Lin Shuer: "I can’t be bothered to argue with you."

movie101_6969128872847770149_4380_4560.text: Cui Minho said, 'We've been walking around all day. What's going on inside?' Shen Meijing lowered her head after hearing this.

Shen Meijing said: 'Our DC8 has already alerted half the underground intelligence world in the UK, US, China, and the Middle East. Because the weapons were seized, he said that at least three groups would carry out terrorist attacks in Hong Kong unless we turn over the police officer who killed the Middle Eastern buyer the night before. He will then tell us where the Equator is.'
Park Yuzhe said: "That's simple. Explain it clearly to Officer Fan. What's the issue with trading Officer Fan for information?"
Cui Minho asked in disbelief: 'You're saying to betray a Hong Kong police officer, to trade Officer Fan for uncertain intel?'

After Shen Meijing finished speaking, she looked at Park Yuzhe. Park Yuzhe glanced at her, then turned his head to the side and took a deep breath. Cui Minho watched the two of them, feeling uneasy, and then picked up his glass and drank it in one go.
Park Yuzhe said: "Officer Fan is also a police officer. A cop's duty is to sacrifice themselves for the nation if needed. Were I in his position, I would also consider doing the same at all costs."
Cui Minho said: 'This isn't a matter of life for life; it's about trust, integrity. How is what you're suggesting any different from what those criminals would do?'
Cui Minho looked at Park Yuzhe, then at Shen Meijing. The three of them raised their glasses and drank. After finishing, Shen Meijing grabbed Cui Minho's hand.

Park Yuzhe said: 'If sacrificing one person can save many lives, don't you think it's worth it? Director, didn't you say we must retrieve the weapons even if it means using force? I've already mobilized many people. Why are you hesitating now?'

Cui Minho said: "I told you to prepare just in case!" Park Yuzhe stood up, looked at Shen Meijing, and then put his hands in his pockets, turning to walk away. Shen Meijing looked up at Park Yuzhe, then lowered her head to look at Cui Minho, who avoided her gaze and turned his head.
Park Yuzhe said angrily: 'If that informant is reliable, the Equator passed right by us. Can we face the generals with this? How can you live with yourself?'

Shen Meijing said, "Wait a moment." "Can I say something?" "Director Cui Minho, your decision is very immature." After saying this, Shen Meijing turned to look at Park Yuzhe, and Cui Minho turned his head away, not looking at her.
At this moment, Fan Jiaming drove up in a car. He got out of the car and approached the two.

Fan Jiaming said: "Please, keep your phones on, and quickly put on your simultaneous translators." He then took out a translator from his pocket and put it on Shen Meijing, saying: "Your weapons have been compromised." Fan Jiaming then said to everyone: "Everyone return to the intelligence center now."
Jin Tao Nian, carrying a guitar, followed behind them. After a while, he took out his phone and made a call, saying, "The Chinese weapon expert will arrive within thirty minutes."

movie101_7010686199291445773_3540_3720.text: Lin Chong was so angry that he clenched his fists and then let out a loud shout, attracting the attention of passersby. He ran towards the van, shouting, 'Lin Chong, Lin Chong!'
Lin Chong ran to the bus stop, desperately trying to catch the bus. The bus arrived, and Lin Chong got on without hesitation, only to find that the bus was empty. He was overjoyed and danced for joy.
The bus driver started the vehicle, and the bus headed towards the destination. Xiao Xing sat in the second row, holding Cong Cong (Animal) in her lap. Her phone rang, and she answered, 'Hello.'
Lin Chong said: "Don't say anything, just listen to me."
Xiao Xing said tearfully: "Lin Chong."
Lin Chong, agitated, said: "Didn't I tell you to just listen? Do you have headphones?"
Xiao Xing replied: "Yes."
Lin Chong said urgently: "Quick, plug them in. We need to have a video call."
Xiao Xing asked, puzzled: "What's going on?"
Lin Chong, while listening to music, said: "Do as I say."
Xiao Xing hung up the phone with a heavy heart, and the two vehicles drove in opposite directions on the road.

Lin Chong said anxiously: "Listen to me, that guy got on the bus with you. Use your phone to take a photo of your surroundings. Wait, take a photo of your left side. That guy is sitting to your left. There's no one else on the bus, ask the driver to stop."
Xiao Xing obediently said: "Cong Cong (Animal)!" Cong Cong (Animal) obediently ran to Xiao Xing's side.

At this moment, Lin Chong was still on the way home by bus. The bus sped along the road, and Lin Chong suddenly realized that he had missed his stop. He shouted anxiously: "Driver, stop the bus, open the door!" The bus came to a halt, and Lin Chong got off at the stop.

Lin Chong got off the bus, and Xiao Xing, who was listening to music on the bus, heard Lin Chong's voice and immediately stood up. Lin Chong said, "I got off the bus, I'm hurrying to you, go find the driver!"
Tang Zheng held a scalpel to Xiao Xing's back and said, "Don't say anything."
Tang Zheng asked, "What's wrong?"
Tang Zheng said, "Get off at the next stop."
Lin Chong was rollerblading on the road and saw Xiao Xing on the bus. He quickly pulled out his phone and called Xiao Xing, saying, 'Hey, answer me quickly,' 'Speak up!'
The bus arrived at its stop. Xiao Xing and Cong Cong (Animal) boarded the bus. The bus stopped, and the doors opened. Xiao Xing said to the person next to her: "Don't you dare hang up the phone."
Lin Chong apologized and said, "Excuse me, may I borrow your phone?"
