Zhang Dong's Younger Brother said, 'I wasn't stalking him. I just saw it by chance.'
Lu Chunhu said, "That's quite a coincidence, isn't it?"
Zhang Dong's Younger Brother said, 'It was just a coincidence that I saw him give He Dame the turtle. If I hadn't seen it, who knows how many others he might have given turtles to.'
Zhang Xi said, 'Alright, whether it's a coincidence or not, the facts are right here.' 'Mayor Yang, if a candidate is really bribing voters...'

movie101_7101937153785102885_1680_1860.text: Yuan Xiaoou said: "How is it impossible?"
Qi Jia: "Unless I die tomorrow" "You know I'm going to die tomorrow"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "What nonsense are you talking about?" "Starting tomorrow, you must change your lifestyle and schedule," "and your life goals."

Yuan Xiaoou said: "Alright, here it comes." "Thank you, thank you." Yuan Xiaoou quickly grabbed a few sausages for Qi Jia, who was drinking, and then stuffed the sausages into Qi Jia's mouth one by one.
Qi Jia stood up, ate a bite of skewer, and said: "Super spicy!" "Waiter"
Yuan Xiaoou looked towards the door and shouted, "Waiter!"
Qi Jia turned his head and said: "I'll wait for you."
Yuan Xiaoou asked: "What now?"
Qi Jia stood up and said: "I ordered super spicy, what is this?"
Yuan Xiaoou stood up and said: "This is super spicy"
Qi Jia pointed at the menu and said, "Show me" "Where, where is it super spicy?"
Waiter said: "I think it's super spicy everywhere"
Yuan Xiaoou said to Qi Jia: "Don't take him seriously, don't take him seriously."
Qi Jia stood up and threw the chopsticks on the table, Yuan Xiaoou wanted to hold her back, but Qi Jia shook off his hand and said: "Who did you call a freak" "Let go"
Qi Jia pointed at Yuan Xiaoou and said: "Who did you call super spicy? Who did you call super spicy, huh?"
Waiter: "Just saying that you're the super spicy one."
Qi Jia asked: "Who did you call super spicy?"
Waiter cursed: "Old pervert"
Qi Jia, struggling, said: "How am I a freak?"
Yuan Xiaoou said while running: "Old freak, you're a freak."
Qi Jia, while pulling Yuan Xiaoou, said: "Who's the freak now?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Get in quickly" "Stop messing around" "Go, go"
Qi Jia got out of the car and shouted: "Yuan Xiaoou"
Yuan Xiaoou walked into the restaurant and said to Qi Jia: "We eat, sleep, and play games, and there are two of us."
Yuan Xiaoou walked up the steps, with the burly man in the black vest closely following behind and saying, "Keep up, don't fall behind."
Waiter, who was just about to go out, froze and walked towards Qi Jia saying, "Bro"
The burly men followed closely behind and said, "Sit here."
Yuan Xiaoou grabbed Waiter and said: "Do you know who I am?" "Do you know what I do?" "Why is your mouth so reckless?"
Waiter said: "Big brother."
Yuan Xiaoou quickly stopped him and said: "Keep your voice down, keep your voice down, my brothers might really beat you."
Waiter said: "Bro, I'm sorry to the sister-in-law, my mouth is reckless, reckless."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Know that's your sister-in-law, huh?" "Next time you see her, be more polite, with a smile, understood?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "I'll help you."
Yuan Xiaoou pointed at Waiter and said: "Do squats, a thousand," "Do them now," "Quickly."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Count them yourself."
Yuan Xiaoou patted his head and said: "One."
Yuan Xiaoou stood up and said: "I'm going to the bathroom" "I'm telling you, my brothers are all watching."
Yuan Xiaoou turned back and said: "Three"

Yuan Xiaoou, who was squatting at the entrance of the noodle shop, saw this scene and quickly walked over. He squatted down and helped Qi Jia up. Qi Jia, who was lying on the ground, was in a lot of pain.
Yuan Xiaoou, who was squatting on the ground, quickly helped Qi Jia up and said: "Oh my god" "You scared me to death" "Um".
Qi Jia asked: "Where to"
The scene shifts to the night when Qi Jia was found. Yuan Xiaoou was carrying Qi Jia and asked, "Where are you going?" After putting Qi Jia down, Yuan Xiaoou arrived at the agreed location.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5100_5280.text: Zhao Zhiren smiled and patted Li Yanming's shoulder, then left. Li Yanming stood there, watching him go.
Zhang Yijun was shoved into the car by Zhao Zhiren's men, she sat blankly in the car, when Li Yanming suddenly placed his hand on the steering wheel, blocking her view.
Li Yanming: "Stay calm. If you try anything funny, I'll be the first to shoot you dead."

After speaking, Zhao Zhiren closed the car door and drove away, leaving Zhang Yijun alone in the car. The police car behind also slowly drove away, leaving only the prison van and the police car in the tunnel.

The police car was driving on the road, the sirens blaring, followed closely by the transport vehicle carrying the hostages. Inside the transport vehicle, the bodyguards held guns, and Yuan Xiaowen sat expressionless in the front row.
The scene shifts to the tunnel, where the convoy is moving smoothly. The tunnel is dimly lit, with the headlights of the vehicles casting long shadows.

The well-trained Jin Taonian on the vehicle returns fire, but the enemies on the overpass have already set up a machine gun on the roof, and the gunfire is so intense that it covers the entire width of the bridge. The vehicle's windows are shattered, and the passengers inside are thrown around by the powerful shockwaves.
The mercenaries on the overpass were still on guard, with police cars and fire trucks parked nearby.

Jin Taonian, who had been hiding in the plane, saw Yuan Xiaowen through the glass. Yuan Xiaowen, who was being held at gunpoint by Jin Taonian, had her hair disheveled and looked extremely frightened.
The police car's lights were flashing as it slowly drove away. The Macau Tower glowed brilliantly at night, standing out as a landmark.

At night, a car sped along the road. The driver was Li Yanming. He turned into a small road beside a large building. The interior of the building was dimly lit, with a large window overlooking the night scene.
Jin Taonian: "Saad?" "Saad, I brought them here"
Shen Meijing: "Saad" Shen Meijing walked towards the balcony, but was stopped by Fan Jiaming.
Fan Jiaming, who was beside her, saw her state and then turned away, rubbing his head.
On the highway, a man was driving a sedan at high speed. Inside the car, Zhang Yijun stared out the window, while Li Yanming kept his head down, silent. The car sped across the bridge.

The scene shifts to the street, where a woman is driving a car, closely following the vehicle in front, which happens to be Li Yanming's group. As the two cars get closer to each other, Li Yanming's group suddenly raises their submachine gun and fires at the woman's car, but the woman remains unfazed and continues to drive forward.

The scene switches to the street, where Li Yanming is driving with Zhao Zhiren and Zhang Yijun. The three of them are sitting in the car, and Li Yanming is in the driver's seat. Suddenly, Li Yanming's earpiece emits a voice: "Speak."
The man on the other end of the line said: "Change the location" "Wan Chai" "Shek Tong Tsui" "Sanxiang Building."
Li Yanming picked up the walkie-talkie and said: "Everyone listen, the location has changed. Wan Chai, Shek Tong Tsui, Sanxiang Building."

Li Yanming and his group were driving in the car, with Zhang Yijun in the front passenger seat. The car sped through the streets, and Zhang Yijun kept a sharp lookout for the rear of the car. Suddenly, Zhang Yijun slammed on the brakes, and the car came to an abrupt halt.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4080_4260.text: Jingkuang: "A high nose bridge"
Shandong Soldier's colleague said: "Okay, I've noted it down."
On the other end of the phone: "Yes, a high nose bridge."
The soldier replied: "Got it."
Shandong Soldier handed over a report: "Lu Li, no other bloodstains were found in the mall."
Lin Chong: "Single eyelids."
The police asked: "Any other distinguishing features?"
Lin Chong turned to Lu Li and said: "There's a deep sense of fatigue at the corners of the eyes."
Lin Chong turned to the policeman and said: "Good, anything else?"
Lin Chong turned around and said: "But when he glares, he looks as terrifying as a wild beast."
Lin Chong pointed at the sketch and said: "Terrifying as a wild beast."
Lin Chong pointed and said: "He"
Lin Chong pointed at the sketch and thought for a while, then touched his head in frustration. Lu Li patted his back and said: "Don't rush."
Lu Li comforted: "If you can't remember everything, it's alright," "Just do your best."
Lin Chong said: "No, I must catch the criminal," Lin Chong looked at Lu Li with a determined look, Lu Li frowned and looked at Lin Chong.
Lu Li walked while crying, saying: "Officer Shandong."
Shandong Soldier: "Oh."
Lu Li said while walking: "Go and check the mall's surveillance again."
Shandong Soldier: "Roger that."
Lu Li said while walking: "Luo Tao," "check the distribution channels of Propofol."
Lu Li said while walking: "Jingkuang, you investigate the criminal suspect's 'Zhiyue' account," "and everyone else," "conduct a search on all Golf 6s in the city."
The soldier holding the gun shouted, "Move out!"

Lu Li frowned, and Lin Chong suddenly realized that the sketch on the wall was of Lu Li. He quickly turned around and looked at the sketch in surprise, which showed the various facial features of Lu Li.

He recalled the article he had written before, and after thinking for a moment, he deleted the previously written content and rewrote a new article. The article stated that the so-called 'sexual assault' was actually a false accusation by the victim, and the so-called 'innocent victim' was actually a 'criminal'.
The scene shifts to Lu Li, who is sitting in front of a computer, furiously typing on the keyboard. He suddenly hears a knock on the door and turns to look at the door.

Jingkuang walked in and said: "I found the IDs the guy used to contact Zheng Huiying and Yu Lu on his mobile phone – one called 'Tears of the Stars Above,' another called 'Withered Roses on the Ground.' What kind of IDs are these? 'Tears of the Stars Above,' 'Withered Roses on the Ground,' what's this all about?"
Lin Chong said: "Wait a minute," and then pulled out his phone and pressed a few buttons, finding the person who posted the information.
Lin Chong pulled out his phone and said: "Look at this," "Lu Li," "The wind was blowing on the roses," "The wind was blowing on the roses."
Lu Li took the phone and found that the song playing was called 'Pole Star'.
Lu Li: "This guy," "all the IDs come from this song," "which means that if that bastard shows up again," "his ID will emerge from the lyrics of this song," "got it?"
Shandong Soldier: "Got it."
Lu Li smiled and said: "Not bad at all." He then playfully punched Lin Chong, who was looking at his phone, and walked out of the room with his son.

Lin Chong said: "That guy is definitely doomed, he won't escape Lu Li's grasp, I've found a decisive clue. That guy's IDs all come from a song I like. Who’d have thought this guy actually likes our Brother Cong’s songs. Oh right, today there's also a memorial concert by Brother Cong. The songs from his band are just too good."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Zhang Xi asked: "How should we deal with this?"
Town Mayor said: "If this really happened, we will investigate thoroughly."
Zhang Xi said: "Okay, so is Lin Chunhu's election today invalid?"
Town Mayor said, "Decisions can only be made after investigation," "This matter has not been fully investigated yet, has it?"
A man holding a photo said: "Come on, everyone come have a look," "Someone rigged the election, come see."

Zhang Xi continued to the crowd: "The president of the tortoise farming cooperative in Camellia Village, Lin Chunhu, during the election period, delivered two tortoises to our village's old party member Aunt He, in order to gain an extra vote in the election."
Genxing's Dad said: "How can offering a tortoise be bribery?"

Zhang Xi continued to explain to the villagers: "During the election period, whatever is offered is considered bribery, "as per the legal regulation" the team leader of the village organization term ends in six months"to the end of the community election"under the pretext of helping and condoling"indirectly giving things to voters" is also considered bribery."
Genxing's Dad said to Zhang Xi: "I tell you Zhang Xi, how could you be so heartless, Lin Chunhu is doing good deeds and you label it as bribery, there's no such thing!"
The crowd echoed: "Yeah, yeah, way too much."
Zhang Xi asked: "Genxing's Dad why are you so upset, could it be, that you also benefitted from Lin Chunhu?"
Genxing's Dad angrily tore down the village committee's announcement and said: "This is outrageous!"
A villager said: "How can you speak like that?" "Enough, let's go." The crowd dispersed.
The scene shifts to an office, where Town Mayor is serving water to Lin Chunhu, who says: "Tea break."
Lin Chunhu accepted the water and said: "Thank you, mayor."
Town Mayor sat down and asked: "Lin Chunhu, I want to ask you, did you or did you not give Aunt He the tortoises?"
Lin Chunhu answered: "Yes."
Town Mayor asked again: "Do you know Aunt He is a party member?"
Lin Chunhu said excitedly: "I know she is a party member!"
Town Mayor asked, "When did this happen?"
Lin Chunhu thought for a moment and said: "The 6th," "the day before the village's party organization's community election notice was issued."
Town Mayor asked: "Then when you gave her the tortoise, did you hint about the election?"
Lin Chunhu shook his head and said, "No."
Town Mayor asked: "Then why did you give him the tortoise?"

Lin Chunhu explained: "I had no motive, I just heard Aunt He was not in good health recently, and she was all by herself, so I felt sorry for her. I sent a home-raised tortoise, just to give her some strength."

Lin Chunhu said: "I was born in Camellia Village and grew in Camellia Village." "I always want to do more for the villagers of Camellia Village." "I won't say anything else." "I, Lin Chunhu, have a clear conscience."

At this moment, the village head's assistant came in and said: "Mayor Yang, please come out, two old men insisted to see you." Town Mayor followed him out of the village committee building, and ran into the village chief and another villager.

Genxing's Dad said to Town Mayor: "Hello Mayor Yang, Mayor Yang, you cannot just listen to the Zhang brothers." "Lin Chunhu is unjustly defamed." "Thirty of our village elders co-signed to vouch for him." "Here is the joint guarantee letter," "Mayor Yang, take a look."
Genxing's Dad replied, "Their names are all here. Actually, every New Year and holiday, all the elders over seventy in our village receive a consolation gift from Lin Chunhu."
The old lady continued, "Whenever the poor and lonely elderly in our village fall sick, he is always the first to front up their medical expenses."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5280_5460.text: Li Yanming, who was in the car, said into the walkie-talkie: "Overtake them, Weiye, catch up quickly." After saying this, Li Yanming floored the gas pedal. Zhang Yijun, who was in the car, kept his eyes on the road ahead, while Li Yanming drove the car out of the alley.

The car sped forward, and Li Yanming, sitting in the passenger seat, held a walkie-talkie and communicated with the team members. The BMW made a sharp turn and entered the parking lot, where two team members were waiting. The car slowly stopped, and Li Yanming and the co-driver exited the vehicle. Zhang Yijun watched them from inside the car, a slight smile appearing on her lips.
Li Yanming instructed the bodyguard: "Seal off the building," "as soon as you see her," "shoot without further ado."
Li Yanming said: "Yes."
The police officers, with their guns drawn, stormed the site. Li Yanming, with his hands raised, followed behind them. The officers methodically searched the area, ensuring no suspects were missed.

Li Yanming and the bodyguard draw their guns, aiming at the car. The officers and SWAT surround the vehicle, guns raised. The car door opens, a man in a suit steps out, holding a gun. He runs to the front of the car, the trunk suddenly opens, revealing a large amount of cash.
Li Yanming slowly lowered his gun, then walked to the front of the car, raised both hands to the roof, and squatted down.
Li Yanming, who had just taken out a briefcase from the car, was still in the process of taking out a mobile phone from the briefcase. The person in the front passenger seat was making a call.
Cui Minho, while on the phone, said: "I'll be right there."
Zhang Yijun said: "I'm still in Macau." "The source is dead." "It's a bit troublesome." "But don't worry about me." "What's the situation on your side?"

Cui Minho replied: "DC8 is already in our hands. Professor Zhao said that the Korean consulate is in the office building in Admiralty. Sending weapons there is very dangerous. He gave us a dock address. I will send it to you by text later."
Zhang Yijun said: 'Okay.' 'Then I will contact Consul Quan and have him send support.' 'I will be back to Hong Kong immediately.' 'May be a little late.'

Cui Minho said: "There is one more thing, very important." "You pass the news into the intelligence community." "DC8 is back in our hands and has already left port." "So no one will hurt Hong Kong anymore."

Zhang Yijun said: "Understood, I will do that," Zhang Yijun hung up the phone, and the car drove into a small road. The driver was looking at the navigation device in the car, and the car sped off in the wrong direction.
The scene switches to a car driving into a dead-end street. Cui Minho asks Park Yuzhe: "Is the route correct?"
Park Yuzhe replied: "Almost there, it's a bit odd."
The car slowly drove into the construction site, stopping in an open space. The two in the front seats got out of the car.
At this moment, a car slowly approached. The man in the passenger seat got off and walked towards the man in the driver's seat, saying: "Cui Minho, you're here."
The two walked side by side along the road. Cui Minho took out his phone and handed it to Park Yuzhe, who took it and started to make a call.
Cui Minho said: "The GPS shows here."

movie101_7101937153785102885_1860_2040.text: Yuan Xiaoou, holding Qi Jia, said: 'Are you crazy? What if I didn't come back at this time? You and Lin Shuer drink like this all day. Are you still women?' Then, dragging Qi Jia, said: 'You made it home.'
Qi Jia, excitedly waving her arms, said: 'I made it home! Made it home!'
The delivery man approached and asked, 'Is there a Qi Jia here?'
Yuan Xiaoou asked the courier: 'What's up?'
The courier said: 'You have a package.'
Yuan Xiaoou raised his hand and said: 'It's mine.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Come, come, I'll sign for it!' and took the package.
Qi Jia said: 'I was already so drunk my eyes were blurred, but the name Liu Chong was clear as day, crashing into my eyes.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Thanks!'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Don't snatch it, look at it later!'
Qi Jia, while walking, hugged the gift box tightly. Yuan Xiaoou said, 'Don't you need to throw up? Hurry home and throw up then.'
Qi Jia turned her head to look at Yuan Xiaoou and said with a smile: 'I swallowed it back down.'
Yuan Xiaoou called out to her, and Qi Jia, pretending to be blind, walked a few steps with the box, then turned back.
Qi Jia, while wiping her tears, said: 'You swallow back your words too!' After saying that, she opened the door and went inside, leaving Yuan Xiaoou standing there, feeling awkward.

Qi Jia wrote in the letter: "I have sent Liu Chong hundreds of letters these three years." "All vanished without a trace." "I didn't expect his first reply." "To be a wedding invitation with another woman!" "Looking at the face on the wedding photo that looks so much like mine." "Does Liu Chong still miss me?" "Did he just find a replacement for me?"
The scene shifted, and as the room light came back on, Qi Jia was lying on the bed, holding the alarm clock, with rose petals scattered on the bed. Yuan Xiaoou pushed the door open and walked in.

The next day, Yuan Xiaoou carried Qi Jia out of the house, descending the steep steps of the alley. Qi Jia, wearing a dress, looked extremely pale and frail, with a vacant stare. Yuan Xiaoou, also looking haggard, held Qi Jia tightly as they walked down the stairs and towards the front door.

Qi Jia, who had been hiding in the dark all day, finally felt relieved after seeing Yuan Xiaoou safely arrive at the hospital. She rushed to the hospital, sat by the patient's bed, and stared at the IV drip, unable to calm down for a long time.
The scene shifted, and Qi Jia was lying in bed, tightly gripping the blanket. She wore a buttoned-up pajama set, but her eyes were tightly shut, and her face was twisted with pain.

Lin Shuer, understanding Qi Jia's meaning, said with a smile: "Stomach hurts, doesn't it?" "Your stomach must have done something terrible in a past life." After saying that, Lin Shuer stood up and adjusted the IV drip.
Qi Jia said: 'You shouldn't have saved me.' 'If I die,' 'nothing will hurt anywhere.'
Lin Shuer said: "So what if a jerk found a mate?" "Is it worth it?" After saying that, she looked at Yuan Xiaoou.

Lin Shuer said: "Since you can't let go," "Why didn't you go to Beijing with him in the first place?" After saying this, Lin Shuer stood up and walked out of the room, while Qi Jia turned her head to watch her leave.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: The Old Man said: "Yes, Mayor Yang, this is not a bribery election at all. You must investigate him thoroughly and return Lin Chunhu's innocence, okay?"

Mayor Yang said: "The Old Man, don't worry. We will definitely investigate this matter." "If Lin Chunhu really didn't bribe, we will not wrong him." "You two go first." "We are still investigating this matter." "When you go back, just wait patiently for our news."
The Old Man said: "Okay, Mayor Yang, we'll take our leave first."
Mayor Yang said: "Okay, goodbye." The Old Man left, and Mayor Yang stood at the door watching him go, feeling very satisfied.
The scene switches to a group of people eating. Bao Liang says: "Come on, come on, Chichi."
Another person raised his glass and said: "Let's toast to Secretary Zhang Dong."
Zhang Dong said: "Low-key, low-key, low-key." "The town committee members haven't been finally decided yet." "Low-key, everyone take one, come."
Zhang Dong said: "Brother, why are you so careful? Everyone present today is our own brother. If you don’t take this village secretary position, who will take it? Everyone agrees, right?"
Everyone applauded and said: "Yes, well said."

Zhang Dong continued: "You see, the elected committee members, the old secretary is old, Liu Mengting is just a freshman out of school, she has no experience." "Lin Chunhu’s eligibility has been cancelled." "Now, in terms of strength and qualifications, this secretary position can't be given to others."
Everyone agreed: "Yes, yes, yes, yes, well said."

Zhang Dong said: "Okay, to be honest," "I didn't want to be it initially," "Being a village official is not a great job," "Being a village chief is annoying enough for me," "However, since everyone trusts me so much," "and the village can't find a suitable candidate for the time being," "I'll reluctantly go along with the public opinion."
Everyone raised their glasses and clinked them together, saying: "Cheers, let's drink."
Zhang Dong said: "Speaking of this election," "it not only has people's will," "but also the will of heaven."
Zhang Dong said: "Yes, who allowed our Xiaobao to take such a nice photo, it's simply a divine favor."
The man in the black suit echoed: "Yes, yes, yes, Xiaobao is the number one hero." "Bao Liang brother, I toast to you." Everyone stood up and clinked glasses.
Zhang Dong, after thinking for a moment, said: "Ah, by the way, why didn't we call Xiaobao for a couple of drinks?"
Bao Liang said: "Xiaobao must not be called, he is kept in the dark about this matter."
The scene shifts to a bamboo forest, where Zhang Dong and Bao Liang are shouting: "Mengting!" "Mengting!" "Mengting!"

movie101_7010686199291445773_4260_4440.text: Xiao Xing tightly gripped the dagger in her hand, which belonged to Qian Qian. She tried to pull it back, but Xiao Xing held on tightly. Xiao Xing suddenly let go, and Lin Chong quickly grabbed Xiao Xing's hand, realizing it was empty.
Lin Chong: "Can you spare some time for me, Miss Xiao Xing?"

Xiao Xing, with tears in her eyes, nodded silently. Then, Lin Chong, wearing roller skates, found Xiao Xing and gently extended a hand to invite her. Xiao Xing, with a heavy heart, slowly stood up and followed Lin Chong. Xiao Xing, unsteady on the skates, leaned on Lin Chong for support.
Lin Chong said: "I'm here, I'm here" "Don't think about anything" "Hold my hand tight" "Just feel it"
Xiao Xing said: "I can't"
Lin Chong said: "It's okay, it's okay." "Don't be a slave to fear." "Come on, take it slow."
Xiao Xing said: "Oh"
Lin Chong said: "Xiao Xing sis, don't think that I am carefree, actually, I have worries too, but when I'm feeling down, I go roller skating. That flying feeling, it’s amazing."
Lin Chong and Xiao Xing were walking in the square. The square was deserted, and the only lights were from the hanging bulbs.
Xiao Xing, holding onto Lin Chong, laughed and said: 'Lin Chong, wait a minute,' as the two of them skated hand in hand, completely unaware of the danger that was approaching them.
Lin Chong turned around and said: "Yes"
Xiao Xing said: "Can you come with me to a place?" Lin Chong agreed, and Xiao Xing smiled at him. In the hospital, two patients lay on the beds in the operating room.
In the blink of an eye, Qian Qian was already lying on the operating table, her hands and feet tightly restrained.
Lin Chong continued: "Can any of you tell me" "why on earth there are disgusting apps like 'Just Date' in this world" "Why didn't you answer the phone?"
Xiao Xing's assistant: "The phone was off, no battery."
Lin Chong said: "You used that filthy app to meet men again, didn't you?"
Xiao Xing said: "That's online socializing."
Lin Chong said: "Why can you girls" "Hook up with others so casually? Look at yourself now" "Dressed like that, do you still look like a decent girl? What happened to your face?"
Xiao Xing turned away and said: "It's none of your business."
Lin Chong said: "No, tell me what happened to your face." "Why do you dirty your bodies" "and also dirty my hands?"

Xiao Xing broke free from his embrace and said: "Let go of me," "I'm old enough, even my parents don't control me, why do you?" "I'm an adult, I do whatever I want" "I just went out, I just hooked up with men" "What can you do about it?"
Qian Qian, furiously said: "How dare you hit me, how dare you?"
Yichen shouted: "Tell me why, why."
He reached out to touch Qian Qian's face, but Qian Qian's lips were pale. He called out Qian Qian's name with concern.
Lin Chong cried out: "Qian Qian". The director angrily slammed the script onto the table.

movie101_6969128872847770149_5460_5640.text: Park Yuzhe turned his head and said: "Cui Minho". Suddenly, a group of armed men in black appeared behind them, hiding behind the trucks in the narrow alley.
Cui Minho cursed, "Damn it", and then the two of them hid behind the large truck, observing the situation on the roadside. At this moment, Indian Henchman and his men were approaching the truck.
Cui Minho looked into the distance and said, "Suddenly so many people showed up" "Let's split up"
Park Yuzhe: "Let's go together"

Park Yuzhe, who was hiding under the truck, saw Cui Minho injured, so he quickly took out a pistol and helped him up. The two of them supported each other and ran towards the back of the truck. The mercenaries on the truck were still searching for them, and Cui Minho, who was shot, naturally couldn't run fast. In the end, they hid under a large truck, and the mercenaries on the opposite side kept firing at them.

Park Yuzhe, who had just rushed out of the ambulance, was instantly surrounded by a group of people. He quickly shot and killed two of them. Cui Minho, seeing Park Yuzhe was struggling, opened the ambulance door and asked, "Can you handle it?"

Cui Minho nodded, then quickly ran to the car. After getting in, he closed the door and started the vehicle. Cui Minho held the gun and fired at the people chasing him. Park Yuzhe hid behind the car, took the opportunity to get in, and then drove away. Cui Minho fired again to clear the way for Park Yuzhe.
Cui Minho and Indian Henchman were still fighting fiercely. Cui Minho was hiding behind a car, shooting at the enemies while shouting: "Councilor"

Park Yuzhe and Indian Henchman exchanged fire, with Park Yuzhe taking the opportunity to move to the rear of the truck. Indian Henchman was stunned, and Park Yuzhe quickly reached the other side of the truck, taking aim at the rear.

Cui Minho, clutching his wound, hobbles away. Park Yuzhe, who had been hiding behind the wall, follows him. The two of them sneakily cross the road and hide in a corner where they can observe the situation on the road.

Cui Minho and Indian Henchman got out of the car and started running. Indian Henchman fired a few shots while running, and Cui Minho ducked to avoid them. He stumbled into a low wall and fell to the ground.

Cui Minho was shot in the abdomen, and Park Yuzhe immediately helped him up. Cui Minho fired a few shots at the enemies but was overwhelmed and ran out of bullets. Park Yuzhe quickly picked up Cui Minho's gun and continued to fight.

Cui Minho, enduring the pain, grabbed Park Yuzhe's shoulder. Park Yuzhe took the opportunity to load his gun. Cui Minho, clutching his shoulder, looked at Park Yuzhe. Park Yuzhe, ignoring the pain, stood up and aimed his gun at the enemies.

Cui Minho was shot in the left shoulder. Park Yuzhe supported him and they ran towards the rooftop. Cui Minho was seriously injured and kept bleeding. Park Yuzhe kept supporting him and finally reached the rooftop. Cui Minho was shot too many times and couldn't stand up.
The two, supporting each other, moved forward. Cui Minho, clutching his wound, leaned against a large vehicle. Cui Minho said to Park Yuzhe, "Hold on for now."

Park Yuzhe, who was shot in the shoulder, was bleeding profusely. Cui Minho, who was hit in the head, was barely conscious. Park Yuzhe, struggling to get up, crawled towards the back of the van, while Cui Minho, with a bloodied face, sat up and looked around. Park Yuzhe, who was about to open the trunk, was shot in the head by a henchman.
At this moment, Park Yuzhe rushed over, grabbed the man's neck, and pulled him back. He bit the man's arm hard, then pushed him back and continued to fight with him.

Cui Minho, who had just rushed out of the car, was shot in the left shoulder. He staggered and leaned against the car body, trying to escape. Indian Henchman, who had just shot him, was also hit in the right shoulder. Cui Minho, clutching his wound, ran towards the warehouse, Indian Henchman quickly fired a few shots but missed, and Cui Minho was already inside the warehouse.
Cui Minho was pinned down by the man in black, and at that moment, Park Yuzhe arrived just in time to pull Cui Minho up.

Park Yuzhe took the gun, and the two of them quickly eliminated the threats. At this moment, Cui Minho was shooting while taking cover behind a car, but Indian Henchman was still relentless in pursuit. Park Yuzhe fired a shot and hit Indian Henchman, who fell to the ground.

Cui Minho and Zhang Yijun, seeing the situation deteriorating, quickly fled the scene. The two of them went to the alley behind the truck, with Zhang Yijun covering fire from behind and Cui Minho running to the front.

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: "What did I do to offend you this time? I've already advised my dad about the pig farm issue." "He promised he would change."
Liu Mengting said: "See for yourself."
Zhang Xiaobao took the photos and said, "What are these?" "Aren't these the photos I took last time we went to Aunt He’s house together? What's going on?"

Liu Mengting said: "Shouldn't I be asking you that?" "Only you, me, and Brother Chunhu were there that day." "How did this photo get out?" "Do you know Brother Chunhu was falsely accused of bribery because of this photo?"
Liu Mengting said: "Tell me." "Wasn't this done by your dad colluding with your family members?"
Zhang Xiaobao said: "I really don't know anything about this."
Liu Mengting said: "This is your camera." "If you don’t know, then who does?"
Zhang Xiaobao, looking at the bamboo forest, sighed and said to Liu Mengting: "You think I was involved in this, don't you?"
Liu Mengting said, "Zhang Xiaobao, I used to think you were different from those people. But now, I am really disappointed in you, you know that?"

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Even though the camera is mine, many people have had access to it." "And many people have borrowed it." "Forget it, I won't explain anymore." "Mengting, we've known each other for so many years." "I thought you would at least have some basic trust in me." "Now I see, I overestimated myself."
After saying this, Zhang Xiaobao turned and left, leaving Liu Mengting kneeling on the steps, unable to recover for a long time.
Zhang Baoliang looked at the goldfish in the tank, lost in thought.
Zhang Xiaobao, who was on his way downstairs, was called by his father. Zhang Baoliang asked, "Camera? It's almost dark. Are you still going out to take pictures?"
Zhang Xiaobao asked impatiently: "Have you seen it? I’m in a hurry. Have you seen my camera or not?"
Zhang Baoliang shook his head and said, "No, just don’t go out."
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said, "Did you hide my camera?"
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said, "Yes, I took it."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Give it back to me."
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said: "You did this, didn’t you?" "You used the photos in my camera." "You didn't want Brother Chunhu to become the secretary, right?"

Zhang Baoliang said: "If he becomes the secretary, our family wouldn’t have peaceful days." "Didn’t you hear him say in his campaign speech that he wants to manage the Mother River?" "Isn’t that targeting our family?" "If he does that, how will our pig farm survive?"
Zhang Xiaobao, after listening, walked over to Zhang Baoliang and said: "Just because of this, you mixed with those people from East Zhang Baoliang?" "Doing such conscience-defying things?"
Zhang Baoliang said, "I'm doing this for survival."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2040_2220.text: Lin Shuer looked at her and said: 'Come on, tell me, I've asked you eight hundred times and you never answer, what is it really about?'
Qi Jia opened her eyes and said: "I want to be a teacher."
Qi Jia said: 'On graduation day when I wore my wedding dress, I always felt that he was going to say I do.' After saying this, Qi Jia sat up.
Lin Shuer said: 'If that were the case, even if he went to hell, I would go with him.'
Yuan Xiaoou, who had just left the ward, overheard this and slowly walked back in. Qi Jia said, 'I never thought he would say that he wasn't ready.'

Lin Shuer said: 'Qi Jia, you have only two choices now, first is to go to Beijing and snatch him back, you're not afraid of death, what else is there to fear? Second, completely annihilate him from your mind, dice him up, cremate him in your skull, and let the pathetic remains flush out with your tears. From then on, reborn from the ashes, start a new life. If all else fails, there's still Yuan Xiaoou to try.'
Yuan Xiaoou, hands in pockets, calmly said, "No." "Can we consider my feelings when speaking?"
Lin Shuer shook his head and said, "No."
Qi Jia suddenly said: "I'm going to Beijing."
The scene shifts to the car, where Qi Jia is sitting in the passenger seat. Lin Shuer asks, "Sis, is fear of flying also a symptom of early menopause?"

Qi Jia sat in the back seat, looking at the rearview mirror, while Lin Shuer said in the front seat: "This time going to Beijing, don't screw up okay? If it's a love you can't forget, then prove it to us."

The car sped along the coastal road, with the sea breeze blowing and the sky clear. The sunset cast a golden glow on the water, and the gentle waves lapped against the shore. The car passed through the bustling streets of Sanya and arrived at a small town at the end of the road.
The scene shifts to a rural area, where a car slowly drives into a rapeseed field. The car stops, and Qi Jia gets out.
Lin Shuer got out of the car and shouted, "Qi Jia!"
Qi Jia exclaimed in surprise, "Ah!"
Lin Shuer said while getting out of the car: "Just squat behind the car's rear, nobody can see you."
Qi Jia said angrily, 'You think you both are blind or what?'
Lin Shuer and Qi Jia were running in the rapeseed field, Lin Shuer said to Yuan Xiaoou: 'Blockhead, get back in the car, what's a girl peeing got to do with you?'
The man warned: "Be careful there, don't step on a wasp nest."
Qi Jia ran while saying, "There are wasp nests in the mustard flowers." "Lin Shuer, you're right," "that's just being mindless."
The two of them ran and played in the rapeseed field, as if they had returned to their childhood.
The next day, Qi Jia and Lin Shuer drove to the village where Yuan Xiaoou lived. The car crossed over a stone bridge, and the villagers sitting by the roadside greeted them.
Qi Jia said: "I'll go get the money."
Yang Yingjun replied, "This chicken soup, I started simmering it at four in the morning."
Qi Jia said: "Let's go."
Qi Jia replied, "Soup."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5640_5820.text: Jin Taonian and Park Yuzhe were still in a standoff. Jin Taonian hid behind a wall, while Park Yuzhe kept advancing. Jin Taonian suddenly got up and ran, shooting as he went.

Jin Taonian, who had just rushed to the cement truck, was now covering Shen Meijing. He quickly got up and ran to the back of the truck, while Shen Meijing hid behind the control panel at the back of the truck, Jin Taonian covered Shen Meijing and then ran to the side of the cement truck, shooting at the enemies chasing him.
Jin Taonian and Park Yuzhe quickly got up and ran towards the exit. Jin Taonian got shot in the leg, and Park Yuzhe crouched down to help him. Jin Taonian shouted, "Advisor!"

The drug dealers who ran out from the factory were all knocked down by Jin Taonian. Park Yuzhe and Jin Taonian hid behind a van, Jin Taonian opened the door and helped Park Yuzhe to sit inside the car.

Jin Taonian and Park Yuzhe cooperated perfectly and successfully subdued the suspect. Park Yuzhe, panting heavily, helped Jin Taonian up and they walked towards the back of the car to tie up the suspect.
Jin Taonian: "Adviser," Jin Taonian held Cui Minho's neck, trying to stop the bleeding, but Cui Minho's head drooped.
Park Yuzhe, panting, said: "This...""There's no hope...""Mission...""We must complete the mission...""The mission..."
Park Yuzhe held Cui Minho's hand and said, "Advisor, advisor, pull yourself together." "Advisor, pull yourself together." "Pull yourself together."

He looked at Cui Minho on the ground, then turned to look at Jin Taonian and Shen Meijing behind him. Jin Taonian was holding a camera, filming everything in front of him, while Shen Meijing was covering his nose and mouth, retching.

The shot switches to the warehouse where Park Yuzhe was previously shot. Park Yuzhe was hit in the left shoulder by Cui Minho and fell to the ground. Jin Taonian and Shen Meijing stood behind him, guns raised, on high alert.
The two men in suits lay there, stained with blood, motionless. Jin Taonian stood nearby, his gun raised as a warning to anyone who might approach.
The scene shifts to the middle of the road where a body has been found. A police officer says to Song An: "Song An boss, I've seen everything, there's no Xiao Yuan."
Song An nodded, and the superior turned and left. Song An's gaze remained fixed on the departing figure of the superior, his eyes full of reluctance.

At this time, a black taxi stops in front of a villa. The driver opens the door and gets out, followed by a bodyguard. Inside the house, Yun Hee-sun is playing with a child. The child is watching the TV that the nanny is holding.
Yun Hee-sun, who was wiping the floor, heard the sound of the intercom and stood up to answer the call. The intercom asked if she was there. She nodded and turned on the intercom.
Yun Hee-sun, hearing the commotion, quickly pulls her son into the bedroom. She looks at Shen Meijing with a face full of pleading and begging, but Shen Meijing does not respond to her.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4440_4620.text: Man looked at the big screen, and the projection showed Xiao Xing in a white dress slowly approaching him. He looked at the big screen with a complicated expression.

Man held his wife tightly in his arms, while Xiao Xing sat quietly by the door. The two couples remained silent, letting the rain wash over them. Time slowly passed, and the rain gradually stopped, leaving a cold and damp room.

The scene shifts to the study, where Man stood by the window with his back to the room, seemingly deep in thought. The study was filled with books, and a desk with a few decorative items was placed in the middle. Man turned around and walked slowly towards the desk, his eyes fixed on a spot on the wall.
The scene shifts to a room where Man is picking a new phone from a drawer full of various brands. He browsed through them one by one until he finally chose one and started to play with it.
Man glanced at the time, 9:23 AM, and saw that Xiao Xing had sent 13 location updates.
Jingkuang clicked on the computer and said: "Not afraid of the dark""This guy's new ID has already logged in."
Lu Li asked the officer beside him: "Have you fixed the location?"
Jingkuang looked at the computer and said: "Fuhua Villa 32B""The owner's name is Tang Qian"
Lu Li: "Good." "Jingkuang, take the search warrant." "We'll head over first and you guys can rendezvous with us." "It's a capture operation."
Lin Chong: "Yes." Xiao Xing pulled Lin Chong along and they walked towards the villa together. The villa was two stories high with a distinct European architectural style.

Jingkuang: "Good," "I understand," "Tang Qian is 20 years old this year," "What's strange is," "For the past three months, there's been absolutely no traceable record," "Not even phone records," "and credit card activity disappeared together," "Tang Qian also has an older brother," "named Tang Zheng," "He's a plastic surgeon," "and also three months ago," "he sold his own hospital."
Lu Li: "Siblings, huh?" The two of them pushed open the door and entered the room, turning on the light.

Xiao Xing, who had been waiting at the door for a long time, turned on the light upon seeing him. Lin Chong walked up to Xiao Xing and asked: "Xiao Xing sis, can I acknowledge you as my blood sister?"
Xiao Xing stopped him: "Wait for me a second."
Lin Chong followed Xiao Xing's instructions and went to the living room. He threw his backpack onto the sofa and casually lay on the couch.
Xiao Xing placed the photo of Lin Chong next to the vibrating bell, hesitated for a moment, and then withdrew her hand.
The scene shifts to a quiet evening at home, Xiao Xing holding a guitar, reminiscing about the past. Xiao Xing picked up a photo frame from the table and said: "Lin Chong, are you still there?"
Lin Chong: "Oh, Xiao Xing sis""So you were a cop""That explains it""You always exuded righteousness."
Lin Chong took out a photo frame, inside of which was a picture of himself and Liang Cong. He compared it to Liang Cong's face and said: "Liang Cong, he's Liang Cong, you"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Bao Liang said, "You know about the great pig farm in the village. Why is it leased to our family every year? They willingly give us such a good place because over the years I've been treating them well, providing them with good food and drinks, and offering fine tobacco. Ah, if you still recognize me as your father, go back to your room obediently."
Bao Liang said, "Son, you have to understand, I do this for the sake of our family. As long as we father and son are united, we can raise more pigs and make more money."
Xiao Bao said, "Stop it, I don't want so much money. What I want is a clear conscience. To be human, one must have a conscience. Without it, we're worse than pigs."
Bao Liang cursed, "Bastard! How dare you talk to me like this? It was me, your father who's worse than a pig, who raised you. Spoiled piglet, if you've got the guts, then leave!"
Bao Liang said, "Take the camera, here."
Bao Liang shouted, "Come back! If you dare leave through that door, never come back!"
After the broadcast, Xiao Bao left the recording studio and went straight to the village. He arrived at the alley where he used to live, and while walking, he took out his phone to check messages.
Mayor Yang went to the village committee and asked the staff, "Sister, how does Lin Chunhu behave usually in the village? Is he good to people?"
Mayor Yang replied, "He's very good, especially kind to the elderly."
Mayor Yang asked, "Then does he have anything to do with this election?"
Xiao Bao ran in shouting, "Town leader, town leader!"
Mayor Yang asked, "Hey, what's the matter, young man?"
Xiao Bao said, "Town leader! I'm actually here to clarify something. Lin Chunhu didn't rig the election. The photo, it was actually... I took it, you see."

Mayor Yang said, "Everyone, please be quiet." "I've called you all here because there is a very important matter I need to announce to you all." "Everyone has been very concerned about the bribery case in our village's election." "Over these past few days, our township investigation team has conducted a comprehensive investigation into this matter, and now, the results are out."

Mayor Yang said: "After verification from various aspects, Lin Chunhu has not engaged in any election bribery. Therefore, the results of our election still stand. Also, during the two recommendations and one election process, Lin Chunhu received the highest call from both party members and the masses."
Mayor Yang said: "After the decision of our superior party organization, it has been confirmed that he is the candidate for the new Village Party Branch Secretary of Teahua Village."

movie101_6969128872847770149_5820_6000.text: Yun Hee-sun was stunned for a moment, then looked at Shen Meijing's eyes and couldn't help but reach out to touch the wall. The call from the police station interrupted her thoughts, and she turned to look at Shen Meijing. She took a step forward, wanting to say something but stopped, her eyes filled with tears.
Shen Meijing rushed into the room, knelt down in front of Yun Hee-sun, and held her in her arms. Yun Hee-sun, who had been pretending to be strong, let tears fall then.

The two of them sat on the ground, heads bowed, not knowing what they were talking about. The child in the living room was playing with toys, completely unaware of the serious conversation in the hallway.
Li Yanming stood by the window, his fingers lightly tapping on the glass. He was thinking about Shen Meijing's words when a knock on the door suddenly broke his thoughts.
Li Yanming: "Fan, there's a mole." "Check for me after we left the headquarters." "All entries, communications, and email records."
Li Yanming looked at Shen Meijing, then lowered his head and closed his eyes, trying to control his emotions.
Li Yanming, who had been standing idly by, finally couldn't help but sigh deeply. He slowly walked to the glass window, looking down at the bustling crowd below, appearing thoughtful.

Li Yanming slammed the file folder in his hand onto the table, the papers inside scattered all over the place. He leaned against the back of the sofa, looking at the surveillance screen, but his eyes were fixed on one spot. He suddenly sat up, staring intently at the monitor.
A female police officer said: "Chief Li," "in the past two days," "only the professor made a call within the crisis team."
The scene shifts to the police station, where Li Yanming is sitting in front of a computer, listening to the interrogation tape of Yun Hee-sun. After listening, he nods his head.

The scene switches to Professor Zhao making a phone call: "Angela? It's Professor Zhao, do me a favor. Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time? Also, I'm sorry, please organize the paper on my desk. I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18. Discard the rest."

The police officer on the other end of the phone said: "Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time?" The officer then instructed Li Yanming to organize the paper on his desk and only keep the numbers 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18, and discard the rest.

The scene shifts to the police station, where Li Yanming is listening to the voice recording and taking notes. The tape is playing: 'Hello, I am Yun Hee-sun's friend Shen Meijing. I am very anxious to meet with Yun Hee-sun. If you could arrange a meeting, it would be very helpful.'
Li Yanming was sitting in front of the computer, listening to music and writing lyrics. He took off his headphones, clicked the mouse twice, and then put his headphones back on.

The police station was analyzing the sound, and Li Yanming was transcribing the words from the tape: "Can you find out where Li Sir's third-grade paper is from last time?" "Sorry for the trouble, please organize the paper on my desk." "I only want to keep 5, 6, 15, 16, 17, 18." "Discard the rest."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2220_2400.text: Yuan Xiaoou said while serving the food: "Meat, it's ready, eat it all."
Lin Shuer said, 'Give me more meat'
Yuan Xiaoou said, "Sorry, that's all the meat there is."
Lin Shuer said: "Cooking more won't kill you"
Yuan Xiaoou said, 'I only used half a chicken.'
Lin Shuer said, "It's not even your meat."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Eat more meat, this is free-range chicken, eat as much of the remaining food as you can, if you can't finish, let her eat it."
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'What are you doing, Qi Jia hasn't eaten yet'

Lin Shuer said: "Delicious," as Yuan Xiaoou and Qi Jia nodded in agreement. Lin Shuer then took out a tablet and said: "By the way, Qi Jia, look here, I found the same ones for you, check it out on JD.com."
Qi Jia said: "Are we still going? I'm still not sure"
Lin Shuer said: "When do you plan to decide, big sister, they're about to get married soon"
Qi Jia said: "I still can't believe he would marry someone else."
Lin Shuer said: 'Then I can't believe I'm not a billionaire either'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Oh come on, hurry up and eat, or you'll be too weak to cry. Quick, eat the meat, hurry."
Qi Jia said: "We better not go."
Lin Shuer said: "Coward, it's just a wedding crash, what's the big deal?"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, if you actually manage to crash the wedding," "will you settle in Beijing?"

Lin Shuer said: 'If you don't stay in Beijing', 'Are you planning to kidnap Liu Chong back to Xiamen?', 'Let me tell you', 'I've already planned the steps for the wedding crash', 'We need close cooperation from the three of us', 'Come here', 'Once we're in Beijing', 'Qi Jia, you should not lose your virginity first'
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Huh?"
Lin Shuer said: "No, no, don't show yourself."
Liu Chong said, "You know the construction industry, only in Beijing can you enter the core circle"
Lin Shuer said: "But Beijing has no sky, no sea, bad environment, high pressure." "Apart from you, I have nothing in Beijing."

Liu Chong looked at her and said, 'Are there monsters outside?', 'Why won't you try?', 'Or do you prefer to follow your parents' arrangements, drinking tea, reading newspapers, stamping papers for life?'

Lin Shuer stood up and said, "No," "Have you ever thought," "In a completely unfamiliar city," "The moment you open your eyes it's all pressure," "It's not just about our bodies and minds," "Even our love would be defeated."
Liu Chong said, "You know, in my dictionary, there is no word for defeat. Qi Jia, I really don't want to miss this opportunity. The company chose me among tens of thousands."
Lin Shuer said, 'But there's 1.3 billion people in China, and I chose you alone'
Lin Shuer said, "Why don't you go first" "If it doesn't suit you, come back."
Liu Chong said, 'Do you think so little of me, think I can't do it?'
Lin Shuer said, "I don't mean that" "I'll wait for you here". Liu Chong looked at Lin Shuer, feeling helpless.
Liu Chong said, 'But I don't believe I'll be back', Liu Chong looked at Qi Jia in the car, then turned to look at Lin Shuer, and then turned to look at Qi Jia in the car again.

Qi Jia looked at the night scene outside the window, with a slight smile at the corner of her mouth. The rainy night seemed to mirror her mood, melancholic yet hopeful. She knew that after this night, things would be different.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4620_4800.text: Lin Chong asked in shock: "You are her sister."
Xiao Xing led Lin Chong to the first floor, where Lin Chong introduced, "This is our brother Liang Cong's practice room."
Xiao Xing asked, "Is this your Ramones poster?"
Lin Chong walked up the stairs, Xiao Xing followed him and came to the stairway downstairs. Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong practicing the drums on the stage, and quietly watched him for a while.
Lin Chong stood up, looking at Xiao Xing with a smile. Xiao Xing looked at him with a worried face, and Lin Chong adjusted his posture on the stool, ready to start.
Xiao Xing lit a match, held up the photo, and lit the incense.
Lin Chong was lighting incense, Xiao Xing stood behind him, silently watching. Lin Chong sensed someone behind him and slowly turned around.
Lin Chong turned around and said, "Xiao Xing sis, come over too."
Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong with a face full of grievance and said: "They have all left me one by one—""My dad""My brother""And Cong Cong."
Lin Chong turned around, stunned. The car stopped in front of the villa, and after a while, Xiao Xing came out.
The car slowly stopped in front of a villa with two stories. The front door was closed, and there was only one light on in the whole villa. The two got out of the car and walked towards the villa.
Lu Li and Xiao Xing were still outside, desperately seeking a way in. Lu Li was the first to climb up, using the rock wall to vault into the window.
At this time, Xiao Xing and Lu Li were still searching for clues outside the room. The two walked to the front of a flower bed.

Lu Li and Lin Chong were the first to enter the living room. The spacious room was filled with various pieces of furniture and luxurious decorations. Lin Chong was examining the furnishings while Lu Li was looking for something else.
Lu Li picked up a small trophy and a few picture frames, all of which held memories of Xiao Xing and Lin Chong. Lu Li's eyes welled up with tears as he looked at the photos.
Lu Li, holding a flashlight and a gun, cautiously descended the stairs.

Lu Li, holding a flashlight in one hand and a gun in the other, cautiously approached the door. He bent down to examine the lock, inserted the flashlight into the keyhole, and shone it on the lock to get a clearer look. After some fiddling, he finally picked the lock successfully.
At this moment, Lu Li was searching for something in the room with a flashlight. He turned on the light switch, but there was no light coming out.

Lu Li looked at the newly arrived car, tears streaming down his face. He then looked at the car's license plate, which read 'A 307'. Lu Li quickly bent down to search for something on the ground and called out, "Jingkuang, come over."

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: Meng Ting looked at the woman beside her and said: "Good, really good."

Mayor Yang said: "Good, everyone be quiet, I have a very important matter, to announce to everyone, after verification through public reporting, one of the candidates, Zhang Dong, has engaged in election bribery. The bribery is very clear, and the evidence is also conclusive. So our township party committee has decided to revoke his eligibility as a committee member. In this term's election, he will not participate. Even if elected, it would be invalid."
The crowd responded, "Exactly, exactly, exactly," and the man with the gold chain around his neck stood up and walked towards the stage.
Younger Brother asked, "Big brother, where are we going?" Zhang Dong didn't answer.
Younger Brother said: "Big brother, about this, I know we messed it up, I didn't realize they took something, and couldn't keep their mouths shut."
Zhang Dong impatiently said: "Get out, get out"
Younger Brother said, "Big brother."
Zhang Dong said: "Scram."
Younger Brother said, "Alright alright alright, I'll scram I'll scram," and then opened the car door and got out.
Zhang Dong shouted: "Close the door!"
Zhang Dong said, "I'll wait for you to come back and take the money."
Zhang Dong angrily said: "A bunch of useless people,"

Younger Brother shouted from behind: "Big brother, big brother," Zhang Dong drove away in a luxury car, and Younger Brother watched the car drive off into the distance. Zhang Dong suddenly braked and got out of the car.
Zhang Dong got out of the car, closed the door with a slam, walked around the front of the car, and kicked the tire with his foot. Then he raised his hand and knocked on the roof of the car twice.
The village was very quiet, with no one in sight, only a few red lanterns hanging on the old houses.

Meng Ting continued, "Now, our farmers' lives are better, but our rural domestic sewage has become an important source of water pollution. So, our village organization has decided to try using ecological treatment to deal with our village's domestic sewage."
A woman in a brown coat asked: "Hey, Xiao Liu, what is ecological treatment? We don't understand, can you explain it to us?"

Meng Ting continued, "Okay, this ecological treatment refers to, after collecting and settling the sewage, to build constructed wetlands. Through the joint action of wetland plants, organic substrates, and microorganisms, and through multi-layer filtration, degrade pollutants, purify water quality and discharge rationally. This method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly, plus the investment cost for individual projects is low, it's a purely ecological treatment approach."
Woman in Red Clothes said: "Sewage treatment tanks, aren't those things found in cities?"
A woman from the neighboring village said: "Exactly, building a sewage pool at our doorstep, that would smell terrible."
The parents below echoed, 'Yeah.'

Meng Ting pointed at the screen and said: "Everyone, take a look." "This is a model of a constructed wetland from the next village." "This afternoon, you can all follow me for a visit, and once you see it, you'll understand."

movie101_6969128872847770149_6000_6180.text: Li Yanming turned his head, and a man said: "Professor, the police need you now"
Zhao Zhiren said: "Everything you do is classified," "I don't know anything, how can I cooperate with you?"
Zhao Zhiren said: "Based on the safety of Hong Kong residents, DC8 absolutely cannot stay in Hong Kong."
Song An also confirmed the weapon and locked it in safety mode.
Zhao Zhiren said: "Please help me take good care of the weapon"
Zhao Zhiren said: "These are all classified"

Song An said: "Before you realize the situation," "Our war with the equator has already begun," "If you compromise this time," "He will turn Hong Kong into a real underground weapon trafficking center," "Deal?"
Li Yanming said: "Professor, Mr. Cui, you go check DC8 first"
Li Yanming sat in the chair, looking at the monitor with a fierce gaze. Suddenly, he stood up and walked out of the tunnel. Fan Jiaming asked: "Do you really not need help?"
Li Yanming said: "No need, if I guess wrong, I have a document in my computer, if I guess right, you take my place."
Fan Jiaming watched as the car drove away, then turned to look at the others.
Zhao Zhiren sat at the desk, typing on the typewriter. The desk was covered with books, and the bookshelf behind was full of books. He was wearing a red sweater, smiling as he typed.
Zhao Zhiren looked at Li Yanming with a complex expression. After Li Yanming got out of the car, the female colleague asked Li Yanming: "Officer Li, do we really not need us?"
Li Yanming, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally showed a smile. He closed the door and looked at Zhao Zhiren inside the room.
The scene shifts to a door opening, and Li Yanming walks in. He looks around the room, and Zhao Zhiren comes in behind him.
Zhao Zhiren said: "Looking for me?" Zhao Zhiren handed over a pair of glasses and turned on the stereo.
Zhao Zhiren stood by the window, looking out.

Li Yanming said: "Fourteen years ago I was transferred to the serious crime squad" "When I was dealing with the first case, my superior told me" "Policemen are humans too" "And humans can also commit crimes."
Zhao Zhiren said: "Your boss has a very high opinion of you," "First case, he let you catch one of your own"
Zhao Zhiren said: "But unfortunately, he found the wrong person."
Zhao Zhiren turned around and asked: "Why?"
Li Yanming said: "Because I'm used to suspecting everyone"
Zhao Zhiren smiled and said: "Then you are not very popular"
Li Yanming smiled and said: "Not at all," "The case was solved, and I also caught the boss," "Because he wanted to push the responsibility to his subordinates"

movie101_7010686199291445773_4800_4980.text: At this moment, Tang Zheng suddenly appeared behind him, slowly approaching and kicking Lu Li in the abdomen, sending him flying against the wall. Tang Zheng then took out handcuffs and cuffed him.

Tang Zheng suddenly turned and pushed Jingkuang out. The two of them fought in the room, Tang Zheng pushed Jingkuang out and said, 'So many people outside,' 'you don't catch the ones you should,' 'you come here to catch me,' 'to catch me.'
Lu Li and Tang Zheng were still fighting in the garage, and suddenly a figure flashed by.
Tang Zheng, who had just rushed out of the freezer, was immediately cornered by Lu Li and choked by the neck. Tang Zheng struggled desperately, but to no avail.
Tang Zheng, who had been knocked down, quickly got up and grabbed Lu Li's neck, trying to strangle him. Tang Zheng lifted Lu Li up, but was pushed aside by Lu Li.

The two of them were knocked to the ground by the falling cabinet. After getting up, they found themselves surrounded by scattered tools and cans. Lu Li picked up a wrench and handed it to Tang Zheng, who used it to break the chains binding his feet.

Lu Li, who was originally lying on the ground, suddenly got up, dodged Tang Zheng's attack, and then kicked Tang Zheng in the chest. Lu Li lifted Tang Zheng up by the collar and said, 'Caught you,' 'I have caught you.'

Lu Li, who was originally standing, was knocked down by Tang Zheng's punch, and the bottle that had been knocked away also shattered on the ground. Lu Li was knocked down by Tang Zheng's punch, and the bottle that had been knocked away also shattered on the ground. Lu Li was knocked down by Tang Zheng's punch, and the bottle that had been knocked away also shattered on the ground.

Tang Zheng walked over to Lu Li, squatted down, and looked at him.
Tang Zheng looked at the dying Lu Li with great excitement.
Tang Zheng, lying on the ground, slowly closed his eyes.
Jingkuang, holding a flashlight and gun, sneaked into the morgue, carefully scanning the room. He saw a person fully bandaged and lying on a bed, with machines on the wall administering fluids.

He held a flashlight and observed the figure on the bed. It was Tang Qian's twin sister, Xiaochuan. Jingkuang looked at the various machines in the ward, examining every detail. The room was filled with machines that were silent witnesses to the siblings' fate.
Jingkuang pressed the emergency stop button, but the lights did not respond. He was so anxious that he broke the button. The door opened, and Jingkuang walked in with a flashlight, looking around.
