Jingkuang said, 'Hello, Captain Shan?' 'This is Jingkuang.' 'Found all the missing girls,' 'yes, they're all alive,' 'send the brothers over to help fast,' 'hurry up.'

movie101_7101937153785102885_2400_2580.text: Qi Jia was driving in the rain, with the wipers struggling to clear the heavy rain from the windshield. The raindrops were streaming down the glass, blurring the view. Qi Jia picked up a tissue to wipe the raindrops off the glass, then turned to look at Liu Chong in the passenger seat. Liu Chong was staring at the road ahead with a gloomy expression. Qi Jia smiled at Liu Chong, and a tear slid down from the corner of her eye.

The heavy rain outside the window kept falling, Yuan Xiaoou was driving, and Qi Jia was sleeping in the passenger seat. The wipers were struggling to clear the rain from the windshield, and the car slowly drove forward.
The scene shifts to a rainy night, Liu Chong is driving with Qi Jia in the car, the wipers are working tirelessly, the car is slowly stopping, and the two are about to get out of the car.

The scene shifts to the car, where Qi Jia is leaning against the passenger seat, her head resting on the window, and Liu Chong is leaning against the driver's seat, leaning towards Qi Jia, wiping her tears with his thumb.

The scene shifts to 2013, with the rapid development of Beijing, the skyscrapers in the city are constantly increasing, and the road traffic is booming. Yuan Xiaoou and Lin Shuanger are walking on the street, looking up at the tall buildings around them, Yuan Xiaoou said: "I think I am still suitable to stay behind."
Lin Shuanger, who was about to leave, was called back by Yuan Xiaoou. Lin Shuanger turned around and said: "Come back", Yuan Xiaoou turned around and walked away.
Lin Shuanger asked: "Are you not happy to see an old classmate?"
Liu Chong, surprised, said: "Happy, happy, I just didn’t expect you two to be together."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "No, Liu Chong."
Lin Shuanger said: "This affair, it's a long story," "Sit, sit."
Lin Shuanger said: 'Such a big deal as marriage, yet you didn't send us an invitation.'
Liu Chong said: "I hesitated for a long time and still sent the invitation to Qi Jia""But I think with her character""Even if she received the invitation, she would not come"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Guess what."

Lin Shuanger said: "The truth is, Liu Chong, Qi Jia is really happy for you" "But she is so busy, she sent me and little Yuan Xiaoou to help.""She repeatedly asked us""She hopes the two of us can be your bridesmaids and best man""Witness your happiest moment on her behalf."
Liu Chong put down the shoe model, smiled, and said: "I think she's doing really well. The bridesmaids and the best man are already set, you can come and attend the ceremony."
Lin Shuanger said: "We have consulted a master, Yuan Xiaoou's Bazi is very favourable for you"

Lin Shuanger said: "Really, don't underestimate him, he's not the sharpest tool in the box, but he is indeed the best match for your best man. In the words of the master, it's called completion. We must believe in the words of the master."
Lin Shuanger said: "This is also Qi Jia's wish, she sincerely blesses you"
Liu Chong nodded and said: "Okay"

Qi Jia opened the door and a cardboard box fell at her feet. She bent down to pick it up, and a wedding dress was thrown in. Qi Jia was stunned, clutching the dress and looking at herself in the mirror. She then stepped out of the room, and the scene shifted to a wedding ceremony in a church.

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu angrily said: "What is going on here"
Eldest Brother handed the letter to Chun Hu and said: "Chun Hu, take a look," Chun Hu took the letter and started reading it.

Chun Hu holding the agreement, read: "Support Agreement: For the convenience of managing our household and establishing a business, my brother and I have voluntarily decided to divide our household. Eldest brother, Lin Genwang, will support our father, and second brother, Lin Genxing, will support our mother. Both will look after their respective parents, provide for their every need till the end, bear clear responsibilities, and not interfere in each other's affairs. To ensure there is proof of this arrangement, we're putting this in writing as a testament."
Second Brother said: "This is all what we agreed upon back then, written in black and white"
Old Father said: "The two of us elders, each living in a different house, if one of us falls ill in the middle of the night, no one would even know, let alone take care of us."
Second Brother said: "My old man and I want to chat and speak our minds," "but we have to do it behind their backs," "it feels like being thieves."
Old Father said: "This, both of us living separately, my legs are not good. Last night, I got up to get some water and fell and when my old wife found out," "she wanted to move in to take care of me"
Mother said: "But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us."
Chun Hu said: "Living together is no big deal," "and we're family now."

Eldest Brother said: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."
Second Brother said: "What, I don't help?" "Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?"

Chun Hu said excitedly: "Stop arguing, aren't you ashamed?" "This is about supporting your parents, not contracting a turtle pond." "Genwang, Genxing," "I initially agreed to let you join our turtle farming cooperative," "but now, I need to reconsider."

Chun Hu angrily said: "If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?"
Old Father looked at Chun Hu and said: "Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?"

Chun Hu continued: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_6969128872847770149_600_780.text: The scene shifts to the outside of the research institute where several people in protective suits are collecting white powder from a truck.
The crowd was directed to enter the decontamination tent, and the infected person was taken to the police car by the officers.

The police were cutting the clothes of the infected patients with scissors, and the medical staff would put the patients into a plastic bag and then carry them away on a cart. The police would also put the patients into a plastic bag and then carry them away on a cart.
The scene shifts to the street, where two police cars slowly drive to a roundabout and stop. The officers get out of the cars.
Li Yanming, Zhao Zhiren, and a female assistant walked on the street. Li Yanming was looking down at his watch, seemingly calculating the time.
Li Yanming was the first to step forward, followed by others. They were led by a police officer, wearing protective suits, and came to the plastic tent.
Li Yanming: "Professor," "The police need you now."
Zhao Zhiren looked at Li Yanming with a complex expression. He lowered his head, put on his glasses, and then looked back at Li Yanming and said: "Mr. Lee, our drill isn't over yet."
Li Yanming asked: "Why are you doing a drill?" Zhao Zhiren was taken aback and didn't know how to answer.

Zhao Zhiren asked: "Why are you looking for me? Honestly, Mr. Lee, I don't really like working with government agencies. Everything you do is classified. I know nothing. How can I collaborate with you? Right?"

Li Yanming said: "The National Intelligence Service of Korea suspects their number one wanted man, a man nicknamed 'Equator', along with his assistant courier, successfully stole raw material spheres and handheld devices from both Koreas. UK MI6 intercepted reliable information that the weapon will be handed over in Hong Kong. Korean experts are on their way to Hong Kong. So far, I know what you know."
Zhao Zhiren glanced at Zhang Yijun, then turned his head and said: "This is all classified."
Li Yanming said: "When you're asked to work," "you have the right to know." "You are a physics professor, not Snowden."
The two took off their glasses and fastened their seat belts, ready to start the day's work.
Zhang Yijun, who had just finished checking in, stood there with a smug smile. Jin Taonian came over and asked: "What did you do?"

The plane landed smoothly, and a car drove up to the plane and stopped. The people in the car were Jin Taonian and Cui Minho. The two of them got out of the car and walked towards the airport terminal.

movie101_7010686199291445773_480_660.text: Lu Xiaoxing turned around, walked to the door, and opened it. She looked at Mr. Ma in the hallway outside, feeling a mix of emotions. The bright light from outside bathed her face, making her look exceptionally beautiful. She walked out of the door with a heavy heart.
Lu Xiaoxing and Cong Cong (Animal) left the hospital and walked towards the police station. The police officers who were training Cong Cong (Animal) gathered together and followed them.
Lu Xiaoxing and Mr. Ma met again. Cong Cong (Animal) was very happy to see them. Mr. Ma said: "Three years without seeing you, you now have such a cool bodyguard."
Lu Xiaoxing said: "It's called Cong Cong (Animal), it is my eyes."
Mr. Ma looked at Cong Cong (Animal) and said, "Cong Cong (Animal), indeed looks quite handsome."

Lu Xiaoxing said: "Mr. Ma, I have learned braille in the past three years." "I can now type, read, and surf the internet proficiently." "Cong Cong (Animal) can take me anywhere I want to go." "I believe that blindness can no longer be an obstacle to my work and life." "I want to re-apply for admission."
Mr. Ma said: "Lu Xiaoxing, I don't want to discourage you. The reason you had to leave the school was not because of your blindness, but due to your severe violation of rules."

Mr. Ma continued: "During your internship with the police" "you left your post without permission." "Your impulsive actions" "resulted in serious consequences." "I know your brother's death" "was a huge blow to you." "But that mistake" "is something that cannot be undone." "If you ask me, you should go back."
Mr. Ma pressed the switch, and the traffic light changed from red to green.

Lu Xiaoxing and Cong Cong (Animal) stopped at the zebra crossing. The traffic light turned red, and the two prepared to cross the road. Lu Xiaoxing looked at the traffic light, and the moment the light turned green, she hurriedly walked towards the other side with Cong Cong (Animal). The surrounding area was eerily quiet, with only the sound of the wind blowing through the trees. Lu Xiaoxing's hair fluttered in the wind, and the image of her and Cong Cong (Animal) gradually blurred.
Lu Xiaoxing was walking with Cong Cong (Animal) when suddenly a car honked at them. They had to stop and wait for the car to pass. The driver stuck his head out and cursed at Lu Xiaoxing.

Lu Xiaoxing ran desperately on the road, not knowing where to go. She ran to a crossroad, slowed down, and looked around. The traffic lights were red, and there were a few pedestrians on the road. She looked left and right, but nobody was there to help her. She turned her head and saw the car that had hit her before.

Lu Xiaoxing was walking on the road when suddenly a car blocked in front. Cong Cong (Animal) stopped obediently. Lu Xiaoxing looked at the car, then at Cong Cong (Animal), and finally walked towards the car.
Lu Xiaoxing was exhausted, leaning on the roadside steps, panting heavily. She reached into her pocket, but to her surprise, there was no money. She kept looking.
Lu Xiaoxing touched the wounds on his leg, then took out a spray and sprayed it. He returned home and put his awards and certificates into the cabinet.
She opened the packaging to find that it was indeed the book she had ordered. She put down the boxes and looked at the books, her face filled with a happy smile.

Lu Xiaoxing sat on the floor, watching Cong Cong (Animal) eat heartily. She looked at Cong Cong (Animal) with a face full of love and anticipation. Cong Cong (Animal) seemed to understand her owner's wishes, finishing the food in the bowl.

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Man continued: "Think about the old man's wishes, take good care of the old man's health, that's settled then, the two old men will live together, as for the support payments, the two brothers will split them equally."
The next day, the village was as quiet as usual, with only a few villagers walking around in the alleys. The calf continued to suckle from its mother, oblivious to the outside world.
Old Secretary and Mayor Yang shook hands, and Old Secretary said: "Oh, Mayor Yang, hello, hello, hello"
Mayor Yang said: "I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself."
Old Secretary said: "It's a minor issue, no big deal, no big deal."
Old Secretary said: "Please, please, please, come on in."
Mayor Yang said: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."
A man in a gray suit asked: "Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?"

Mayor Yang said: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."
Man in Gray Clothes said: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"
Mayor Yang said: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated," "We will try our best to inform them," "Those who can come back should come back," "Those who can't," "will have to forgo this right"
Old Secretary said: "Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside."
Mayor Yang said: "Alright, alright, let's go", and the group set off together.
Seated Woman said: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party Secretary?"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."
Seated Woman asked: "Why?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."
Seated Woman said: "Is it that serious?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "Of course." "Anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago," "violated family planning policies, or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

Woman in White Clothes said: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."
Seated Woman said: "Oh, you're boasting"
The next day, Man in Gray Clothes and Woman in Black Clothes were chasing a rabbit in the field. Woman in Black Clothes shouted: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"
Man in Gray Clothes: "Alright, got it"
Seated Woman asked: "Is it heavy?"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Not heavy."
Woman in Black Clothes: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"
Man in Blue Clothes said: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7101937153785102885_240_420.text: Dean: "Oh my, I've heard that the two of you are considered the golden couple among this year's graduates." "You guys managed to express a commitment to each other in a way that makes us all believe in love again." The audience broke into warm applause.

Qi Jia, holding Liu Chong's hand, said: "I, Qi Jia, am willing to marry Liu Chong as his lawful wife. In good times and better, in wealth and more wealth, in health and better health, for the rest of my life, I will love you, be loyal to you, cherish you, until death do us part."
Liu Chong, with a smile on his face, accepted the certificate from the dean. Qi Jia, however, was still not satisfied. Liu Chong said: "I'm not ready yet."
Qi Jia: 'Dizzy, chest tightness, shortness of breath, heart palpitations, weak legs. All these symptoms started at that moment. And what happened next, I just can't recall.'
The scene shifts to a hospital, where Qi Jia is standing at the nurse's station with a worried look on her face,

The hospital was bustling with people, and the sound of the announcement blaring through the loudspeaker kept echoing in the corridor. Lin Shuer and her daughter, along with Old Doctor, walked out of the corridor one after another.

The hospital corridor was bustling with people coming and going, some pushing wheelchairs, some holding bouquets, all with worried or anxious expressions. The cries of the baby in the advertisement seemed to echo in the corridor, tugging at people's heartstrings.
The scene shifts to the hospital, where Lin Shuer is sitting in the corridor with a friend, waiting for Old Doctor to see her.
The scene shifts to the hospital, where Qi Jia and her family are waiting for the doctor to see her.

The scene shifts to a hospital, where Qi Jia is sitting in the lobby waiting for Old Doctor to see the doctor. The phone rang, and the screen displayed various treatment options for Old Doctor's disease.

The scene shifts to the gynecological clinic, where Old Doctor is diagnosing patients. A woman with a white towel over her face says: '"Menopausal syndrome," "Take the prescribed medicine," "Control your diet and maintain hygiene," "Next patient."'
Liu Chong continued: "My Chris always encourages me""Not having MC doesn't mean anything""Tomorrow is another day""But every day is the same"
Old Doctor: '"Menopausal syndrome," "Take the prescribed medicine," "Control your diet and maintain hygiene," "Keep exercising."'
Qi Jia said with red eyes: 'Can you say something else?'

Old Doctor: '"Menopausal syndrome," "In traditional Chinese medicine it's called syndromes before and after menopause," "Kidney Qi declines, Tian Gui is exhausted, Chong and Ren are imbalanced, organs lack nourishment, Qi and blood are deficient."'
Qi Jia replied: '"I just missed my period. If this were a cheesy TV drama, I'd be pregnant.'"
Qi Jia, seeing Old Doctor looking at her, said: '"What are you looking at?" "A CT scan with your naked eye?"

movie101_6969128872847770149_6180_6360.text: Li Yanming, with a frown, said: "Since coming back from Macau," "I've been constantly thinking," "'Why?" "Why am I always one step behind the Equator?'"
Zhao Zhiren took a sip of coffee, looking at Li Yanming with a complex expression. He leaned in close to Li Yanming, his eyes gleaming with a strange light. After a moment, he said, "The Equator."

Li Yanming looked at Zhao Zhiren with a meaningful gaze, then lowered his head to ponder for a moment before saying, 'Both the United States and South Korea have failed to find you over the years. I'm honored.'
Zhao Zhiren said with a smile: "Know I'm the Equator, and just come with these few people?"
Li Yanming said, 'Mr. Song hasn't left yet. No matter how sure I am, I can't give this credit to him.'
Zhao Zhiren looked at Li Yanming with a smile, then said, "Your character will kill you." "Do you want to be the police chief?"
Li Yanming said: "Chief? Back in high school, he was still copying my homework. Don’t mention this to anyone." Li Yanming said with a smile, and Zhao Zhiren laughed and adjusted his glasses.
Zhao Zhiren took off his glasses, looked at Li Yanming with a smile, and asked, "Why?"
Zhao Zhiren lowered his head and said, "There's no reason. It's just business." He forced a smile, looked up at Li Yanming, and then stood up to leave.
Zhao Zhiren said: "In the entire process, you did one thing wrong." "You should not have hit a woman." "Apologize to her."
Zhang Yijun, with a sinister smile, strangles Li Yanming's neck with the scarf. Li Yanming, in pain, struggles desperately, but Zhang Yijun is too strong, soon Li Yanming is unable to move anymore.

Zhang Yijun, who was originally on top, was thrown to the ground by Li Yanming. Then, Li Yanming pinned Zhang Yijun down, using his weight to pin her arms down. Zhang Yijun struggled desperately, trying to break free from Li Yanming's grip, but Li Yanming held on tightly.

Jin Taonian, who was originally sitting on the sofa, stood up and looked at Li Yanming, who was struggling on the ground. Zhao Zhiren, who was originally sitting at the table, also put down his reading glasses and slowly stood up.
The man in gray clothes, who was pushed down, was struggling to get up. He was also one of the four people who were kicked out of the office by Zhao Zhiren.

Li Yanming, lying on the ground, was choked by a hand. He looked up at Zhao Zhiren, his eyes full of fear. Zhao Zhiren looked down at him with a cold expression, while Jin Taonian on the side nodded with a smirk.
At this moment, Li Yanming's eyeball suddenly became lifeless, and his pupils uncontrollably dilated. Zhao Zhiren's face was expressionless, but his trembling lips revealed his inner turmoil.
Zhao Zhiren, with a cold expression, turned and left. Li Yanming, lying on the ground, had a look of peace on his face.

movie101_7010686199291445773_4980_5160.text: Lin Chong looked at the ukulele in his hands, then turned and walked out of the hotel. Xiao Xing sat on a bench in the park, recalling the scene when she first met Lin Chong.
Lin Chong sang, "The dark sky hangs low, bright stars follow, the insects fly, whom are you missing?"
Lin Chong picked up the guitar and started playing and singing for Xiao Xing. Xiao Xing smiled and swayed gently to the rhythm.

Tang Zheng asked, "Where is his car?"
Jingkuang pointed behind and said, "It's back there."
Shan Dui turned around and said, "You go look for him again," "Come with me."

The camera cuts to the interior of the room, where a pair of leather shoes stand by the door, with a puddle of muddy water at the door, and muddy footprints leading to the door.
Tang Zheng took out a bottle of red wine from the box and opened it, while Xiao Xing, who was downstairs, quickly came to the living room, sat on a leather sofa, and looked up at Tang Zheng.

Tang Zheng turned around and said, "Don't be nervous."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2580_2760.text: Yuan Xiaoou stood in front of the mirror, buttoning up a shirt, then put on a suit, adjusting the suit jacket while looking at himself in the mirror. Lin Shuer walked out of the fitting room, and Yuan Xiaoou came out of the fitting room saying, "Lin Shuer, I'm ready."
Yuan Xiaoou buttoning up his suit jacket, walked towards Lin Shuer and said: "Didn't you always say your boyfriend is tall and strong? Why are the clothes so small?"
Lin Shuer: "Wear whatever fits." "Why are you complaining so much?"

Lin Shuer: "Hey, it's fine." Lin Shuer, holding the wedding bouquet, escorted Qi Jia to the luxury sports car that Yuan Xiaoou had prepared in advance. The guests were already in their seats, clapping and taking photos. Lin Shuer opened the car door for Qi Jia, who sat in the front passenger seat.
Qi Jia asked: "Do I look much different from graduation?"
Lin Shuer said: "It's been over three years. Who hasn't changed a bit?"
Qi Jia asked: "Where's the bride?"
Lin Shuer looked around and said: "The bride's wedding car is still stuck on Xizhi Bridge." "Let's cut in line and go first."
Lin Shuer: "Today is your last chance. If you fail, turn this wedding into your funeral. Bury your ignorant youth and obsessive love."
The scene switches to the wedding day, with the guests applauding as Lin Shuer and Liu Chong walk down the aisle. Liu Chong asks: "What's the matter? Nervous?"
The priest asked: "Groom, do you pledge to love her and regard her as your wife for the rest of your life? Do you?"
Liu Chong: "I do."
The priest asked: "Bride, do you pledge to love him and regard him as your husband for the rest of your life? Do you?"
Qi Jia held Liu Chong's arm, looking down, while Lin Shuer stood behind them, looking at the two. The priest then announced that the two were husband and wife.
Qi Jia: "I, Qi Jia, am willing to marry Liu Chong as my lawful husband—whether in health or greater health, in wealth or greater wealth."
Qi Jia: "Starting today," "I am willing to love you," "be faithful to you," "cherish you," "until death do us part."
Liu Chong: "You already made a choice. Why overturn it now?"
Qi Jia walked up to Liu Chong and said: 'I am willing to go anywhere with you.'
Liu Chong said: "I don't love you anymore." "Just go."
Qi Jia turned to look at Liu Chong, who was at a loss and didn't know what to do.

Qi Jia, holding the bouquet, walked slowly down the aisle, her face covered by the veil, looking at Yuan Xiaoou with a face full of love. Yuan Xiaoou, standing at the end of the aisle, looked back at Qi Jia with a face full of anticipation. Lin Shuer, standing next to Liu Chong, looked at the two with a face full of envy, while Qi Jia's eyes were only for Yuan Xiaoou.

Qi Jia looked at Liu Chong, tears streaming down her face. Liu Chong turned and walked towards the officiant, while Qi Jia, still in a daze, watched him. Lin Shuer stood behind Qi Jia, looking at her with concern.

movie101_6969128872847770149_6360_6540.text: The car windows were riddled with bullet holes, and the building behind was ablaze with thick smoke.

The cargo hold door opened slowly, and a group of neatly dressed people appeared in the frame. They were all wearing black mourning clothes, carrying a long rectangular coffin, and walking slowly towards the plane. Among them, Kim Hae-sook and Yun Hee-sun were at the forefront, followed by the rest of the family members and the reporters.

The coffin was slowly carried onto the hearse. The pallbearers were all wearing mourning masks, their expressions somber. One of them carried a photo of Cui Minho. In the photo, Cui Minho was dressed in a suit, exuding an air of gentleness.
Yun Hee-sun was deeply moved and had tears in her eyes. She said: "I want to talk to my husband."
Cui Minho sat in the car, looking at the photo of his father, his eyes gradually moistening. Meanwhile, the mother was being helped to sit down by the staff.
Yun Hee-sun, unable to hold back her grief, ran forward, and the staff quickly stopped her.
Cui Minho looked at Yun Hee-sun with a face full of pleading, Yun Hee-sun was moved to tears, nodding repeatedly. Cui Minho asked: "Where is Min-kyun?"
Shen Meijing stepped forward and said: "Director Choi, we really appreciate you."
Cui Minho looked at the man and said: "We for him"
Kim Hae-sook said: "Everyone has worked hard."
Cui Minho said: "My greatest regret is that I couldn't protect Woo-cheol."
Kim Hae-sook said: "Director Choi, we truly appreciate your efforts. Welcome back safely."
Cui Minho slowly raised his hand, trying hard to move his fingers. He tried to speak, but couldn't form words. Yun Hee-sun covered her mouth, crying silently.
Cui Minho raised his hand and said: "Deputy Director Choi Minho of the National Intelligence Service reporting to the general and the Director of the National Intelligence Service."
Yun Hee-sun quickly stepped forward to support Cui Minho's head, and held his hand to his chest. Cui Minho placed his head on Yun Hee-sun's shoulder, and they held hands tightly.
Cui Minho opened his eyes and looked at the woman in front of him, then slowly closed his eyes again. The scene shifted to Shanghai World Financial Center.

The scene shifts to an office, where a subordinate is reporting to Song Hui-ming: "Mr. Song, we found out that this Professor Zhao Zhiren is not a Vietnamese Chinese, according to the nation's reputation..."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5160_5340.text: Tang Zheng said, "People like us," "how could we be afraid?" "Do you know," "I've always thought the reason you got in my car that day" "was fate," "because we share the same misery."

Tang Zheng turned his head to look at her, then turned back to the wine glass in his hand. Xiao Xing pushed the door open and rushed into the room. Tang Zheng stood up and said, "You love your brother, and I love my sister."

Tang Zheng said, "But they died by our hands," "My life is ruined," "Even this can't help with the pain inside me," "Could anything be more hopeless," "Might as well," "Let's join them," "I'll help you."
Lin Chong came out from around the corner and shouted, "Sister, run!"
Tang Zheng and Lin Chong were knocked to the ground by the bookshelf, and Xiao Xing was stunned watching them.
Lin Chong shouted, "Xiao Xing sis, call the police, hurry!"
Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong by the collar and pushed him against the wall, Xiao Xing was very scared and didn't dare to intervene.
Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's collar and was about to strangle him when Xiao Xing rushed in. The three of them wrestled together, and Tang Zheng, seeing the situation was bad, tried to escape.

Lin Chong was the first to run down the stairs, Xiao Xing followed closely. Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's collar, but was choked by Lin Chong. Xiao Xing picked up a dagger from the ground and slashed at Tang Zheng's back, Tang Zheng turned around and grabbed Xiao Xing's wrist, Xiao Xing kicked Tang Zheng to the ground.

Xiao Xing, who had just been pushed to the ground, got up and threw her phone under the table. Lin Chong grabbed Tang Zheng's collar and, with tears streaming down, tried to strangle him, but Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's wrists.
Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's collar and glared at him fiercely. Lin Chong tried to break free but was held tight. Tang Zheng suddenly let go, and Lin Chong took the opportunity to escape.

Tang Zheng grabbed Lin Chong's arm and threw her to the ground. The already dazed Lin Chong barely reacted before Tang Zheng kicked her in the stomach, sending her flying to the floor. Tang Zheng looked down at her, then walked over to Xiao Xing.
Tang Zheng walked up the stairs with his head down, Xiao Xing was frantically packing her clothes, she looked up and saw Tang Zheng, she stood up in a panic, grabbed her bag and ran downstairs.

Xiao Xing hurriedly hid the bag under the sofa, then took out the bag from under the sofa, took out the passport and put it in the bag, then hid the bag under the table. Tang Zheng was walking and observing the room.
Xiao Xing quickly turned off the tape recorder, and Tang Zheng walked over and plugged the phone charger into the power outlet.
The lights suddenly came back on. Xiao Xing, who had just opened a drawer, quickly closed it again. Tang Zheng looked around the room nervously.
Tang Zheng, who had just returned from the meeting, was about to go upstairs, but the power was out, so he had to turn around and head back home.
In the pitch-dark stairwell, Tang Zheng lit a cigarette and waited anxiously. Xiao Xing and Lin Chong were upstairs, eavesdropping on their conversation.

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The scene shifts, and the film officially begins. A luxurious car is seen driving along a mountain road.
The scene shifts to a mountain road, where a red Land Rover is driving. The road is lined with fallen leaves, and the vehicle's wheels kick up a spray of dust.

The car slowly drives along the mountain road, with bamboo forests on both sides, a gentle breeze blowing the leaves, and sunlight shining on the car, making it seem particularly warm and comfortable.

The four brothers saw Zhang Dong coming from a distance, they quickly ran to open the car door, and shouted: "Big brother, big brother, watch your step, be careful, slow down, big brother, slow down, you're finally back big brother, let's go."
The scene shifts to four women sitting around a table, chatting. A few people pass by and the woman with the scarf asked: "Who is this rich man?"
The woman said: "Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?"
The woman in blue said: "She's only been married a few months." "The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi." "Of course, she wouldn't recognize him."

The woman in the black dress said: "If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now."

The scene switches to a mahjong table, a middle-aged woman says: "The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief," "He doesn’t manage the village affairs and spends most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business."
The woman said: "The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor." "Remember the road repair we had in our village?" "It was contracted to him."
The woman said: "The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it."
The woman with short hair continued: "The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill." "The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village."
The woman in green clothes said: "East, West, South, North, Central." "Isn't this a full mahjong hand?" Everyone laughed and clapped.
The woman said: "Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?"
The woman in the middle asked: "Why?"
The woman with curly hair said: "For Secretary selection."
The woman in blue said: "Oh, that makes sense."
The scene shifts to the outside of the inn, which is surrounded by greenery and has a simple yet elegant atmosphere.
The scene switches to the courtyard, where the uncle in a suit is leading them, saying: "Come come come." "Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."
Zhang Dong asked: "Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?"
Zhang Dong said: "Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers." "Come, have a look." "Sit down."
The man eating noodles said: "Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village."

The man in the red shirt said: "The assistant village chief Liu Mengting has organized some kind of environmental volunteer team. It seems that she has some big opinions about the water quality of the Da Xi River outside our village."
Zhang Dong said: "Just a bunch of kids messing around."
The man with the gold chain said: "Big brother."

movie101_6969128872847770149_6540_6720.text: Song An analyzed: "According to the bulletin given to us by Interpol, his two couriers were last seen with an underground buyer nicknamed 'His Highness' in Estonia. We suspect that they made the transaction for the DC8 here. Also, we've analyzed the information Mr. Lee left us before his death, we believe the next target from the equator should be in Kyoto."

Song An's expression was complex, and the scene shifted to a snowy mountain in Japan. The cold weather made the trees shed their leaves, and the stone lions at the shrine entrance were covered in moss, looking very eerie.
The scene shifts to a small village, where a train slowly approaches the station.

The scene shifted to a train slowly arriving at the village station. The train was heading to the small village where Tom's family resided. The village was quiet, with only a few people going about their business. A van drove into the village, stopping in front of a shop.

The four of them were still stretching their arms when a minivan suddenly drove up. The driver was a Japanese man, and the four quickly stopped their stretching and stood at attention. The Japanese driver looked them up and down, then gave a thumbs up and said, "Good, good."
Song An got out of the car, walked to the side of the data collection point, and began to input the password. After entering the password, he waited for the confirmation code to be sent out.
Song An opened the mailbox, there was only a piece of paper in it. He took the letter out of the mailbox. The scene shifted to a street, where a group of people walked towards a house in a line.
The two walked into the station together, Song An glanced around and then headed straight for the ticket counter.

Song An arrived at the train station at 9:30, and the temperature was still below zero degrees Celsius. He sat on a chair and took out a portable electric heater from his bag. He placed the heater on the ground and wrapped his hands around it to heat them. The cold wind blew past, and Song An's eyes were filled with tears. He looked at the heater and then at the empty space in front of him, as if recalling the times spent with his family.
The train slowly arrived at the station. The platform was empty, with only a few security guards standing in place. A man with a backpack walked briskly towards the train.

The man in black coat and hat standing at the door was actually a Japanese man. He looked at the two people inside the room, Song An and the foreigner, through the glass. The Japanese man was wearing a mask, holding a spray bottle, and spraying the entrance of the station.
The man said: "Mr. Song An, we're ready."

Song An walked out of the station with a serious face, followed by a group of subordinates. He took the light rail home, sitting in the vehicle and staring out the window, lost in thought. His expression was very serious, as if he was preoccupied with something. The people around him were all silent, and the station was deserted, with only a few sporadic passengers.
The train slowly started moving forward. The snow outside the window fell lightly, and the trees were covered with thick snow, making the whole scene look like a painting.

On the way to Italy, Song An and his group took a train. They arrived at a small town in Italy. Song An walked through the aisle of the train, his eyes scanning the surroundings. He noticed a young man and a young woman standing by the window. Song An walked up to them and looked down at the book the young man was holding.

movie101_7101937153785102885_2760_2940.text: Qi Jia ran out of the church, holding up her skirt, and ran down the street. Yuan Xiaoou followed behind her. Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, you don't love me as much as you think, because you always want me to love you more. You haven't realized this until now, but I know."
Qi Jia ran into the church, looking around for Liu Chong.

Yuan Xiaoou said: "You will definitely regret this", Yuan Xiaoou turned around and left, walking step by step out of the church, while Liu Chong looked down, not daring to look at him again. Qi Jia, holding the bouquet, turned her head to look at Liu Chong, her face full of confusion.

Qi Jia thought to herself: "This love is like a tug of war, we both want the other to love us more." "Desperately trying to win the game." "But I forgot, if the other lets go of the rope first." "You'll just fall and hurt yourself badly." "I've been asleep in this dream for seven years." "When I woke up, he had already reached the other side and I didn't know where I was."
The scene shifted to a bustling road, with cars coming and going incessantly.

Qi Jia returned home alone, dragging a suitcase as usual, but this time there was no smile on her face. She went to the kitchen, her eyes dull, and looked around. She reached out to touch the little bear on the shelf, as if trying to find some comfort.

Qi Jia returned home after the wedding, lifted the curtain in the kitchen, and was surprised to find the shelf full of various kinds of edible fungi. She then opened the cabinet door and was stunned by the sight of the large amount of cash inside.
Qi Jia opened the cabinet doors, inside were various kinds of milk and a few bottles of detergent. She closed the doors and opened the drawer beside it, inside were some beans and corn.
Qi Jia was about to open the drawer when she heard Yuan Xiaoou's footsteps. She quickly pulled out a kitchen knife from the knife block and hid it behind the door panel.
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "What are you rummaging through?"
Qi Jia squatted in the kitchen, suddenly stood up and said to Yuan Xiaoou, "I forgot something very important."
Yuan Xiaoou said, "What are you looking for? I'll help you find it."
Qi Jia turned around and slapped Yuan Xiaoou, saying, "I just forgot what I forgot." Then turned to look at the TV and said, "It's just early menopause, I'm not senile." "Why do I forget everything!"
Yuan Xiaoou comforted her: "Don't worry, don't worry." "Forgetfulness is also a symptom of early menopause." "It's something very important, right?"
Qi Jia nodded and said, "Hmm."
Yuan Xiaoou said, "That very important thing probably isn't in the kitchen, right?" "It should be in your room." "Think along those lines."
Yuan Xiaoou quickly agreed: "Yes, yes, yes."
Yuan Xiaoou raised his hands and said, "Isn't it?"
Yuan Xiaoou raised his hands and said, "Why am I so smart?"
Yuan Xiaoou lying on the bed said, "Wine bottle, mineral water bottle, shoe brush." "Which one are you looking for?"
Qi Jia said, "It's this one." "But where's my turtle?"
Yuan Xiaoou got up and asked, "In the middle of the night, what are you looking for a fish tank for?"
Qi Jia holding the fish tank said, "Yuan Xiaoou, you have to help me find my turtle."
Yuan Xiaoou asked, "When did you raise a turtle?"

movie101_7010686199291445773_5340_5520.text: Tang Zheng lit a cigarette with a lighter, the flame flickered on his face, he turned and walked up the stairs, the lighter's flame casting a dim light on the wall, he reached the top of the stairs, and the flame on the lighter gradually died out.

Xiao Xing, with a face full of sorrow, didn't notice the subtle changes in her body. She slowly walked out of the bathroom, her steps heavy and cumbersome. At that moment, Tang Zheng, who had just taken a shower, was leisurely smoking a cigarette, his gaze fixed on the door. He slowly walked towards the door, his expression serious, as if he had anticipated something.
He turned around and walked a few steps, suddenly stopped, and looked around. He saw a cigarette butt on the ground, stepped on it, and crushed it thoroughly.

Tang Zheng walked in with a lighter, the light from the flame casting on his face. Xiao Xing, with eyes closed, seemed to sense someone approaching. Tang Zheng slowly lit the door with the lighter and pushed in, entering the room.
Tang Zheng, holding a lighter, slowly walked into the room. The faint light made it difficult to see clearly, and he looked up to observe the layout of the room.
Tang Zheng lit a lighter and walked towards the window. The rain outside was coming down hard, like nails hitting a sandbag. He reached the window and found the glass was broken.

Xiao Xing, who had just opened the door, was about to enter when she saw the scene. She immediately hid behind the door and called Tang Zheng. Tang Zheng took out his phone and dialed Xiao Xing's number, but there was no answer.

Jingkuang closed the door, leaving Tang Zheng alone in the room. Xiao Xing, who had been hiding in the darkness, immediately turned on the light as soon as Jingkuang closed the door. Xiao Xing took off the coat and slung it over the chair.

Xiao Xing looked at the door in front of her, her pupils dilating. In her imagination, the figure of the perpetrator gradually became clear, revealing a man with a terrifying face. Xiao Xing's body trembled slightly, and she took a deep breath.

Jingkuang, who had been eavesdropping outside the door, heard the conversation between the two inside. He silently entered the room, lit a cigarette, and then threw the cigarette butt on the floor, letting the smoke drift into the air.
Xiao Xing, who had just rushed out of the elevator, was drenched in blood, with a trail of fresh blood extending from her back to the floor, and then to Lu Li on the ground.
Suddenly, a phone on the table emitted a strange glow. Tang Zheng, holding a lighter, turned to look at the phone. After a moment of silence, he turned back to the front door.

The scene shifts to a man in a trench coat breaking into a house. He tiptoed to the bathroom, where the bathtub was filled with water and flowers. He looked at the body in the water and then at the door.

Xiao Xing, who had been waiting outside for a long time, finally got impatient. She opened the door and got in, only to find Jingkuang sleeping soundly on the floor. She reached out to turn off the alarm, but as soon as she let go, the door locked automatically. She looked at Jingkuang in a panic, and the room was left in darkness.

Xiao Xing, who had just entered the room, saw the monitor screen and rushed to the monitor, seeing Lin Chong in a critical condition. She screamed and ran towards the door, but was stopped by the closing door. Jingkuang arrived just in time.
Jingkuang: "Lu Li" "Lu Li" "Pull yourself together" "Lu Li"
Lu Li, struggling to speak, said: "Xiao Xing," "Danger!"
Jingkuang shouted: "Over here!" "Lu Li is here!" "Somebody help!"
Xiao Xing hurriedly walked down the stairs, calling out, "Lin Chong", "Lin Chong", "Where are you?"

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Liu Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?' Liu Mengting agreed. Zhang Xiaobao picked a good spot, carefully framed the shot, and pressed the shutter.
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Good,' 'Sit here,' 'Sit,' 'Sit well,' 'One, two, three,' 'Hmm, looks good.'
Zhang Xiaobao asked: "Liu Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?"

Liu Mengting said: "Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: "Nonsense, what I do is all about serving our villagers, unlike you, all talk no action."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "How have I been all talk no action?"
Liu Mengting said: "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Who says? The photos are all ready, look." "Not bad, right?" "Now, my dad is helping me find a venue," "As soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start."
Liu Mengting said: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"
Liu Mengting, fearless, walked across the stones, and Zhang Xiaobao, not wanting to lag behind, hurriedly followed.
Zhang Xiaobao asked: 'Liu Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?'

Liu Mengting said: "Well, my plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village."
Zhang Xiaobao asked: "And then?"
Liu Mengting said: "And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Still studying, huh? You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?"
Liu Mengting shouted: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."
Liu Mengting said: 'Why are you walking so slow?' 'Old Lady He is waiting for us at home,' 'Let's move faster.' The two hurriedly left the tea garden and arrived at the village.
After a while, the clay pot was steaming, and Liu Mengting covered it with a cloth and poured the steaming hot soup into the bowls.

movie101_6969128872847770149_780_960.text: Cui Minho walked up to the director and said: "Cui Minho, thank you for being willing to help out this time too."
Cui Minho accepted the gun and said: "It's my honor."
Cui Minho said: "We're still waiting for one more person."
The officer in a military uniform said: "We've arrived."
At this moment, three sedans slowly drove up from outside the hangar and stopped in front of the group. The car door opened, and a man in a suit got out.

Cui Minho and Park Yuzhe walked out of the airport under the gaze of the crowd, and the car opened its door for them. Cui Minho looked at Kim Hae-sook in the car, and then opened the car door to walk over.

Cui Minho saluted, and Kim Hae-sook returned the salute. Kim Hae-sook said to Cui Minho: "Cui Minho Director," "You have worked hard this time," "I heard your son is having his first birthday feast today," "I've already sent someone to deliver a congratulatory gift to your home."
Cui Minho said: "You're too kind," and Kim Hae-sook smiled and nodded. Then, the two left the hangar together.
Kim Hae-sook said while walking: "I've reviewed your records," "and to be honest," "I need to apologize on behalf of my father," "to your family," "Cui Minho," "the nation owes you a lot."
Cui Minho said: "I don't know what to say to that."

Kim Hae-sook said: "Park Yuzhe is our agency's best operative; he will ensure your complete safety. By working together, we will ensure a safe return for everyone. I entrust the safety of this country, as well as that of Northeast Asia, to you all."
Cui Minho said: "We will certainly do our best." The plane took off into the dark night, and the situation became more urgent. The special envoy team prepared to act.
The scene shifts to a room where Wang Jian-zhong is checking belongings, saying: "Chief Li, please place your cell phone and personal belongings here."
Wang Jian-zhong said: "Thank you," and then Zhao Zhiren walked over to Li Yanming and introduced him.
The two policemen patted Zhao Zhiren down, finding nothing unusual, then led him away.

Zhao Zhiren and Li Yanming walked into the analysis room. The female officer scanned Zhao Zhiren's fingerprint, and Zhao Zhiren put on a virtual reality headset, following Li Yanming to a workstation. The female officer entered the password and opened the iron door, and the two walked in.

The scene shifts to the interior of the police station, where Zhao Zhiren and Li Yanming walk side by side, passing by rows of computer workstations. The two stop in front of a large screen displaying surveillance footage.

The scene shifts to the police station, where Li Yanming and Zhao Zhiren walk briskly into the command center. The colleagues who were originally busy with their work all stood up and greeted him, then returned to their posts.

The scene switches to a meeting room, where Li Yanming is holding documents and walking to his seat, followed by Zhao Zhiren and a female officer. The female officer hands the documents to Zhao Zhiren, who sits down next to Li Yanming.
Li Yanming said: "This is Inspector General Wang Jian-zhong, aside from me, he will coordinate the operations of the crisis team entirely." Wang Jian-zhong stood up and left the room.

Wang Jian-zhong said: "Ladies and gentlemen present," "These underground buyers are very cunning," "But we have identified two locations," "And the Criminal Intelligence Division has tracked their movements."

movie101_7010686199291445773_5520_5700.text: Xiao Xing looked at Lin Chong, then at the window. She took a deep breath, steadied her emotions, and methodically dismantled the restraints, successfully opening the window. She then used the restraints to unlock the door and tiptoed out.
Xiao Xing rushed to the door, only to find it locked from the inside. She tried to push the door open, but it wouldn't budge. Tang Zheng peeked through the door crack.
Tang Zheng's inner monologue: "The dark sky hangs low" "The bright stars follow" "Insects fly, insects fly" "Who are you missing"
Police Officer said: "No good, request mobile phone location tracking."
The fat man said, "Xiao Hu, request mobile phone location tracking, keep calling Xiao Xing, hurry up."

The ambulance sped along the road, with sirens blaring. Xiao Xing rushed into the house, only to find Lin Chong lying on the ground. Xiao Xing knelt beside him, anxiously grabbing his collar, but Lin Chong had no response.

Lin Chong suddenly woke up, Xiao Xing was startled and screamed. Lin Chong quickly got up and ran towards Xiao Xing. Xiao Xing hurriedly helped Lin Chong up. Lin Chong clung to Xiao Xing tightly, Xiao Xing stood up and walked towards the door.
Xiao Xing was scared into the corner of the wall. She held Lin Chong tightly in her arms. At this moment, Tang Zheng came running from upstairs. Xiao Xing immediately hid Lin Chong under the wall.

Lin Chong and Xiao Xing were knocked down by a blow from behind. Xiao Xing tried to get up but was pinned down by Lin Chong. Tang Zheng, who had just come up the stairs, saw this through the crack in the door. Xiao Xing, struggling to get up, was pinned down by Lin Chong again. Tang Zheng, holding a knife, rushed towards the door.
Tang Zheng heard the sound of a door closing. He walked over to pick up Xiao Xing's phone, and as he did, he chanted, "The dark sky hangs low, the bright stars follow."
Xiao Xing gently touched Lin Chong's face, then checked his breath. Realizing he was still alive, she quickly opened the trash can nearby.

Xiao Xing took out a small bottle from the box, opened it, and poured the contents into her hand. Then she took out a golf club and placed it on Lin Chong's chest. Xiao Xing looked up and saw the golf club, which made her even more panicked.
Tang Zheng picked up the fire extinguisher, took a swing, then aimed at Xiao Xing.
Tang Zheng stood at the doorway, his eyes gleaming in the darkness. He reached down to pick up the dropped briefcase and pressed the walkie-talkie hidden within it.

Tang Zheng looked at the key in his hand, then tossed it into the trash can. He walked into the study, which was dark and only had a faint light shining in from the doorway. The furnishings in the room were simple, with a desk and a few chairs placed around.

The scene shifts to Tang Zheng, who is pacing back and forth in the living room. He looks up at the clock on the wall, then pulls back the curtains and opens the French windows. Xiao Xing, who is sitting on the sofa, watches him with a worried expression.
Xiao Xing retreated while saying, "Don't come any closer."

movie101_7101937153785102885_2940_3120.text: Qi Jia said: "A pet raised from childhood."
Yuan Xiaoou lay on the bed and said: "People and their pets really match each other. I've been here for four years, and I've never seen any turtles. I bet it turned into somebody's turtle jelly."
Qi Jia said: "Even if it turned into a turtle spirit, you have to help me find it."

Qi Jia was holding a glass of water and fell asleep on the bed, with the glass still in her hand. Yuan Xiaoou was lying on the floor covered with a blanket, surrounded by a pile of garbage, with a turtle slowly crawling towards him.
The scene shifts to the kitchen, where Yuan Xiaoou is looking up a soup recipe on the internet. Yuan Xiaoou asked, "What do you mean by transferring me fifty thousand dollars?"
Lin Shuer parked the car at home and said, "I have to go on a business trip for a while." "That money is for Qi Jia's treatment."
Yuan Xiaoou, on the phone, said: "You can't just not accompany her." "She even had hallucinations yesterday."
Qi Jia asked in confusion: "What?"
Qi Jia laughed and said: "Yuan Xiaoou"
Lin Shuer said: "Hallucination."
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Ah"
Lin Shuer, while driving, said: "Then you'd better cure her before I get back."
Qi Jia smiled and said: "I spent all of last night watching the moon."
The witch said: "Otherwise, be careful that some parts of your body might also become a hallucination."
Yuan Xiaoou, while making a phone call, said: "It's over, it's over." "Alternating between acting up and depression – it seems only a psychiatric hospital can treat her."
Qi Jia turned and walked away, Yuan Xiaoou watched her leaving, standing there in a daze, not knowing what to do.
Qi Jia walked past him, and Yuan Xiaoou tried to touch Qi Jia, saying: "Hey, don't touch me!"
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Big sister, did you wake up with multiple personalities? Don't scare me."
Qi Jia, frightened, said: 'My heart is beating so fast. Could I be having a heart attack?'

Yuan Xiaoou said: "No, this is just one of the early symptoms of menopause. You need to take medicine." Qi Jia was about to leave, Yuan Xiaoou handed her some medicine and said: "Here, here's the medicine."

Yuan Xiaoou, holding the soup, pleaded with Qi Jia: "Madam, for the sake of your health, please drink it, I beg you." Qi Jia turned her head to look out the window and said: "Let's be fair then." "Drink this bowl of Ganges water, and we'll be menopausal buddies in the next life."

Qi Jia said: 'Let's be fair then. Drink this bowl of Ganges water, and we'll be menopausal buddies in the next life.' The two of them took a sip of the Ganges water. Qi Jia playfully splashed the water onto Yuan Xiaoou's face, who immediately touched his swollen throat and looked at Qi Jia with a face full of grievance.

Yuan Xiaoou touched his neck and said: "I feel it, I feel something special." "Do you feel it?" After saying that, Yuan Xiaoou went into the bedroom, closed the door, and then gestured to show that he was about to kiss.

Yuan Xiaoou's face was covered with painful thorns. He bent over the window, continuously blowing on the thorns on his face. Qi Jia was drinking milk and watching TV at home when Yuan Xiaoou came over with a tablet.
Yuan Xiaoou said: "Qi Jia, you need to tell them," "say goodbye, say goodbye." Yuan Xiaoou picked up the tablet and continued: "This is your new diet."

Yuan Xiaoou continued: 'And you must follow the seven house rules. First, no drinking, second, go to bed early and get up early.' Qi Jia pointed at each rule as they were discussed. Yuan Xiaoou added: 'Oh my.'
Yuan Xiaoou said: 'Don't lock me out. What was number four again, and five?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting wipes the medicine bowl with a towel, then squats in front of Auntie He and says, "Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget."

Zhang Xiaobao was taking photos of Liu Mengting and Auntie He, when Chun Hu came over with a plate of snacks. Zhang Xiaobao saw Chun Hu and said: "Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too."
Chun Hu said: "Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength."

Auntie He said: "Much better!"
Chun Hu happily said: "That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!"

Auntie He gratefully said: "Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you."

The scene shifts to the village committee, where the villagers are gathered around the notice board. The broadcast says: "Announcement for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization." "According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization."
Bao Liang, with a pig's head in hand, pondered for a moment and then laughed, saying: "Bao Liang ah."
Bao Liang laughed and said: "Hey, hey, hey."
Director said: "You didn't need to bring a gift when you came." "Why are you being so polite?"
Bao Liang holding the pig head said: "Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home." "You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi."
Director said: "Old Five."
Director said: 'Oh.'
Director said: "Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well." "Let's have it for lunch."

Director said: "Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang."
Director said: "Alright alright alright."
Director looked at Bao Liang and said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Bao Liang said: "Hey."
Director asked: "How's business in the first half of the year?"
Bao Liang laughed and said: "Not too great, business is tough these days."
Director said: "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
Bao Liang sighed and said: "Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."
Director said: "That's a good thing!"

Bao Liang continued: "But dealing with the land isn't easy." "The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss." "Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."
Director laughed heartily, Director said: "Bao Liang ah"
Bao Liang responded: "Oh."
Director said: "This timing isn't right."
Bao Liang said in surprise: "Huh?"
Director said: "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you, will it be inappropriate?"
Director thought for a moment and said: "Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism."
Bao Liang said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Director looked at Bao Liang and asked: 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'
Bao Liang said: "Leverage? How could that be?" "My pig farm has all the proper paperwork."

"DC8 is a handheld weapon developed unilaterally by the Korean side." "Its power is unknown." "I personally believe that this weapon is quite dangerous."

Everyone fell into deep thought. The police officers in the conference room looked serious, Li Yanming frowned and sighed, then turned to the captain beside him and said: "The suspect might have a big fight with Officer Wang."
Li Yanming stood by the floor-to-ceiling window, looking at the bustling street outside, full of neon lights, and he took a drag of his cigarette.
Li Yanming smoked by the window, then extinguished the cigarette in the ashtray. The plane continued to fly, and the bomb on it was getting closer and closer to the detonation time.

The scene switches to the plane, where a person in a military uniform says: "According to international conventions," "Cui Minghao, as the director," "you cannot possess the activation codes for the device at the same time."

Officer Wang said: "Zhe Yu, you take care of one set," "Another set, I've already transmitted to a National Intelligence Service officer stationed in Hong Kong," "She is well-versed in Hong Kong affairs," "Upon arrival, she will contact you proactively."

The person in the cockpit said: "Understood." The four men in the conference room were all staring at the screen, and the man in the white tank top was examining the machine in front of him, which looked like a robot's head, complete with a mechanical arm.

movie101_7010686199291445773_5700_5880.text: Tang Zheng handed the umbrella to Xiao Xing, who then closed it. The two of them tiptoed out of the room, and only after they had left did Lin Chong regain consciousness.

Lin Chong, lying on the bed, slowly opened her eyes. Xiao Xing rushed to Tang Zheng, who had just closed the door, and drew a dagger from her waist. Tang Zheng grabbed Xiao Xing and said: "Xiao Xing, accept your fate."
Xiao Xing, who had been lying on the sofa, got up, kicked Tang Zheng to the ground, then walked to the coffee table, picked up the briefcase, and slung it over her shoulder.
Tang Zheng, who had just rushed out of the elevator, was knocked down by a man in black who had been ambushed. He struggled to get up, but his head was throbbing with pain.
Tang Zheng: "Come out" "Do you just like hiding in the dark?"

Tang Zheng, who had just escaped from death, was momentarily stunned by the sight of the bomb. He couldn't believe that Xiao Xing had prepared such a surprise for him. He looked at Xiao Xing and said, 'You are just like me.'
Tang Zheng asked: "Is it meaningful to live so painfully?"
Xiao Xing, holding a match, said: "Who is like you?" "If you want to die, go die yourself!"
Xiao Xing, scared, retreated while holding a match, and said: "Don't come closer" "Stomp your foot"
Xiao Xing said: "Keep chopping, don't stop." Tang Zheng's eyes were fixed on the key on the ground. Xiao Xing said: "Give me the key to the lock."
Tang Zheng, seeing Xiao Xing so calm, felt a bit at a loss. He slowly put down his bag, took the lit match from her hand, and looked at the drum set in the room.

Tang Zheng, seeing this, was terrified. He involuntarily took a step back, his eyes wide with fear, his breathing rapid. He tried to steady himself, but his trembling hands betrayed him. Xiao Xing, sensing his panic, took a deep breath and extended the lit match towards him.

The scene shifted to a dimly lit room, where Tang Zheng was flipping a switch, and the room instantly lit up. The chandelier spun in the air, and Xiao Xing lit a match, placing the flame near the chandelier. The sparks flew, and Tang Zheng quickly dodged to the side.

Xiao Xing, who had been hiding in the bedroom, saw Tang Zheng coming towards her with a torch. She quickly picked up a wooden stick and threw it at him. Tang Zheng dodged the stick but was hit by the torch, falling to the ground. Xiao Xing, who had been lying on the bed, got up and walked towards him.

The fire was spreading rapidly, and the room was quickly engulfed in flames. The photo of Tang Zheng was also burned to the point where it could no longer be recognized. The fire was getting closer and closer to the ceiling, and the room was filled with thick smoke.

Xiao Xing, who had been hiding in the closet, pushed the closet door open forcefully. She ran to the living room, turned on the light switch, and Tang Zheng, who had just rushed in, collided with her.

Tang Zheng picked up a wine bottle from the table and smashed it towards Xiao Xing. Xiao Xing dodged and then grabbed Tang Zheng's ankle, pulling hard. The two wrestled together, and Xiao Xing managed to stab Tang Zheng's ankle with a heel.
Tang Zheng swung his arm forcefully, hitting Xiao Xing's head against the wall. Xiao Xing, dazed, tried to crawl away but found her hands stuck to the floor.
